text.body:
3. sādhāraṇo yathā—
pūreu paṇaabhaṃge gaā vi maṇorahā savattīṇa mahaṁ |
aṇaho ṇāma ṇiattaï, akaattho vi bahuīṇa pulehi (?pulaehi) pio || 30 ||
(pūrayatu praṇayabhaṅgena gatā api manorathāḥ sapat‍nīnāṃ mama |
anagho nāma nivartate, akṛtārtho 'pi baha‍vīnāṃ pralokya mama ||) ku.
4. asādhāraṇo yathā—(raghu. 14.87)
tyaktvā sītāṃ daśamukharipurnopayeme yadanyāṃ tasyā eva pratikṛtisakho yat kratūnājahāra |
vṛttāntena śravaṇaviṣayaprāpiṇā tena bhartuḥ sā durvāravyathamapi parityāgaduḥkhaṃ viṣehe || 31 ||
5. sahajarāgo yathā—(rāmābhyu.)
kṛtakakupitaiḥ bāṣpāmbhobhiḥ sadainyavilokitaiḥ vanamapi gatā yasya prītyā dhṛtāpi tathāmbayā |
navajaladharaś‍yāmāḥ paś‍yan diśo bhavatīṃ vinā kaṭhinahṛdayo jīvatyeva priye sa tava priyaḥ || 32 ||
6. vistrabdharāgo yathā—(megha. 93)
jāne sakhyāstava mayi manaḥ sambhṛtas‍nehamasmā— ditthaṃbhūtāṃ prathamavirahe tāmahaṃ tarkayāmi |
vācālaṃ māṃ na khalu subhagammanyabhāvaḥ karoti pratyakṣaṃ te nikhilamacirād bhrātaruktaṃ mayā yat || 33 ||
7. prāp‍tasamayo yathā—
bandhūkairadharaṃ smitāni kumudairnetrāṇi nīlotpalai— rhastau kokanadairmukhaṃ ca kamalaiḥ haṃsaiḥ sahāsā giraḥ |
pratyadhvaṃ prativāsaraṃ pratisaraḥ saṃdarśayantī haṭhāt pānthānāṃ priyakāminīva kurute yātroparodhaṃ śarat || 34 ||
8. aprāp‍tasamayo yathā—
udyada‍barhiṣi dardurāravapuṣi prakṣīṇapānthāyuṣi śacyotadvipruṣi candraruṅa‍muṣi sakhe haṃsadviṣi prāvṛṣi |
mā muñcoc‍cakucāntasantatagalada‍bāṣpākulāṃ bālikāṃ kāle kālakarālanīlajaladavyālup‍tabhāsvattviṣi || 35 ||
9. sapratividhāno yathā—(megha. 4)
pratyāsanne nabhasi dayitājīvitālambanārthī jīmūtena svakuśalamayīṃ hārayiṣyan pravṛttim |
sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai prītaḥ prītipramukhavacanaṃ svāgataṃ vyājahāra || 36 ||
10. niṣpratividhāno yathā—(urāca. 3.45)
vyarthaṃ yatra kapīndrasakhyamapi me vīryaṃ harīṇāṃ vṛthā prajñā jāmbavato na yatra na gatiḥ putrasya vāyorapi |
mārgaṃ yatra na viśvakarmatanayaḥ kartuṃ nalo 'pi kṣamaḥ saumitrerapi patttriṇāmaviṣaye tatra priye k‍vāsi me || 37 ||
11. sannikṛṣṭo yathā—(seba. 15.22)
sīāvioadukthaṃ visahaṃtassa caü—jāma—mettaṃtariaṃ |
dīho a gaā kālo ṇa samā ekkā a sā ṇisā rahuvaïṇo || 38 ||
(sītāviyogaduḥkhaṃ viṣahamāṇasya caturyāmamātrāntaritam |
dīrghaś‍ca gataḥ kālo na samā ekā ca sā niśā raghupateḥ ||)
12. viprakṛṣṭo yathā—(amaru. 99)
deśairantaritā śataiśca saritāmurvībhṛtāṃ kānanai— ryat‍nenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi |
uda‍grīvaścaraṇārdharuddhavasudhaḥ kṛtvāśrupūrṇāṃ dṛśaṃ tāmāśāṃ pathikastathāpi kimapi dhyāyan muhurvīkṣate || 39 ||
13. sāvadhiḥ yathā—(megha. 1)
kaścit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārāt pramatta— śśāpenāstaṅgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ |
yakṣaścakre janakatanayās‍nānapuṇyodakeṣu s‍nigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu || 40 ||
14. niravadhiḥ yathā—(urāca. 3.44)
upāyānāṃ bhāvādaviratavinodavyatikarai— rvimardairvīrāṇāṃ janitajagadatyadbha‍utarasaḥ |
viyogo mugdhākṣyāḥ sa khalu ripughātāvadhirabhūt kathaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sahyo niravadhirayaṃ tu pravilayaḥ || 41 ||
15. alpakālo yathā—(śāku. 6.12)
ekaikamatra divase divase madīyaṃ nāmākṣaraṃ gaṇaya gacchasi yāvadantam |
tāvatpriye madavarodhagṛhapraveśaṃ netā janastava samīpamupaiṣyatīti || 42 ||
16. dīrghakālo yathā—(urāca. 3.33)
devyā śūnyasya jagato dvādaśaḥ parivatsaraḥ |
praṇaṣṭamiva nāmāpi na ca rāmo na jīvati || 43 ||
17. saṃsṛṣṭo yathā—(gāsa. 848ve.)
ruaï ruantīe mae ohidiṇe gaṇaï jhijjaï ahaṃ va |
piavirahe māmi saajjhiāe ṇeho c‍cia apuvvo || 44 ||
(roditi rudatyā mayā avadhidināni gaṇayati kṣīyate 'hamiva |
priyavirahe mātulāni! prativeśinyāḥ s‍neha evāpūrvaḥ ||)
18. asaṃsṛṣṭo yathā—(gāsa. 871ve., vajjā 467)
kulapāliāe pecchaha, jovvaṇa—lāaṇṇa—vibbhama—vilāsā |
pavasaṃti vva pavasie, eti vva pie gharaṃ eṃte || 45 ||
(kulapālikāyāḥ prekṣadhvaṃ yauvanalāvaṇyavibhramavilāsāḥ |
proṣitā iva proṣite, āyātā iva priye gṛhamāgate ||)
19. prakāśakṛto yathā—
yāvannirasyati sa tatra na siddhamenāmākṛṣya khaṅgamasitaṃ nijavikrameṇa |
anyena tāvadapahṛtya mṛgāṅkalekhā nītāntarikṣagatinā rajanīcareṇa || 46 ||
20. pracchannakṛto yathā—(māmā. 8.8)
tvad‍vatsalaḥ k‍va ca tapasvijanasya hantā kanyāviṭaḥ patirasau parirakṣatu tvām |
ś‍yenāvapātacakitānanavartikeva kiṃ nekṣase nanu cirāt kabalīkṛtāsi || 47 ||
21. sopasaṃhāro yathā—(megha. 109)
śāpānto me bhujagaśayanādutthite śārṅgapāṇau māsānanyān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā |
paścādāvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tamātmānamāvāṃ nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇataśarac‍candrikāsu kṣapāsu || 48 ||
22. nirupasaṃhāro yathā—(vikra. 5.17)
nanu sulabhaviyāgā kartumātmapriyāṇi prabhavati paravattā śāsane tiṣṭha bhartuḥ |
ahamapi tava sūnāvāyuṣi nyastarājyaḥ paricitamṛgayūthānyāśrayiṣye vanāni || 49 ||
23. nāyikānimitto yathā—(vikra. 4.3)
ayamekapade tayā viyogaḥ priyayā copanataḥ suduḥsaho me |
navavāridharodayādahobhirbhavitavyaṃ ca nirātapatvaramyaiḥ || 50 ||
24. nāyakakṛto yathā—
uṇhaṃ jaüṇāeĕ jalaṃ uṇhā jaüṇāeĕ veasa—kuḍuṃgā |
uṇhā jaüṇā vi kaā keṇa vi mahuraṃ gae kaṇhe || 51 ||
(uṣṇaṃ yamunāyā jalaṃ uṣṇā yamunāyā vetasanikuñjāḥ |
uṣṇā yamunāpi kṛtā kenāpi mathurāṃ gate kṛṣṇe ||)
(viśeṣataḥ pravāsaḥ— 28)
athāto viśeṣabhedāḥ | tatra—
1. daivāpanneṣu śāpakṛto yathā—(śāku. 4.1)
vicintayantī yamananyamānasā taponidhiṃ vetsi na māmupasthitam |
smariṣyati tvāṃ na sa bodhito 'pi san kathāṃ pramattaḥ prathamoditāmiva || 52 ||
2. pāpakṛto yathā—
tvaccheṣeṇa cchuritakarayā kuṅkumenādadhatyā kokacchāyāṃ bhavanabisinīhaṃsake kautukena |
vaktrabhrāntikṣaṇavirahiṇī yatkṛtā rājahaṃsī tasyaitanme phalamupanataṃ nātha yat tvad viyogaḥ || 53 ||
3. sambhramakṛto yathā—
sambhrāntastvaritamasau malimlucānā— murvīśaḥ śamitamayodhayada‍dhanuṣkān |
kāle 'sminvinayavatī vaneṣu cārtā vārtāyai kamituritastato jagāma || 54 ||
4. vibhramakṛto yathā—
vibhrāntaḥ sapadi sa rākṣasīti sītā— manyāṃ tu svamanasi jānakītyajānāt |
jāyāvān daśarathanandano niyatyā vaiyātyād vyasanamahārṇave papāta || 55 ||
5. dharmāpanneṣu sābhiprāyo yathā—
nyakkāre vihite dviṣā yaducitaṃ manye kṛtaṃ tanmayā sve sugrīvavibhīṣaṇāvapi pade nītau punaḥ svāṃ sthitim |
ājñāṃ pālayato mameha phalitāstātāśiṣaḥ kintvidaṃ sarvaṃ neha videharājatanayātyāgād vinā labhyate || 56 ||
6. nirabhiprāyo yathā—(urāca. 1.49)
visrambhādurasi nipatya jātanidrā— munmucya priyagṛhiṇīṃ gṛhasya śobhām |
ātaṅkasphuritakaṭhoragarbhagurvīṃ kravyāde balimiva dāruṇaḥ kṣipāmi || 57 ||
7. sānutāpo yathā—
kaikeyī mayi no vilakṣavadanā no mantharānyādṛśī śrūyante na ca maithilīparijanasyādyāpi duṣṭā giraḥ |
mithyāvādavimohitena sahasā vahnau viśuddhā tathā nirvācyā kimasau mayā priyatamā dharmavadhvajenojjhitā || 58 ||
8. niranupāto yathā—
sadasi pihitadvāre dārānnidhāya pidhāya tat tṛṇajatuśaṇaiḥ pūrṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ pradīpya kṛśānunā |
avikṛtamanāḥ pārśvaṃ bharturjagāma śivāsutaḥ sakalamapi tajjñātvā cārairnṛpo 'pi visiṣmiye || 59 ||
9. arthāpanneṣu sābhyanujño yathā—(kirātā. 3.54)
tadāśu kurvan vacanaṃ maharṣermanorathānnaḥ saphalīkuruṣva |
pratyāgataṃ tvāsmi kṛtārthameva stanopapīḍaṃ parirabdhukāmā || 60 ||
10. nirabhyanujño yathā—
pratyāgamiṣyati bhaviṣyati saṅgamo 'pi sampatsyate ca hṛdayābhimato 'bhilāṣaḥ |
eṣā gatā na punareṣyati jīviteśa! vidyuda‍vilāsataralā navayauvanaśrīḥ || 61 ||
11. sopadhāno yathā—(urāca. 1.45)
śaiśavāt prabhṛti poṣitāṃ priyāṃ sauhṛdādapṛthagāśayāmimām |
chadmanā paridadāmi mṛtyave sauniko gṛhaśakuntikāmiva || 62 ||
12. nirupadhāno yathā—
sa mātulasyānucarāya jāyāṃ samarpayanno jagatīṃ jigīṣuḥ |
mahābhimānaikadhano vanāya gataiḥ sameyāya puruḥ suhṛdbhiḥ || 63 ||
13. daivadharmāpanneṣu prakṛtistho yathā—(raghu. 15.61)
śrlāghyastyāgo 'pi vaidehyāḥ patyuḥ prāgvaṃśavāsinaḥ |
ananyajāneryasyāsīt saiva jāyā hiraṇmayī || 64 ||
14. komalo yathā—(saka. 5.212)
sītāveś‍ma yato nirīkṣya harate dṛṣṭiṃ jhaṭityākulā— manyonyārpitacañculabdhakavalaiḥ pārāvatairbhūyate |
indordūrata eva naś‍yati viśatyantargṛhaṃ duḥkhitaḥ pracchādyānanamañcalena rajanīṣvastatrapaṃ roditi || 65 ||
15. kaṭhoro yathā—
chittvā nalaḥ sapadi tad‍vasanaṃ niśīthe hastaṃ gatena kalineva kulakṣureṇa |
śrāntāmaraṇyasadasi svapatīṃ vihāya bhīmātmajāmabhimatena pathā jagāma || 66 ||
16. pariṇato yathā—(śāku. 6.8)
munisutāpraṇayasmṛtirodhinā mama ca muktamidaṃ tamasā manaḥ |
manasijena sakhe! prahariṣyatā dhanuṣi cūtaśaraśca niveśitaḥ || 67 ||
17. daivārthāpanneṣu grāmyo yathā—
atha sa dayitāṃ sup‍tāmaṅkādapāsya śanaiḥśanai— śśithilitabhujāśleṣaḥ śayyāṃ vihāya vinirgataḥ |
gatavati rajanyardhe sārdha tayā sma mṛgīdṛśā mṛgapatigatiḥ paś‍yatyagre vidhiṃ hayavigraham || 68 ||
18. nāgaro yathā—
tataḥ svabhaginīmanu prahitacittavṛttiṃ patiṃ vibhāvya bhavitavyatāmapi kṛtāgamo janmanaḥ |
upāśramapadaṃ pituḥ pratijagāma vidyādharī cakāra na vidāmidaṃ madanapīḍayā pārthivaḥ || 69 ||
19. upanāgaro yathā—(harivi.)
aha diṭṭha-vikkamammi vi siṇeha-sac‍cavia-garua-viṇivāa-haā |
ciṃtei sac‍cabhāmā suraarulaṃbhaṭṭhie gaammi mahumahe || 70 ||
(atha dṛṣṭavikrame 'pi s‍nehadarśitaguruka—vinipātabhayā |
cintayati satyabhāmā suratarulābhārthike gate madhumathe ||)
20. prakīrṇo yathā—
sambodhya sāyamiti sānumatīṃ prabhāte śrīparvataṃ dhṛtadhanustapase jagāma |
putrīyato 'sya vṛṣabhadhvajasevayāsmin māsāḥ ṣaḍekamanaso dinavad vyatīyuḥ || 71 ||
21. dharmārthāpanneṣu hito yathā—
āsṛṣṭeḥ pratipārthivaṃ yuvatayo jātā manovallabhāḥ mag‍nāste vyasanārṇave ca bahavastābhiḥ sahaiveśvarāḥ |
devyā yattu kṛtaṃ tathā vikalatāmutsṛjya lokottaraṃ tasyaiṣā kṛpaṇena tena vidhinā kiṃ glānirutpādyate || 72 ||
22. avahito yathā—
yāvat priye tava pituḥ prathamasya dātuṃ nyāyārjitasya vasuno vasudhāṃ bhramāmi |
koṭīścaturdaśa gurorgurudakṣiṇāyā— stāvat sahasva virahaṃ racito 'ñjaliste || 73 ||
23. sukho yathā—
abhyāgatasya suhṛdaḥ sudhiyo 'grajāte— rātenuṣo vinayamanyaparāṅ‌mukhasya |
kānte! vrajāmi manaso 'bhimataṃ ca kartu— māhartumeva ca śiromaṇibhūṣaṇaṃ te || 74 ||
24. duḥkho yathā—
vrīḍāyogānnatavadanayā sannidhāne gurūṇāṃ baddhotkampaṃ stanamukulayormanyumantarniyamya |
tiṣṭhetyuktaṃ kimiva na tayā yat samutsṛjya bāṣpaṃ mayyāsaktaścakitahariṇīhārinetratribhāgāḥ || 75 ||
25. daivadharmārthopapanneṣu vṛtto yathā—
he dhanyāḥ śṛṇuta pradhānadhaninaḥ seyaṃ mayā preyasī matpāṇigrahadūṣaṇāditi daśāṃ yātā jagatpāvanī |
durvṛttena durantapātakaśatairastobhitaḥ pauruṣaiḥ svāmitvaikasamunnatena sudatī vikrīyate krīyatām || 76 ||
26. āyato yathā—
vanabhuvi saha patyā prasthitāṃ vīkṣya sītāṃ gṛhiṇamanuyiyāsurjānakī śokaniṣṭhā |
gurugurujanalajjānamravaktrāmbujena bhrukuṭipuṭanibandhād vāritā lakṣmaṇena || 77 ||
27. tryastro yathā—(śāku. 6.24)
saṃropite 'yyātmani dharmapat‍nī tyaktā mayā nāma kulapratiṣṭhā |
kalpiṣyamāṇā mahate phalāya vasundharā kāla ivop‍tabījā || 78 ||
28. caturastro yathā—
sāraṅgeṇa hiraṇmayena sahasā rāmaḥ sudūraṃ hṛtaḥ hā vatseti vaco niśamya tamanusnehād gato lakṣmaṇaḥ |
kāle 'smin kuliśābhighātakaṭhinakleśākulāṃ maithilī— māropyāṅkamaśaṅkameṣa nabhasā laṅkāṃ gato rāvaṇaḥ || 79 ||
athaitasya trayaḥ skandhā bhavanti— prāp‍tiskandhaḥ, vyāp‍tiskandhaḥ, samāp‍tiskandha iti| teṣu—
(1) pravāsaśaṅkā, pravāsārambhaḥ, priyaprasthānaṃ, priyānugamaḥ, priyāpraś‍naḥ, pratinivṛttiḥ, pravāsacaryā, pravāsavṛttānta iti prāp‍tiskandhasyāṣṭau prakāṇḍāni |
(2) viyuktasvarūpaṃ, viyuktāvasthā, virahoddīpanaṃ, virahapratīkāraḥ, sahāyāśvāsanaṃ, sahāyopālambhaḥ, utkaṇṭhāvinodaḥ, sandeśādānam iti vyāp‍tiskandhasyāṣṭau prakāṇḍāni |
(3) pravṛttyāgamaḥ, pravṛttiparipraś‍naḥ, avadhipratīkṣā, mārgodīkṣaṇaṃ, daivanimitta— śakunopaśrutayaḥ. susvapnadarśanaṃ, sunimittānubhavaḥ, priyapratyāgama iti samāp‍tiskandhasyāṣṭau prakāṇḍāni| tatra
(1. prāp‍tiskandhaḥ —8)
(1. pravāsaśaṅkā —5)
prāp‍tiskandhai nāyikāyāḥ priyāviyogasambhāvanā pravāsaśaṅkā |
sā ca pañcadhā vartamānā, adyatanī, hyastanī, śvastanī, bhaviṣyantī ca| tāsu
1. vartamānā yathā—
kallāṇijjaïttvā(?)satthaḍā kira jāesaï ̣dhollu |
jaï—aṃtio(ho) hiaā sahahi locaāddaṇaloo(?) mollu || 80 ||
2. adyatanī yathā—(gāsa. 2.11)
teṇa maṇe bhaggamaṇoraheṇa ullāviaṃ pavāso tti |
savisāi va alasāaṃti eṇa vahuāe aṃgāiṃ || 81 ||
(tena manye bhagnamanorathena ullāpitaṃ pravāsa iti |
saviṣāṇīva alasāyante yena vadhvāḥ aṅgāni ||)
3. hyastanī yathā—
pratyagrairapi vipriyaiḥ samucitāṃ nālambate vāmatāṃ prema pratyahamātanoti vividhaiḥ svādūttaraiḥ ceṣṭate |
soccha‍vāsā divase 'vasīdati niśānāthe punarvepate bālā śrotrapathaṃ gate parijanāt patyuḥ prayāṇadhvanau || 82 ||
4. śvastanī yathā—(gāsa. 1.46, vala. 365)
kallaṃ kira kharahiao pavasihii pio tti suvvaï jaṇammi |
taha vaḍḍha bhaavaï ṇise jaha se kallaṃ cia ṇa hoi || 83 ||
(kalyaṃ kila kharahṛdayaḥ pravatsyati priya iti śrūyate jane |
tathā vardhasva bhagavati niśe yathā tasya kalyameva na bhavati ||)
5. bhaviṣyantī yathā—
hoṃta—pia—viraha—dūsaha—saṃtāvupphasia—vaaṇa—sohāo |
caṃdamuhio tti satthā jāāo piāo paccūse || 84 ||
(bhaviṣyat—priya—viraha—dussaha—santāponmṛṣṭa—vadana—śobhāḥ |
candramukhya iti sārthā jātāḥ priyāḥ pratyūṣe ||)
(2. pravāsārambhaḥ —5)
nāyakasya priyāparityāgodyogaḥ pravāsārambhaḥ| so 'pi pañcadhā—'pravṛttoparataḥ, pravṛttāvirataḥ, nityapravṛttaḥ, bhūtasāmīpyaḥ, bhaviṣyatsāmīpyaśca| teṣu
1. pravṛttoparato yathā—
kāme kelirasānubandhavidhure jāte tadopakrame pakṣmāgragrathitāśrubindujaḍayā dṛṣṭayā nirīkṣya kṣaṇam |
śvo gantā niyamena kiṃ priya iti prāṇeśayā vyāhṛte yūnaḥ sādarakalpito 'pi sahasā bhagnaḥ prayāṇodyamaḥ|| 85 ||
2. pravṛttāvirato yathā—(gāsa. 1.47)
hoṃtapahiassa jāā āucchaṇa—jīadhāraṇahassaṃ |
pucchaṃtī bhamaï gharaṃ ghareṇa pia—viraha—sahirīo || 86 ||
(bhaviṣyatpathikasya jāyā āpṛcchana jīvadhāraṇārahasyam |
pṛcchantī bhramatī gṛhaṃ gṛheṇa priyavirahasahanaśīlāḥ ||)
3. nityapravṛtto yathā—(gāsa. 3.61)
ghariṇi-ghaṇa-tthaṇa-pellaṇa-suhelli-paḍiassa hoṃta-pahiassa |
avasaüṇaṃgāraavāra-viṭṭhi-diahā suhāveṃtī || 87 ||
(gṛhiṇīghanastanapīḍanasukhakelipatitasya bhaviṣyatpathikasya |
apaśakunā 'ṅgārakavāra—viṣṭidivasāssukhayanti ||)
4. bhūtasāmīpyo yathā—(amaru. 35)
prasthānaṃ valayaiḥ kṛtaṃ priyasakhairastrairajastraṃ gataṃ dhṛtyā na kṣaṇamāsitaṃ vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ |
yātuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve saha prasthitā gantavye sati jīvita! priyasuhṛtsārthaḥ kimutsṛjyate || 88 ||
5. bhaviṣyatsāmīpyo yathā—(gāsa. 831 vai.)
kaṇṇe paḍiaṃ hiae paḍiaṃ cia o mae aha/bhavvāe |
jāmi tti tujjha vaaṇaṃ kiṃ va ṇa sahiaṃ pavāsassa || 89 ||
(karṇe patitaṃ hṛdaye/yaṃ patitameva o mayā abhavyayā |
yāmīti tava vacanaṃ kiṃ vā na soḍhaṃ pravāsasya ||)
(3. priyaprasthānam — 5)
nāyakasya gehād vinirgamaḥ priyaprasthānam| tadapi pañcadhā—'pravṛttam, apravṛttaṃ, pravṛttāpravṛttam, apravṛttapravṛttam, apravṛttāpravṛttaṃ' ceti| teṣu—
1. pravṛttaṃ yathā—(amaru. 85)
dṛṣṭaḥ kātaranetrayā 'tisuciraṃ bada‍dhvāñjaliṃ yācitaḥ paścādaṃśukapallave ca vidhṛto nirvyājamāliṅgitaḥ |
ityākṣipya sadāsamastamaghṛṇo gantuṃ pravṛttastadā pūrvaṃ prāṇaparigraho dayitayā muktastato vallabhaḥ || 90 ||
2. apravṛttaṃ yathā—(amaru. 63)
lag‍nā nāṃśukapallave bhujalatā na dvāradeśe 'rpitā no vā pādayuge muhurnipatitā tiṣṭheti noktaṃ vacaḥ |
kāle kevalamambudālimaline gantuṃ samabhyudyata— stanvyā bāṣpajalaudhakalpitanadīpūreṇa ruddhaḥ priyaḥ || 92 ||
3. pravṛttāpravṛttaṃ yathā—
yāmītyuktavati vrajetyabhihitaṃ trastaṃ vimaktāsane dvitrāṇyeva padāni gacchati galada‌bāṣpāndhamālokitam |
niryāte dayite 'śrūpūritadṛśā tanmugdhayānuṣṭhitaṃ vyāse 'vasthitipatrakaṃ pravasato yajjātamājanmanaḥ || 92 ||
4. apravṛttapravṛttaṃ yathā—
yātrāmaṅgalasannidhānaracanāvyagre sakhīnāṃ gaṇe bāṣpāmbhaḥpihitekṣaṇe gurujane tada‌vatsuhṛnmaṇḍale |
prāṇeśasya madīkṣaṇāhitadṛśaḥ kṛcchradatikrāmataḥ kiṃ vrīḍāhatayā mayā bhujalatāpāśo na kaṇṭhe 'rpitaḥ || 93 ||
5. apravṛttāpravṛttaṃ yathā—
kartavyaṃ na nivāritaṃ gurujanāt prāsthānikaṃ lajjayā śūnyaṃ manyunirodhamantharagirā saṃvargikā bāndhavāḥ |
pānthena priyavipravāsavidhurāṃ dṛṣṭavāṃ puraḥ preyasī— mud‌bāṣpeṇa diśo nivṛttiśakunapratyāśayā vīkṣitāḥ || 94 ||
(4. priyānugamaḥ —5)
nāyikāyāḥ preyasā saha prasthānasīmāntāt priyānugamaḥ, so 'pi pañcadhā—saha, agrataḥ, paścāt, dūrataḥ, antika iti| teṣu— sahānugamo yathā—(amaru. 10)
yātāḥ kiṃ na milanti sundari! punaścinteti nāsmāsu te kāryā dūramanudrutā hi kathayatय़evaṃ muhuḥ preyasi |
tanvyā mantharatārakeṇa bahuśaḥ pītāśruṇā cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭā taṃ hasitaṃ na kintu maraṇotsāhastayā sūcitaḥ || 95 ||
agrato yathā—
tiṣṭhetyuktaḥ pravasan dayitānayanena kṛṣṇaśāreṇa |
dayitaḥ purato yātaṃ vāmaṃ valatā mṛgeṇeva || 96 ||
paścāt yathā—
pariṣvaktastāvad gurujanabhayānnaiva sa mayā na coktaṃ tiṣṭheti priyāvirahabāṣpārdragalayā |
drutaṃ gacchāmīti priyasakhi! sudṛṣṭo 'pi na kṛto niruddho yāvanme nayanasalilairdṛṣṭiviṣayaḥ || 97 ||
dūrato yathā—
kiṃ vaḥ ko 'pi jano 'dhvagāssvavasaterāpṛcchaya mụ̄dhāṃ priyā— mutsṛjyāgatavānvimūḍhahṛdayo dhīraṃ dhvanatyambude |
bālā māṃsalapaṅkabhūyasi pathi śrāntā puro vallabhe dūraṃ gacchati pṛcchatīti pathikān kṣībānivākuñcati || 98 ||
antikato yathā—
dūraṃ sundari nirgatāsi nagarādeṣa drumaḥ kṣīravā— nasmādeva nivartyatāmiti śanairuktvādhvagena priyām |
gạ̄dhiliṅganavāmanīkṛtakucābhogasphuṭatkañcukaṃ vīkṣyoraḥsthalamaśrupūritadṛśā prasthānabhaṅgaḥ kṛtaḥ || 99 ||
(5. priyāpraś‍naḥ — 5)
prasthitasya sambhāṣaṇāśleṣādipūrvakaḥ priyajanaparityāgaḥ priyāpraśnaḥ| so 'pi pañcadhā — 'sambhāṣaṇakṛtaḥ, āliṅganakṛtaḥ, avadhipradānakṛtaḥ, avadhiyācanakṛtaḥ, priyānuśāsanakṛtaśce' ti| teṣu—
1. sambhāṣaṇakṛto yathā—
āucchaṃtammi pie puratto saüṇa—pisuṇiāpeaṃ |
ruṇṇaṃ sasajjhasosariavāhadhāraṃ kulavahae || 100 ||
(āpṛcchamāne priye purastāt śakunapiśunitāpetam |
ruditaṃ sasādhvasāpasṛtabāṣpadhāraṃ kulavadhvā ||)
2. āliṅganakṛto yathā—(gāsa. 786 ve.)
āucchaṇovaūhaṇa—kaṃṭhasamosaria—vāhulaïāe |
valaāi pahiacalaṇe vahue ṇialā via paḍaṃti || 101 ||
(āpṛcchanopagūhana—kaṇṭha—samapasṛta—bāhulatikāyāḥ |
valayāni pathikacaraṇe vadhvāḥ nigaḍā iva patanti ||)
3. avadhipradānakṛto yathā—
jāva a ṇa dei ohiṃ uvaūḍhaṃ jāva ṇea saḍilei |
maraṇe ṇa puṇṇaaṃ puṇo kiṃ māe tāva garuavio appā || 102 ||
(yāvacca na dadāti avadhimupagūḍhaṃ yāvannaiva ślathayati |
maraṇe na punaḥ kiṃ mātaḥ tāvad gurūkṛta ātmā ||)
4. avadhiyācanakṛto yathā—(saka. 726)
mugdhe! preṣaya yāmi yānti pathikāḥ kālo 'vadheḥ kathyatā— mudvig‍na kimakāṇḍa eva bhavatī tūṣṇīṃ kimevaṃ sthitā |
pūrvoktoparatāṃ priyeṇa dayitāmāśliṣya tat tat kṛtaṃ datto yena samastapānthavirahaprāṇāntako ḍiṇḍimaḥ || 103 ||
5. priyānuśāsanakṛto yathā—
āpṛṣṭāsi vinirgato 'dhvagajanastanvaṅgi! gacchāmyahaṃ svalpaireva dinaiḥ samāgama iti jñātvā śucaṃ mā kṛthāḥ |
ityākarṇya vacaḥ priyasya sahasā tanmugdhayānuṣṭhitaṃ yenākuṇṭhasamāp‍tatīvravirahakleśaḥ kṛto vallabhaḥ || 104 ||
(6. pratinivṛttiḥ — 5)
preyasi gate nāyikādīnāṃ gṛhāgamanaṃ pratinivṛttiḥ| sāpi pañcadhā—'gṛhāt, alindataḥ, aṅgaṇataḥ, upavanāt, jalāśayata' iti |
1. gṛhād yathā—
mayā baddhā veṇī nivasitamaśuklaṃ ca vasanaṃ śrutāḥ śocantīnāṃ parijanasakhīnāmapi giraḥ |
nivṛttāste dṛṣṭā gatamanugatā ye 'sya suhṛda— stathāpyete prāṇā dayitamanuyātā na kṛpaṇāḥ || 105 ||
2. alindato yathā—
saukhye gate pravasatā dayitena sārdhaṃ netradvaye dayitamārgagamānnivṛtte |
vrīḍāvatī bata kṛtā hatajīvitena niryāya yanna padamātramapi prayātam || 106 ||
3. aṅgaṇato yathā—(amaru. 79)
yāsyāmīti samudyatasya vadato vistrabdhamākarṇitaṃ gacchan dūramudīkṣito muhurasau vyāvṛtya paś‍yannapi |
kāruṇya punarāgato 'smi bhavane prāṇāsta eva sthitāḥ sakhyastiṣṭhata jīvitavyasaninī dambhādahaṃ rodimi || 107 ||
4. upavanato yathā—
ammaṇuaṃcevi jāhi huā heṭṭhi baïṭṭha |
virahe pucchaï jāhi kahiṃ bahuahiṃ kālahaṃ diṭṭha || 108 ||
5. jalāśayato yathā—
priyānugamato gṛhaṃ pratinivṛttya mugdhekṣaṇā nirīkṣya sarasīmapi sphuṭitapaṅkajāmodinīm |
vrajantamapi dūrataḥ samanukūlavātādhvanā nivṛttamukhasīrikāvalitakaṇṭhamālokate || 109 ||
(7. pravāsācaryā — 32)
priyaviyoge nāyiketivṛttaṃ pravāsacaryā |
sā svedeśakālakāryapātraucityaśaktisādhanopāyabhedāt dvātriṃśatprakārā| teṣu —
deśaścaturdhā — svakīyaḥ, parakīyaḥ, svakīyaparakīyaḥ, na svakīyo na parakīya iti| evaṃ kāladayo 'pi| tatra—
kālaḥ — sādhāraṇaḥ, asādhāraṇaḥ, ullekhavān, anullekhavān ca |
kāryaṃ — sāmānyavat, viśeṣavat, nityaṃ naimittikaṃ ca |
pātram — uttamādikaṃ, udāttādikaṃ, mugdhādikaṃ, adhīrādikaṃ ca |
aucityaṃ — jātitaḥ, kriyātaḥ, guṇataḥ, dravyaśca |
śaktiḥ— autsāhikī, vaiśikī, sāhāyyikī, daivikī ca |
sādhanam — upādānaṃ, hetuḥ, kāraṇaṃ, adhikaraṇaṃ ca |
upāyaḥ — svābhāvikaḥ, prāyatnikaḥ, sārvalaukikaḥ, yādṛcchika iti| tatra—
deśopādhibhedeṣu —
1. svakīyadeśe yathā—(megha. 82)
tāṃ jānīthāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ dūrībhūte mayi sahacare cakravākīmivaikām |
gạ̄dhotkaṇṭhā—guruṣu divaseṣveṣu gacchatsu bālāṃ jātāṃ manye śiśiramathitāṃ padminīṃ vā 'nyarūpām || 110 ||
2. parakīyadeśe yathā—(seba. 11.48)
hattheṇa vāhagaruia—dūrapalaṃvālao—tthaeṇa vahaṃtiṃ |
pia—pesiaṃgulīa—a—maṇi—paaḍekkapāsaṃ va muhaṃ || 111 ||
(hastena bāṣpagurukaṃ dūrapralambālakāvastṛtena vahantīm |
priya—proṣitāṅgulīyakamaṇiprabhāprakaṭaikapārśvamiva mukam ||)
3. svakīyaparakīye yathā—(śāku. 7.21)
vasane paridhūsare vasānā niyamakṣāmatanuḥ kṛtaikaveṇiḥ |
atiniṣkaruṇasya śuddhaśīlā mama dīrghāṃ virahavyathā bibharti || 112 ||
4. na svakīye na parakīye yathā—
gatavati niṣedheśvare vibuddhā vanabhuvi bhīmasutā bhramanmṛgīva |
mṛgayitumanusānu sā 'nugantuṃ diśi diśi dattaviloladīrghadṛṣṭiḥ || 113 ||
(kālopādhibhedeṣu) kālaḥ —
5. sādhāraṇo yathā—(gāsa. 839 ve.)
jaha diahavirāmo ṇava—sirīsa—gaṃduddharāṇilagghavio |
pahia—gharaṇīa ṇa tahā tavei tivvo vi majjhaṇho || 114 ||
(yathā divasaviromo navaśirīṣagandhoddhurānilārghitaḥ |
pathikagṛhiṇīḥ na tathā tāpayati tīvro 'pi madhyāhnaḥ ||)
6. asādhāraṇo yathā—
maṇṇo daḍḍhaṃ daḍḍhaṃ va hiaaṃ evi tuha pasāeṇa |
dūruṇṇaa—ghaṇa—sāmaliādisā hi sigghapariṇāmā || 115 ||
(manye dagdhaṃ gaddhamiva hṛdayaṃ he api tava prasādena |
dūronnata—ghana—ś‍yāmalitā diśā hi śīghrapariṇāmāḥ ||)
7. ullekhavān yathā—(sūmu. 24)
asmin varṣamahe na vartata idaṃ yatkāmadevotsave stheyaṃ putri! nirannayā tadadhunā kiñcinmukhe dīyatām |
ityukte jaratījanena kathamapyadhvanyavadhvā tataḥ paryaste 'hani kalpitaśca kavalo dhautaśca dhārāśrubhiḥ || 116 ||
8. anullekho yathā—
snātāyāḥ svajanotsave vidhiriti snānīyaśūnyairjalai— rbibhratyā gurugauraveṇa guruṇī rakte vṛthā vāsasī |
patyurmaṅgalamicchatā parijanenāyojite maṇḍane tanvyā locanavāritā kathamapi svacchandamāgacchati || 117 ||
kāryopādhibhedeṣu
9. sāmānyavad yathā—(gāsa. 870ve.)
abbhara(taṃbara)sūṇāi ṇiraṃjaṇāi vaïrikkaruṇṇapusiāiṃ |
virahukkaṃṭhaṃ kulavāliāṇa sāheṃti acchīiṃ || 118 ||
(abhra/tāmrāṃśūni nirañjanāni pratiriktaruditamṛṣṭāni |
virahotkaṇṭhāṃ kulapālikānāṃ kathayanti akṣiṇi ||)
10. viśeṣavad yathā—(gāsa. 838ve.)
ukkaṃṭhāṇicchāā savvaṃ cia pariaṇaṃ ruṇāvei |
āaṃbirehi ajjhā pusiaparuṇṇehi acchīhiṃ || 119 ||
(utkaṇṭhāniś‍chāyā sarvameva parijanaṃ rodayati |
ātāmrābhyāmāryā pramṛṣṭapraharuditābhyāmakṣibhyām ||)
11. nityaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 5.93)
aïkovaṇā vi sāsū ruāviā gaavaīa soṇhāe |
pāapaḍaṇoṇṇaāe dosu vi galiesu valaesu || 120 ||
(atikopanā nu śvaśrūḥ roditā gatapatikayā snuṣayā |
pādapatanāvanatayā dvayorapi galitayoḥ valayayoḥ ||)
12. naimittikaṃ yathā—
chaṇapaḍivaāe pahadevaaṇā dijjaṃti pahiaghariṇīe |
dobballagaliavalaomi/valaāe parigaā maṃgalapaīvā || 121 ||
(kṣaṇapratipadāyāṃ pathadaivatānāṃ dīyamāne pathikagṛhiṇyā |
daurbalyagalitavalayayā parigatā maṅgalapradīpāḥ ||)
pātrabhedeṣu,
13. uttamā yathā—
ghanagirīndravilaṅghanaśālinā vanagatā vanajadyutilocanā |
jana/ hanumatā dadṛśe janakātmajā tarumṛgeṇa tarusthalaśāyinī || 122 ||
madhyamā yathā— (megha. 88)
ādhikṣāmāṃ virahaśayane sanniṣaṇṇaikapārśvāṃ prācīmūle tanumiva kalāmātraśeṣāṃ himāṃśoḥ |
nītā rātriḥ kṣaṇami(i)va mayā sārdhamicchāratairyā tāmevoṣṇairvirahamahatīmaśrubhiryāpayantīm || 123 ||
14. udāttā yathā—
śvāsāliṅganadhūsareṇa sumukhī bimbādhareṇāmunā paryantāruṇatāṃ dṛśorvidadhatī bāṣpairavicchedibhiḥ |
kṣāmakṣāmakapolamānanamanuvyālambilolālakā gātrairujjhitabhūṣaṇairiyamaho dhatte navaṃ maṇḍanam || 124 ||
lalitā yathā—(megha. 91)
nūnaṃ tasyāḥ prabalaruditocchūnanetraṃ priyāyāḥ niḥśvāsānāmaśiśiratayā bhinnavarṇādharoṣṭham |
hastanyastaṃ mukhamasakalavyakti lambālakatvā— dindordainyaṃ tvadanusaraṇakliṣṭakānterbibharti || 125 ||
15. mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.8, vala. 377)
ajjaṃ gao—tti ajjaṃ gao—tti ajjaṃ gao—tti gaṇarīe |
paḍhamaccia jāmada‌dhe kuḍḍo rehāhiṃ cittalio || 126 ||
(udya gata ityadya gata iti gaṇanaśīlayā |
prathama eva yāmārdhe kuḍय़ṃ rekhābhiścitritam ||)
pragalbhā yathā—(megha. 90)
niḥśśvāsenādharakisalayakleśinā vikṣipantī śuddhasnānāt paruṣamalakaṃ nūnamāgaṇḍalambam |
matsambhogaḥ kathamupanayet svapnajo 'pīti nidrā— mākāṅkṣantī nayanasalilotpīḍaruddhāvakāśām || 127 ||
16. adhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 836ve.)
vijjhāvei paīvaṃ abbhuṭṭhatīe pahiajāāe |
piaama—vioa—dīhara—ṇīsāsa—ri़ñcholī || 128 ||
(nirvāpayati pradīpamabhyuttiṣṭhantyāḥ pathikajāyāyāḥ |
priyatamaviyogadīrghanissahaniḥśvāsapaṅktiḥ ||)
dhīrā yathā—
॰ ॰ ॰ jā ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ taṃ |
sapallahanthiaṃ sukhāā pahiajāā || 129 ||
aucityabhedeṣu
17. jātyaucityaṃ yathā—
pariaḍḍiāi doṇṇi vi ghariṇīe daïe pavasie eṃte |
ṇiamo kulāṇurūo siṇehasarisaṃ va dobballaṃ || 130 ||
(parityak‍te dve api gṛhiṇyā dayite proṣite āgate |
niyamaḥ kulānurūpaḥ snehasadṛśaṃ daurbalyam ||)
18. kriyaucityaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 837ve.)
jaṃ pīaṃ maṃgalavāsaṇāe patthāṇapaḍhamadiahaṃmi |
bāhasalilaṃ ṇa ṇiṭṭhaï taṃ cia virahe ruaṃtīe || 131 ||
(yatpītaṃ maṅgalavāsanayā prasthānaprathamadivase |
bāṣpasalilaṃ na tiṣṭhati tadeva virahe rudatyāḥ ||)
19. guṇaucityaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 871ve.)
kulavāliāe pecchaha jovvaṇalāaṇṇavibbhamavilāsā |
pavasaṃti vva pavasie eṃti vva pie gharaṃ eṃte || 132 ||
(kulapālikāyāḥ prekṣadhvaṃ yauvanavalāṇyavibhramavilāsāḥ |
pravasantīva proṣita āyāntīva priye gṛhamāyāte ||)
20. dravyaucityaṃ yathā—
ṇa vi taha gharammi daḍ̣dhe aṇṇesu visaccaesu bahuesu |
kuḍḍaliesu jaha sāsa ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ || 133 ||
śaktibhedeṣu,
21. autsāhikī yathā—(gāsa. 3.83)
āsāsei pariaṇaṃ parivattaṃtīeṁ pahiajāāe |
ṇitthāmuvvattaṇahatthamuhalo valaasaddo || 134 ||
(āśvāsayati parijanaṃ parivartamānāyāḥ pathikajāyāyāḥ |
niḥsthāmodvartana—hastavalanamukharo valayaśabdaḥ ||)
22. vaiśikī yathā—(gārako. 383)
raṇaraṇaa—rujja—dabbalaehi ṇaccaï ṇaḍo vva haaloo |
virahe maraṇeṇa viṇā siṇeharehā ṇa ṇivvaḍaï || 135 ||
(raṇaraṇakarodanadaurvalyaiḥ nṛtyati naṭa iva hatalokaḥ |
virahe maraṇena vinā sneharekhā na spaṣṭībhavati ||)
23. sāhāyyakī yathā—
oppejjaü chaṇadiahe savattivaggassa pahiagharaṇīe |
pavihajjiūṇa bahuso virahasihī dīvamisseṇa || 136 ||
(ucchidyate kṣaṇadivase sapatnīvargasya pathikagṛhiṇyā |
vardhayitvā bahuśo virahaśikhinaṃ dīpakamiṣeṇa ||)
24. daivikī yathā—(gāsa. 711ve. saka. 5.586)
jaṃ mucchiae ṇa suo kalaṃvagaṃdheṇa taṃ guṇe paḍiaṃ |
harā gajjiasaddo jīeṇa viṇā ṇa volaṃto || 137 ||
(yanmūrcchitayā na śrutaṃ kadambagandhena tada‍guṇe patitam |
itarathā garjitaśabdo jīvitena vinā na atikrāmet ||)
sādhanabhedeṣu,
25. upādānaṃ yathā—
pamhuṭṭhapāṇiāe vi pahaahiaāe pahiajāāe |
pahamaṃḍalaṃ ua roirīe vāheṇa sicaṃvi || 138 ||
(vismṛtapāṇikāyāḥ vipathagatahṛdayāyāḥ pathikajāyāyāḥ |
pathamaṇḍalaṃ paś‍ya rodanaśīlāyāḥ bāṣpeṇa secitam ||
26. hetuḥ yathā—
ṇīsahavevirasihaṃ pahiavahū bāhasalilasippaṃtaṃ |
dei pahadevaāṇaṃ bhāmaṃ bhāmaṃ ca ṇavapaīvaṃ || 139 ||
(niḥsahavepanaśīlaśikhaṃ pathikavadhūḥ bāṣpasalilasicyamānam |
dadāti pathadaivatānāṃ bhrāmaṃ ca navapradīpam ||)
27. karaṇaṃ yathā—
gimhaṃ gamei kaha kaha vi virahasihi—tāviā vi pahiavahū |
aviraa—paḍaṃta—ṇibbhara—vāhajalollā—varilleṇa || 140 ||
(grīṣmaṃ gamayati kathaṃ kathamapi virahaśikhitāpitāpi pathikavadhūḥ |
avirata—patrannirbhara—bāṣpa—jalārdreṇa vastreṇa ||)
28. adhikaraṇaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 4.15)
jhaṃjhāvāottiṇie gharammi rottūṇa ṇīsahaṇisaṇṇaṃ |
dāvei vva gaavaïaṃ vijjujjoo jalaharāṇaṃ || 141 ||
(jhañjhāvātottṛṇite gṛhe ruditvā niḥsahaniṣaṇṇām |
darśayatīva gatapatikāṃ vidyuda‍dyoto jaladharāṇām ||)
upāyabhedeṣu,
29. svābhāviko yathā—(gāsa. 834ve.)
uppekkhāgaa—daliaṃga—saṃgamuc‍cilia—viuṇaseāe |
bolīṇo vi ṇa ṇāo paütthapaïāe hemaṃto || 142 ||
(utprekṣāgatadalitāṅgasaṅgamoc‍calitadviguṇasvedayā |
atikrānto 'pi na jñātaḥ proṣitapatikayā hemantaḥ ||)
30. prāyat‍niko yathā—(gāsa. 2.33)
saaṇe ciṃtāmaliaṃ kāūṇa piaṃ ṇimīliach‌chīe |
appāṇo uvaụ̄dho pasịdhilavalaāhi bāhāhiṃ || 143 ||
(śayane cintāmalitaṃ kṛtvā priyaṃ nimilitākṣyā |
ātmā upagūḍhaḥ praśithilavalayābhyāṃ bāhubhyām ||)
31. sārvalaukiko yathā—(gāsa. 3.22)
pia—saṃbharaṇa—paloṭṭhaṃta—bāhadhārā—ṇivāa—bhīāe |
dijjaï vaṃkaggīvāe dīvao pahiajāāe || 144 ||
(priyasaṃsmaraṇapraluṭhada‍bāṣpadhārānipātabhītayā |
dīpyate vakragrīvayā dīpakaḥ pathikajāyayā || )
32. yādṛcchiko yathā—
mañjaryo na vilokitā vikasitāś‍cūtasya bāṣpāndhayā nāghrātā api santataśvasitayā vātāstadāmodinaḥ |
bhṛṅgāṇāṃ kalikāvṛtaśravaṇayā no gītamākarṇitaṃ kṣemeṇa vyatilaṅghitā pathika! he vadhvā madhuśrīstava || 145 ||
(8. pravāsavṛttāntaḥ — 15)
priyāviyoge viprayoge videśādau nāyikāvasthānaṃ pravāsavṛttāntaḥ | saḥ pravāsacaryayā vyākhyātaḥ; bhūyaśca viśeṣato vakṣyāmaḥ | tatra—
deśastridhā — grāmyaḥ, āraṇyaḥ, sādhāraṇaśca | teṣu —
1. grāmyo yathā—(amaru. 131)
grāme 'smin pathikāya pāntha vasatirnaivādhunā dīyate paś‍yātraiva vivāhamaṇḍapatale pānthaḥ prasup‍to yuvā |
tenotthāya khalena garjati ghane smṛtvā priyāṃ tatkṛtaṃ yenādyāpi karaṅkadaṇḍapatanāśaṅkī janastiṣṭhati || 146 ||
2. āraṇyo yathā—(rāca. 1.1)
atha mālyavataḥ prasthe kākutsthasya viyoginaḥ |
durnivārāstrasaṃvego jagāma jaladāgamaḥ || 147 ||
3. sādhāraṇo yathā—(līlāvatī 80)
pajjatta—viāsu—vvellaguṃdi—pabbhāra—ṇamia—dalāiṃ |
pahiāṇa durāloāi honti māaṃdagahaṇāiṃ || 148 ||
(paryāp‍tavikāsaprasaraṇaśīlamañjarīprāgbhāranamitadalāni |
pathikānāṃ durālokāni bhavanti mākandagahanāni ||)
kālaḥ upakrāntaḥ, prakrāntaḥ, vyatikrāntaśca | tatra —
4. upakrānto yathā—(seba. 5.1)
aha jalaṇihimmi ahiaṃ maaṇe a miaṃkadaṃsaṇaviaṃbhaṃte |
virahavihurassa ṇajjaï ṇisā vi rāmassa vaḍ‌̣dhiuṃ āḍhaḍhattā || 149 ||
(atha jalanidhau adhikaṃ madane ca mṛgāṅkadarśanavijṛmbhamāṇe |
virahavidhurasya jñāyate niśā api rāmasya vardhitumārabdhā ||)
5. prakrānto yathā—
hiaï khuḍuk‍kaï goraḍī gaaṇi ghuḍukkaï mehu |
vāsāratti pavāsuahaṃ visamā saṃkaḍu aihu || 150 ||
(hṛdaye (khaṭakatī) śalyāyate gaurī gagane (ghuḍak‍kati) garjati meghaḥ |
varṣārātre pravāsināṃ viṣamaṃ saṅkaṭametat ||)
6. vyatikrānto yathā—(seba. 1.15)
gamiā kalaṃbavāā diṭṭhaṃ mehaṃdhaāriaṃ gaaṇaalaṃ |
sāhio gajjiasaddo tahavi hu se ṇatthi jīvie āsaṃgho || 151 ||
(gamitāḥ kadambavātāḥ dṛṣṭaṃ meghāndhakāritaṃ gaganatalam |
soḍhaḥ garjitaśabdastathāpi tasya nāsti jīvite āsaṅgaḥ ||)
kāryaṃ nirvartyavṛtti, vikāryavṛtti, prāpyavṛtti ceti | tatra —
7. nirvartyavṛtti yathā—
jāāsahattha vakkīvā ho aamalie vihatthehiṃ |
pahieṇa paḍhamadiahe visavvacchiṇṇaṃṇa vatthaaṇaṃ || 152 ||
8. vikāryavṛtti yathā—
kajjalamalalli aṃṅgaṃṭhiṃ ummola kaṃvijāma vasaṃto |
dhavalavalaāṇapuṃjaṃtā pecchaï savvale pahio || 153 ||
9. prāpyavṛtti yathā—(gāsa. 4.96)
rāyaviruddhaṃ va kahaṃ pahio pahiassa sāhaï sasaṃkaṃ |
jatto aṃbāṇa vaṇaṃ tatto daraṇiggaaṃ kipiṃ || 154 ||
(rājaviruddhamiva kathāṃ pathikaḥ pathikasya śaṃsati saśaṅkam |
yata āmrāṇāṃ vanaṃ tataḥ īṣannirgataṃ kimapi ||)
pātram — uttamaṃ, madhyamaṃ, kaniṣṭhaṃ ca | tatra —
10. uttamaṃ yathā—
koṭi—pariṭṭhaviā—ṇaṇa—bhara—ṇimiaṃ raghuvaïssa sīāvirahe |
cāvavaliaṃ ca ṇavaraṃ sajjiajīaṃ va vāhadhārāhi kaaṃ || 155 ||
(koṭiparisthāpitānanabharanamitaṃ raghupateḥ sītāvirahe |
cāpavalitaṃ ca kevalaṃ sajjita—jīvamiva bāṣpadhārābhiḥ kṛtam ||
11. madhyamaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 4.99)
majjhaṇhapatthiassa vi gimhe pahiassa haraï saṃdāvaṃ |
hiaa—ṭṭhia—jāā—muha—miaṃka—joṇhā—jalappavāho || 156 ||
(madhyāhnaprasthitasyāpi grīṣme pathikasya harati santāpam |
hṛdayasthitajāyāmukhamṛgāṅkajyots‍nājalapravāhaḥ ||)
12. kaniṣṭhaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 7.39)
agghāi chivaï cumbaï hiaamiṃ ṭhevaï jaṇiaromaṃco |
jāā—kaola—sāri—cchaāe pahio mahuapupphaṃ || 157 ||
(āghrāti spṛśati cumbati hṛdaye sthāpayati janitaromāñcaḥ |
jāyākapolasādṛkṣyāt pathiko madhūkapuṣpam ||)
aucityaṃ s‍nehaucityaṃ, udyogaucityam, autsukyaucityaṃ ca | teṣu —
13. s‍nehaucityaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 6.66)
gajja mahaṃ cia uvari savvatthāmeṇa loha-hiaassa |
jalahara! laṃbālaïaṃ mā re mārehisi varāiṃ || 158 ||
(garja mamaivopari sarvasthām‍nā lohahṛdayasya |
jaladhara! lambālakikāṃ mā re mārayiṣyasi varākīm ||)
14. udyamaucityaṃ yathā—(megha. 106)
bhittvā sadyaḥ kisalayapuṭān devadārudrumāṇāṃ ye tatkṣīrasrutisurabhayo dakṣiṇena pravṛttāḥ |
āliṅgyante guṇavati! mayā te tuṣārādrivātāḥ pūrvaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadi kila bhavedaṅgamebhistaveti || 159 ||
15. autsukyaucityaṃ yathā—(seba. 12.22)
sīāvioaduḥkhaṃ visahaṃtassa caüjāmeṃttatariaṃ |
dīho a gao kālo ṇa samā ekka a sā ṇisā rahuvaïṇo || 160 ||
(sītāviyogaduḥkhaṃ viṣahamāṇasya caturyāmamātrāntaritam |
dīrghaśca gataḥ kālaḥ na samā ekā ca niśā raghupateḥ ||)
śaktisādhanopāyānāṃ pravāsiṣu prāyo viparyayādayaḥ svadante, na svarūpāṇi | tataḥ tathaiva tānyudāhriyante | teṣu —
1. śaktiviparyayastredhā balaviparyayaḥ, buddhiviparyayaḥ, utsāhaviparyayaśca | tatra —
balaviparyayo yathā—(gāsa. 832 ve.)
samapaṃthapatthiassa vi pahiassa khalaṃti puḍhamadiahaṃmi |
hiaa—ṭṭhia—jāā—guru—ṇiaṃbabhāreṇa va paāi || 161 ||
(samapathaprasthitasyāpi/pathikasya skhalanti prathamadivase |
hṛdayasthitajāyāgurunitambabhāreṇeva padāni ||)
buddhiviparyayo yathā—
vaṭṭaṃ ma ṭaṃ pucchāmi païṃ jāṇaṃtā meha |
virahaṃ jo maraï tassa osahaṃ kehā || 162 ||
(vṛttaṃ ma(u)tvāṃ pṛcchāmi patiṃ jānantaṃ megha |
viraheṇa yo mriyate tasya auṣadhaṃ kīdṛśam/kuśalaṃ kutreha ||)
utsāhaviparyayo yathā—(seba. 5.7)
dhīreṇa samaṃ āmā, hiaeṇa samaṃ aṇiṃṭṭhiā uvaesā |
ucchāheṇa samaṃ bhuā, bāheṇa samaṃ galaṃti se ullāvā || 163 ||
(dhairyeṇa samaṃ yāmāḥ, hṛdayena samaṃ aniṣṭhitā upadeśāḥ |
utsāhena samaṃ bhujau, bāṣpeṇa samaṃ galanti tasyā ullāpāḥ ||)
2. sādhanaviparyayaḥ — heyaḥ, upādeyaḥ, heyopādeyaśca | tatra —
heyo yathā—
so uddeso vihiṇā ṇa ṇimmio bahuvirahamullihaṃteṇa |
jattha vi a vivoā saddāvadde hi ṇijjaṃti || 164 ||
(sa uddeśo vidhinā na nirmita- bahuvirahamullikhatā |
yatrāpi ca viprayogāḥ śraddhāvattve hi nīyante ||)
upādeyo yathā—(gāsa. 843ve.)
dīhuṇṇā ṇīsāsā raṇaraṇao rujjagaggiraṃ geaṃ |
piavirahe jīviavallāhāṇa eso c‍cia viṇoo || 165 ||
(dīrghoṣṇā niḥśvāsā raṇaraṇako rodanagadgadaṃ geyam |
priyavirahe jīvitavallabhānāṃ eṣa eva vinodaḥ ||)
heyopādeyo yathā—(gāsa. 847ve.)
cirajīvittaṇa—kaṃkhiri mā tamma rasāaṇehi athirehiṃ |
virahaṃ pavajja jāaṃti jeṇa juadīharā diahā || 166 ||
(cirajīvitvakāṅkṣaṇaśīle mā tāmya rasāyanairasthiraiḥ |
virahaṃ pratipadya jāyante yena yugadīrghā divasāḥ ||)
3. upāyaviparyayaḥ — kādācitkaḥ, aikadeśikaḥ, vihitaśca | teṣu —
kādācitko yathā—(megha. 105)
māmākāśapraṇihitabhujaṃ nirdayāśleṣaheto— rlabdhāyāste kathamapi mayā svap‍nasandarśaneṣu |
paś‍yantīnāṃ na khalu bahuśo na sthalīdevatānāṃ muktāsthūlāstarukisalayeṣvaśruleśāḥ patanti || 167 ||
aikadeśiko yathā—(megha. 103)
ś‍yāmāsvaṅgaṃ cakitahariṇīprekṣite dṛṣṭipātaṃ vaktracchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ barhabhāreṣu keśān |
utpaś‍yāmi pratanuṣu nadīviciṣu bhrūvilāsān hantaikasmin k‍vacidapi na te caṇḍi! sādṛś‍yamasti || 168 ||
vihito yathā—(megha. 104)
tvāmālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiśśilāyā— matmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvadicchāmi kartum |
āsrestāvanmuhurupacitairdṛṣṭirāli/lupyate me krūrastasminnapi na sahate saṅgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ || 169 ||
so 'yamaṣṭaprakāṇḍo 'pi prāp‍tiskandha udāhṛtaḥ |
vyāp‍tiskandhaprakāṇḍānām athaiṣoddiś‍yate gatiḥ || 170 ||
(2. vyāp‍tiskandhaḥ —8)
(1. viyuktasvarūpam —12)
teṣu virahiṇāmasādhāraṇadharmaḥ, viyuktasvarūpam | tad deśakālapātrādibhedāda—
nekadhā | tatra—
deśe nāyikāsthaṃ, nāyakastham, ubhayastham, ubhayasādhāraṇaṃ ca |
kāle dṛṣṭaviparītam, śrutaviparītam, bhūtaviparītam, anubhūtaviparītam ca |
pātre udāttāstham, uddhatāsthaṃ, (lalitāsthaṃ), śāntāsthaṃ ca |
prapañcato dṛṣṭvā śeṣamavagantavyam | tatra—
(deśe)
1. svadeśe nāyikāsthaṃ yathā—
uc‍ca uraḍevidhāhakaruaṃmaḍe |
upasihu uduṃguvavasaṃijjaṃ maḍe || 171 ||
2. paradeśe nāyakasthaṃ yathā—
utkampo 'pi sakampa eva hṛdaye cintāpi cintānvitā niḥśvāsā api niḥśvasantyanibhṛtā bāṣpo 'pi bāṣpāyate |
kāntāṃ saṃsmarato videśavasaternaktāndivaṃ kāminaḥ prārohā iva niṣpatanti manaso duḥkhāni duḥkhānvitāt || 172 ||
3. svaparadeśe ubhayasthaṃ yathā—(saka. 906)
sup‍te grāme nadati jalade śāntasaṃvādaramyaṃ pānthenātmavyasanakaraṇodaśru gītaṃ niśīthe |
sphītotkaṇṭhāparigatadhiyā proṣitastrījanena dhyānāveśāstimitanayanaṃ śrūyate rudyate ca || 173 ||
4. ubhayasādhāraṇe ubhayasādhāraṇaṃ yathā—(urāca. 6.38)
ciraṃ dhyātvā dhyātvā likhitamiva nirmāya purataḥ pravāse praśvāsaṃ na khalu na karoti priyajanaḥ |
jagajjīrṇāraṇyaṃ bhavati tu vikalpavyuparame kukūlānāṃ rāśau tadanu hṛdayaṃ pacyata iva || 174 ||
kāle —
5. sādhāraṇe dṛṣṭaviparītaṃ yathā—(ku.pṛ.apabhraṃśa 26, item 50)
vāahiṃ vaḍito duḥkhahiṃ aṃmaḍe |
caṃduki sūrihoi pavasaṃ ijaṃmaḍe || 175 ||
6. asādhāraṇe śrutaviparītaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 845ve.)
rāīo bhaṇaï loo jā kila gimhammi hoṃti maḍahāo |
maha uṇa daïeṇa viṇā ṇa āṇimo kīsa vaḍḍhaṃti || 176 ||
(rātryo bhaṇati loko yāḥ kila grīṣme bhavanti laghavaḥ |
mama punardayitena vinā na jānīmaḥ kīdṛśaṃ vardhante ||)
7. anullekhavati bhūtaviparītaṃ yathā—
niśā drāghīyasyaḥ k‍vacidapi dinānāmalaghimā na tanvī na vyụ̄dhā k‍vacidapi samā vṛttiranayoḥ |
ṛtuḥ ko nāmāyaṃ virahadahanamlānamanasā— masīmā no yatra priyasakhi! niśā eva divasāḥ || 177 ||
8. ullekhavati anubhūtaviparītaṃ yathā—
yasmin puṣpamayaṃ dhanussmṛtibhuvo yatrāmṛtāṃśuśśaśī preyo 'nyasya sukhasya dhāma gatavān mātassa kāmodbhava |
ko vāyaṃ viparītakāraṇaguṇaprakrāntimān parvaṇaḥ sargo yatra bhavanti lambhitarujaḥ prāṇā mahāmṛtyavaḥ || 178 ||
pātre —
9. udāttāyāṃ dṛś‍yamānaṃ yathā—(saka. 1.88)
pratīcchatyāśokīṃ kisalayaparāvṛttimadharaḥ kapolaḥ pāṇḍutvādavatarati tāḍīpariṇatim |
parimlānacchāyāmanuvadati dṛṣṭiḥ kamalinīṃ viyoge mādhuryaṃ tyajati ca mṛgākṣīṃ spṛśati ca || 179 ||
10. uddhatāyāṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ yathā—
vāmabāhuśikharāgraśāyinā sā mukhena lavalīphalatviṣā |
diṅ‍mukhaprahitalolalocanā mṛtyumutsavamiva pratīkṣate || 180 ||
11. lalitāyāmupanīyamānaṃ yathā—
ruddhaṃ ruddhaṃ vahati salilaṃ netrayoruṣṇamuṣṇaṃ nyastaṃ nyastaṃ sapadi hṛdaye candanaṃ śoṣameti |
yātaṃ yātaṃ dayitavirahe jīvitaṃ dhārayantyā duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vrajati rajanī kalpatulyā varākyāḥ || 181 ||
12. śāntāyāmanumīyamānaṃ yathā—
ohīcadeṇa uvihurā puṃṇamahuā paosi aṃpaṃthaṃ |
ṭhiapahia pigahavaï āsāṇaḍiāpuloei || 182 ||
(2. viyuktāvasthā —12)
manodṛgvaktrāvāgvapuśceṣṭāsu virahiṇaḥ svarūpāvasthānaṃ viyuktāvasthā |
tanmanasi cintāmayamanusmaraṇātmakaṃ ca |
dṛśi prajāgarīyaṃ, viṣayavyāvṛttyātmakaṃ, ca |
vaktre nirlajjatāmayamunmādātmakaṃ ca |
vāci guṇakīrtanamayaṃ vilāpātmakaṃ ca |
vapuṣi kārś‍yamayaṃ, vyādhyātmakaṃ ca |
ceṣṭāyāṃ jāḍyamayaṃ, mūrcchātmakaṃ ca |
tac‍ca sthānāt sthānāntare 'vatiṣṭhamānam avasthetyācakṣate | tatra—
manasi
1. cintā yathā—
sā sundarīti taruṇīti tanūdarīti mugdheti mugdhavacaneti muhurmuhurme |
kāntāmayaṃ virahiṇīmabhigantukāmaḥ kāntāmayaṃ japati mantramivāntarātmā || 183 ||
yathā vā—
kṛtassaṅkalpo 'pi vyathayati paricchedaviṣayaḥ paricchindhītyuktaṃ vacanamapi pīḍāṃ janayati |
manassmṛtvā smṛtvā glapitāmidamatraiva ramate prabandhāntaścintā sukhayati ca māṃ duḥkhayati ca || 184 ||
2. tatraiva anusmaraṇaṃ yathā—
adyāpi tatkanakacampakadāmagauraṃ gorocanātilakabindukṛtaikabindu |
īṣatkaṭākṣahasitolbaṇagaṇḍadeśaṃ tanvyā mukhaṃ pathi mayā saha gacchatīva || 185 ||
yathā vā—
nirastālaṅkārāṃ nayanajalasiktādharapuṭāṃ ravāvastaṃ yāte dviguṇatarakhedālasamukhīm |
aho dūrasthāṃ tāṃ karakamalavinyastavadanāṃ priyāṃ paś‍yāmīti smṛtiśaraṇakuḍye hi likhitā || 186 ||
dṛśi —
3. prajāgaro yathā—(śāku. 6.22)
prajāgarāt khilībhūtastasyāssvap‍ne samāgamaḥ |
bāṣpastu na dadātyenāṃ draṣṭuṃ citragatāmapi || 187 ||
yathā vā—
ṇiṃdaṇīkasu ei vaḍhaṇiṃsi ciṃttaṃ taha jāi |
daïāmuhapaḍibiṃve bhijaü ciṃpiṃjjaï tāi || 188 ||
4. tatraiva viṣayavyāvṛttiryathā—
vidharmāṇo bhāvāstadupahitavṛtterna dhṛtaye sarūpatvādanye vihitaviphalautsukyavirasāḥ |
ataścetthaṃ pūrveṣvasṛjaditarebhyaḥ pratahataṃ k‍va hīnaṃ preyasyā hṛdayamidamanyatra ramatām || 189 ||
yathā vā—
anārabdhākṣepaṃ paramakṛtabāṣpavyatikaraṃ nigụ̄dhāntastāpaṃ hṛdayavinipātavyavasitam |
kṛśāṅgyā yat pāpe vrajati mayi nairāś‍yapiśunaṃ ślathairaṅgairuktaṃ hṛdayamidamunmīlayati tat || 190 ||
vakre —
5. lajjāpraṇāśo yathā—
girāṃ saikā vācyaṃ hṛdayamapi tatraiva nirataṃ, puraḥ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati hariṇākṣyā mukhamiti |
viyogastanvaṅgyāḥ kathamanupakārī yadi bhavet kṛtaṃ tadrūpeṇa tribhuvanamidaṃ yena kṛtinā || 191 ||
yathā vā—
kvacit svapne paś‍yāmyaviracitalambālakamukhīṃ kvacit saṅkalpastāṃ suhṛdiva puraḥ sthāpayati me |
kvacid draṣṭavyā sā sukhayati muhūrtaṁ hyanusṛtā namastasyai yasyā ramayati viyogo 'pi hṛdayam || 192 ||
6. tatraivonmādo yathā—
raktastvaṃ navapallavairahamapi ślāghyaiḥ priyāyā guṇai— stvāmāyānti śilīmukhāḥ smaradhanurmuktāssakhe! māmapi |
tasyāḥ pādatalāhatistava mude tadvanmamāpyāvayoḥ sarvaṁ tulyamaśoka! kevalamahaṃ dhātrā saśokaḥ kṛtaḥ || 193 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 9. 29)
bhavaddhissarvāṅgaprakṛtiramaṇīyā kulavadhū— rihasthairdṛṣṭā vā viditamiha vāsyā yadabhavat |
vayo 'vasthāṃ tasyāḥ śrṛṇuta suhṛdo yatra madanaḥ pragalbhavyāpāraścalata hṛdi mugdhaśca vapuṣi || 194 ||
vāci—
7. guṇakīrtanaṃ yathā—
idaṃ kiṃ te nyastaṃ valayini kare vaktrakamalaṃ priye! kaḥ kopo 'yaṃ praṇayini nirāgasyapi jane |
bruvāṇe mayyevaṃ śvasitaviṣayotkampitakucaṃ mṛgākṣyāstatkālaṃ nayanajalamovottaramabhūt || 195 ||
yathā vā—
kṣaṇamaviśadaṃ vyaktaṃ bhūyastataḥ parimantharaṃ tadanu cakitaṃ hnītaṃ paścāt tataśca niraṅkuśam |
kuvalayadṛśā prema prāduṣkṛtaṃ navasaṅgame tadiha virahe dhyātaṃ dhyātaṃ vidhūnayatīva mām || 196 ||
8. tatraiva vilāpo yathā—
he viprayogadahana! jvalito (yadi tva) māṃ nirdaha priyamidaṃ na hi jīvitaṃ me |
ekaṃ manaḥ pariharāñjalireṣa mūrdhni nyasto mayā vasati yatra saroruhākṣī || 197 ||
yathā vā—
priyavirahamahoṣmā marmurānaṅgalekhā mayi hataka! himāṃśo! mā spṛśa krīḍayāpi |
iha hi tava luṭhantaḥ ploṣapīḍāṃ bhajante darajaraṭhamṛṇālīkāṇḍamugdhā mayūkhāḥ || 198 ||
vapuṣi—
9. kārśyaṁ yathā—
paryasya svakareṇa bāṣpapayasāṃ pūrasya pakṣmālakān niḥśvāsāṃścaṃ nakhampacān na sahate pāṇiḥ kapolāśrayaḥ |
dagdhontarmadanāgninā stanabharo bhagneva pāṇḍucchavi— rbhāsvad‌bimbagatā kaleva śaśinaḥ kṣīṇā tanustāmyati || 199 ||
yathā vā—(urāca. 3. 5)
kisalayamiva mugdhaṃ bandhanād vipralūnaṃ hṛdayakusumaśoṣo dāruṇo dīrghaśokaḥ |
glapayati paripāṇḍu kṣāmamasyāḥ śarīraṃ śaradija iva gharmaḥ ketakīgarbhapatram || 200 ||
10. tatraiva vyādhiryathā—
āpāṇḍurvadane gatāvaviśadaṃ cintā ' 'mayeṣvāyataḥ kṣāmo vāci vicāraṇāsvakuśalo ramyeṣvaramyakriyaḥ |
utkampī hṛdaye dravo nayanayorūrvorjaḍo 'ṅge guruḥ śoko 'yaṃ mayi yāti tad‌virahabhūreko 'pyanekāṃ gatim || 201 ||
yathā vā—(urāca. 3. 31)
dalati hṛdayaṃ gạ̄dhodvegaṃ dvidhā na tu bhidyate vahati vikalaḥ kāyo dehaṃ na muñcati cetanā |
jvalayati tanūmantardāhaḥ karoti na bhasmasāt praharati vidhirmarmacchedī na kṛntati jīvitam || 202 ||
ceṣṭāyāṃ
11. jāḍa‍yaṃ yathā—
ekamutkaṇṭhayā śūnyamanyad dayitayā hṛtam |
vedanāmaparaṃ dhatte kiyanti hṛdayāni me || 203 ||
yathā vā—(saka. 5. 61)
śithilaśithilaṃ nyasya svairaṃ dhanuśśikhare bhujaṃ nayanasalilaiḥ kurvan maurvīṃ latāmaparāmiva |
ahaha vikalaḥ śrutvā śrutvā ghanastanitadhvaniṃ kimapi kimapi dhyāyannāryo na yāti na tiṣṭhati || 204 ||
12. tatraiva mūrcchā yathā—(māmā. 9. 20)
mātarmātardalati hṛdayaṃ dhvaṃsate dehabandhaḥ śūnyaṃ manye jagadaviratajvālamantarjvalāmi |
sīdannandhe tamasi vidhuro majjatīvāntarātmā viṣvaṅgamohaḥ sthagayati kathaṃ mandabhāgyaḥ karomi || 205 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 9. 21)
bandhutāhṛdayakaumudīmaho mālatīnayanamugdhacandramāḥ |
so 'yamadya makarandandano jīvalokatilakaḥ pralīyate || 206 ||
(3. virahoddīpanam)
jātānubhāvasya virahiṇaḥ smaraṇādibījod‌bodhahetuścittārambhādikāraṇaṃ arthātiśayaḥ virahoddīpanam| sa prāyeṇāṣṭadhā— deśaḥ, deśacihnaṃ, kālaḥ, kālacihnaṃ, vastu, vastucihnaṃ, kāryaṃ, kāryacihnam iti |
smaraṇādayastu catvāraḥ— smaraṇam, icchā, dveṣaḥ, prayat‍na iti |
cittārambhādayo 'pi tāvanta eva—cittārambhaḥ, vāgārambhaḥ, budadhyārambhaḥ, śarīrārambha iti | ubhaye pratyekataścaturdhā | tatra—
(smaraṇādayaḥ— 16)
smaraṇabhedeṣu— smṛtiḥ, anusmṛtiḥ, smṛtiviśeṣaḥ, anusmṛtiviśeṣaśca iti |
icchābhedeṣu— icchā, anvicchā, icchāviśeṣaḥ, anvicchāviśeṣaśca iti |
dveṣabhedeṣu— dveṣa:, anudveṣaḥ, dveṣaviśeṣaḥ, anudveṣaviśeṣaśca iti |
prayat‍nabhedeṣu—prayat‍na:, anuprayat‍na:, prayat‍naviśeṣaḥ, anuprayat‍naviśeṣaśca iti |
(cittārambhādayaḥ— 16)
cittārambhaprabhedeṣu— śuddhaḥ, saṅkīrṇaḥ, prakīrṇaḥ, viprakīrṇa iti |
vāgārambhaprabhedeṣu— prakṛtaḥ, aprakṛtaḥ, prasaktaḥ, anuprasakta iti |
buddhyārambhaprabhedeṣu— yatā, tathā, anyathā, ubhayathā iti |
śarīrārambhaprabhedeṣu— vaktre, vapuṣi, dṛṣṭau, ceṣṭāyāmiti |
catvāraścatuṣkāḥ kāraṇabhūtāḥ, catvārastu kāryabhūtā iti | teṣu—
cittārambhabuddhayāmbhāvābhyantarau, vāgārambhaśarīrārambhayoḥ kāraṇamapi bhavataḥ |
śarīrārambhavāgārambhau tu bāhyau kāryameva|
cittārambhastu buddhayārambhasyāpi kāraṇamiti | tatra—
(virohoddīpanaprabhedāḥ— 8)
1. virahoddīpanaprabhedeṣu grāmyāraṇyādayo deśāḥ| teṣu—
grāmyo yathā—
abhyāśasthitacūtaṣaṇḍāgahanād grāmādito gehinī sthānaṃ kiñcidavṛkṣakaṃ virahiṇī tūrṇaṃ vadhūrnīyatām |
atrāyāntyacireṇa kokilakulavyāhārajhaṅkāriṇaḥ pānthastrījanajīvitāpaharaṇapraụdhāḥ puro vāsarāḥ || 207 ||
āraṇyo yathā—(urāca. 2. 22)
etat punarvanamaho kathamadya dṛṣṭaṃ yasminnabhūma cirameva purā vasantaḥ |
āraṇyakāśca gṛhiṇaśca ratāśca dharme sāṃsārikeṣu ca sukheṣu vayaṃ rasajñāḥ || 208 ||
2. anubhūyamānasmaryamāṇāni deśācihnāni | teṣu—
anubhūyamānaṃ yathā—(urāca. 2. 23)
ete ta eva girayo viravanmayūrāstānyeva mattahariṇāni vanasthalāni |
āmañjuvañjularutāni ca tānyamūni nīrandhranīraniculāni sarittaṭāni || 209 ||
smaryamāṇaṃ yathā—(urāca. 2. 27)
purā yatra strotaḥ pulinamadhunā tatra saritāṃ viparyāsaṃ yāto ghanaviralabhāvaḥ kṣitiruhām |
bahordṛṣṭaṃ kālādaparamiva manye vanamidaṃ niveśaḥ śailānāṃ tadidamiti buddhiṃ draḍhayati || 210 ||
3. varṣāvasantasamayādiḥ kālaḥ| tatra—
varṣāsamayo yathā—
vātaprotkṣip‍tadhūlīparimilanasamud‌dha‌ūlitāmbhaḥ(ṅgaṃ) samantā— ddaṇḍodvellada‍valākāvalikuṇapaśironaddhanīlābhrakeśaḥ |
peṅkhada‍vidyutpatākārucirasuradhanuḥ khaṇḍakhaṭa‍vāṅgadhārī samprāp‍taḥ proṣitastrīpratibhayajananaḥ kālakāpāliko 'yam || 211 ||
vasantasamayo yathā—
caitraḥ saiṣa sakhe svavṛntaniyataś‍yāmāśribhiḥ kiṃśukai— raṅgārairiva bhāsurāndharucikṣiścakṣuṃṣi danhahyate |
yatraitā madamañjubhiḥ parabhṛtairuccoccaratpañcamā— ś‍cūtārāmabhuvaḥ priyāvirahiṇāṃ kurvanti karṇajvaram || 212 ||
4. ghanonnatiprasūnavikāsādīni kālacihnāni| yathā—(amaru. 117)
kiñcinmudritapāṃsavaḥ śikhikulaissānandamālokitāḥ bhagnavāsa—rudaddharidragṛhiṇī—śvāsānilairjarjarāḥ |
ete te nipatanti nūtanaghanāt prāvṛibharārambhiṇo vicchāyīkṛtaviprayuktavanitāvaktrendavo bindavaḥ || 213 ||
yathā vā—
māṇagaïṃdaho aṃkusu mahusihaho ṇahakumāhavasi riikeli suavaāṇā saṃkakaru |
vaḍḍhaï virahiṇījīvaïṃ kiṃ ghūiṃ kuḍaülohiṃ aliattaü maaṇahoṇaṃ hatthakuḍaü || 214 ||
5. īpsitamanīpsitaṃ vā dravyajātaṃ vastu| tatra īpsitaṃ yathā—(kundamālā. 4. 20)
dyūte paṇaḥ praṇayakeliṣu kaṇṭhapāśaḥ krīḍāpariśramaharaṃ vyajanaṃ ratānte |
śayyā niśīthakalahe hariṇekṣaṇāyā labdhaṃ mayā vidhivaśādidamuttarīyam || 215 ||
anīpsitaṃ yathā—
ayi pibata cakorāḥ kiñcidunnāmya1 kaṇṭhaṃ 2kramakabalanacañcaccañcavaścandrikāmbhaḥ3 |
virahavidhuritānāṃ jīvitatrāṇaheto— rbhavati hariṇalakṣmā yena tejodaridraḥ || 216 ||
6. asādhāraṇadharmacihnāni yathā—(sūmu. 225)
kāntā kā mama4 garjitairuparatā5 dhārāmbubhiḥ kā hatā kā mohaṃ gamitā viyogavidhurā dhārākadambānilaiḥ |
nītā kā ca vilolatāṃ madakalaiḥ6 kekāravairbarhiṇā— mitthaṃ pāntha! gṛhāṇi paś‍yati ghano vidyutpradīpairiva || 217 ||
yathā vā—(gāsa. 1. 44)
akkhaḍaï piā hiae aṇṇaṃ mahilāaṇaṃ ramaṃtassa |
diṭṭhe sarisammi guṇe sarisammi aī/dīsaṃte || 218 ||
(āskhalati priyā hṛdaye anyaṃ mahilājanaṃ mamāṇasya |
dṛṣṭe sadṛśe guṇe sadṛśe adṛś‍yamāne ||)
7. nirvartya—vikārya—prāpya—karmavyāpī kriyāviśeṣaḥ kāryaḥ yathā—
mā gāḥ pāntha! pathāmunā yadi tava bhrātaḥ! priyaṃ jīvitaṃ yaccūtākṛtiratra tiṣṭhati mahān raudraḥ puro rākṣasaḥ |
tenodyanmakaranda—lubdha—madhupa—vyāhāra—&jhaṅkariṇā pānthānāmadhunaiva nirghṛṇādhiyā sārtho hataḥ śrūyate || 219 ||
yathā vāmdash;
upaparisaraṃ godāvaryāḥ parityajatādhvagāḥ saraṇimaparo mārgastāvad bhavada‍bhiravekṣyatām |
iha hi vihito raktāśokaḥ kayāpi hatāśayā caraṇanalina—nyāsodañcannavā 'ṅkuraka़ñcukaḥ || 220 ||
1. nāmyakaṃ jo, nnamika rāghavaḥ 2. kramasya kramukasya kavalanāditi yāvat | 3. nāmbhaḥ jo, nābhyaḥ rāghavaḥ 4. kāntā kā mama = kāntārairmama. jo. rā. 5. ruparatā = kaparatā jo. 6. vilolatāṃ madakalaiḥ = vilolanādakabalaḥ rā.
8. kriyāviśeṣānumāpakamarthāntaraṃ kāryacihnaṃ yathā—
savyādheḥ kṛśatā kṣatasya rudhiraṃ daṣṭasya lālāstrutiḥ sarvaṃ naitadihāsti tatkathamayaṃ pānthastapasvī mṛtaḥ |
ā jñātaṃ madhulampaṭairmadhukarairārabdhakolāhalai— rnanaṃ duḥkhitakena cūtamukule dṛṣṭiḥ kvacit pātitā || 221 ||
yathā vā—(vikra. 4. 34)
raktāśoka kṛśodarī kva nu gatā muktvānuraktaṃ jana no dṛṣṭeti mudhaiva dhūnayasi kiṃ vātāvadhūtaṃ śiraḥ |
utkaṇṭhāghaṭamānaṣaṭpadaghaṭāsaṅghaṭṭadaṣṭacchada— statpādāhatimantareṇa sarasaḥ puṣpoda‍gamo 'yaṃ kutaḥ || 222 ||
athaiteṣu smṛtīcchādveṣaprayat‍najanmāno vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhāḥ| teṣu—
1. manaārambhaḥ smṛtijanmā yathā—(rāca. 1. 18)
tasya cakruścamatkāraṃ vyatītasamayā api |
smitārdramukulod‌bhedāḥ kadambavanarājayaḥ|| 223 ||
sa evecchājanmā yathā—(urāca. 3. 25)
karakamalavitīrṇairambunīvāraśaṣpai— staruśakunikuraṅgānmaithilī yānapuṣyat |
bhavati mama vikārasteṣu dṛṣṭeṣu ko 'pi drava iva hṛdayasya prasnavoddhedayogyaḥ || 224 ||
eṣa dveṣajanmā yathā—
sañchannairjalavāmanairjaladharairvyomni prasup‍te jane deve varṣati diṅgamukheṣu carati svairaṃ kadambānile |
utke gāyati ca pravāsini kathaṃ pānthapriyāyāṇāmimā nonmathnanti manāṃsi māṃsalamiladdīrghāndhakārāḥ kṣapāḥ || 225 ||
ayameva prayat‍najanmā yathā—
utkekāḥ śikhinaḥ payodapaṭalaiśchannaṃ nabhomaṇḍalaṃ vātā vānti kadambareṇuśabalā jātā mahī śād‌valā |
udbhinnaṃ navayovanaṃ, priyatamo deśāntarastho 'vadhiḥ kālo yāti, na yāti jīvitamiti vyagraṃ manaścintayā || 226 ||
2. vāgārambhasmṛtijanmā yathā—(rāmābhyu.)
yat tvannetrasamānakānti salile magnaṃ tadindīvaraṃ meghairantaritaḥ priye! tava mukhacchāyānukārī śaśī |
ye 'pi tvadgamanānusārigatayaste rājahaṃsā gatā— stvatsādṛś‍yavinodamātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate || 227 ||
sa evecchājanmā yathā—(urāca. 6. 26)
api janakasutāyāstacca taccānurūpaṃ sphuṭamiha śiśuyugme naipuṇonneyamasti |
nanu punariva tanme gocarībhūtamakṣṇo— rabhinavaśatapatraśīmadīsyaṃ priyāyāḥ || 228 ||
eṣa dveṣajanmā yathā—
taruṇatamālanīlabahulonnamadambudharāḥ śiśirasamīraṇā vadhūta—nūtana—vārikaṇāḥ |
kathamavalokayeyamadhunā harihetimatī— rmadakalanīlakaṇṭhakalahairmukharā haritaḥ || 229 ||
ayameva prayat‍najanmā yathā—(urāca.)
śailaḥ so 'yaṃ kakubhasurabhirmālyavānnāma yasmi— nnīlāsnigdhaśśrayati śikharaṃ nūtanastoyavāhaḥ |
āryeṇāsminvirama viramātaḥ paraṃ na kṣamo 'smi pratyāvṛttaḥ punariva sa me jānakīviprayogaḥ || 230 ||
3. buda‍dhyārambhasmṛtijanmā yathā—
raktāśokataroḥ karākṛtidharā rājantyamī pallavā vṛttatvāt sadṛśī tadūruyugalenaiṣāpi rambhāvaliḥ |
praụdhimnā kusume sthitā tadadharacchāyā vikāraṃ vinā tanmanye 'tra vane vibhajya vidhinā kṣip‍tā mama preyasī || 231 ||
sa evecchājanmā yathā—(urāca. 2. 28)
yastānte divasāstayā saha tathā nītāḥ punaḥ sve gṛhe yatsambada‍dhakathābhireva suciraṃ dīrghābhirasthīyata |
ekaḥ samprati nāśitapriyatamastāmeva pāpaḥ kathaṃ rāmaḥ pañcavaṭīṃ vilokayatu vā gacchatvasambhāvya vā || 232 ||
eṣa dveṣajanmā yathā—
vātaiḥ kesaragandhibhirviṣadharaśvāsairivāndhaṃ mano dagdhe tap‍taśalākayeva taḍitā paryaśruṇī locane |
etāḥ samprati rūpagarbhaguravaḥ sāndrībhavatsaurabhāḥ ketakyaḥ karapatrapatrajaraṭhāḥ kṛntanti marmāṇi me || 233 ||
ayameva prayat‍najanmā yathā—(rāmābhyu.)
snigdhaś‍yāmalakāntilip‍taviyato vellada‍valākā ghanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ |
kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahāhā devi! dhīrā bhava || 234 ||
4. śarīrārambhaḥ smṛtijanmā yathā—(saka. 759)
nipatati śayane tava smarantī pathikavadhūravadhūtajīvitāśā |
jaladharasamayasya he/ke—tubhūtāṃ vakulalatāmavalokya puṣpitāgrām || 235 ||
sa evecchājanmā yathā—(rāca. 1. 19)
adṛś‍yanta purastena khelā- khañjanapaṅaktigāḥ |
asmaryanta ca niḥśvasya priyānayanavibhramāḥ || 236 ||
eṣa dveṣajanmā yathā—(gāsa. 4. 36)
saṃjīviṇosahiṃ piba suassa rakkhaï aṇaṇṇavāvārā |
sāsū ṇavabbhadaṃsaṇakaṃṭhāgaajīviaṃ soṇhaṃ || 237 ||
(saṃjīvanauṣadhimiva sutasya rakṣatyananyavyāpārā |
śvaśrūrnavādarśanakaṇṭhāgatajīvitāṃ snuṣām ||)
ayameva prayat‍najanmā yathā—(gāsa. 6. 38)
daṭṭhūṇa uṇṇamaṃte mehe āmukkajīviāsāe |
pahia—vahue pariaṇo oruṇṇamuhīe saccavio || 268 ||
(dṛṣṭavā unnamato meghān āmuktajīvitāśayā |
pathikavadhvā parijanaḥ avaruditamukhyā parijñātaḥ ||)
(smaraṇādayaḥ— 16)
(smaraṇabhedeṣu—4) athaiteṣu smaraṇādīnāṃ pṛthakpṛthak catuṣkam| tatra7 smaraṇasya smṛtiranusmṛtiḥ smṛtiviśeṣo 'nusmṛtiviśeṣaśca | teṣu—
1. smṛtiryathā—
śaśimaṇiśilā seyaṃ yasyāṃ vipāṇḍuramānanaṃ karakisalaye kṛtvā vāme ghanaśvasitodramā |
cirayati mayi vyaktākūtā manāksphūritādharā niyamitamanomanyurdṛṣṭā mayā rudatī priyā || 239 ||
2. anusmṛtiryathā—(megha. 76)
tasyāstīre racitaśikharaḥ peśalairindranīlaiḥ krīḍāśailaḥ kanakakadalīveṣṭanaprekṣaṇīyaḥ |
mada‍gehinyāḥ priya iti sakhe! cetasā kātareṇa prekṣyopāntasphuritataḍitaṃ tvāṃ tameva smarāmi || 240 ||
3. smṛtiviśeṣo yathā—(megha. 77)
raktāśokaścalakisalayaḥ kesaraścātra kāntaḥ pratyāsannau kuravakavṛtermādhavīmaṇḍapasya |
ekassakhyāstava saha mayā vāmapādābhilāṣī kāṅkṣatyanyo vadanamadirāṃ dohadacchadyanāsyāḥ || 241 ||
4. anusmṛtiviśeṣo yathā—(megha. 78)
tanmadhye ca sphuṭitaphalakā kāñcanī vāsayaṣṭi— rmūle baddhā maṇibhiranatiprauḍhavaṃśaprakāśaiḥ |
tālaiśśiñjāvalayasubhagairnartitaḥ kāntayā me yāmadhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhassuhṛd vaḥ || 242 ||
(icchābhedeṣu —4) icchāyā icchā, anvicchā, icchāviśeṣaḥ, anvicchāviśeṣaśca | teṣu —
5. icchā (yathā)—
vikasatkadambanikurumbapāṃsunā saha jīvitaṃ vaha mama priyā yataḥ |
api vā tadaṅgaparivādaśītalaṃ mayi kiñcidīraya bhavān hi me gatiḥ || 243 ||
6. anvicchā yathā—(seba. 1.42)
taṃ daïāhiṇṇāṇaṃ jammi vi aṃgammi rāhaveṇa ṇa ṇimiaṃ |
sīāparimaṭṭheṇa va vụ̄dho teṇa vi ṇiraṃtaraṃ romaṃco || 244 ||
(tad‍ dayitābhijñānaṃ yasmin api aṅge rāghaveṇa na sthāpitam |
sītāparimṛṣṭeneva vyūḍhaḥ tenāpi nirantaraṃ romāñcaḥ ||)
7. icchāviśeṣo yathā—(megha. 62)
tasyotsaṅge praṇayina iva strastagaṅgādukūlāṃ na tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā na punaralakāṃ jñāsyase kāmacārin | yā vaḥ kāle vahati salilodgāramuccairvimānai— rmuktājālagrathitamalakaṃ kāminīvābhrabṛndam || 245 ||
8. anvicchāviśeṣo yathā—(megha. 74)
tatrāgāraṃ dhanapatigṛhānuttareṇāsmadīyaṃ dūrāllakṣyaṃ surapatidhanuścāruṇā toraṇena |
yasyodyāne kṛtakatanayaḥ kāntayā vardhito me hastaprāpyastavakanamito bālamandāravṛkṣaḥ || 246 ||
(dveṣabhedeṣu —4) dveṣasya dveṣo 'nudveṣo dveṣaviśeṣo 'nudveṣaviśeṣaśca | teṣu —
9. dveṣo yathā—(sūmu. 212)
asthikṣodavatīva kundamukulaiḥ phullaiḥ palāśadrumaiḥ sāṅgāraprakareva dhūmakaluṣevotpātibhiḥ ṣaṭpadaiḥ |
raktākṣidyutibhiḥ saśoṣagahanālāteva puṃskokilai— rdṛṣṭā prāṇasamā citeva pathikenārād vanāntasthalī || 247 ||
10. anudveṣo yathā—
caṃdo visaasahoaraü(hoi)ko vollaamiassa sahi |
laggaṃtīaṃge maha juṇhā vi jālaï (?jjālaī) jassa || 248 ||
11. dveṣaviśeṣo yathā—(gāsa. 1.29)
ajja mae teṇa viṇā aṇuhūyasuhāiṃ saṃbharaṃtīe |
ahiṇavamehāṇa ravo ṇīsāmio vacjjhapaḍaho vva || 249 ||
(adya mayā tena vinā, anubhūtasukhāni saṃsmarantyā |
abhinavameghānāṃ ravo niśāmito(=śruto) vadhyapaṭaha iva ||)
12. anudveṣaviśeṣo yathā—(māmā. 9.42)
bhramaya jaladānambhogarbhān pramodaya kokilān kalaya śikhinaḥ kekotkaṇṭhān kaṭhoraya ketakān |
virahiṇi jane mūrcchāṃ labdhvā vinodayati vyathā— makaruṇa! punaḥ saṃjñāvyādhiṃ vidhāya kimīhase || 250 ||
(prayat‍nabhedeṣu —4)
prayat‍nasya prayat‍no 'nuprayat‍naḥ, prayat‍naviśeṣaḥ, anuprayat‍naviśeṣaśca | teṣu —
13. prayat‍no yathā—(amaru. 99)
deśairantaritā śataiśca saritāmurvībhṛtāṃ kānanaiḥ- ryat‍nenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi |
udgrīvaścaraṇāgraruddhavasudhaḥ kṛtvāśrupūrṇāṃ dṛśaṃ tāmāśāṃ pathikastathāpi kimapi dhyāyan muhurvīkṣate || 251 ||
14. anuprayat‍no yathā—
alasagatayaḥ śyāmāgandhaṃ vahanti vanānilāḥ kvaṇati madhuraṃ kādambānāṃ kṛlaṃ kamalākare |
avadhigaṇanābhagnāṅgulyā tayā virahaśca me bhagavati niśe śaṃsa prātaḥ kadā nu bhaviṣyati || 252 ||
(candro viṣasya sahodarako bhavati kaḥ kathayati amṛtasya sakhi |
lagantī aṅge mama jyotsnāpi jvālayati yasya ||) iti ku.
15. prayat‍naviśeṣo yathā—(śāku. 6. 20)
akliṣṭabālatarupallavalobhanīyaṃ pītaṃ mayā sadayameva ratotsaveṣu |
bimbādharaṃ spṛśasi ced bhramara priyāyāstvāṃ kārayāmi kamalodarabandhanastham || 253 ||
16. anuprayat‍naviśeṣo yathā—
vyomaśrīhṛdayaikamauktikalate! mātarbalākāvali! brūyāstaṃ jaṃnamādaraḥ khalu mahān prāṇeṣu kāryastvayā |
etāṃ mlānimupāgatāṃ strajamiva tyaktvā tanuṃ durvahā— meṣāhaṃ sukhinī bhavāmi na sahe tīvrāṃ viyogavyathām || 254 ||
(cittārambheṣu —16)
atha cittārambhādīnāṃ1 pṛthakpṛthak catuṣkam | tatra—
(cittārambheṣu —4) cittārambheṣu smṛtyādīnāmekasyaiva sadbhāve śuddhaḥ, dvayossaṅkīrṇaḥ, trayāṇāṃ prakīrṇaḥ, caturṇāṃ viprakīrṇa iti | teṣu —
1. śuddho yathā—(urāca. 2.26)
cirād vegārambhī prasṛta iva tīvro viṣarasaḥ kutaścit saṃvegāt pracala iva śalyasya śakalaḥ |
vraṇo rūḍhagranthiḥ sphuṭita iva hṛnmarmaṇi punaḥ parāvṛttaḥ śoko vikalayati māṃ nūtana iva || 255 ||
2. saṅkīrṇo yathā—
etāḥ priyatamā vācaḥ snehārdrāḥ śokadāruṇāḥ |
etāstā madhuno dhārāś‍cyotanti saviṣāstvayi || 256 ||
3. prakīrṇo yathā—(visā. 3.19)
śītāṃśurviṣaśekharaḥ phaṇabhṛtāṃ līlāspadaṃ candanaṃ hārāḥ kṣārapayobhuvaḥ priyasuhṛt paṅkeruhaṃ bhāsvataḥ |
ityeṣāṃ kimivāstu vastu madanajyotirvighātāya yad bāhyākāraparigraheṇa tu vayaṃ tattvatyajo vañcitāḥ || 257 ||
4. viprakīrṇo yathā—(megha. 3)
tasya sthitvā kathamapi puraḥ kaitukādhānaheto— rantarbāṣpaściramanucaro rājarājasya dadhyau |
meghāloke bhavati sukhino 'pyanyathāvṛtti cetaḥ kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punardūrasaṃsthe || 258 ||
1. cintārambheti rā. — pṛ. 1591 HOS, jo. — pṛ. IV — 1087, dra. pṛ. 1433
(vāgārambheṣu —4) vāgārambheṣu kāryaśarīrānugāmī prakṛtaḥ, tad‌viparīto 'prakṛtaḥ, prakṛtāprakṛtayoranuyāyī prasaktaḥ, prasaktānuyāy‌yanuprasakta iti | tatra—
5. prakṛto yathā—(megha. 7)
santap‍tānāṃ tvamasi śaraṇaṃ tatpayoda! priyā‌yāḥ sandeśaṃ me hara dhanapatikrodhaviśleṣitasya |
gantavyā te vasatiralakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ bāhyodyāna—sthita—hara—śiraścandrikā—dhautaharmyā || 259 ||
6. aprakṛto yathā—(megha. 13)
mārgaṃ tāvacchṛṇu kathayatastvatprayāṇānurūpaṃ sandeśaṃ me tadanu jalada! śroṣyasi śrotrapeyam |
khinnaḥ khinnaḥ śikhariṣu padaṃ nyasya gantāsi yatra kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ parilaghu payaḥ strotasāṃ copabhujya || 260 ||
7. prasakto yathā—(megha. 27)
vakraḥ panthā yadapi bhavataḥ prasthitasyottarāśāṃ saudhotsaṅgapraṇayavimukho mā sma bhūrujjayinyāḥ |
vidyuddāmasphuritacakitairyatra paurāṅganānāṃ lolāpāṅgairyadi na ramase locanairvañcito 'si || 261 ||
8. anuprasakto yathā—(megha. 33)
bhartuḥ kaṇṭhacchaviriti gaṇaiḥ sādaraṃ dṛśyamānaḥ puṇyaṃ yāyāstribhuvanagurordhāma caṇḍīśvarasya |
dhṛtodyānaṃ kuvalayarajogandhibhirgandhavatyā— stoya—krīḍā—nirata—yuvati—snāna—tiktairmarudbhiḥ || 262 ||
(bud‍dhyārambheṣu —4) buddhyārambheṣu sādṛśyāvalambī pratyayaḥ yathā, (tathā), anyathā iti | saṃśayāvalambī tu ubhayatheti | teṣu—
9. yathārūpo yathā —(vikra. 4.39)
tanvī meghajalārdrapallavatayā dhautādharevāśrubhiḥ śūnyevābharaṇaiḥ svakālavirahād viśrāntapuṣpod‍gamā |
cintā maunamivāsthitā madhukṛtāṃ śabdairvinā lakṣyate caṇḍī māmavadhūya pādapatitaṃ jātānutāpeva sā || 263 ||
navajaladharaḥ sannaddho 'yaṃ na dṛp‍taniśācaraḥ suradhanuridaṃ dūrānnaṣṭaṃ na nāma śarāsanam |
ayamapi paṭurdhārāsāro na bāṇaparamparā kanakanikaṣasnigdhā vidyut priyā na mamorvaśī || 264 || (vikra. 4.1)
10. anyathārūpo yathā—(vikra. 4.7)
hṛtoṣṭharāgairnayanodabindubhirnimagnanābhau nipatadbhiraṅkitam |
cyutaṃ ruṣā bhinnagaterasaṃśayaṃ śukodaraśyāmamida stanāṃśukam || 265 ||
11. ubhayathārupo yathā—
pathika! kathitaṃ tvatprasthānaṃ gato 'dhikavāsaraḥ śvasitamadhunā vāmenākṣṇā taraṅgitapakṣmaṇā |
pratidinamamī doṣā doṣaṃ hatā hatavāyasā— stadapi dayito naivāyātaḥ kimāli vipaśyasi || 266 ||
(śarīrārambheṣu —4) śarīrārambheṣu vaktrābhivyaktarūpo vaktre, vapurabhivyaktarūpo vapuṣi, dṛṣṭyabhivyaktarūpo dṛṣṭau, ceṣṭābhivyaktarūpa śceṣṭāyāmiti| teṣu —
12. prathamo yathā—
bhrātaḥ pāntha! vrajasi yadi he tāṃ diśaṃ puṇyabhājaṃ vaktāsītthaṃ kaṭhinahṛdayaṃ taṃ janaṃ kiṃ yatheti |
pṛṣṭā yāvat kathayati vaco vāñchitaṃ naiva bālā tāvat sāndrairvadanakamalaṃ ruddhamaśrupravāhaiḥ || 267 ||
13. dvitīyo yathā—(urāca. 3.4)
paripāṇḍupāṃsulakapolasundaraṃ dadhatī vilolakabarīkamānanam |
karuṇasya mūrtirathavā śarīriṇī virahavyatheva vanameti jānakī || 268 ||
14. tṛtīyo yathā—(megha. 8)
tvāmārūḍhaṃ pavanapadavīmud‍gṛhītālakāntāḥ prekṣiṣyante pathikavanitāḥ pratyayādāśvasatyaḥ |
kassannaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayyupekṣeta jāyāṃ na syādanyo 'pyahamiva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ || 269 ||
15. caturtho yathā—(megha. 108)
māmākāśapraṇihitabhujaṃ nirdayāśleṣaheto— rlabdhāyāste kathamapi mayā svapnasandarśaneṣu |
paśyantīnāṃ na khalu bahuśo na sthalīdevatānāṃ muktāsthūlāstarukisalayeṣvaśruleśāḥ patanti || 270 ||
athaite deśakālādibhedaissambhinnamūrtayaḥ |
parasparaṃ ca saṃpṛktāḥ saṅkhyāmatyetumīśate || 271 ||
na paryanto vikalpānāṃ virahoddīp‍tijanmanām |
śabdabrahma—vivartānāṃ vyaktavyaktātmanāmiva || 272 ||
(4. virahapratīkāraḥ —11)
virahapratīkāraḥ — svābhāvikaḥ, kādācitkaśca; yād‍ṛcchikaḥ, nāyikākṛtaḥ, nāyakakṛtaḥ, sakhīkṛtaḥ, parijanakṛtaśca; hetuviparītaḥ, vyādhiviparītaḥ, tadarthakārī, kālpanikaśceti| tatra —
1. svābhāviko yathā—
unnāla-bālakamalākara-mākaranda-niṣyanda-saṃvalanamāṃsala-gandhabandhuḥ |
tvāṃ prīṇayiṣyati puraḥ parivartamānakallolaśīkaratuṣārajaḍassamīraḥ || 273 ||
2. kādācitko yathā—(urāca. 3.2)
vīcīvātaiḥ śīkarakṣodaśītairākarṣadbhiḥ padmakiñjalkagandhān |
mohe mohe rāmabhadrasya jīvaṃ svairaṃ svairaṃ preṣitastarpayeti || 274 ||
3. yād‍ṛcchiko yathā—(gāsa. 711ve.)
jaṃ muṃcchiāeṁ ṇa suo kalaṃbagaṃdheṇa taṃ guṇe paḍiaṃ |
iharā gajjiasaddo jīeṇa viṇā ṇa volaṃto || 275 ||
(yanmūrdhitayā na śrutaḥ kadambagandhena tad‍guṇe patitam |
itarathā garjitaśabdo jīvitena vinā nāpakrāmati na gacchet ||)
4. nāyikākṛto yathā—(gāsa. 835ve.)
siviṇaa—laddha—piaama—pulaïuggama—ṇibbharehiṃ aṃgehiṃ |
pariraṃbhaṇe suhāiṃ, pāvaü mā ṇaṃ paboheha || 276 ||
(svapnalabdhapriyatamapulakitodgamanirbharaiḥ aṅgaiḥ |
pariraṃbhaṇe sukhāni prāpnotu mā enāṃ prabodhayata ||)
5. nāyakakṛto yathā—(megha. 96)
tasmin kāle jalada! yadi sā labdhanidrāsukhā syāt tatrāsīnaḥ stanitavimukho yāmamātraṃ sahasva |
mā bhūdasyāḥ praṇayini mayi svapnalabdhe kathaṃcit sadyaḥ kaṇṭhacyutabhujalatāgranthi gạ̄dhopagūḍham || 277 ||
āś‍cyotanaṃ nu haricandanapallavānāṃ niṣpīḍitendukarakandalajo 'nusekaḥ |
ātap‍tajīvitapunaḥparitarpaṇo me sañjīvanauṣadhiraso suhṛdi prasaktaḥ || 278 ||(urāca. 3.11)
6. sakhīkṛto yathā—
sapadi sakhībhirnibhṛtaṃ virahavatīstrātumatra bhajyante |
sahakāramañjarīṇāṃ śikhodgamagranthayaḥ prathame || 279 ||
7. parijanakṛto yathā—(saka. 5.54)
sahasā mā sāhijjaü, piāgamo tīeṁ viraha—kisiāe |
accaṃta—pahariseṇa vi, jā maā sā maa ccea || 280 ||
(sahasā mā kathyatāṃ priyāgamastasyāḥ virahakṛśāyāḥ |
atyantapraharṣeṇāpi yā mṛtā sā mṛtaiva ||)
8. hetuviparīto yathā—(gāsa. 1.39)
sāhīṇe vi piaame patte vi chaṇe ṇa maṃḍio appā |
duggaapaütthavaïaṃ saaṃjhiaṃ saṃṭhavaṃtīe || 281 ||
(svādhīne 'pi priyatame prāp‍te 'pi kṣaṇe na maṇḍitaḥ ātmā |
durgataproṣitapatikāṃ prātiveśinīṃ saṃsthāpayantyā ||)
9. vyādhiviparīto yathā—
magāapaladvavalaaṃ saaṃsaaṃ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ |
dottiṇṇaṃ sahaccia cori āvere hapusi sijjhatti || 282 ||
10. tadarthakarī yathā—(gāsa. 840ve.)
cirapavasiadaïakaā ṇihuṇāhi sahīhi virahasahaṇatthaṃ |
aliā avi avarāhā vahūeṁ kamaso kahijjaṃti || 283 ||
(ciraproṣitadayitakṛtā nipuṇābhiḥ sakhībhirvirahasahanārtham |
alīkā apyaparādhā vadhvai kramaśaḥ kathyante ||)
11. kālpaniko yathā—(visā. 2.2)
vilīyendussākṣādamṛtarasavāpī yadi bhavet kalaṅkastatratyo yadi ca vikacendīvaravanam |
tatassnānakrīḍājanitajaḍabhāvairavayavaiḥ kadācinmuñceyaṃ priyavirahapīḍāpariṇatim || 284 ||
(5. sahāyāśvāsanam —7)
viyogavedanāvegaśāntaye sakhījanādivākyaṃ sahāyāśvāsanam| tat— āpātārambhapravṛttiprakramoddīpanābhiniveśakāleṣu upapadyate | tatra—
1. āpāto yathā—(gāsa. 2.43)
harihii piassa ṇava—cūa—pallavo paḍhama—maṃjari-saṇāho |
mā ruvasu putti patthāṇa—kalasa—muha—saṃṭhio gamaṇam || 285 ||
(hariṣyati priyasya navacūtapallavaḥ prathamamañjarīsanāthaḥ |
mā rodīḥ putri! prasthānakalaśamukhasaṃsthito gamanam ||)
2. ārambho yathā—
ea ccia putti piaṃ dharaṃti āucchaṇe mahapaattā |
uttāṇaamuhagholaṃtavāhavirimālaṇo vāā || 286 ||
3. pravṛtto yathā—
ettahiṃpullia ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ |
॰ ॰ ॰ ṇavijaṃta viulaï paramaïsu samīraṇavāraï || 287 ||
5. prakramo yathā—
pakṣmāgragrathitāśrudhautavalayā niṣpandatārekṣaṇā vibhrāṇā karapallavena kalitaṃ klāmyatkapolasthalam |
sedānīṃ likhiteva kāmapi gatāvasthāṃ sakhībhiścirā— dāsannāvadhi vāsaraprakaṭitapratyāśayāśvāsyate || 288 ||
6. uddīpanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 1.70)
gimhe davaggimasimaïliāiṃ dīsaṃti vijjhasiharāiṃ |
āsasu paütthapaïe ṇa hoṃti ṇavapāūsabbhāiṃ || 289 ||
(grīṣme davāgnimaṣīmalinitāni d‍ṛśyante vindhyaśikharāṇi |
āśvasihi proṣitapatike! na bhavanti navaprāvṛḍabhrāṇi ||)
7. abhiniveśo yathā—
pattia ṇa mehavaṃdaṃ eaṃ sahi sūradīvasihāe u kajjalaṃ |
(saïra—)paḍaṇeṇa ṇahakhaparammi dīasehi saṃgaliaṃ || 290 ||
(pratīhi na meghavṛndametaṃ sakhi! sūryadīpaśikajjalaṃ |
(svaira—) patanena nabhaḥkarpare divasaiḥ saṃghaṭitam ||)
(6. sahāyopālambhaḥ —12)
sakhīsahāyanāyakānāṃ mithaḥ svaparādidoṣod‍ghā(ṭanaṃ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰) yayoriti dvādaśadhā | tatra—
1. nāyakasya sakhīṃ prati yathā—(urāca. 3.28)
trastaikahāyanakuraṅgavilolad‍ṛṣṭestasyāḥ parisphurita—garbhabharālasāyāḥ |
jyotsnāmayīva mṛdubālamṛṇālakalpā kravyādbhiraṅgalatikā niyataṃ vilup‍tā || 291 ||
2. tasyaiva sahāyaṃ prati yathā—
॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ kṛtā kāntā || 292 ||
3. nāyikāyāḥ sakhīṃ prati yathā—(gāsa. 2.77)
sahi dūmeṃti kalaṃbāiṃ jaha maṃ taha ṇa sesakusumāiṃ |
ṇūṇaṃ imesu diahesu vahaï guḍiā—dhaṇuṃ kāmo || 293 ||
(sakhi dunvanti kadambāni yathā māṃ tathā na śeṣakusumāni |
nūnaṃ eṣu divaseṣu vahati guṭikādhanuḥ kāmaḥ ||)
4. tasyāḥ sahāyaṃ prati yathā—(sūmu. 142)
śvāsā bāṣpajalaṃ girassakaruṇā mārgeṇa netrāpaṇe kenedaṃ na kṛtaṃ priyasya virahe kasyāsavo nirgatāḥ |
sakhyevaṃ dayitena nāsmi kathitā kāntaḥ kathaṃ proṣitaḥ prāṇāḥ samprati me kalaṅkamalināstiṣṭhantu vā yāntu vā || 294 ||
5. sakhyā nāyikāṃ prati yathā—
aṃcalaṇu dhario suhuṃ ṇa gaṇaamuaṇaṇaggiimabhagge |
tuhaṃ appaṇa/ṇu duṇṇaü kirevi evahiṃ jūri ma agge || 295 ||
6. tasyā eva nāyakaṃ prati yathā—(sūmu. 169)
samprāp‍te 'vadhivāsare kṣaṇamasau tvad‍vartmavātāyanaṃ vāraṃ vāramupetya nirghṛṇatayā niścitya kiñcit tataḥ |
sampratyeva nivedya kelikurarīṃ sāstraṃ sakhībhyaḥ śiśo— rmādhavyā sahakārakeṇa karuṇaḥ pāṇigrahaḥ kalpitaḥ || 296 ||
7. tasyāḥ sahāyaṃ prati yathā—(gāsa. 4.22)
luṃbīo aṃgaṇamāhavīṇaṃ dāraggalāo jāāo |
āsāso paṃtha—paloaṇe vi piṭṭo gaavaīṇaṃ || 297 ||
(stabakā aṅgaṇamādhavīnāṃ dvārārgalā jātāḥ |
āśvāsaḥ pānthapralokane 'pi naṣṭo gatapatikānām ||)
8. sahāyasya nāyikāṃ prati yathā—
॰ ॰ ṇaṃti vippiaṃ virahiṇīoṃ ṇa maṇaaṃmi |
māandamaṃjarīo māe emea māreṃti || 298 ||
(॰ ॰ nanti vipriyaṃ virahiṇyo na manasi |
mākandamañjaryo mātaḥ evameva mārayanti ||)
9. sahāyasya nāyakaṃ prati yathā—
ma aratthaasāmaṇubaṇahi muhaṃpibāharasindūri |
aükkagghevi taï haahūaṃ hiae vahaṃcita ujjiviso || 299 ||
10. ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ (māmā. 9.19)
apahastitabāndhave tvayā vihitaṃ sāhasamasya tṛṣṇayā |
tadihānaparādhini priye sakhi! ko 'yaṃ karuṇojjhitaḥ kramaḥ || 300 ||
11. sahāyasya sakhīṃ prati yathā—(urāca. 2.7)
vajrādapi kaṭhorāṇi mṛdūni kusumādapi |
lokottarāṇāṃ cetāṃsi ko hi vijñātumarhati || 301 ||
12. sahāyaṃ prati yathā—
te pucchijjahi pattaḍaṃ je tahiṃ disihi ṇa eṃti |
jehi sa diṭṭhā goraḍī te dukkharaṃ jīaṃti || 302 ||
(te pṛcch‌yeyuḥ vārtā ye tasyāḥ diśaḥ na āyānti |
yaiḥ sā dṛṣṭā gaurī te duṣkaraṃ jīvanti ||)
(7. utkaṇṭhāvinodaḥ —6)
jātautsukyasya cetasaḥ kriyāntareṣu vyāsaṅga utkaṇṭhāvinodaḥ | sa āntaro, bāhyo, bāhyābhyantaraḥ, prasakto 'nuprasaktaḥ, prasaktānuprasakteśceti nāyakasya ṣọdhā | nāyikāyā api bāhyaḥ, āntaraḥ bāhyāntaraḥ, prasakto 'nuprasaktaḥ, prasaktānuprasaktaśceti krameṇa ṣọdhaivodahriyante | tatra—
1. nāyakasyāntaro yathā—(śāku. 6.14)
yad yat sādhu na citre 'syāḥ kriyate tat tadanyathā |
tathāpi tasyā lāvaṇyaṃ rekhayā kiñcidanvitam || 303 ||
2. tasyaiva bāhyo bāhyābhyantaraśca yathā—(śāku. 6.18)
kṛtaṃ na karṇārpitabandhanaṃ sakhe ! śirīṣamābhug‍navilambikesaram |
na vā śarac‍candramarīcinirmalaṃ mṛṇālasūtraṃ racitaṃ stanāntare || 304 ||
3. tasya prasakto 'nuprasaktaḥ prasaktānuprasaktaśca yathā—(śāku. 6.17)
kāryā saikatalīnahaṃsamithunā strotovahā mālinī pādāstāmabhito niṣaṇṇahariṇā gaurīguroḥ pāvanāḥ |
śākhālambitavalkalasya ca tarornirmātumicchāmyadhaḥ śrṛṅge kṛṣṇamṛgasya vāmanayanaṃ kaṇḍūyamānāṃ mṛgīm || 305 ||
4. nāyikānā bāhya āntaro bāhyāntaraśca yathā—(megha. 84)
āloke te nipatati purā sā balivyākulā vā matsādṛśyaṃ virahatanu vā bhāvagamyaṃ likhantī |
pṛcchantī vā madhuravacanāṃ śārikāṃ pañcarasthāṃ kac‍cid bhartuḥ smarasi rasike ! tvaṃ hi tasya priyeti || 306 ||
5. tasyā eva prasakto yathā—(megha. 85)
utsaṅge vā malinavasane saumya! nikṣipya vīṇāṃ mada‍gotrāṅkaṃ viracitapadaṃ geyamuda‍gātukāmā |
tantrīrārdrā nayanasalilaissārayitvā kathañcid bhūyo bhūyaḥ svayamapi kṛtāṃ mūrcchanāṃ vismarantī || 307 ||
6. tasyā anuprasaktaḥ prasaktānuprasaktaśca yathā—(megha. 86)
śeṣān māsān virahadivasasthāpitasyāvadhervā vinyasyantī bhuvi gaṇanayā dehalīmuktapuṣpaiḥ|
sambhogaṃ vā hṛdayanihitārambhamāsvādayantī prāyeṇaite ramaṇaviraheṣvaṅganānāṃ vinodāḥ || 308 ||
(8. sandeśādānam —12)
dūrasthayordūtadvārakayoḥ patraprayogaḥ sandeśādānam | paraḥ, parovaraḥ, avaraḥ, pratyayaparovaraśca, mukhyo 'vāntarastūṣṇīṃ bhāktaśca, vārta ārtavaḥ sauvārtavaḥ saukhavārtaśceti dvādaśadhā | teṣu
1. paro yathā—(megha. 100)
tāmāyuṣman! mama! ca vacanādātmanaścopakartu brūyā evaṃ tava sahacaro rāmagiryāśramasthaḥ |
avyāpannaḥ kuśalamabale ! pṛcchati tvāṃ viyuktaḥ pūrvābhāṣyaṃ sulabhavipadāṃ prāṇināmetadeva || 309 ||
2. parovaro yathā—
aṅgenāṅgaṃ pratanu tanunā gāḍhatap‍tena taptaṃ sāstreṇāstradravamaviratotkaṇṭhamutkaṇṭhitena |
uṣṇocch‌vāsaṃ samadhikatarocch‍‍vāsināṃ dūravartī saṅkalpaistairviśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ || 310 ||
3. avaro yathā—(megha. 102)
śabdākhyeyaṃ yadapi kila te yassakhīnāṃ purastāt karṇe lolaḥ kathayitumabhūdānanasparśalobhāt |
so 'tikrāntaḥ śravaṇaviṣayaṃ locanābhyāmadṛśya— stvāmutkaṇṭhāviracitapadaṃ sammu/manmukhenedamāha || 311 ||
4. pratyavaro yathā—(megha. 97)
bharturmitraṃ priyamavidhave! viddhi māmambuvāhaṃ tatsandeśairmanasi nihitairāgatastvatsamīpam |
yo bṛndāni tvarayati pathi bhrā/śrāmyatāṃ proṣitānāṃ mandras‍nigdhairdhvanibhirabalāveṇimokṣotsukāni || 312 ||
5. mukhyo yathā—
kuṭajakaṭavo vātā vātāḥ, śrutaṃ ghanagarjitaṃ, niśi niśi muhuḥ śūnye talpe kṛtaḥ śayanaśramaḥ |
avadhigaṇanārekhāpūrṇāḥ kṛtā gṛhabhittayo na tava savidhaṃ prāp‍tāḥ prāṇāḥ na ca tvamihāgataḥ || 313 ||
6. avāntaro yathā—
pāntha! dvāravatīṃ prayāsi yadi he tad devakīnandano vak‍tavyaḥ smaramantramohavivaśā gopyo na nāmojjhitāḥ |
etāḥ ketakapuṣpadhūlipaṭalairālokya ramyā diśaḥ kālindītaṭabhūmayaḥ kitava ! re no yānti cintāspadam || 314 ||
7. tūṣṇīṃ yathā—
navāḥ kiṃ nāmbhodā na vahati kimāsārapavano niśāḥ kiṃ vā sarvā na ghanatimiracchannakakubhaḥ |
priyo yasmin deśo vrajatu pathiko nāsti likhitaṃ na jāne sandeṣṭuṃ sakhi! kathaya vācyaṃ paramataḥ || 315 ||
8. bhākto yathā—
eyaṃ pia pe sijjaüalāhioramaha kiṃ thaṇeheṇa |
lehaṇiabolaṇoattha hatthagaliaṃ palaaṃmissā || 316 ||
9. vārto yathā—(megha. 108)
ityātmānaṃ bahu vigaṇayannātmanaivāvalambe tat kalyāṇi! tvamapi sutarāṃ mā gamaḥ kātaratvam |
kasyaikāntaṃ sukhamupanataṃ duḥkhamekāntato vā nīcairgacchatyupari ca daśā cakranemikrameṇa || 317 ||
10. ārtavo yathā—(megha. prakṣip‍ta 102)
dhārāsiktasthalasurabhiṇastvanmukhasyāsya bāle! dūrībhūtaṃ pratanumapi māṃ pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti |
gharmānte 'smin vigaṇaya kathaṃ vāsarāṇi vrajeyu— rdiksaṃsakta—prabala—jalada—vyasta—sūryātapāni || 318 ||
11. sauvārtavo yathā—(megha. 107)
saṃkṣipyeta kṣaṇamapi kathaṃ dīrghayāmā triyāmā sarvāvasthāsvaharapi kathaṃ mandamandātapaṃ syāt |
itthaṃ cetaścaṭulanayane! durlabhaprārthanaṃ me gạ̄dhoṣṇābhiḥ kṛtamaśaraṇaṃ tvad‌viyogavyathābhiḥ || 319 ||
12. saukhavārto yathā—(megha. 109)
'śāpānto me bhujagaśayanādutthite śārṅgapāṇau' || 320 ||(pṛ. 967)ityādi |
vyāp‍tiskandho 'yamuddeśanirdeśābhyāmudāhṛtaḥ |
athodāhriyate hyadya samāp‍tiskandhapaddhatiḥ || 321 ||
(3. samāp‍tiskandhaḥ — 8)
(1. pravṛttyāgamaḥ —5)
tatra dūtādibhyaḥ priyodantalābhaḥ pravṛttyāgamaḥ |
sa svadūtakṛtaḥ, paradūtakṛtaḥ, svapatrahārakṛtaḥ, sakhīkṛtaḥ, sahāyakṛta iti | teṣu—
1. svadūtakṛto yathā—(urā. 4.25)
devyāssantatabāṣpavāripaṭalacchannekṣaṇāyāḥ karaṃ cūḍārat‍nasamarpaṇāya bahuśo yāntaṃ vṛthaivānyataḥ |
bhrāmyantaṃ padadaśrupūritadṛśo hastaṃ mamāpyekato dṛṣṭvā tatra niśācarairapi nijasvāmī ciraṃ ninditaḥ || 322 ||
2. paradūtakṛto yathā—
paliaṃti pahia tuha bhavaṇa—dāra—sahaāra—sāhiṇo eṇhiṃ |
ghariṇīe kuddhaloaṇa—galaṃta—jala—pūriā hārāḥ || 323 ||
(pradīpayanti pathika! tava bhavanadvāra—sahakāra—śākhina idānīm |
gṛhiṇyāḥ kruddha—locana—galajjala—pūritā dhārāḥ ||)
3. svapatraharakṛto yathā—(gāsa. 841ve.)
jaṃ jaṃ paütthapaïā piaama—ṇāmakkhaṃra lihaï lehe |
taṃ taṃ se lehaṇiāṇusāragalio pusaï seo || 324 ||
(yad yat proṣitapatikā priyatamanāmākṣaraṃ likhati lekhe |
tat tat tasyāḥ lekhanikānusāragalito mārṣṭi svedaḥ ||)
4. sakhīkṛto yathā—
svap‍nāntare samupalabhya ca sā bhavantaṃ mithyopagūhanaviṣaktabhujā prabudhya |
dṛṣṭo 'si yanna śayane 'tha tadadhyaśeta mugdhā punaḥ punaralīkanimīlitākṣī || 325 ||
5. sahāyakṛto yathā—(visā. 3.25)
muktvānaṅgaḥ kusumaviśikhān pañca tūṇīkṛtāgrān manye mugdhāṃ praharati sakhe! patriṇā vāruṇena |
bāṣpotpīḍaḥ kathamaparathā sthūlanetrapraṇālī— vaktroda‍vāntastrivalivipine sāraṇīsāmyameti || 326 ||
(2. pravṛtti(pari)praś‍naḥ —6)
virahiṇoḥ priyodantapṛcchā pravṛttipraśnaḥ |
sa ūrjitaḥ, dīnaḥ, svasthaḥ, unmattaḥ, śaṅkāvān, vicitraśceti | teṣu—
1. ūrjito yathā—
keyūrīkṛtakaṅkaṇāvalirasau karṇāvataṃsīkṛta— vyālolālaka (paddhatiḥ pathi) puro baddhāñjaliḥ pṛcchati |
yāvat kiñcidudantamātmakamitustāvat sa evetyatha vrīḍāvakritakaṇṭhanālamabalā kaiḥ kairna bhinnā rasaiḥ || 327 ||
2. dīno yathā—
madhyesadma samutthitā tadanu ca dvārantarālaṃ gatā yāvatprāṅgaṇamāgataḥ kathamapi preyāṃstu nālokitaḥ |
haṃho vāyasa rājahaṃsa śuka he he śārike kathyatāṃ kā vārteti mṛgīdṛśo vijayate bāṣpāntarālaṃ vacaḥ || 328 ||
3. svastho yathā—
bhrātaḥ pāntha! pathi tvayā na pathikaḥ kaścit samāsādito mugdhe! naikaśatāni kīdṛśa iti prakhyāpyatāṃ vallabhaḥ |
yaṃ dṛṣṭvā na bhavanti kīdṛśa iti prekṣāvatāmuktayaḥ saṃjñeyaḥ dayito mameti pathikāyāvedya mohaṃ gatā || 329 ||
4. unmatto yathā—(vikra. 4.27)
sarvakṣitibhṛtāṃ nātha! dṛṣṭāṃ sarvāṅgasundarī |
rāmā ramye vanoddeśe mayā virahitā tvayā || 330 ||
5. śaṅkito yathā—
bhadrātra grāmake tvaṃ vasasi paricayaste 'sti jānāsi vārtā— masminnadhvanyayoṣidgurutaravirahotkā na kācid vipannā |
itthaṃ pānthaḥ pravāsāvadhidinavigamāpāyaśaṅkī priyāyāḥ pṛcchan vārtāṃ samīpasthitanijabhavano 'pyākulo nopayāti || 331 ||
6. vicitro yathā—(vikramo. 4.22)
madhukara madirākṣyāḥ śaṃsa tasyāḥ pravṛttiṃ varatanurathavāsau naiva dṛṣṭiṃ gatā te |
yadi surabhimavāpsyastanmukhoccha‍vāsagandhaṃ tava ratirabhaviṣyat puṇḍarīke kimasmin || 332 ||
(3. avadhipratīkṣā —6)
priyāgamanadinodīkṣaṇ avadhipratīkṣā, sā davīyasyavidūrā nedīyasyapi prāp‍tātītā ca |
1. tāsu davīyasī yathā—
smartuṃ viyogadivasān dayitasya yāṃ yāṃ rekhāṃ cakāra bhuvi tāmrarucā nakhena |
tāṃ tāmarālacalapakṣmaśikhāgrabhinnai— rmuktāphala—dyutibhiraśrubhi—runmamārja || 333 ||
2. avidūrā yathā—
avadhidivasāḥ prāyeṇaite prayānti kṛtāgasa— stanurapi tanuḥ sthātuṃ śaktā na kālakalamapi |
glapayati mano mūrcchāveśairviyogaviṣadruma— stadalamadhunā sakhyaścintāśatairasurakṣaṇe || 334 ||
3. nedīyasī yathā—
gharakajjeṇa vi jo calaï jattha dhāvaï tahiṃ tahiṃ cea |
gharaṇīe ohidiahe paddhāvaï saṃkiaṃ hiaaṃ || 335 ||
(gṛhakāryeṇāpi yaś‍calati yatra dhāvati tatra tatraiva |
gṛhiṇyā avadhidivase pradhāvati śaṅkitaṃ hṛdayam ||)
4. prāp‍tā yathā—
dei puloia—pariaṇamohīdiahammi majjaṇuttiṇṇā |
sūraṃ jalaṃjaliṃ piaamavahasok‍kakaajīaṃ sā || 336 ||
(dadāti pralokitaparijanamavadhidivase majjanottīrṇā |
sūryaṃ jalāñjaliṃ priyatama—vahanaikakṛta jīvitaṃ sā ||)
5. atītā yathā—
vatse mādhavi! mugdhikāsi balavad vahnayaukasau devatāḥ pāntu tvāmayamastamañcati ravirvīto 'vadhiste pituḥ |
śāntaṃ pāpamamaṅgalaṃ paramataḥ śravyā na kalyāṇinī kavyaṃ navyamadhuvratāya1 tu madhūnyuddiś‍ya no dāsyasi || 337 ||
(4. mārgodīkṣaṇam— 5)
dayitapathāvaloko mārgodīkṣaṇam| yathā saḥ gṛhāt, gavākṣataḥ, aṅgaṇataḥ, upaśalyakāt, mārgavṛkṣata iti | teṣu—
1. gṛhād yathā—
dāre hatthakkhittāi ālaṇīlaṃti galiavāhāi |
piadaṃsaṇūsūāo muhāṇa pahiāṇajāāo || 338 ||
2. gavākṣato yathā—
aṇṇapahiammi eṃte so tti gavakkhao taṃ puloaṃtī |
muṇiavaaṇā gaavaī sahīo ruirī ruāvei || 339 ||
(anyapathike āyāti sa iti gavākṣataḥ taṃ pralokayantī |
jñātavadanā gatapatikā sakhyaḥ rodanaśīlā rodayata ||)
3. aṅgaṇato yathā—
ālambyāṅgavāpikāparisare svecchānatāṃ śākhikāṃ keyūrībhavadalpaśeṣavalayā bālā samastaṃ dinam |
sā daivopahatasya mūḍhamanaso bhagnāvadheradya me panthānaṃ vidhṛtāśruṇā vadanakenālokya kiṃ vakṣyati || 340 ||
4. upaśalyakād yathā—(amaru. 76)
ādṛṣṭiprasarāt priyasya padavīmālokya nirviṇṇayā viśrānteṣu pathiṣvahaḥ pariṇatau dhvānte samutsarpati |
datvaikaṃ saśucā gṛhaṃ prati padaṃ pānthastriyā 'smin kṣaṇe mā bhūdāgata ityamandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvīkṣitam || 341 ||
1. kāvyaṃ = kāvyaṃ jorā. ; vratāya = vratādya jorā.
5. mārgavṛkṣato yathā—
piavaṃthū ṇiattihiṃ goriahe diṭṭhi pahillī dhāi |
taṇu—giriṇaï—sotti caḍa—puḍaïṇiṇa kuḍuṃ—iṇāvaï || 342 ||
taru—sāhaü dhuvaṃtiahe vagga hoti thaṇullā |
taṇua piāsahaṃ patthuahaṃpaheṇa . . . . la || 343 ||
(5. daivanimittaśakunopaśrutayaḥ— 4)
priyāgamajñānahetavo daivanimitthaśakunopaśrutayaḥ| teṣu—
1. daivo yathā—
yeṣa/(ṣuḥ smarasya nanu) pañcamakaṇṭakasthā saumyāstṛtīyaripulābhagatāśca pāpāḥ |
āyānti teṣu bhavanāni punaḥ kṛtārthāḥ dattaṃ dvijātiṣu purā vidhivad yathārthāḥ || 344 ||
yathā vā—
jātimitre 'thavā ṣaṣṭhe rāhau kendre ca vārdyutau |
proṣitāgamanaṃ vidyāt tṛtīye jñe 'site 'pi vā || 345 ||
2. nimittaṃ yathā—
dattaṃ piṇḍaṃ nayanasalilakṣālanā ' 'dhautagaṇḍaṃ dvāropānte gatadayitayā saṅgamānveṣaṇāya |
vakragrīvaścalataśirāḥ pārśvasañcārinetraḥ pāśāśaṅkīṃ galitavalayaṃ krāntamaśnāti kākaḥ || 346 ||
yathā vā—
tailāktānalakān kapolapatitān sandhāya karṇāntare vastrāntena vilambinā sarabhasaṃ pracchādya pīnau stanau |
bālā vāyasamevamāha bahuśo dāsyāmi te yat priyaṃ cūtāt kesarapādapaṃ vraja śanairyadyeti me vallabhaḥ || 347 ||
—— —
3. śakuno yathā—(sūmu. 143)
gato 'staṃ tigmāṃśurvraja sahacarīnīḍamadhunā sukhaṃ bhrātaḥ supyāssujanasadṛśaṃ vāyasakṛtam |
mayi snehād bāṣpasthagitajaḍadṛṣṭau sakaruṇaṃ rudatyā yo yātastvapi sa vilapatyeṣyati katham || 348 ||
yathā vā—
jātābhīmarayāstaṭadrumarajaḥkūlaṃkaṣā nimnagā vāntyutphullakadambasaurabhadharā meghaṅkarā vāyavaḥ |
etaccābhinavo navāmbugurubhirnītaṃ ghanaiśśyāmatā— madyāpyeṣa virauti kiṃ sakhi!— vṛthā vītatrapo vāyasaḥ || 349 ||
4. upaśrutiryathā —
taralayasi dṛśaṃ kimutsukāmakaluṣamānasavāsalālite |
avatara kalahaṃsi! vāpikāṃ punarapi yāsyasi paṅkajālayam || 350 ||
yathā vā—
karabhakabhī paścānmuktetyanādṛtasauṣṭhavaḥ kimapi valitagrīvaṃ paśyanmuhurmuhurākulaḥ |
vrajati yadapi stokaṃ gatvā nivṛtya tato dhruvaṃ punarapi bhavānnūnaṃ labdhānayā saha saṅgamam || 351 ||
(6. susvapnadarśanam— 6)
mānasapratyakṣeṇā priyajanāvalokaḥ susvapnadarśanam | saḥ samyagavabhāso, mithyāvabhāsaḥ, saṃkṣip‍tākāraḥ, vikṣip‍tākāraḥ, paryāp‍tarūpo 'paryāp‍tarūpaśca | teṣu—
1. samyagavabhāso yathā—
sudhādhārākārā niśi niśi kutaścandrakiraṇā- kutaḥ kāntānetradyuti kuvalayaṃ vā pratisaraḥ |
kutaḥ śrāvyā vācaḥ prativacanamakliṣṭaracanā pratisvapnaṃ ceto virama kuta eva priyatamā || 352 ||
2. mithyāvabhāso yathā—(visā. 1. 20)
kva peyaṃ jyotsnāmbho vadanabisavallīsaraṇibhi— rmṛṇālītantubhyaḥ sicayaracanā kutra bhavatu |
kva vā pārīmeyo bata vakuladāmnāṃ parimalaḥ kathaṃ svapnaḥ sākṣātkuvalayadṛśaṃ tām || 353 ||
3. saṃkṣip‍tākāro yathā—
sa dṛṣṭaḥ svapne 'dya praṇayakupito māṃ pratijana— stataḥ kṣīṇā rātrirna ca caraṇayorasmi patitā |
kṛtaṃ kalyāṇānāmanabhilaṣitā sāvadhi vayaḥ prasannaṃ tadavaktraṃ na kṛtamiti ceto dahati mām || 354 ||
4. vikṣip‍tarūpo yathā—
jāne kopaparāṅ‍mukhī priyatamā svapne 'dya dṛṣṭā mayā mā mā saṃspṛśa pāṇineti rudatī gantuṃ pravṛttā tataḥ |
no yāvat parirabhya cāṭukaśatairāśvāsayāmi kṣaṇaṃ bhrātastāvadahaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā nidrādaridrīkṛtaḥ || 355 ||
5. paryāp‍tarūpo yathā—(caurapa. 210)
adyāpi tāṃ smaraniketamahāpatākāṃ lambālakāṃ ciraviyogakṛśāṅgayaṣṭim |
svapne vilolanayanāṃ kṣaṇadṛṣṭanaṣṭāṃ vidyāṃ pramādagalitāmiva saṃsmarāmi || 356 ||
6. aparyāp‍tarūpo yathā—
siviṇaa—khaṇa—suttūṭṭhiāe punarutta—daṃsaṇa—maṇāe— | bālāe ṇimīlia—loaṇaāe divaso vi volīṇo || 357 ||
(svapna—kṣaṇa—sup‍totthitāyāḥ punaruktadarśanamanasaḥ |
bālāyāḥ nimīlitalocanāyā divaso 'pi na atikrāntaḥ ||)
(7. sunimittānubhavaḥ— 3)
pravāsinaḥ śubhasūcakacakṣurādisphuraṇaṃ sunimittānubhavaḥ|
tanmanorathopagame, (dūtopagame), dayitopagame ca tatra—
1. manorathopagamo yathā—(gāsa. 2. 37)
