phurie vāmacchi tue jaï ehiiso piojja tā suiraṃ |
viṇimilia dāhiṇṇaaṇaṃ tue a eaṃ puloissaṃ || 358 ||
(sphurite vāmākṣi tvayi yadyeṣyati mama priya iti tat ciram |
mīlitvā dakṣiṇānayanaṃ tvayā avitṛṣṇaṃ pralokayiṣyāmi ||)
jeṇa jāṇu ṭṭhia-vialia—dhavala—valaa—paḍirohaṇekkarasiāhiṃ |
vāhāhi kaha ṇu tuetti/turijjaï māmi pahiapuraṃdhīhiṃ || 359 ||
(yena sthita—vigalita—dhavala—valaya—pratirodhanaikarasikābhyām |
bāhubhyāṃ kathaṃ nu tvayeti/tvaryate sakhi! pathikapurandhrībhiḥ ||)
2. dūtopagamo yathā—(megha. 94)
ruddhāpāṅgaprasaramalakairañjanasnehaśūnyaṃ pratyādeśādapi ca madhuno vismṛtabhrūvilāsam |
tvayyāsanne nayanamuparispandi śaṅke mṛgākṣyā mīnakṣobhakulakuvalayaśrītulāmeṣyatīti || 360||
yathā vā—(megha. 95)
vāmaścāsyāḥ kararuhapadairmucyamāno madīyaiḥ krīḍāyogaṃ ciraparicitaṃ tyājito daivagatyā |
sambhogānte mama samucito hastasaṃvāhanānāṃ yāsyatyūruḥ sarasakadalīstambhagauraścalatvam || 361 ||
3. dayitopagamo yathā—
ajja maha imaṃ sahi dāhiṇearaṃ piaamāgamaṇadūaṃ |
avaṇia—kheaṃ vaddhāviāsi papphaṃdae acchī || 362 ||
(adya mamedaṃ sakhi! dakṣiṇāparaṃ priyatamāgamanadūtam |
apanītakhedaṃ rdhāpitāsi praspandate akṣi ||)
yathā vā—
vāmenaiva vilocanena bhavatī diṣṭa‍yā ciraṃ vardhitā prāyaḥ prāpsyasi pāritoṣikamimaṃ dhṛṣṭo jano mādṛśaḥ |
asmin prāṅgaṇapīlukuñjaviṭape kṛtvā padaṃ dṛś‍yatāṃ cañcatkesarakandhareṇa karabheṇāyaṃ vane vallabhaḥ || 363 ||
(8. priyapratyāgamaḥ— 12)
pravāsato gṛhāgamanaṃ priyapratyāgamaḥ| sa udāttādināyikānimittabhedād dvādaśadhā | teṣu—
1. udāttādinimitto yathā—
āyāte dayite marusthalabhuvāṃ saṃcintya durlaṅghayatāṃ gehinyā paritoṣabāṣpataralāmāsajya dṛṣṭiṃ mukhe |
datvā pīluśamīkarīrakabalaṃ celāñcalenādarā— dunmṛṣṭaṃ karabhasya kesarasaṭābhārāgralagnaṃ rajaḥ || 364 ||
2. uddhatānimitto yathā—
yaddatvā lavaṇāñjaliṃ svayamasāvucchūnatāmrekṣaṇā tvāmapyudagatabāṣpamarpitavatī bhūyo 'pi matsaṅgamaḥ |
tatkiṃ nirghṛṇa vismṛtaṃ karabha he yenādya pūrṇenavadhau tasyāḥ krīḍasi jīvitena vijahada‍gaṅgopakaṇṭhe jalam || 365 ||
3. lalitānimitto yathā—
dṛṣṭirvandanamālikā stanayugaṃ lāvaṇyapūrṇau ghaṭau śubhrāṇāṃ prakaraḥ smitaṃ sumanasāṃ dantaprabhā darpaṇaḥ |
romāñcodṛma eva sarṣapakaṇāḥ pāṇī tathā pallavau svāṅgaireva gṛhaṃ priyasya viśatastanvyā kṛtaṃ maṅgalam || 366 ||
4. śāntānimitto yathā—
garjatyunnata eṣa nīlajaladaḥ krūraṃ kadambanilo mārgāḥ (palla) vino vanāni haritasnigdhāni pūrṇo 'vadhiḥ |
āyattaṃ tava jīvitaṃ karabha! he khinno 'pi gaccha drutaṃ kāntā yadyāpi tena kupyati tathāpyastyeva me saṅgamaḥ || 367 ||
5. dhīrānimitto yathā—
maṃgala—valaaṃ jīaṃ va rakkhiaṃ jaṃ paütthapaïāe |
sahasa tti daṃsaṇūsasia—bāhulaïāe taṃ bhiṇṇaṃ || 368 ||
(maṅgalavalayaṃ jīvitamiva rakṣitaṃ yat proṣitapatikayā |
sahaseti darśanocchravasita—bāhulatikayā tad bhinnam ||)
6. adhīrānimitto yathā—
āsīd yasya muharmuharvigalito(tair) bāṣpaiḥ samaṃ durdharai— rdaurbalyād valayasya hāṭakabhuvaḥ paryākulā dhāraṇā |
diṣṭyā vṛddhikarā yadā tu madhunā tasyaiva cākarṣaṇe nānyānāhvayate punaḥ punarasau nāgacchati preyasi || 369 ||
7. mugdhānimittā yathā—
puliiamaṇujjuacchaṃ seo aṃgesu pahariso hiae |
muddhāeṁ vi jāaṃ ṇavavahūeṁ jāmāue āe || 370 ||
(pralokitamanṛjvakṣaṃ svedo 'ṅgeṣu praharṣo hṛdaye |
mugdhāyā api jātaṃ navavadhvā jāmātṛka āgate ||)
8. madhyānimitto yathā—(gāsa. 822 ve.)
atthakkāgaadiṭṭhe vahuā jāmāuammi gurupurao |
jūraï ṇivaḍaṃtāṇaṃ harisavisaṃṭṭāṇa valaāṇa || 371 ||
(akasmād āgatadṛṣṭe vadhukā jāmātṛke gurupurataḥ |
krudhyati nipatadbhyo harṣa—viṣamitebhyo valayebhyaḥ ||)
9. pragalbhānimitto yathā—(gāsa. 7. 83)
avaraṇhāgaa—jāmāuassa viuṇei mohaṇukkaṃṭhaṃ |
vahūāe gharaparohaḍamajjaṇamuhalo valaasaddo || 372 ||
(aparāh‍ṇāgatajāmātuḥ dviguṇayati mohanotkaṇṭhām |
vadhukāyā gṛhapaś‍cādabhāgamajjanamukharo valayaśabdaḥ ||)
10. uttamānimitto yathā—
pulaïbbhebveu pasāhaï dara—kummāṇa—thaṇa |
paharisa bāhu vihūsaï ṇikkajjala ṇaaṇa || 373 ||
assujaloha vi sohaï khāmakavole muhe |
muddhahe kāi ṇa maṃḍaṇa daïāgamaṇasuhe || 374 ||
(pulakodbhedaḥ prasādhayati īṣanmlānau stanau |
praharṣa: bāhū vibhūṣayati niṣkajjale nayane ||
aśrujalaudhaḥ api śobhate kṣāmakapole mukhe |
mugdhāyāḥ kiṃ na maṇḍanaṃ dayitāgamanasukhe ||)
11. madhyamānimitto yathā—
pie sahasatti pahattitahe vihavi/ ḍia valaa |
pulaüttaṃbhiagattahe sohahiṃ mahihiṃ gaa || 375 ||
takkhaṇamukkaho soaho ṇaṃ baṃdhaṇakaḍaa |
ṇāi paṇaṭṭhaho virahaho taralaturaṃgaae || 376 ||
(priye sahasā prāp‍te vighaṭitāni valayāni |
pulakottambhitagāñyāḥ śobhante mahyāṃ gatāni ||
tatkṣaṇamuk‍tasya śokasya nanu bandhanakaṭakāni |
nanu praṇaṣṭasya virahasya taralaturaṅgapadāni ||)
12. kaniṣṭhānimitto—
bāhajalollialoaṇa thaṇaya ṇa uppusia |
ṇavi dahikaakkhaa laïa ṇa vaṃdaṇamāla kia || 377 ||
harisāraṃbha—viaṃmiapulaükkaṃpa—bhara |
pekkhevi kaṃtu pahuttaü laggī kaṃṭhe para || 378 ||
(bāṣpajavālārdritalocane stanau na parimārjitau |
nāpi dadhi—akṣatāḥ gṛhītāḥ na vandanamālā kṛtā ||
harṣārambha—vijṛmbhita—pulakotkampabharā |
prekṣya kāntaṃ prāp‍taṃ lagnā kaṇṭhe punaḥ ||)
uktā samāp‍tiskandhe 'sāvudāharaṇapaddhatiḥ |
diśānayo 'nusartavyamanuktamapi sūribhiḥ || 379 ||
saiva pravāsaśaṅkādicaturviṃśatikandalaḥ |
smṛto 'naṅgavihaṅgasya pravāso vasatidrumaḥ || 380 ||
samāsavyāsābhyāṃ kusumadhanuṣo jīvitamiti pravāso nirṇītaḥ priyajanamanohemanikaṣaḥ |
atha premodyānapraṇayataruvistrambhasumano— nivāsaikāsthānī surabhirabhidhīyeta karuṇaḥ || 381 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe pravāsopavarṇano nāma || ekatriṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 31 ||
sanātanalalāṭake likhitamasti sāhityagāṃ malīmasitalekhinīmapagatāṃhasaṃ prekṣitum |
pravāsakalanāmayīmitarathā tu gāthāmimā— masāvasadṛśīṃ punaḥ susadṛśīṃ vidhātuṃ kṛtī |
atrāpi santi bahavo 'sphuṭitārthakā hi ś‍lokā vicakṣaṇadhiyaḥ khalu tān dhayeyuḥ |
na prākṛtaṃ na khalu saṃskṛtamapyaśuddha— lekhaṃ nijārthaparibhāvanikāsu śaktam ||
atha
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe dvātriṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ
karuṇavipralambhaprakāśaḥ
athātaḥ kramaprāp‍taṃ karuṇavipralambhamupadekṣyāmaḥ | tasya ca prathamānurāgādibhyo rāgavardhanatvādante 'bhidhānamityabhihitaṃ purastāt1 | bhūyaśca viśeṣato 'bhidhīyate |
vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogād prakarṣamāpadyamānā2 ratirnāma kāmaśrṛṅgārakhyāṃ labhate | sa tu nityanaimittikādibhedādaṣṭadhocyate | tatra rāgavardhanatvāpekṣāyāṃ nityānanaimittikaḥ, sāmānyād viśeṣaḥ, prakāśāt pracchannaḥ, kṛtrimādakṛtrimo balīyān | bhūyo 'pi naimittikād vaiśoṣiko, vaiśeṣikāt pracchannaḥ, pracchannādakṛtrima iti sarvato 'pyakṛtrima evotkṛṣyate | sa cāhāryo, yauvanajaḥ, sahajo, vistrambhajaśceti caturdhā | tatrāhāryād yauvanajo, yauvanajāt sahajaḥ, sahajād vistrambhajo balīyān |
kāmaśrṛṅgāraśca dvedhā | sambhogo vipralambhaśca | tatrābhilaṣaṇīyānāmavāp‍tau sambhogaḥ, viparyaye vipralambhaḥ | sambhogaś‍ca vipralambhamantareṇa na prakarṣamadhirohatīti vipralambhasya sambhogāt prathamamabhidhānam |
vipralambho hi kāmaśrṛṅgārasya prāṇitam | sa prathamānurāge 'ṅkurito, māne pallavitaḥ, pravāse kusumitaḥ, karuṇe phalitaḥ, prathamānurāgānantarādiṣu prakarṣamāpannaḥ samyagupabhogyo bhavati | padātpadaṃ ca pratipadyamāno viśeṣataḥ svadate |
yathā dugdhād dadhi svādu yathā dadhno 'mlaṣāḍavaḥ |
yathāmlaṣāḍavāt svādurāmikṣaivaṃ rasodayaḥ || 1 ||
te ca prathamānurāgādayo vipralambhāḥ, tadanantarāstu sambhogāḥ | anurāgastu na tathā iṅgitākārādibhiḥ prathamānurāgeṇerṣyāyitamantrāyitādibhirmānenotkaṇṭhāveśakārśyādibhiḥ pravāse, yathā vyasanābhighātasammīlanādibhiranubhāvaiḥ karuṇavipralambhe prakarṣamāpanno niṣprakampatāṃ prāpnoti | ataḥ prathamānurāgādīnāṃ vipralambhabhedānāṃ trayāṇāmapyanantaraṃ rāgavardhanatamaḥ karuṇavipralambho 'bhidhīyate iti |
kaḥ punarayaṃ karuṇo nāma |
1. dra. atraiva pṛ. 1396 2. nabhāvo= 'nabhāvo' jo, 'naḥ pradhānaḥ (sthāyī) bhāvo' rāghavaḥ |
(1. karuṇaḥ— 12)
yatrāsmin mithyābhiniveśa iva gurvāyāsakārake 'pi mūrkhāṇāṃ, sarvāṅgaparityāga ivālaukike 'pi brahmavidāṃ, rajaḥkardamakrīḍāvinoda iva veṣadūṣake 'pi paurapaugaṇḍānāṃ, mahāhavamahīvihāra iva bībhatsabhīṣaṇe 'pi śūrasāhasikānāṃ, priyasuhannarmanirbhartsana ivātigrāmye 'pi parihāsikānāṃ, kupitakāminīpārṣṇiprahāra iva sukumāre 'pi rāgiṇāṃ, timirābhisārikāveṣa iva malīmase 'pi cauryaratarucīnāṃ, vilāsinīkilikiñcitaprapañca iva dīnapradarśane 'pi nāgarikāṇām, atīvānurajyate manaḥ |
(manaḥ prema)
sāmayikānāmucyate | prarūḍhasnehayoranyataravināśe anyasya duḥkhābhiniveśo hṛdayadāruṇaḥ | sa kathaṃ śokād vibhidyata iti cet,
hetuphalaviṣayasvarūpabhedāt | tathāhi— 'ratyekahetuḥ karuṇaḥ, prītidayādyanekahetuḥ śokaḥ, punassaṅgamaphalaḥ karuṇaḥ, apunassaṅgamaphalaḥ śokaḥ, strīpuṃsaviṣayaḥ karuṇaḥ, astrīpuṃsaviṣayaḥ śokaḥ, sapratyāśarūpa: karuṇaḥ, niṣpratyāśasvarūpaḥ śoka ityanya eva śoko 'nyaśca karuṇa' iti |
sa prāyeṇa daivāśrayaḥ, pauruṣāśrayaḥ, deśāśrayaḥ, kālāśrayaḥ, svarūpāśrayaḥ, parimāṇāśrayaḥ, pramāṇāśrayaḥ, anurāgāśrayaḥ, sambhogāśrayaḥ, vipralambhāśrayaḥ, nāyakāśrayaḥ, nāyikāśraya iti dvādaśadhā| teṣu—
1. daivāśrayaḥ— strīnimittaḥ, puruṣanimittaḥ, sahāyanimittaḥ, gurunimitta iti |
2. pauruṣāśrayaḥ— puruṣakṛtaḥ strīviṣaye, strīkṛtaḥ puruṣaviṣaye, puruṣakṛtaḥ puruṣaviṣaye, strīkṛtaḥ strīkṛtaḥ strīviṣaya iti |
3. deśaśrayo— divyo, mānuṣo, divyamānuṣo, na/ adivyamānuṣa iti |1
4. kālāśrayaḥ— ihajanmasaṅgamaḥ, anyajanmasaṅgamaḥ, ihānyajanmasaṅgamaḥ, pretyasaṅgama2 iti |
5. svarūpāśrayo— vicintitaḥ, ākasmikaḥ, pāramārthiko 'pāramārthika iti |
1. 'mānuṣo na divyo 'mānuṣo' iti jo. pṛ. 1108, rā. pṛ. 1621 HOS ; dra. pṛ. 1470 2. 'ubhayajanmasaṅgama' iti jo. pṛ. 1108, rā. pṛ. 1621 HOS ; dra. pṛ. 1471
6. parimāṇāśrayo— mahānaṇurdīrgho hnasva iti |
7. pramāṇāśrayaḥ— dṛṣṭaḥ, śruto 'numitaḥ, śaṅkita iti |
8. anurāgāśrayaḥ— śreyān, madhyamo 'varaḥ, pratyavara iti |
9. sambhogāśrayaḥ— prathamānurāgānantaryo, mānānantaryaḥ, pravāsānantaryaḥ, karuṇānantarya iti |
10. vipralambhāśrayaḥ— prathamānurāgajo, mānajaḥ, pravāsajaḥ, karuṇaja iti |
11. nāyakāśrayo— guṇakṛtaḥ, prakṛtikṛtaḥ, pravṛttikṛtaḥ, parigrahakṛta iti |
12. nāyikāśrayo— guṇakṛtaḥ, vayaskṛtaśceṣṭākṛto dhairyakṛta iti | teṣu—
(1. daivāśrayaḥ)
1. daivāśrayaḥ strīnimittaḥ puruṣe yathā—(kādambarīkathāsāre 4. 108)
ayi pāpe! mahāśvete! na tuṣṭāsyakṣamālayā |
hatā me suhṛdo 'muṣya prāṇavṛttirapi tvayā || 2 ||
2. puruṣanimittaḥ striyāṃ yathā—
vicinvatīṃ māmiyamadrikukṣau vikukṣināmnā bhujagena daṣṭā |
gatāsurāste mṛgaśābanetrā mṛgāvatī hā vidhinā hato 'smi || 3 ||
3. sahāyanimittaḥ puruṣe yathā—(kādambakasā. 6. 106)
iti śrutvā bhinnaḥ prasabhamiva śūlāgraśikhayā kadā tvāṃ paś‍yeyaṃ kamalamukhi kādambari! punaḥ |
vadannevaṃ śokasphuṭitahṛdayaḥ tatkṣaṇamasūñ jahaccandrāpīḍastaruriva papāta kṣititale || 4 ||
4. gurunimittaḥ striyāṃ yathā— (māmā. 10.13)
eṣā pravāsaṃ kathamapyatītya yātā punaḥ saṃśayamanyathaiva |
ko nāma pākābhimukhasya janturdvārāṇi daivasya pidhātumīṣṭe || 5 ||
1. pratyavara pravara jo. 1108 rā. 1621 ; dra. pṛ. 14
(2. pauruṣāśrayaḥ)
1. pauruṣāśrayaḥ puruṣakṛtaḥ strīviṣaye yathā—
sā vakṣaḥparivartanaikalalitā viśvāsabhūmiḥ priyā bālā niṣkaruṇena mugdhatapasā dagdhā varākī mayā |
bharturbhaktirapekṣitā nanu punaḥ strīdāhadoṣo mahāñ jātaṃ saccaritaiṣiṇo bata mama mlecchasya yannocitam || 6 ||
2. strīkṛtaḥ puruṣaviṣaye yathā—(kādakasā. 6. 104)
śāpena tena mahatā madanāgninā vā janmāntaropacitaduṣkṛtakarmaṇā vā |
citreṇa vā bhagavataścaritena dhātuḥ prāṇānasāvudasṛjannipapāta corvyām || 7 ||
3. puruṣakṛtaḥ puruṣaviṣaye yathā—(nāgāna. 5. 21)
ātmīyaḥ para ityayaṃ khalu kutaḥ satyaṃ na nāma kramaḥ kiṃ rakṣāmi bahūn kimekamiti vā cintā na jātā katham |
tārkṣyāt trātumahīn svajīvitaparityāgaṃ tvayā kurvatā yaccātmā pitarau vadhūriti hataṃ niśśeṣametat kulam || 8 ||
4. strīkṛtaḥ strīviṣaye yathā—(kusaṃ. 1. 53)
yadaive pūrve janane śarīraṃ sā dakṣadoṣāt sudatī sasarja |
tadāprabhṛtyeva vimuktasaṅgaḥ patiḥ paśūnāmaparigraha 'bhūt || 9 ||
(3. deśāśrayaḥ)
1. deśāśrayabhedeṣu divyo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4. 19)
vibudhairapi yasya dāruṇairasamāp‍te parikarmaṇi smṛtaḥ |
tamimaṃ kuru dakṣiṇetaraṃ caraṇaṃ nirmitarāgamehi me || 10 ||
2. mānuṣo yathā—
ripuryātu parāṃ vṛddhiṃ dhig rājyamanayo 'stu naḥ |
daivamevaṃvidhaṃ dṛṣṭa‍vā dāne pratyaryayāmi tām || 11 ||
3. divyamānuṣo yathā (raghu. 8.82)
krathakaiśikavaṃśambhavā tava bhutā mahiṣī cirāya sā |
upalabdhavatī divaś‍cyutaṃ vivaśā śāpanivṛttikāraṇam || 12 ||
4. ādivyamānuṣo yathā—(sebaṃ. 11.53)
āloie ṇisaṇṇā uaṇijjaṃ temi veviuṃ āḍhattā |
sīātti raaṇiarehiṃ rāmasīratti bhaṇie gaa c‍ciaṃ mohaṃ || 13 ||
(ālokite niṣaṇṇā upanīyamāne vepitumārabdhā |
sītā rajanīcaraiḥ rāmaśira iti bhaṇite gatā eva moham ||)
(4. kālaśrayaḥ)
1. kālaśrayaprabhedeṣu ihajanmasaṅgamo yathā—
svap‍naḥ syāt kimayaṃ na jātu jagati svap‍no bhavejjāgrataḥ kiṃ kenāpi hi vañcito 'smi dayitālābhaḥ kuto vañcanā |
kiṃ nāhaṃ śukanandanaḥ kathamasāvanyaṃ samābhāṣate kenāyaṃ racito vidhiḥ sukṛtinā siddhena te karmaṇā || 14 ||
2. anyajanmasaṅgamo yathā—
mā śocasva śucismite ! kṛtajapā tapyasva tīvraṃ tapo bhūtvā vedavatī bhaviṣyasi tatassīteti nām‍nā bhuvi |
kāntaste harireṣa vāmanatanuṃ kṛtvā sahastrārjunaṃ jitvā dāśarathitvametya bhavatīṃ bhūyaḥ samud‌vakṣyati || 15 ||
3. ihānyajanmasaṅgamo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.44)
tadidaṃ parirakṣa śobhane ! bhavitavyapriyasaṅgamaṃ vapuḥ |
ravipītajalā tapātyaye punaroghena hi yujyate nadī || 16 ||
4. pretyasaṅgamo yathā—(raghu. 8.95)
tīrthe toyavyatikarabhave jahnukanyāsarayvoḥ— rdehatyāgādamaragaṇanālekhyamāsādya sadyaḥ |
pūrvākāradhikatararucā saṅgataḥ kāntayāsau līlāgāreṣvaramata punarnandanābhyantareṣu || 17 ||
(5. svarūpāśrayaḥ)
1. svarūpāśrayaprabhedeṣu vicintito yathā—(māmā. 8.12)
mama hi kuvalayākṣīṃ pratyaniṣṭaikabuddhe— raviratamanubaddhotkampa evāntarātmā |
sphurati ca khalu cakṣurvāmametac‍ca kaṣṭaṃ vacanamiha bhavatyoḥ sarvathā hā hato 'smi || 18 ||
2. ākasmiko yathā—(raghu. 14.53)
atha vyavasthāpitavāk kathañcit saumitrirantargatabāṣpakaṇṭhaḥ |
autpātikaṃ megha ivāśmavarṣaṃ mahīpateḥ śāsanamujjagāra || 19 ||
3. pāramārthiko yathā—(raghu. 8.38)
vapuṣā karaṇojjhitena sā nipatantī patimapyapātayat |
nanu tailaniṣekabindunā saha dīpārcirupaiti medinīm || 20 ||
4. apāramārthiko yathā—(rāmābhyu.)
pratyākhyānaruṣā kṛtaṃ samucitaṃ krūreṇa te rakṣasā soḍhaṃ tac‍ca tathā tvayā kulavadhūrdhatte yathoc‍caiḥ śiraḥ |
vyarthaṃ samprati bibhratā dhanuridaṃ tvad‍vyāpadaḥ sākṣiṇā rāmeṇa priyajīvitena tu kṛtaṃ premṇaḥ priye! nocitam || 21 ||
(6. pariṇāmāśrayaḥ)
1. pariṇāmāśrayaprabhedeṣu mahān yathā—(māmā. 9.12, urāca. 3.31)
dalati hṛdayaṃ gạ̄dhodvegaṃ dvidhā tu na bhidyate vahati vikalaḥ kāyo mohaṃ na muñcati cetanā |
jvalayati tanūmantardāhaḥ karoti na bhasmasāt praharati vidhirmarmacchedī na kṛntati jīvitam || 22 ||
2. aṇuryathā—(tāva. 6.4)
vistrambhānna visarpitaṃ mayi mano nirpyantraṇaṃ mantrituṃ vyāvṛttāpi nivartitā na śayane bāṣpaṃ tyajantī śanaiḥ |
māmuddiś‍ya tathānayā vyavasitaṃ tannoparuddhaṃ mudhā kaṣṭaṃ kevalameva rājatanayā dagdhā varākī śucā || 23 ||
3. dīrgho yathā—(tāva. 3.10)
sarvatra jvaliteṣu veś‍masu bhayādālījane vidrute vyāsotkampavihastayā pratipadaṃ devyā patantyā tadā |
hā nātheti muhuḥ pralāpaparayā dagdhaṃ varākyā tayā śāntenāpi vayaṃ tu tena dahanenādyāpi dahyāmahe || 24 ||
4. hrasvo yathā—
asamāp‍tapratijñe 'staṃgate tvayi mahābhuje |
muktakeś‍yaiva dattaste priyāyāyaṃ jalāñjaliḥ || 25 ||
(7. pramāṇāśrayaḥ)
1. pramāṇāśrayabhedeṣu dṛṣṭo yathā—
hā hā kathaṃ kumudanīlanalāṅgadādiyūthādhipairatijavādanubadhyamānaḥ |
asmanmanorathabhuvaṃ sahasaiva devīṃ vyāpādya rākṣasapatirnagarīṃ praviṣṭaḥ || 26 ||
2. śruto yathā—
śrutvaiṣa vidhṛtabāṣpaḥ tathāsthito yena vardhitākrandaiḥ |
hṛdayasphuṭanabhayārtai roditumabhyarthyate sacivaiḥ || 27 ||
3. anumito yathā—(urā. 34)
bhramati hṛdayaṃ cintāyattaṃ dhanurgurutāṃ gataṃ na khalu viṣayaṃ jāne cetastathāpi samākulam |
ayamapi muhurbāṣpotpīḍo ruṇaddhi vilocane sphurati ca yathā vāmaṃ cakṣustathaiṣa śaṭho vidhiḥ || 28 ||
4. śaṅkito yathā—(māmā. 8.13)
kimapi kimapi śaṅke maṅgalebhyo yadanyad viramati parihāsaścaṇḍi! paryutsuko 'smi |
kalayasi kalito 'haṃ vallabhe! dehi vācaṃ bhramati hṛdayamantarvihvalaṃ nirdayāsi || 29 ||
(8. anurāgāśrayaḥ) anurāgāśrayaprabhedeṣu
1. śreyāṃstridhā nityo 'kṛtrimo vistrambhajaś‍ca | teṣu —
nityo yathā—nityo 'kṛtrimo vistrambhajaś‍ca | teṣu —
nityo yathā—(gāsa. 4.73)
aṃtohuttaṃ ḍajjhaï jāāsuṇṇe ghare haliaütto |
o(ū)sittaṇihāṇāiṃ va ramiaṭṭhāṇā pecchato || 30 ||
(antarabhimukhaṃ dahyate jāyāśūnye gṛhe halikaputraḥ |
upasiktanidhānānīva ramitasthānāni paś‍yan ||)
akṛtrimo yathā—(raghu. 8.66)
dhṛtirastamitā ratiśacyutā virataṃ geyamṛturnirutsavaḥ |
gatamābharaṇaprayojanaṃ pariśūnyaṃ śayanīyamadya me || 31 ||
vistrambhajo yathā—(urāca. 6.33)
k‍va tāvānānando niratiśayavistrambhabahulaḥ k‍va te 'nyonyaṃ yatra k‍vacana gahanāḥ kautukarasāḥ |
sukhe vā duḥkhe vā k‍va nu khalu tadaikyaṃ hṛdayayo— stathāpyeṣa prāṇaḥ sphurati na tu pāpo viramati || 32 ||
2. tathā madhyamo 'pi sahajaḥ, pracchanno, vaiśiṣikaśceti tridhaiva | teṣu — sahajo yathā—
mukhaṃ jyots‍nālokaprasaradhavalākṣaṃ k‍vanu mayā punardupyante/rdraṣṭavyaṃ tat smitamadhuramanthālpavacanam |
k‍va sā śravyā vāṇī vijitakalahaṃsīkalaravā vilāsāḥ paś‍yantyā/vīkṣyantāṃ k‍va ca sahabhuvo dhīralalitāḥ || 33 ||
pracchanno yathā—
daṭa‍ṭhūṇa ciraṃ rottūṇa ṇibbharaṃ dhāriūṇa hiaammi |
baṃdhaï kaṃṭhe aïṇaṃ ṭhiaṃ kaṃṭhiaṃ o maha pāiṇī || 34 ||
(dṛṣṭa‍vā ciraṃ ruditvā nirbharaṃ dhṛtvā hṛdaye |
badhāti kaṇṭhe ajinaṃ sthitāṃ kaṇṭhikāṃ aï mama pat‍nī ||)
vaiśeṣiko yathā—(raghu. 8.69)
vibhave 'pi sati tvayā vinā sukhametāvadajasya gaṇyatām |
ahṛtasya vilobhanāntarairmama sarve viṣayāstvadāśrayāḥ || 35 ||
3. evamaparo 'pi tridhā naimittikaḥ, sāmānyo, yauvanajaśca | teṣu —
naimittiko yathā—(urāca. 3.9)
antarlīnasya duḥkhāg‍neradyoddāmaṃ jvaliṣyataḥ |
utpīḍa iva dhūmasya mohaḥ prāgāvṛṇoti mām || 36 ||
sāmānyo yathā—(gāsa. 2.42)
samasokkhadukkhasaṃvavaḍ‌̣dhiāṇaṃ kāleṇa rūḍhapaṇaāṇaṃ |
mihuṇāṇaṃ maraï jaṃ taṃ khu jiaï iaraṃ maaṃ hoi || 37 ||
(samasaukhyaduḥkhasaṃvardhitayoḥ kālena rūḍhapraṇayayoḥ |
mithunayormriyate yat tat khalu jīvati itaranmṛtam bhavati) ||
yauvanajo yathā—
aṇudiahaṃ vaḍ‌ḍhaṃte khu kkhuruḍe/garue vva dukkhamuvvahaï |
kulavahuā vihavattaṇaṇippaïguṇagoraveṇa thaṇāe || 38 ||
(anudivasaṃ vardhamānayoḥ khalu gurukayoḥ iva duḥkhamud‌vahati |
kulavadhukā vidhavātvaniṣpattiguṇagauraveṇa stanayoḥ ||)
4. pratyavaro 'pi tridhaiva prakāśa, āhāryaḥ, kṛtrimaśceti | teṣu —
prakāśo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.3)
ayi jivitanātha! jīvasītyabhidhāyotthitayā tayā punaḥ |
dadṛśe puruṣākṛti kṣitau harakopānalabhasma kevalam || 39 ||
āhāryo yathā—
kiṃ devyā api cumbito 'smi bahuśo mithyāprasup‍tastayā kope satyapi kiṃ nirīkṣya hasitā no manmūkhaṃ bhāminī |
vistrambhāt kalitā lateva hṛdaye kiṃ vā ciraṃ na sthitā kāntirvāsya vināpi vācyamasavo yanna prayātāḥ svayam || 40 ||
kṛtrimo yathā—(gāsa. 876ve.)
taha aḍaaṇāe ruṇṇaṃ païmaraṇe vāharidhdhakaṃṭhīe |
aṇumaraṇasaṃkiṇo jaha jārassa vi saṃkiaṃ hiaaṃ || 41 ||
(tathā asatyā ruditaṃ patimaraṇe bāṣpakaruddhakaṇṭhayā |
anumaraṇaśaṅkino yathā jārasyāpi śaṅkitaṃ hṛdayam ||)
sambhogavipralambhāśrayabhedeṣu prathamānurāgānantaryādayo 'ṣṭāvapi pratyekaṃ tridhā— tajjātāstadullekhinastadantaraṅgāśca |
(9. sambhogāśrayaḥ)
1. tatra sambhogāśrayeṣu prathamānurāgānantarajā yathā—(māmā. 6.9)
nairāś‍yakātaradhiyo hariṇekṣaṇāyāḥ śrutvā nikāmakaruṇaṃ ca manoharaṃ ca |
mātsaryamohaparidevitamud‌vahāmi cintāviṣādavipadaṃ ca mahotsavaṃ ce1 || 42 ||
2. mānānantarīyeṣu mānānantarajo yathā—
jāne kopaparāṅa‍mukhī priyatamā svap‍ne 'dya dṛṣṭā mayā mā mā saṃspṛśa pāṇineti rudatī gantuṃ pravṛttā tataḥ |
no yāvat parirabhya cāṭukaśatairāśvāsayāmi kṣaṇaṃ bhrātastāvadahaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā nidrādaridrīkṛtaḥ || 43 ||
tadullekhī yathā—(raghu. 8.48)
kṛtavatyasi nāvadhīraṇāmaparāddhe 'pi yadā ciraṃ mayi |
kathamekapade nirāgasaṃ janamābhāṣyamamuṃ na manyase || 44 ||
tadantaraṅgo yathā—(urāca. 3.13)
taṭasthaṃ nairāś‍yādapi ca kaluṣaṃ vipriyavaśād viyoge dīrghe 'smin jhaṭiti stambhitamiva |
prasannaṃ saujanyādapi ca karuṇairgāḍhakaruṇaṃ dravībhūtaṃ premṇā tava hṛdayamasmin kṣaṇa iva || 45 ||
3. pravāsānantarīyeṣu tajjāto yathā—
dhauto 'malaḥ ślāghyataraiḥ sahāyaiḥ parābhavaḥ śatrukṛto bhavadbhiḥ |
yat sāmprataṃ samprati rāghavāṇāṃ tyāgena devyāstadahaṃ karomi || 46 ||
tadullekhī yathā—
viraharacitāṃ gạ̄dhāṃ veṇīṃ tavoda‍grathayañchanai— rvirahaguṇitāstāstāḥ kurvan kathāḥ samayocitāḥ |
kṛśataratanuṃ tvāmāśliṣya tyajeyamahaṃ śucaṃ yaditi guṇitaṃ tanme dhātrā śaṭhena na sahyate || 47 ||
tadantaraṅgo yathā—(urāca. 1.30)
tatkālapriyajanaviprayogajanmā tīvro 'pi pratikṛtivāñchayā visoḍhaḥ |
duḥkhāg‍nirmanasi muhurnivartamāno hṛnmarmagrahamiva vedanāṃ karoti || 48 ||
1. prathamānurāgollekhī prathamānurāgāntaraṅgaś‍ca nopalabhyete |
4. karuṇānantaryeṣu tajjāto yathā—(urāca. 140)
hāhā dhik paragṛhavāsadūṣaṇaṃ yad vaidehyāḥ praśamitamadbhutairupāyaiḥ |
tat tāvat punarapi daivadurvipākādālarkaṃ viṣamiva sarvataḥ prasṛp‍tam || 49 ||
tadullekhī yathā—(māmā. 9.11)
mayi vigalitapratyāśatvād vivāhavidheḥ puro vikalakaraṇairmarmacchedavyathāvidhurairiva |
smarasi ruditaiḥ s‍nehākūtaṃ tathā vyatanodasā— vahamapi yathā 'bhūvaṃ pīḍātaraṅgitasammadaḥ || 50 ||
tadantaraṅgo yathā—
yenātmambhariṇā nirasya karuṇāmutsṛjya lajjāmapi praśvāsopacayāhitādhikadhṛtis‍neho 'pi nāvekṣitaḥ |
so 'haṃ subhru! vilokayāmi vadanaṃ brūyāṃ prasīdeti vā caṇḍālastava caṇḍi! dāruṇataraṃ tat karma kṛtvā katham || 51 ||
(10. vipralambhāśrayaḥ)
1. vipralambhāśrayaprabhedeṣu prathamānurāgajo yathā—(māmā. 5.24)
nyastālaktakaraktamālyavasanā pāṣaṇḍicaṇḍālayoḥ pāparambhavatormṛgīva vṛkayorbhīrurgatā gocaram |
seyaṃ bhūrivasorvasoriva sutā mṛtyormukhe vartate hā dhikkaṣṭamaniṣṭamastakaruṇaḥ ko 'yaṃ vidheḥ prakramaḥ || 52 ||
prathamānurāgollekhī yathā—(māmā. 9.10)
sarasakusumakṣāmairaṅgairanaṅgamahājvara— ściramaviratonmāthī soḍhaḥ pratikṣaṇadāruṇaḥ |
tṛṇamiva tataḥ prāṇān moktuṃ mano vidhṛtaṃ tvayā kimaparamato nirvyūḍhaṃ yat karārpaṇasāhasam || 53 ||
prathamānurāgāntaraṅgo yathā—(māmā. 5.20)
nādastāvad vikalakurarīkūjitas‍nigdhatāra— ś‍cittākarṣī paricita iva śrotrasaṃvādameti |
antarbhinnaṃ bhramati hṛdayaṃ vihvalatyaṅgamaṅgaṃ snehastambhaḥ skhalayati gatiṃ kaḥ prakāraḥ kimetat || 54 ||
2. mānajo yathā—
sa dṛṣṭaḥ svapne 'dya praṇayakupito māṃ prati janaṃ tataḥ kṣīṇā rātrirnanu caraṇayorasmi patitā |
kṛtaṃ kalyāṇānāmanabhilaṣitā eva hi vayaṃ prasannaṃ tad vaktraṃ na kṛtamiti ceto dahati mām || 55 ||
mānollekhī yathā—(kusaṃ. 4. 8)
smarasi smara mekhalāguṇairuta gotraskhaliteṣu bandhanam |
cyutakesaradhūsarekṣaṇānyavataṃsotpalatāḍanāni vā || 56 ||
mānāntaraṅgā yathā—
mūrcchāndhakārapaṭalāvṛtadigvibhāgā rāhuparāgamalineva śaśāṅkalekhā |
garbhālasā caturagehaguṇād gṛṇantī pāśaṃ nidhāya galake maraṇonmukhā 'bhūt || 57 ||
3. pravāsajo yathā—
ciramanucitasthāne sthitvā madīkṣaṇavāñchayā kimiva dayite tat syād duḥkha na yad viditaṃ tayā |
katipayadinavyāpय़ṃ sampratyapāsya vṛthaiva māṃ kaṭhinahṛdaye! kiṃ tvaṃ yātā ka eṣa tava kramaḥ || 58 ||
pravāsollekhī yathā—
upāyānāṃ bhāvādaviratavinodavyatikarai— rvimardairvīrāṇāṃ janitajagadatyadbhutarasaḥ |
viyogo mugdhākṣyāḥ sa khalu ripughātāvadhirabhūt kṛtaḥ tūṣṇīṃ sahyo niravadhirayaṃ tu pravilayaḥ || 59 ||
pravāsāntaraṅgo yathā—
priye! hāhā kvāsi prakira madhurāṃ vācamadhunā parābhūtairitthaṃ vilapanavinodo 'pyasulabhaḥ |
anindyaḥ paulastyo vrajatu parivādo mayi jarāṃ yato rụ̄dhe vaire bahuguṇamanena pratikṛtaḥ || 60 ||
4. karuṇajo yathā—(kādakasā. 7.78)
dvitīye 'pyahamevāsya jātā janmani mṛtyave |
śap‍to madanurakto 'sau mayeti vilalāpa sā || 61 ||
karuṇollekhī yathā—(śāku. 6.9)
itaḥ pratyādeśāt svajanamanugantuṃ vyavasitā gṛhe tiṣṭhetyuccairvadati guruśiṣye gurusame |
punardṛṣṭiṃ bāṣpaprasarakaluṣāmarpitavatī mayi krūre yat tat saviṣamiva śalyaṃ dahati mām || 62 ||
karuṇāntaraṅgo yathā—(urāca. 3.38)
hā hā devi sphuṭati hṛdayaṃ dhvaṃsate dehabandhaḥ śūnyaṃ manye jagadaviratajvālamantarjvalāmi |
sīdannandhe tamasi vidhuro majjatīvāntarātmā viṣvaṅ mohaḥ sthagayati kathaṃ mandabhāgyaḥ karomi || 63 ||
(11. nāyakāśrayaḥ) nāyakāśrayaprabhedeṣu
1. guṇakṛtastridhā uttamāśrayo, madhyamāśrayaḥ, kaniṣṭhāśrayaśca | tatra—
uttamāśrayo yathā—
antarāvirbhavanmṛtyurnirodhavidhurātmanā |
kaṣṭaṃ prasahya rāmeṇa bāṣpamokṣo nigṛhyate || 64 ||
madhyamāśrayo yathā—(raghu. 8.72)
pramadāmanu saṃsthitaḥ śucā nṛpatiḥ sanniti vācyadarśanāt |
na cakāra śarīramagnisāt saha devyā na tu jīvitāśayā || 65 ||
kaniṣṭhāśrayo yathā—
satatadayitaviprayogatāpād varamiha kālakalaiva vahninābhaḥ |
upaśamamupanetumātmapīḍāṃ dahanamahaṃ praviśāmi na priyārtham || 66 ||
2. prakṛtikṛto 'pi tridhaiva sāttviko, rājasastāmasa iti | teṣu—
sāttviko yathā—(urāca. 7.7)
dahyamānena manasā daivād vatsāṃ vihāya saḥ |
lokottareṇa dhairyeṇa prajāpuṇyaiśca jīvati || 67 ||
rājaso yathā—(raghu. 8.70)
vilapinniti kosalādhipaḥ karuṇārthagrathitaṃ priyāṃ prati |
akarot pṛthivīruhānapi strutaśākhārasabāṣpadūṣitān || 68 ||
tāmaso yathā—
tāṃ loko 'yaṃ vāñchitārthaprasiddhyai nityaṃ dravyaiḥ pūtahṛdyairdhinoti |
tanme prītaḥ pūtahavyena vahne! kuryāt kāntāsaṅgamaṃ yatra tatra || 69 ||
3. pravṛtikṛtaścaturdhā dhīrodāttāśrayādibhedāt | teṣu—
dhīrodattāśrayo yathā—(urāca. 3.1)
anirbhinno gabhīratvādantargūḍhaghanavyathaḥ |
puṭapākapratīkāśo rāmasya karuṇo rasaḥ || 70 ||
dhīroddhatāśrayo yathā—
pitā vā mātā vā prabhavati sa tāvat prabhurapi vyapekṣā yāvat syurdayiṣu yadi vā bhogavasuṣu |
sahai saṃtyak‍te/k‍to 'yaṃ ghanatṛṣi gatāyāmupaśamaḥ pumānekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jagadidamasamastaṃ viracayet || 71 ||
dhīralalitāśrayo yathā—(raghu. 8.43)
vilalāpa sa bāṣpagadgadaḥ sahajāmapyavadhūya dhīratām |
abhitap‍tamayo 'pi mārdavaṃ bhajate kaiva kathā śarīriṣu || 72 ||
dhīrapraśāntāśrayo yathā—
ugrā kriyā no sahasaiva kāryā dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ tatpariveṣṭitasya |
priyāmaṭavyāṃ hi nalaḥ prasup‍tāṃ vihāya jīvan punarāpa sādhvīm || 73 ||
4. parigrahakṛto dvidhā sādhāraṇāśrayo 'sādhāraṇāśrayaśca | tayoḥ—
sādhāraṇāśrayo yathā—(tāva. 4.14) kāmaṃ duṣkarametadeva yadahaṃ tyaktastvayā jīvita— stannāmāstvanurodhataḥ praṇayināṃ ko vā svatantro bhavet |
yat tat prastutamanyadeva kimapi snehasya yannocitaṃ tvatprāp‍tyai kṛtametadityapi kathaṃ pratyeṣyasi tvaṃ priye! || 74 ||
asādhāraṇaśrayo yathā—
viyoge pratyāśā ghaṭayati mudaṃ saṅgamakṛtā prasādāḥ sannahyo ratikalahakopo 'pi bhavati |
vyasunvan tanvaṅgyā niravadhi navopāyaviṣayas tadāśvāse heturbhavati mama mṛtyuryadi param || 75 ||
(12. nāyikāśrayaḥ) nāyikāśrayeṣvapi
1. guṇakṛtastredhā uttamādibhedāt | tatra—
uttamāśrayo yathā—(urāca. 3.4)
paripāṇḍupāṃsulakapolasundaraṃ dadhatī vilolakabarīkamānanam |
karuṇasya mūrtirathavā śarīriṇī virahavyatheva vanameti jānakī || 76 ||
madhyamāśrayo yathā—(kādakasā. 7.16)
patralekhāpi tadrūpacandrāpīḍavilokinī |
mumuce saṃjñayā sadyaḥ prapatantī śilātale || 77 ||
kaniṣṭhāśrayo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.4)
atha sā punareva vihvalā vasudhāliṅganadhūsarastanī |
vilalāpa vikīrṇamūrdhajā samaduḥkhāmiva kurvatī sthalīm || 78 ||
2. vayaskṛtī 'pi tridhaiva mugdhādibhedāt| teṣu—
mugdhāśrayo yathā—(māmā. 6.6)
iyamavayavaiḥ pāṇḍukṣāmairalaṅkṛtamaṇḍanā kalitakusumā bālevāntarlatā pariśoṣiṇī |
vahati ca varārohā dhanyāṃ vivāhamahotsava— śriyamudayinīmatyarthaṃ ca vyanakti manorujam || 79 ||
madhyamāśrayo yathā—(seba. 11.67)
ṇavari a pasāriaṃgī raabhariuppahapaïṇṇaveṇībaṃdhā |
paḍiā urasaṃdāṇia—mahiala—vakkalaïatthaṇī jaṇaasuā || 80 ||
(anantaraṃ ca prasāritāṅgī rajo—bhṛtotpathaprakīrṇaveṇībandhā |
patitā uraḥsandānitamahītalavakrīkṛtastanī janakasutā ||)
pragalbhāśrayo yathā—(kādakasā. 7.18)
tadākārṇya vihāyaiva vaiklabyaṃ strījanocitam |
labdhasaṃjñā mahāśvetā madalekhāṃ ca sāvadat || 81 ||
3. ceṣṭākṛto 'pi tridhaiva uddhatādibhedāt | tatra1 —
uddhatāśrayo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.34)
amunaiva kaṣāyitastanī subhagena priyagātrabhasmanā |
navapallavasaṃstare yathā racayiṣyāmi tanuṃ vibhāvasau || 82 ||
lalitāśrayo yathā—(seba. 11.54)
paḍiā a hattha—sịdhilia—ṇiroha—paṃḍura—samūsasaṃtakaolā |
pellia—vāmapaohara—visamuṇṇaa—dāhiṇatthaṇī jaṇaasuā || 83 ||
(patitā ca hastaśithilanirodhapāṇḍarasamuccha‌vatkapolā |
preritavāmapayodharaviṣamonnatadakṣiṇastanī janakasutā ||)
śāntāśrayo yathā—(raghu.14.57)
na vāvadad bharturavarṇyamāryā nirākariṣṇorvṛjinād‍ṛte 'pi |
ātmānamevāsthitaduḥkhabhāvaṃ punaḥ punarduṣkṛtinaṃ nininda || 84 ||
4. dhairyakṛto dvedhā dhīrāśrayo 'dhīrāśrayaśca| tayoḥ —
dhīrāśrayo yathā—(seba. 11.80)
jāe paraloagae tumammi vavasāamettasuhadaṭṭhavve |
harisaṭṭhāṇe vi maha ḍajjhaï adiṭṭadahamuhavahaṃ hiaaṃ || 85 ||
(jāte paralokagate tvayi vyavasāyamātrasukhadraṣṭavye |
harṣasthāne 'pi mama dahyate ad‍ṛṣṭadaśamukhavadhaṃ hṛdayam ||)
adhīrāśrayo yathā—(seba. 11.55)
ṇa kao vāhavimokkho ṇivvaṇṇeuṃpi na vaï/ḍiaṃ rāmasiraṃ |
ṇavari paḍivaṇṇamohā gaajīviaṇīsahā mahie ṇisaṇṇā || 86 ||
(na kṛto bāṣpavimokṣo nirvarṇayitu mapi na patitaṃ rāmaśiraḥ |
kevalaṃ pratipannamohā gatajīvitanissahā mahyāṃ niṣaṇṇā ||)
1. 'ceṣṭā.....tatra' — iti jo. (pṛ. 1120), rā. (pṛ. 1637) na paṭhataḥ| pratinirdeśamanusṛtya tvasmābhiridamayoji |
(2. karuṇasya vibhāvādayaḥ)
athāsyaiva vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogaḥ prayogato 'bhidhīyate| tatrālambana— vibhāvoddīpanavibhāvayostādarthyādarthād vyabhicāriṇāmapi abhinnārthatvādanubhāvaireva sarvasaṅgraha iti, tathaivodāhriyate, udāhariṣyante ca| te ca vyasanābhighātādayo mukhapratimukhagarbhavimarśanirvahaṇeṣu pratyekaṃ ṣoḍaśetyevamaśītiryathākramaṃ pratipādyante |
tatra 1. vyasanābhighātaḥ, 2. abhiṣaṅgābhibhavaḥ, 3. ceṣṭāsammīlanaṃ, 4. mohasamāveśaḥ, 5. cetanāpratyāgamaḥ, 6. mūrcchāvicchedaḥ, 7. śokapratyagratā, 8. śokāvegaḥ, 9. duḥkhaniryātanaṃ, 10. duḥkhāvasādaḥ, 11. duḥkhasandīpanaṃ, 12. duḥkhavyāhāraḥ, 13. duḥkhātivāhanaṃ, 14. bāṣpamokṣaḥ, 15. avasthānubhavaḥ, 16. avasthāntarāveśaḥ ityanubhāvāḥ ṣoḍaśa mukhe (16+)
1. paridevanaṃ 2.anuśocanaṃ, 3. guṇasaṃsmaraṇaṃ, 4. svabhāvasya garhaṇaṃ1, 5. vilāpaḥ, 6. pralāpaḥ, 7. pravilāpaḥ, 8. vipralāpaḥ, 9. ātmanindā, 10. hṛdayopalambhaḥ,2 11. jīvitajugupsā, 12. daivādhikāraḥ, 13. śokonmādaḥ, 14. duḥkhasambhedaḥ, 15. sahāyāpekṣaṇaṃ, 16. sahāyānunītirityanubhāvāḥ ṣoḍaśa pratimukhe + (16+16=32)

1. samāśvāsanam, 2. uddharṣaṇaṃ, 3. pratibodhanam, 4. utsāhanam, 5. anukampanaṃ, 6. vistrambhaṇaṃ, 7. pralobhanam, 8. upapattidarśanaṃ, 9. praśvāsanaṃ, 10. satyāpanaṃ, 11. pratyāyanam4, 12. āpyāyanaṃ, 13. tanmatavyāpekṣaḥ, 14. bhayopadarśanam, 15. upālambhanaṃ, 16. pratikopa ityanubhāvāḥ, ṣoḍaśa vimarśe, (48+16=64) |
1. svabhāgyasya iti pṛ. 1490, 2. udāharaṇāni nopalabhyante pṛ. 1491, 3. garūparodanam iti pṛ. 1494, 4. pratyānayanam pṛ. 1501
1. maraṇādhyavasāyavidravaḥ1, 2. śokatiraskāraḥ, 3. śokalāghavaṃ, 4. śokavinodaḥ2, 5. tapasyodvegaḥ3, 6. daivasampadyogaḥ, 7. trikālad‍ṛṣṭadarśanaṃ4, 8. tadupadeśaḥ, 9. sahāyasvīkaraṇaṃ,5 10. tadadhyavasāyaḥ, 11. pratyūhapraśamanaṃ, 12. pratyāśānubandhaḥ, 13. samayapratīkṣā, 14. saṃvidhānakaprakāraḥ, 15. pratyujjīvanaṃ, 16. punassamāgama ityanubhāvāḥ ṣoḍaśa nirvahaṇe| (64+16=80) saiṣā ṣoḍaśakapañcakena aśītiḥ|
athaiteṣāmudāharaṇāni| tatra—
(1. mukhasandhau karuṇasya vibhāvādayaḥ —16)
1. mukhasandhau vyasanābhighāto yathā—(raghu. 14. 33)
kalatranindāguruṇā kilaivamabhyāhataṃ kīrtiviparyayeṇa |
ayoghanenāya ivābhitap‍taṃ vaidehibandhorhṛdayaṃ vidadre || 87 ||
yathā vā—(urā. 3.11)
kulaśailau pracalitau sāgarau śoṣamāgatau |
candrasūryau gatāvastamaho śokasya tīvratā || 88 ||
2. abhiṣaṅgābhibhavo yathā—(raghu. 14.54)
tato 'bhiṣaṅgānilavipraviddhā prabhraśyamānābharaṇaprasūnā |
svamūrtilābhaprakṛtiṃ dharitrīṃ lateva sītā sahasā jagāma || 89 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 3.73)
tīvrābhiṣaṅgaprabhaveṇa manyuṃ mohena saṃstambhayatendriyāṇām |
ajñātabhartṛvyasanā muhūrtaṃ kṛtopakāreva ratirbabhūva || 90 ||
3. ceṣṭāsammīlanaṃ yathā—(seba. 11.64)
taha ṇimia cciṃa diṭhṭhī mukkakaolavihuro uraccia kare |
gaajīviaṇicceṭhṭhā ṇavari sā mahialaṃ thaṇahareṇa gaā || 91 ||
(tathā nirmitā eva d‍ṛṣṭiḥ muk‍takapolavidhuraḥ urasi eva karau |
gatajīvitaniś‍ceṣṭā kevalaṃ sā mahītalaṃ stanabhareṇa gatā ||)
1. ॰sāyavidravaḥ=॰sāyaḥvidravaḥ' iti jo. rā., 2. udāharaṇāni nopalabhyante pṛ.1503, 3. tapasyodyogaḥ pṛ. 1504, 4. ॰d‍ṛśyadarśanam pṛ.1504, 5. sahāyatvāsvīkaraṇam pṛ. 1505
yathā vā—(seba. 11.105)
alaaṃdhaāriamuhī samuhāgaṇa(a)kaṃṭhabhamiraveṇivaṃdhā |
mohapaḍivaṇṇahiaā darajaṃpiaṇīsahaṃ puṇo vi ṇisaṇṇā || 92 ||
(alakāndhakāritamukhī sammukhāgatakaṇṭhabhramaṇaśīlaveṇībandhā |
mohapratipannahṛdayā darajalpitani sahaṃ punarapi niḥsaṃjñā ||)
4. mohasamāveśo yathā—(seba. 11.56)
khaṇaṇiccalaṇīsāsaṃ jā(aṃ) mohaṃdhaārasāmacchāaṃ |
viralamiliacchīpattaṃ muchāhīraṃtatāraaṃ tīe muhaṃ || 93 ||
(kṣaṇaniś‍calaniḥśvāsaṃ jātaṃ mohāndhakāraśyāmacchāyam |
viralamilitākṣipatraṃ mūrcchāhriyamāṇatārakaṃ tasyā mukham ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.57)
vialiavioaviaṇaṃ takkhaṇapabbhaṭṭharāmamaraṇāāsaṃ |
jaṇaataṇaāi ṇavaraṃ laddhaṃ mucchāṇimīlaacchīe musuhaṃ || 94 ||
(vigalitaviyogavedanaṃ tatkṣaṇaprabhraṣṭarāmamaraṇāyāsam |
janakatanayayā kevalaṃ labdhaṃ mūrcchānimīlitākṣyā sukham ||)
5. cetanāpratyāgamo yathā—(seba. 11.58)
thaṇapariṇāhatthaïe tīse hiaammi paaṇuaṃ pi ṇa diṭṭhaṃ |
dīhaṃ pi samūsasiaṃ dukkhijjaï ṇavara vevire aharoṭṭhe || 95 ||
(stanapariṇāhasthagite tasyāḥ hṛdaye pratanukamapi na d‍ṛṣṭam |
dīrghamapi samuccha‌vasitaṃ duḥkhyate kevalaṃ vepanaśīle adharoṣṭe ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.59)
avaripphuḍaṇīsāsā to sā mohavirame vi ṇīsahapaḍiā |
bạdhḍhaṃta—bāha—guruia—duk‌kha —samuvvūḍha—tāraaṃ ummillā || 96 ||
(aparisphuṭaniḥśvāsā tataḥ sā mohavirame api nissahapatitā |
vardhamāna—bāṣpa—gurūkṛta—duḥkha—samudvyūḍha—tārakaṃ unmīlitā ||)
6. mūrcchāvicchedo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.1)
atha mohaparāyaṇā satī vivaśā kāmavadhūrvibodhitā |
vidhinā pratipādayiṣyatā navavaidhavyamasahyavedanam || 97 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 14.56)
sā lup‍tasaṃjñā na viveda duḥkhaṃ pratyāgatāsuḥ samatapyatāntaḥ |
tasyāssumitrātmajayat‍nalabdho mohādabhūt kaṣṭataraḥ prabodhaḥ || 98 ||
7. śokapratyagratā yathā—(urāca. 2.26)
cirād vegārambhī prasṛta iva tīvro viṣarasaḥ kutaścit saṃvegāt pracala iva śalyasya śakalaḥ |
vraṇo rūḍhagranthiḥ sphuṭita iva hṛnmarmaṇi punaḥ parāvṛttaḥ śoko vikalayati māṃ nūtana iva || 99 ||
yathā vā—(seba. 11.131)
ia rāma—pemma—kittaṇa—dūsaṇa—vajjāhighāa—dūmia—hiaā |
saṃbharia mukkakaṇṭhaṃ aṇṇamaaṃ maraṇaṇicchiā vi paruṇṇā || 100 ||
(iti rāmapremakīrtanadūṣaṇavajrābhighāta—dūna—hṛdayā |
saṃsmṛtya muk‍takaṇṭhamanyamayaṃ maraṇaniś‍citā api praruditā ||)
8. śokāvego yathā—
helollolakṣubhitakaruṇo jṛmbhaṇastambhanārthaṃ yo yo yat tat kathamapi samādhīyate taṃ tamantaḥ |
hitvā hitvā prasarati balāt ko 'pi cetovikāra— stoyasyevāpratihatarayaḥ saikataṃ setumoghaḥ || 101 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 8.93)
tasya prasahya hṛdayaṃ kila śokaśaṅkuḥ plakṣapraroha iva saudhatalaṃ bibheda |
prāṇāntahetumapi taṃ bhiṣajāmasādhyaṃ lābhaṃ priyānugamanatvarayā sa mene || 102 ||
9. duḥkhaniryātanaṃ yathā—(seba. 11.73)
parideviuṃ paüttā to ṇiaa—sarīra—muk‍ka—rāhava—dukkhā |
karamagguṭṭhia—soṇia—vivaṇṇa—uṇṇaa—paoharā jaṇaasuā || 103 ||
(parideviu pravṛttā tataḥ nijakaśarīramuk‍tarāghavaduḥkhā |
karamārgotthita—śoṇita—vivarṇonnatapayodharā janakasutā ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.100)
to jaṃpiuṃ paüttā puṇo vi atthakka uṭṭhia—samūsasiā |
uragholiraveṇīmuhathaṇalaggaṃguṭṭhamahiraā jaṇaasuā || 104 ||
(tataḥ jalpituṃ pravṛttā punarapi akasmād utthitasamucch‌vasitā |
uroghūrṇanaśīla—veṇīmukhastanalag‍nāṅguṣṭhamahīrajāḥ janakasutā ||)
10. duḥkhāvasādo yathā—(seba. 11.71)
āveasamukkhittaṃ to se kheāgamosiaṃtovattaṃ |
paḍiaṃ ṇiaücchaṃge appattaṃ cia paohare karajualam || 105 ||
(āvegasamukṣip‍taṃ tataḥ tasyāḥ khedāgamāvasīdadapavṛttam |
patitaṃ nijotsaṅge aprāp‍tam eva payodharau karayugalam ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.107)
tīe ṇava—pallaveṇa va paharāaṃba—vihaleṇa hattheṇa muhaṃ |
parimajjiuṃ ṇa caïaṃ ekkakaola—miliālaaṃ kaha vi kaaṃ || 106 ||
(tayā navapallavena iva prahārātāmravihvalena hastena mukham |
parimārṣṭuṃ na śak‍taṃ ekakapolamilitālakaṃ kathamapi kṛtam ||)
11. duḥkhasandīpanaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.26)
tamavekṣya ruroda sā bhṛśaṃ stanasambādhamuro jaghāna ca |
svajanasya hi duḥkhamagrato vivṛtadvāramivopajāyate || 107 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 4.5)
upamānamabhūd vilāsināṃ1 karaṇaṃ yattava kāntimattayā |
tadidaṃ gatamīdṛśīṃ daśāṃ na vidīrye kaṭhināḥ khalu striyaḥ || 108 ||
12. duḥkhavyāhāro yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.27)
iti cainamuvāca duḥkhitā suhṛdaḥ! paśya vasanta! kiṃ sthitam |
yadidaṃ kaṇaśo vikīryate pavanairbhasma kapotakarburam || 109 ||
1. sinām = sinīnām jo.rā. | atra tṛtīyapādavisaṃvādaḥ |
yathā vā—(raghu. 8.57)
navapallavasaṃstare 'pi te mṛdu dūyeta yadaṅgamarpitam |
tadidaṃ viṣahiṣyate kathaṃ vada vāmoru! citādhirohaṇam || 110 ||
13. duḥkhātivāhanaṃ yathā—(raghu. 8.41)
pratiyojayitavyavallakīsamavasthāmatha sattvaviplavāt |
sa nināya nitāntavatsalaḥ pratigṛhyocitamaṅkamaṅaganām || 111 ||
yathā vā—(seba. 11.98)
to agaṇiovaesā gao/āvaṇiattitajīavi/viamuhijjaṃtī |
tiaḍāe jaṇaataṇaā sahisabbhāvasarisaṃ urammi ṇisaṇṇā || 112 ||
(tataḥ agaṇitopadeśā gatāpanivartitajīvitamudvahantī |
trijaṭāyāḥ janakatanayā sakhīsadbhāvasadṛśamurasi niṣaṇṇā ||)
14. bāṣpamokṣo yathā—(raghu. 14.68)
tatheti tasyāḥ pratigṛhya vācaṃ rāmānuje dṛṣṭipathaṃ vyatīte |
sā muktakaṇṭhaṃ vyasanātibhārāc‍cakranda vig‍nā kurarīva bhūyaḥ || 113 ||
yathā vā—(urāca. 3.32)
na kila bhavatā devyāḥ sthānaṃ gṛhe 'bhimataṃ kṛtaṃ tṛṇamiva vane śūnye tyaktā na cāpyanuśocitā |
ciraparacitāścaite bhāvāḥ paridravayanti mā— midamaśaraṇairadyāsmābhiḥ prasīdata rudyate || 114 ||
15. avasthānubhavo yathā—(seba. 11.99)
loaṇavaïara—laggaṃ taṃsaṇisaṇṇāi tīe tiaṭāvacche |
galiaṃ kavolapellaṇavīlapīḍajjaṃtālaüggaaṃ bāhajalaṃ || 115 ||
(locanavyatikara—lag‍naṃ tiryaṅ‌niṣaṇṇāyāḥ tasyāḥ trijaṭāvakṣasi |
galitaṃ kapolapreraṇapīḍyamānālakodgataṃ bāṣpajalam ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.68)
savvagga—ṇisaṇṇāe ṇīsesa—kkhavia—tivaliaṃ/bhaṃga—ṇirāo |
tīse majjhapaeso thaṇajahaṇakarālio ṇa pāvaï vasuhaṃ || 116 ||
(sarvāṅganiṣaṇṇāyā niśśeṣakṣapitatrivalibhaṅganirāyataḥ |
tasyāḥ madhyapradeśaḥ stanajaghanakarālitaḥ na prāp‍noti vasudhām ||)
16. avasthāntarāveśo yathā—(seba. 11.106)
to aḍḍiapelibaṃdhaṇabhaṃguggamavisamakesavacchattaraṇe |
paḍiā rāmorattala—saaṇa—ṇirāsahiaā mahialucchiṃge || 117 ||
(tataḥ asthitaveṇībandhanabhaṅgod‍gamaviṣamakeśapratyāstaraṇe |
patitā rāmoraḥsthalaśayananirāśahṛdayā mahītalotsaṅge ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.65)
to mucchiuṭhiāe kiṃ eaṃti gaaṇe disāsu a samaaṃ |
suṇṇaparigholiratthaṃ jāaṃ mūḍhaparideviaṃ tīe muhaṃ || 118 ||
(tataḥ mūrchitotthitāyāḥ kimetaditi gagane diśāsu ca samakam |
śūnyaparighūrṇanaśīlākṣaṃ jātaṃ mūḍhaparidevitaṃ tasyā mukham ||)
(2. pratimukhasandhau karuṇasya vibhāvādayaḥ -16)
1. pratimukhasandhau paridevanaṃ yathā—(raghu. 8.62)
kusumaṃ kṛtadohadastvayā yadaśoko 'yamudīrayiṣyati |
alakābharaṇaṃ kathaṃ nu tat tava neṣyāmi nivāpamālyatām || 119 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 4.22)
kriyatāṃ kathamantyamaṇḍanaṃ paralokopagatasya te mayā |
samameva gato 'syatarkitā gatimaṅgena ca jīvitena ca || 120 ||
2. anuśocanaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.12)
nayanānyaruṇāni ghūrṇayan vacanāni skhalayan pade pade |
asati tvayi vāruṇīmadaḥ pramadānāmadhunā viḍambanam || 121 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 4.14)
haritāruṇacārubandhanaḥ kalapuṃskokilaśabdasūcitaḥ |
vada samprati kasya bāṇatāṃ navacūtaprasavo gamiṣyati || 122 ||
3. guṇasaṃsmaraṇaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.23)
ṛjutāṃ nayataḥ smarāmi te śaramutsaṅganiṣaṇṇadhanvanaḥ |
madhunā saha saṃsthitāṃ kathāṃ nayanopāntavilokitaṃ mayi || 123 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 4.17)
śirasā praṇipatya yācitānyupagụ̄dhāni savepathūni ca |
suratāni ca tāni te rahaḥ smara! sañcintya na śāntirasti me || 124 ||
4. svabhāgyagarhaṇaṃ yathā—(seba. 11.76)
virahammi tujjha dhariaṃ dacchāmi tumaṃ tti haajīviaṃ kaha vi mae |
tīe sasi(eaṃ) meṃ diṭṭho phaliā vi maṇorahā ṇa pūrenti mahaṃ || 125 ||
(virahe tava dhṛtaṃ drakṣyāmi tvāṃmiti hatajīvitaṃ kathamapi mayā |
tasyā evamasi me dṛṣṭaḥ phalitā api manorathāḥ na pūryante mama ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.77)
puhaīe hohii paī bahupurisavivesacaṃcalā rāasirī |
maṇe mahaṃ cia imaṃ ṇīsāmaṇṇaṃ uaṭṭhiaṃ vehavvaṃ || 126 ||
(pṛthivyāḥ bhaviṣyati patiḥ bahupuruṣaviśeṣacañcalā rājyaśrīḥ |
manye mama eva idaṃ nissāmānyamupasthitaṃ vaidhavyam ||)
5. vilāpo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.7)
kṛtavānasi vipriyaṃ na me pratikūlaṃ ca mayā na te kṛtam |
kimakāraṇameva darśanaṃ vilapantyai rataye na dīyate || 127 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 8.52)
manasāpi na vipriyaṃ mayā kṛtapūrvaṃ tava kiṃ jahāsi mām |
nanu śabdapatiḥ kṣiterahaṃ tvayi me bhāvanibandhanā ratiḥ || 128 ||
6. pralāpo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.9)
hṛdaye vasasīti matpriyaṃ yadavocastadavaimi kaitavam |
upacārapadaṃ na cedidaṃ tvamanaṅgaḥ kathamakṣatā ratiḥ || 129 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 8.49)
dhruvamasmi śaṭhaḥ śucismite! viditaḥ kaitavavatsalastava |
paralokamasannivṛttaye yadanāpṛcch‌ya gatāsi māmitaḥ || 130 ||
7. pravilāpo yathā—(raghu. 8.61)
mithunaṃ parikalpitaṃ tvayā sahakāraḥ phalinī ca nanvimau |
avidhāya vivāhasaṃskriyāmanayorgamyata ityasāmpratam || 131 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 8.64)
tava niḥśvasitānuvādibhiḥ vakulairardhacitāṃ samaṃ mayā |
asamāpya vilāsamekhalāṃ kimidaṃ kinnarakaṇṭhi! supyate || 132 ||
8. vipralāpo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.6)
k‍va nu māṃ tvadadhīnajīvitāṃ vinikīrya kṣaṇabhinnasauhṛdaḥ |
nalinīṃ kṣatasetubandhano jalasaṅghāta ivāsi vidrutaḥ || 133 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 8.65)
samaduḥkhasukhaḥ sakhījanaḥ pratipaccandranibho 'yamātmajaḥ |
ahamekarasastathāpi te vyavasāyaḥ pratipattiniṣṭhuraḥ || 134 ||
9. ātmanindā yathā—(seba. 11.74)
āvāabhaaaraṃ cia ṇa hoi dukkhassa dāruṇaṃ ṇivvahaṇaṃ |
jaṃ mahilāvīhacchaṃ diṭhṭhaṃ sahiaṃ ca tuha mae avasāṇaṃ || 135 ||
{āpātabhayakarameva na bhavati duḥkhasya dāruṇaṃ nirvahaṇam |
yat mahilābībhatsaṃ d‍ṛṣṭaṃ soḍhaṃ ca (tava mayā avasānam) ||}
yathā vā—(seba. 11.102)
sahiaṃ rakkhasavasaī diṭhṭhaṃ tuha taha erisaṃ avasāṇaṃ |
ajja vi vaaṇijjahaaṃ dhūmāi via ṇa pajjalaï me hiaaṃ || 136 ||
{soḍhaṃ rākṣasavasatau d‍ṛṣṭaṃ tava tataḥ īd‍ṛśamavasānam |
adyāpi vacanīyahataṃ dhūmāyate eva na prajvalati me hṛdayam ||}*
11. jīvitajugupsā yathā—(raghu. 8.50)
dayitāṃ yadi tāvadanvagād vinivṛttaṃ kimidaṃ tayā vinā |
sahatāṃ hatajīvitaṃ mayā prabalāmātmakṛtāṃ ca vedanām || 137 ||
yathā vā—(seba. 11.79)
sahio tujjha vioo raaṇiarīhi samaaṃ sahīhi va vutthaṃ |
daṭṭhuṃ tumaṃ ti hontaṃ jaï ettāhe vi jīviaṃ vialaṃtaṃ || 138 ||
(soḍhastava viyogaḥ rajanīcarībhiḥ samakaṃ sakhībhiriva vyuṣitam |
draṣṭuṃ tvām iti abhaviṣyat yadi idānīm api jīvitaṃ vyagaliṣyat ||)
* ataḥ paraṃ hṛdayopalambhasya udāharaṇaṃ nāsti|
12. daivādhikāro yathā—(raghu. 8.44)
kusumānyapi gātrasaṅgamāt prabhavantyāyurapohituṃ yadi |
na bhaviṣyati hanta sādhanaṃ kimivānyat prahariṣyato vidheḥ || 139 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 4.31)
vidhinā kṛtamardhavaiśasaṃ nanu māṃ kāmavadhe vimuñcatā |
anaghāpi vanena(gajena) nirmite drumabhaṅge1 patanāya vallarī || 140 ||
13. śokonmādo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.18)
racitaṃ yadi/rati—paṇḍita tvayā mama gātreṣu yadetadārtavam |
dhriyate kusumaprasādhanaṃ tava taccāruvapurna d‍ṛśyate || 141 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 4.16)
pratipadya manoharaṃ vapuḥ punarapyādiśa tāvadutthitaḥ |
ratidūtapadeṣu kokilāṃ madhurālāpanisargapaṇḍitām || 142 ||
14. duḥkhasambhedo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.11)
madanena vinākṛtā ratiḥ kṣaṇamātraṃ kila jīvatīti me |
vacanīyamupasthitaṃ jane ramaṇa! tvāmanuyāmi yadyapi || 143 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca. 5.22)
nyakkāro hṛdi vrajrakīla iva me tīvraḥ parispandate ghorāndhe tamasīva majjati manaḥ sammīlitaṃ lajjayā |
śokastātavipattijo dahati māṃ nāstyeva yasmin kriyā marmāṇyeva punaśchinatti karuṇā sītāṃ varākīṃ prati || 144 ||
15. sahāyāpekṣaṇaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.24)
k‍va nu te hṛdayaṅgamaḥ sakhā kusumāyojitakārmuko madhuḥ |
na khalūgraruṣā pinākinā2 gamitaḥ so 'pi suhṛdgatāṃ gatim || 145 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 4.28)
ayi samprati dehi darśanaṃ smara! paryutsuka eṣa mādhavaḥ |
pramadāsvanavasthitaṃ nṛṇāṃ na khalu prema calaṃ suhṛjjane || 146 ||
1. vanena—bhaṅge=hi saṃśrayadrume gajabhagne'—kāgra. ādi| 2. kinā = kino rā.
16. sahāyānunītiryathā—(raghu. 14.42)
tadeṣa sargaḥ karuṇārdracittaiḥ na me bhavadbhiḥ pratiṣedhanīyam |
yadyarthitā nirhṛtavācyaśalyān prāṇān mayā dhārayatā ciraṃ vaḥ || 147 ||
yathā vā—
bāṣpāndhā na nirīkṣituṃ viṣahate d‍ṛṣṭiḥ puro vidviṣaḥ sīdanneṣa ca kārmukapraṇayitāṃ dhatte na pāṇirmama |
rundhe tīvraśucā manasyavasaraḥ krodhasya yātaḥ sakhe! kṣantavyaṃ kṛpaṇo 'nuyāmi dayitāmadhyastavairo 'pyaham || 148 ||
(3. garbhasandhau karuṇasya vibhavādayaḥ — 16)
1. garbhasandhau suhṛtparidevanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 9.8)
na yatra pratyāśāmanupatati no vā rahayati pratikṣip‍taṃ cetaḥ praviśati ca mohāndhatamasam |
akiñcitkurvāṇāḥ paśava iva tasyāṃ vayamaho vidhāturvāmatvād vipadi parivartāmaha ime || 149 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 9.8)
suhṛdi guṇanivāse preyasi prāṇanāthe kathamiha sahacaryā krīḍanaprauḍhasakhye |
priyajanavirahādhivyādhivegaṃ dadhāne hatahṛdaya! viśīrya tvaṃ dvidhā na prayāsi || 150 ||
2. suhṛtpralāpo yathā—(māmā. 9. 23)
akaruṇa! vitara smitojjvalāṃ d‍ṛśamatidāruṇa! dehi me giram |
sahacaramanuraktacetasaṃ priyamakaranda 1! kathaṃ na manyase || 151 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 9.39)
āpūrṇaśca kalābhirinduramalo yātaśca rāhormukhaṃ sañjātaśca ghanāghano jaladharaḥ śīrṇaśca vāyorjavāt |
saṃvṛttaśca phalegrahī drumavaro dagdhaśca dāvāgninā tvaṃ cūḍāmaṇitāṃ gataśca jagataḥ prāp‍taśca mṛtyorvaśam || 152 ||
1. priyamaka = priya maka॰jo.rā.
3. parijanānuśocanaṃ yathā—(tāva. 2.11)
dhārāveśma vilokya dīnavadano bhrāntvā ca līlāgṛhā— nniḥśvasyāyatamāśu kesaralatāvīthīṣu kṛtvā d‍ṛśaḥ |
kiṃ me pārśvamupaiṣi putraka! kṛtaiḥ kiṃ cāṭubhiḥ krūrayā mātrā tvaṃ parivarjitaḥ saha mayā yāntyātidīrghāṃ bhuvam || 153 ||
yathā vā—(tāva. 2.23)
kuravakatarurgạ̄dhāśleṣaṃ, mukhāsavalālanaṃ vakulaviṭapī, raktāśokastathā caraṇāhatim |
tava sukṛtinaḥ sambhāvyaite prasādamahotsavā nanu gatadaśāḥ sarve sarvaḥ śaṭho na vayaṃ yathā || 154 ||
4. parijanākrando yathā—(raghu. 8. 39)
ubhayorapi pārśvavartināṃ tumulenārtaraveṇa vejitāḥ |
vihagāḥ kamalākarāśrayāḥ samaduḥkhā iva tatra cukruśuḥ || 155 ||
yathā vā—(urāca. 1.28)
athedaṃ rakṣobhiḥ kanakahariṇacchadmavidhinā tathā vṛttaṃ pāpairvyathayati yathā kṣālitamapi |
janasthāne śūnye vikalakaraṇairāryacaritai— rapi grāvā rodityapi dalati vajrasya hṛdayam || 156 ||
5. gurūparodanaṃ yathā—(nāgā. 5.12)
cūḍāmaṇiṃ caraṇayormama pātayatā tvayā |
lokāntaragatenāpi nojjhito vinayakramaḥ || 157 ||
yathā vā—
vivāhe d‍ṛṣṭeyaṃ sitakusumālyāmbaradharā sanāthā rāmeṇa prathamavayasā kāntavapuṣā |
punaśśūnye 'raṇye pratibhayakare bandhurahitā vimuñcantī prāṇānitaratanayaivādya ca mayā || 158 ||
6. gurujanavilāpo yathā—(māmā. 10.2)
aniyataruditasmitaṃ virājatkatipayakomaladantakuḍ‍malāgram |
vadanakamalakaṃ śiśoḥ smarāmi skhaladasamañjitamañjujalpitaṃ te || 159 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 10.6)
akāraṇasmeramanoharānanaḥ śikhālamalāṭārpitagaurasarṣapaḥ |
tavāṅkaśāyī parivṛttabhāgyayā mayā na dṛṣṭaḥ khalu sa stanandhayaḥ || 160 ||
7. sahāyākrandanaṃ yathā—(kādakasā. 6.107)
tato bhag‍nagrīvaṃ mukulitasitāpāṅganayanaṃ prabhāṃ tanvīṃ dīnāmiva nidadhataṃ dikṣu daśanaiḥ |
kṣitau viśrāntāṅgaṃ patitamimamālokya vivaśā mahāśvetā sadyaḥ kathamapi na yāti sma dalaśaḥ || 161 ||
yathā vā—(saka. 4.189)
akṛtakabalārambhairvaktrairbhayasthagitekṣaṇāḥ kimapi valitagrīvaṃ sthitvā muhurmṛgapaṅktayaḥ |
gaganamasakṛt paśyantyetāstathāśrughanairmukhai— rnipatati yathā śrṛṅgāgrebhyo bhramannayanodakam || 162 ||
8. sahāyābhyupapattiryathā—(kusaṃ. 4.25)
atha taiḥ paridevitākṣaraiḥ hṛdaye digdhaśarairivārditam |
ratimabhyupapattumādarān madhurātmānamadarśayat puraḥ || 163 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 14.70)
tāmabhyagacchad ruditānusārī kaviḥ kuśedhmāharaṇāya yātaḥ |
niṣādaviddhāṇḍajadarśanotthaḥ ślokatvamāpadyata yasya śokaḥ || 164 ||
9. sahāyābhāṣaṇaṃ yathā—(urāca. 3.30)
idaṃ viśvaṃ pālyaṃ vidhivadabhiyuktena manasā priyāśoko jīvaṃ kusumamiva gharmaḥ kalayati |
svayaṃ kṛtvā tyāgaṃ vilapanavinodo 'pyasulabha— stadadyāpyucch‌vāso bhavatu nanu lābho hi ruditam || 165 ||
yathā vā—
jāgarṣi kāśmari! niṣīdasi kovidāra! kutrāsi vatsakṛtamāla! tamāla! paśya |
kiṃ sāmprataṃ raghupateriti viklavābhi— ruktaṃ drumaughamavalokya vanasthalībhiḥ || 166 ||
10. sahāyāpraś‍no yathā—(seba. 11.111)
to tī/taṃ daṭṭhūṇa puṇo maraṇekkarasāe vāhiha—ṇīsāratthaṃ |
āucchasu maṃ ti kaaṃ tiaḍā-gaa-loaṇāe dīṇapalaloiaṃ || 167 ||
(tataḥ tad dṛṣṭvā punaḥ maraṇaikarasayā bāṣpanissārārtham |
āpṛcchasva māmiti kṛtaṃ trijaṭāgatalocanayā dīnapralokitam ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.112)
sahiammi rāmavirahe dūsahaṇijje paḍicchie vehavve |
saasu gaaṇehalahuaṃ maha ṇillajjamaraṇaṃ imaṃ ti paruṇṇā || 168 ||
(sọdhe rāmavirahe dussahanīye pratīṣṭe vaidhavye |
sahasva gatasnehalaghukaṃ mama nirlajjamaraṇamidamiti praruditā ||)
11. sāhasāgraho yathā—
śūnyā diśassapadi vīkṣya śucā varākī mṛtyormukhaṃ viśati pāśamayaṃ nirāśā |
etāvatha sva—vadha—pātaka—dīrgharoṣā mā gaccha śīghramabalāṃ parirakṣa yāvat? || 169 ||
yathā vā—(urāca. 7.2)
viśvambharātmajā devī rājñā tyaktā mahāvane |
prāp‍taprasavamātmānaṃ gaṅgādevyāṃ vimuñcati || 170 ||
12. maraṇābhiniveśo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.10)
paralokanavapravāsinaḥ pratipadye padavīmahaṃ tava |
vidhinā jana eṣa vañcitastvadadhīnaṃ khalu dehināṃ sukham || 171 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 4.33)
śaśinā saha yāti kaumudī saha meghena taḍit pralīyate |
pramadāḥ pativartmagā iti pratipannaṃ hi vicetanairapi || 172 ||
13. samayābhyarthanaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.32)
tadidaṃ kriyatāmanantaraṃ bhavatā bandhujanaprayojanam |
aviṣahyaviyogavedanāṃ nanu māṃ prāpaya patyurantikam || 173 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 4.35)
kusumāstaraṇe sahāyatāṃ bahuśaḥ saumya! gatastvamāvayoḥ |
kṛru samprati satvaraṃ mayā vinipātāñjaliyācitāṃ1 citām || 174 ||
14. sahāyaśikṣā yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.36)
tadanu jvalanaṃ madarpitaṃ tvarayer dakṣiṇavātavījanaiḥ |
viditaṃ khalu te yathā smaraḥ kṣaṇamapyutsahate na māṃ vinā || 175 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 4.38)
paralokavidhau ca mādhava smaramuddiśya vilolapallavāḥ |
nivapessahakāramañjarīṃ priyacūtaprasavo hi te sakhā || 176 ||
15. maraṇopakramo yathā—
ratipatirabhūd yasmin vedhāḥ sudhāparamāṇubhi— ryadiha ghaṭitaṃ yasyākāraṃ vilokya kṛtaḥ śaśī |
vadanakamalaṃ tatpaśyeyaṃ sarojadṛśaḥ puna— rdahanabhavanaṃ nirmāṇaṃ me tadeva kariṣyasi || 177 ||
yathā vā—
haṃso vā cakravāko vā viśālākṣyānayā saha |
bhaveyaṃ mānuṣīgarbhe mā bhūjjanma punarmama || 178 ||
16. maraṇādhyavasāyo yathā—(seba. 11.115)
aṇusoiüṃ ṇa icchaï ṇa dei aṃgagmi sā parammi vi paharaṃ |
bāhaṃ muaï ṇa rudhaï mariavve laddhapaccaaṃ se hiaaṃ || 179 ||
(anuśocituṃ na icchati na dadāti aṅge sā parāsminnapi prahāram |
bāṣpaṃ muñcati na ruṇaddhi martavye labdhapratyayaṃ tasyāḥ hṛdayam ||)
1. vini—citaḥ = 'praṇipātāñjaliyācitaś' kāgra.
yathā vā—(seba. 11.110)
lakkhijjaṃtavisāā abbhahiummillaṇiccalaṭṭhiaṇaaṇā |
rāmasirabaddhalakkhā dhuvvaï vāheṇa se ṇa ruddhaï diṭhṭhī || 180 ||
(lakṣyamāṇaviṣādā abhyadhikonmīlitaniś‍calasthitanayanā |
rāmaśirobaddhalakṣyā dhāvyate bāṣpeṇa tasyā na rudhyate d‍ṛṣṭiḥ ||)
(4. vimarśasandhau karuṇasya vibhāvādayaḥ —16)
1. vimarśasandhau samāśvāsanaṃ yathā—(seba. 11.86)
to vilaviaṇicchāmaṃ galaṃtahiaaparisuṇṇaloaṇajualaṃ |
mahuraṃ āsāsaṃtī hatthuttāṇiamuhī haṇaï taṃ tiaḍā || 181 ||
(tataḥ vilapitaniśśyāmaṃ galad‍dhṛdayapariśūnyalocanayugalam |
madhuramāś‍vāsayantī hastottānitamukhī bhaṇati tāṃ trijaṭā ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.91)
mā ruasu pusasu bāhaṃ avaāse kuṇasu sapariattamuhaṃ |
saṃbharia virahadukkhaṃ rottavvaṃ te puṇo piasa vi aṃke || 182 ||
(mā rodīḥ proñcha bāṣpaṃ paśya kuru saṃparivṛttamukham |
saṃsmṛtya virahaduḥkhaṃ roditavyaṃ te punaḥ priyasyāpyaṅke ||)
2. uddharṣaṇaṃ yathā—(seba. 11.92)
aïrā daṃsihisi tumaṃ ciraviraholuggapaṃḍuramuhacchāaṃ |
gaarosasuhāloaṃ ovāria—cāvaṇivvuaṃ dāsarahaṃ || 183 ||
(acirād drakṣyasi tvaṃ ciravirahāvarugṇapāṇḍuramukhacchāyam |
gataroṣasukhālokamavatāritacāpanirvṛtaṃ dāśarathim ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.124)
aïrā e rahutaṇao taṇṇāaṃtaggahatthamaüviapamahaṃ |
moppia vevaṃtaṃguligupphaṃtakkhittavisamabhāaṃ veṇī || 184 ||
(acirāt te raghutanayaḥ ārdrīyamāṇā 'grahasta—mṛdūkṛta—pakṣma |
mokṣyati vepamānāṅguligupyamānotkṣip‍taviṣamabhāgāṃ veṇīm ||)
3. pratibodhanaṃ yathā—(raghu. 8.83)
tadalaṃ tadapāyacintayā vipadutpattimatāmupasthitā |
vasudheyamavekṣyatāṃ tvayā vasumatyā hi nṛpāḥ kalatriṇaḥ || 185 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 8.85)
rudatā kuta eva sā punarbhavatā nānumṛtāpi labhyate |
paralokajuṣāṃ svakarmabhirgatayo bhinnapathā hi dehinām || 186 ||
4. utsāhanaṃ yathā—(raghu. 8.84)
udaye madavācyamujjhatā śrutamāviṣkṛtamātmanastvayā |
manasastadupasthite jvare punaraklībatayā prakāśyatām || 187 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 8.90)
na pṛthagjanavacchuco vaśaṃ vaśināmuttama! gantumarhasi |
drumasānumatāṃ kimantaraṃ yadi vāyordvitaye 'pi te calāḥ || 188 ||
5. anukampanaṃ yathā—(raghu. 14.71)
tamaśrunetrāvaraṇaṃ pramṛjya sītā vilāpād viratā vavande |
tasyai munirdauhṛdaliṅgadarśī dāśvānapatyāśiṣa ityuvāca || 189 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 14.72)
jāne visṛṣṭāṃ praṇidhānatastvāṃ mithyāpavādakṣubhitena bhartrā |
tanmā vyathiṣṭhā viṣayāntarasthaṃ prāp‍tā 'si vaidehi! piturniketam || 190 ||
6. vistrambhaṇaṃ yathā—(raghu. 14.77)
puṣpaṃ phalaṃ cārtavamāharantyo bījaṃ ca bāleyamakṛṣṭarohi |
vinodayiṣyanti navābhiṣaṅgāmudāravāco munikanyakāstvām || 191 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 14.78)
payoghaṭairāśramabālavṛkṣān saṃvardhayantī svabalānurūpaiḥ |
asaṃśayaṃ prāk tanayopapattesstanandhayaprītimavāpsyasi tvam || 192 ||
7. pralobhanaṃ yathā—(raghu. 14.75)
tapasvisaṃsargavinītasattve tapovane vītabhayā vasāsmin |
ito bhaviṣyatyanaghaprasūterapatyasaṃskāramayo vidhiste || 193 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 14.76)
aśūnyatīrāṃ munisanniveśaiḥ tamo 'pahantrī tamasāṃ vigāhya |
tatsaikatotsaṅgabalikriyābhiḥ sampatsyate te manasaḥ prasādaḥ || 194 ||
8. upapattidarśanaṃ yathā—(seba. 11.90)
māruamoḍiaviḍavaṃ miaṃka—kiraṇa—parimāsa—maülia—kamalaṃ | kaha hoi rāmamaraṇe i vicchāiaṃ dasāṇaṇagharujjāṇam || 195 ||
(mārutamoṭitaviṭapaṃ mṛgāṅkakiraṇaparimarṣamukulitakamalam |
kathaṃ bhavati rāmamaraṇe iti vicchāyitaṃ daśānanagṛhodyānam ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.120)
saalā ṇisāara—urīghara—parivāḍi—samaṇī—haria—ruṇṇaravā |
ekkeṇa kaā kaïṇā kaha hohi aṇaharakkhaso rahuvaho || 196 ||
(sakalā niśācara—purīgṛha—paripāṭi—samanirhrādita—ruditaravā |
ekena kṛtā kapinā kathaṃ bhavati anagharākṣasaḥ raghuvadhaḥ ||)
9. praśvāsanaṃ yathā—(seba. 11.94)
kiṃ va samāsasiavve mujjhasi dahavaaṇadappabhaṃgupphālaṃ |
pecchaṃtī pamaavaṇaṃ rāmāṇattiara—pavaapavvaddhadumaṃ || 197 ||
(kimiva samāśvasitavye muhyasi daśavadanadarpabhaṅgotphālam |
prekṣamāṇā pramadāvanaṃ rāmājñap‍tikaraplavagapraviddhadrumam ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.126)
vālivahadiṭhṭhasāraṃ ṇagalacchiasamuddadiṇṇathalavahaṃ |
rohialaṃkāvalaaṃ mā lahuaṃ peccha rāhavassa bhuabalaṃ || 198 ||
(vālivadhadṛṣṭasāraṃ nagalakṣitasamudradattasthalapatham |
rodhitalaṅkāvalayaṃ mā laghukaṃ prekṣasva rāghavasya bhujabalam ||)
10. satyāpanaṃ yathā—(raghu. 14.73)
utkhātalokatrayakaṇṭake 'pi satyapratijñe 'pyavikatthane 'pi |
tvāṃ pratyakasmāt kaluṣapravṛtterastyeva manyurbharatāgraje me || 199 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 14.74)
tavendrakīrtiḥ śvaśuraḥ sakhā me satāṃ bhavocchedakaraḥ pitā te |
dhuri sthitā tvaṃ patidevatānāṃ kiṃ tanna yenāsi mamānukampyā || 200 ||
11. pratyānayanaṃ/yanam yathā—(seba. 11.96)
taha taṃ si mohaṃ murcchāgamapaḍiaṇīsahavisaṇṇamuhī |
rakkhasamāe tti phuḍaṃ jāṇaṃtī ju imaṃ ahaṃpi vimūḍā || 201 ||
(tathā tvamasi gatā mohaṃ mūrcchāgamapatitanissahaviṣaṇṇamukhī |
rākṣasamāyā iti sphuṭaṃ jānatī yathā idamahamapi vimụ̄dhā ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.129)
taṃ avalaṃbasu dhīraṃ saṃpaï ṇāsaü amaṃgalā jāā imāṃ |
muṇiaparamatthalahuī avaīhia—ṇipphalā ṇisāaramāā || 202 ||
(tadavalambasva dhairyaṃ samprati naśyatu amaṅgalā jātā iyam |
jñātaparamārthalaghvī avadhīritaniṣphalā niśācaramāyā ||)
12.āpyāyanaṃ yathā—(raghu. 14.79)
anugraha—pratyabhinandinīṃ tāṃ vālmīkirādāya dayārdracetāḥ |
sāyaṃ mṛgādhyāsitavedipārśvaṃ svamāśramaṃ śāntisukhaṃ nināya || 203 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 14.80)
tāmarpayāmāsa ca śokadīnāṃ tadāgamaprītiṣu tāpasīṣu |
nirviṣ‍ṭasārāṃ pitṛbhirhimāṃśorantyāṃ kalāṃ darśa ivauṣadhīṣu || 204 ||
13. tanmatavyākṣepo yathā—(seba. 11.88)
tihuaṇamūlāhāraṃ visaṭhṭhamahiṃdaparimukkaūḍharaṇadhuraṃ |
jāṇaṃtī kīsa kusaṃ tulesi sesapurisāṇumāṇeṇa païṃ || 205 ||
(tribhuvanamūlādhāraṃ visarpanmahendraparimuk‍tavyūḍharaṇadhuram |
jānatī kasmāt kṛśaṃ tulayasi śeṣapuruṣānumānena patim ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.89)
amiliasāarasalilā aṇahaṭhṭhiapavvaā aṇuvvattaalā |
rāmassa chiṇṇapaḍiaṃ kaha pattiasi dharaṇī dharei tti siraṃ || 206 ||
(amilitasāgarasalilā anaghasthitaparvatā anud‌vṛttatalā |
rāmasya cchinnapatitaṃ kathaṃ pratyeṣi dharaṇī dhārayatīti śiraḥ ||)
14. bhayopadarśanaṃ yathā—(raghu. 8.86)
apaśokamanāḥ kuṭumbinīmanugṛh‍ṇīṣva nivāpadattibhiḥ |
svajanāśru kilātisambhṛtaṃ dahati pretamiti pracakṣate || 207 ||
yathā vā—(seba. 11.122)
uṭṭhesu aṃasu soaṃ pusa eaṃ vāhamaïliaṃ thaṇavaṭṭhaṃ |
suṇasu suaṇe ṇa vaṭṭhaï samarāhimuhe païmmi asuṇibāo || 208 ||
{uttiṣ‍ṭha antaya sokaṃ protrcha etad bāṣpamalinitaṃ stanapṛṣ‍ṭham |
śrṛṇu śakune na vartate samarābhimukhe patyau aśrunipātaḥ ||}
15. upālambhanaṃ yathā—(seba. 11.97)
miliaṇisāarapurao suvelamalaaṃtarālaṇimmaviapahe |
pelliatiuḍasihare ajja vi kiṃ tujjha rāhave aggahaṇaṃ || 209 ||
(militaniśācarapurataḥ suvelamalayāntarālanirmāpitapathe |
preritatrikūṭaśikhare adyāpi kiṃ tava rāghave agrahaṇam ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.123)
mottūṇa a rahuṇāhaṃ lajjāgamaseaviṃduiajjaṃtamuho |
keṇa va aṇṇeṇa kao pāāraṃtariaṇivvaho ta(da)havaaṇo || 210 ||
(muktvā ca raghunāthaṃ lajjāgamasvedabindukīryamāṇamukhaḥ |
kena vā anyena kṛtaḥ prākārāntarita—niṣprabhaḥ daśavadanaḥ ||)
16. pratikopo yathā—(seba. 11.119)
jāṇaï seha/siṇeha bhaṇiaṃ mā raaṇiari tti me juuvvchasu vaaṇaṃ |
ucchāṇavaṇammi vi jaṃ surahiṃ tī laāṇa gheppaï kusumaṃ || 211 ||
(jānaki! snehabhaṇitaṃ mā rajanīcarīti me jugupsasva vacanam |
udyānavane 'pi yat surabhi iti latānāṃ gṛhyate kusumam ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 11.117)
kiṃ va jiaṃtī sāme jaï aliaṃ sahi ṇa o(ho)jja rāhavamaraṇaṃ |
aṇahe uṇa rahuṇāhe tuha me maraṇavihuraṃ kilamaï hiaaṃ || 212 ||
(kiṃ vā jitaṃ śyāme! yadi alīkaṃ sakhi na bhaved rāghavamaraṇam |
anaghe punā raghunāthe tava me maraṇavidhuraṃ klāmyati hṛdayam ||)
(5. nirvahaṇasandhau karuṇasya vibhāvādayaḥ —16)
1. nirvahaṇasandhau maraṇādhyavasāyavidravo yathā—(kādakasā. 4.121)
maraṇavyavasāyaniścalā kṛtavatyasmi ca saṃvidhānakam |
niriyāya ca candramaṇḍalāt puruṣaḥ ko 'pi himopamadyutiḥ || 213 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 4.45)
itthaṃ rateḥ kimapi bhūtamadṛśyarūpaṃ mandīcakāra maraṇavyavasāyabuddhim |
tatpratyayāc‍ca kusumāyudhabandhurenāmāśvāsayat suracitārthapadairvacobhiḥ || 214 ||
2. śokatiraskāro yathā—(kādakasā. 4.123)
virama maraṇodyogādasmatpriyeṇa tavāmunā punarapi mahāśvete vatse bhaviṣyati saṅgamaḥ |
iti giramimāṃ śrutvā tasmāt savismayakautukāt kimidamiti taṃ tatrāpṛccham prasṛtya kapiñjalam || 215 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 9.55)
astokavismayamapasmṛtapūrvavṛttamudbha‍ūtanūtanabhayajvarajarjharaṃ naḥ |
ekakṣaṇatruṭitasaṅghaṭitapramodamānandaśokaśabavatvamupaiti cetaḥ || 216 ||
3. śokalāghavaṃ yathā—(urāca. 1.31)
etasmin madakalamallikākṣapakṣavyādhūtasphuradurudaṇḍapuṇḍarīkāḥ |
bāṣpāmbhaḥparipatanodgamāntarāle saṃdṛṣ‍ṭāḥ kuvalayino mayā vibhāgāḥ || 217 ||
yathā vā—(urāca. 2.30)
ete te kuhareṣu gad‌gadanadad‌godāvarīvārayo meghālambitameghanīlaśikharāḥ kṣoṇībhṛto dakṣiṇāḥ |
anyonyapratighātasaṅkuladalatkallolakolāhalai— ruttālāsta ime gabhīrapayasaḥ puṇyāḥ saritsaṅgamāḥ || 218 ||1‌
1. ataḥ paraṃ śokavinodasya udāharaṇaṃ nopalabhyate
5. tapasyodyogo yathā—(raghu. 14.66)
sāhaṃ tapassūryaniviṣ‍ṭadṛṣ‍ṭirūrdhvaṃ pratīteścarituṃ yatiṣye |
tathā yathā me jananāntare 'pi tvameva bhartā na ca viprayogaḥ || 219 ||
yathā vā—(kādakasā. 4.125)
paśyantyāṃ mayi te trayo 'pi viviśuḥ śītatviṣo maṇḍalaṃ tatsampratyayasaṃhṛtocitavidhiḥ sāsmi śritedaṃ vratam |
tātenaitya tataḥ prabhṛtyahamihāsīnā na netuṃ gṛhān yat‍nenāpi hi variteti suciraṃ sthitvā gataḥ svaṃ puram || 220 ||
6. daivasampad‌yogo yathā—
dagdhaikena hanūmatā sakhi! yathā laṅkā yathāmbhonidhau śailaiḥ seturakāri bhasmani hutaṃ nāgāsrabandho yathā |
dvīpādanyapathānyato 'pi niśayā nītāpi śalyauṣadhiḥ diṣ‍ṭ‌yā jānaki! vardhase tava tathā jāto 'nukūlo vidhiḥ || 221 ||
yathā vā—(kādakasā. 8.68.)
muneravabhṛthāvadhiḥ pituramuṣya siddhaḥ kratuḥ kṛtastvamapi saṃsmṛtaḥ svatanuradya tacchāsanāt |
tadujjhitamalīmasedṛśaśarīyogau yuvāṃ nijena vapuṣādhunānubhavatāṃ priyāsaṅgamam || 222 ||
7. trikāladṛśyadarśanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 10.8)
vyatikara iva bhīmastāmaso vaidyutaśca kṣaṇamupahṛtacakṣurvṛttiruddha‍ūya śāntaḥ |
kathamiha na vayasyastatkimetat‍kimanyad vibhavati hi mahim‍nā svena yogīśvarīyam || 223 ||
yathā vā—(urā. 3.18)
asyāḥ paśya tadeva lambitavalīvinyāsamag‍nādharaṃ jātaṃ saṅgalitadyuteḥ śaśabhṛtaḥ śobhopamānaṃ mukham |
spaṣ‍ṭasthūlasirāstanurmadhurayā kāntā samunmīlitā citraṃ vyomavilāsinī kathamiyaṃ jātā jarattāpasī || 224 ||
8. tadupadeśo yathā—(urā. 3.20)
bhrātrā vittakalatrarājyaharaṇairnīto 'tikaṣ‍ṭāṃ daśā— madhyāste girimṛśyamūkamadhunā sugrīvanāmā kapiḥ |
taṃ kṛtvā tadarikṣayapraṇayinā mūlyena tasmāt priyā— vārtāṃ prāpya kariṣyasi tribhuvanaṃ vikṣip‍tarakṣojvaram || 225 ||
yathā vā—
yasyāḥ pāṇiparigrahe sati punardevī kila prāpyate daivādeva tadīritaṃ yadi sakhe! satyaṃ muneḥ syād vacaḥ |
tadrakṣe kimapatrapaḥ kṛtamidaṃ tatprāp‍tihetormayā naitat sā hṛdaye kariṣyati yato devī dṛḍhaṃ kopanā || 226 ||
9. sahāyatvāsvīkaraṇaṃ yathā—(raghu. 12.58)
sa hatvā vālinaṃ vīrastatpade cirakāṅ‌kṣite |
dhātoḥ sthāna ivādeśaṃ sugrīvaṃ saṃn‍nyaveśayat || 227 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 12.69)
tasmai niśācaraiśvaryaṃ pratiśuśrāva rāghavaḥ |
kāle khalu sāmārabdhāḥ phalaṃ badh‍nanti nītayaḥ || 228 ||
10. tadadhyavasāyo yathā—(urā. 4.5)
svāmī śokamayīṃ daśāmupagataḥ sītāpravṛttiṃ vinā duṣprekṣā jalabhāravāmanaghanacchannāśca sarvā diśaḥ |
krūrāste piśitāśinaḥ prakṛtito naivāgato māruti— rhā jātaṃ kimidaṃ visaṃsthulamaho pāpasya me sarvataḥ || 229 ||
yathā vā—(urā. 4.7)
bāṣpāmbhassthagitekṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇamasau mūrcchāvilup‍tavyatho vinyasyorasi sambhramāt karatalaṃ bhrātrā yadāśvāsyate |
tatrāśā māyi kāraṇaṃ na ca mayā klībena kiñcit kṛtaṃ prāṇāstad vrajatāthavā nahi bhavedevaṃ prabhurvañcitaḥ || 230 ||
11. pratyūhapraśamanaṃ yathā—(śāku.7.32)
śāpādasi pratihatā smṛtiloparūkṣe bhartaryapetatamasi prabhutā tavaiva |
chāyā na mūrcchati malopahataprasāde śuddhe tu darpaṇatale sulabhāvakāśā || 231 ||
yathā vā—(kādakasā. 8.84)
sā rakṣitā tanuriyaṃ tu tava priyeti śāpaḥ kṛśodari! virāmamavāpa pāpaḥ |
adya prabhṛtyakhilameva hi candralokaṃ śādhi svapādakṛtamudramidaṃ jagacca || 232 ||
12. pratyāśānubandho yathā—(kādakasā. 4.119)
kintu kleśāya yenāśāleśena hatajīvitam |
rājaputra! bibharmīdaṃ tadāścaryaṃ vadāmi te || 233 ||
yathā vā—(kādakasā. 7.92)
divaseṣvatha gacchatsu nirvikāraśarīratām |
candrapīḍasya paśyantī sthirāmāśāṃ babandha sā || 234 ||
13. samayapratīkṣā yathā—(ku.saṃ. 4.46)
atha madanavadhūrupaplavāntaṃ vyasanakṛśā pratipālayāmbabhūva |
śāśina iva divātanasya lekhā kiraṇaparikṣayadhūsarā pradoṣam || 234 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 8.92)
tenāṣ‍ṭau parigamitāḥ samāḥ kathaṃcid bālatvādavitathasūnṛtena sūnoḥ |
sādṛśyapratikṛtidarśanaiḥ priyāyāḥ svapneṣu kṣaṇikasamāgamotsavaiśca || 236 ||
14. saṃvidhānakaprakāro yathā—
na jvālā na ca dahano na dhūmajālaṃ k‍vāka‍smātsikatilavedikānipātaḥ |
svapno 'yaṃ kimuta mahendrajālamāho māyā svit kimidamaho mahāvicitram ||237 ||
yathā vā—(kādakasā. 8.80)
candrapīḍaṃ sā ca jagrāha kaṇṭhe kaṇṭhasthānaṃ jīvitaṃ ca prapede |
tenāpūrvāṃ sā samullāsa lakṣmīminduspṛṣ‍ṭā sindhuveleva bheje || 238 ||
15. pratyujjīvanaṃ yathā—
atha sā pitṛnāthavartmanaḥ pratiyātā vanarmava bhāminī |
dayitaṃ śayitaṃ mahītale dadhataṃ prāṇakalāmalokayat || 239 ||
yathā vā—(kādakasā. 8.81)
śilāśayyāṃ tyak‍tvā tadanu cirasup‍totthita iva kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā jṛmbhālasavadanamunmīlya nayane |
tataścandrāpīḍaḥ prahatamurajadhvānapaṭunā svareṇa svenaiva smitamadhuramāha priyatamām || 240 ||
16. punassamāgamo yathā—(kādakasā. 8.87)
śrutveti tasya gatamutsukatāṃ gatā 'sau romāñcakañcukamakṛtrimamud‍vahantī |
kādambarī caraṇayornipapāta patyu— rānandabāṣpakaṇaśīkaritekṣaṇaśrīḥ || 241 ||
yathā vā—(kādakasā. 8.85)
sakhyāḥ patiṃ pitṛtapobhiravāp‍tadivya— jīvaṃ kapiñjalakarārpitapāṇipadmam |
manmaṇḍalādavatarantamakhaṇḍakānti— māpāṇḍugaṇḍamavalokaya puṇḍarīkam || 242 ||
iti pratiṣ‍ṭhāḥ karuṇāmalārciṣāmaśītiraṣ‍ṭau ca vikalpajātayaḥ |
sahānubhāvairdviraśītisammitairupādhayo dvādaśa pañca sandhayaḥ || 243 ||
tadetadābandhanamātmajanmano nirīti śrṛṅgārarasasya jīvitam |
parā ca kāṣ‍ṭhā praṇayasya jīvatā priyeṇa yat pretya punassamāgamaḥ || 244 ||
bhedāḥ pṛthakpṛthagamī prathamānurāgamānapravāsakaruṇātmani vipralambhe |
uktā yathāmati mayānyadato 'bhiyuktairyuktyānayaiva hi bahissthitamūhanīyam || 245 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe karuṇarasakaruṇavipralambhanirṇayo nāma
|| dvātriṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 32 ||
uhā pativrataparāyaṇavallabheva yātā tvayaiva vilayaṃ saha bhoja! rājan |
yaḥ kāvyamādriyata yaś‍ca tadantaraṅga— svārasyamāśrayata, so 'tra na kaś‍cidanyaḥ ||
atha
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe trayasriṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ
sambhogaprakāśaḥ
athāto vipralambhāpāditaprakarṣasampadaḥ sambhogasya svarūpamupadekṣyāmaḥ |
(saṅgamapadārthaḥ)
kaḥ punarayaṃ saṅgamo nāma?
nanūktaṃ nāyakayoḥ pragasaṅgatayoḥ saṅgataviyuktayorvā mithassamāgame prāgutpannaḥ tadānīntano vā ratyākhyaḥ sthāyī bhāvaḥ abhilaṣaṇīyāliṅganādīnāmavāp‍tau satyāṃ samupajāyamānaiḥ harṣa—dhṛti—smṛti—matibhiḥ vyabhicāribhāvaiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ, ṛtūdyānopagamanajalakrīḍā—krīḍāparvatopaveśa—prasādhanagrahaṇamadhupānendūdayādibhiruddīpana— vibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ savibhramabhrūkaṭākṣavikṣepālāpasambhramasmitādibhiranubhāvairabhivyajyamānaḥ īpsitamāsādayan jihāsitaṃ jihānaḥ prāp‍taprāpyaprakarṣāvasthaḥ sambhogaśrṛṅgārākhyāṃ labhate |
sa caturdhā—'1. prathamānurāgānantaraḥ, 2. mānānantaraḥ, 3. pravāsānantaraḥ, 4. karuṇānantaraḥ' iti|1
saṃjñā tu naiṣā paribhāṣikyeva prakṛtipratyayopasargavibhāgakalpanāyāmanvarthatvasyāpi vidyamānatvāt| tathāhi—
saṃkṣepa—saṅkara—sampūrṇatva—samyaktvadyotakasamupasargapūrvasya pālanakauṭilyā— bhyavahārānubhavakarmaṇo bhujeḥ bhāve kartaryakartari ca kārake saṃjñāyāṃ sarvakāleṣu ghañi sambhoga' iti rūpaṃ bhavati |
kaḥ punariha prakṛtyarthaḥ, ka upasargārthaḥ, kaḥ pratyayārthaḥ, ko vā pratyayotpattikālaḥ iti?
ucyate—saṃjñāśabdānāṃ yathākathaṃcit vyutpattiriti darśane saṃjñānurodhādeva yo 'rtho yatropapadyate sa tatraiva vyavahriyata iti| tatra—
prakṛtyarthavibhāge catvāro dhātvarthāḥ pālanādayaḥ| yathā—'pṛthivīṃ bhunakti rajā; mūlāni vibhujati rathaḥ; odanaṃ bhu़ṅkte māṇavakaḥ; sukhamupabhuṅkte nāgarikaṃ iti |'
1. dra. prathamānurāgānantaraḥ 34prakāśe; mānānantaraḥ, pravāsānantaraḥ karuṇānantaraś‍ca 35prakāśe|
catvāraścopasargārthāḥ saṃkṣepādayaḥ| yathā— samprīyate kathā gāthakena, saṃsṛjyate sūpo lavaṇena, saṃhriyate yāga upakaraṇaiḥ, samprayujyate dayitaḥ kāntayeti |
pratyayārthavibhāgeṣu punaraṣ‍ṭau pratyayārthāḥ— 'bhāvo, hetuḥ, ṣaṭ ca kārakāṇi'| yathā vilasanaṃ vilāsaḥ, viśataḥ1 prayuṅkta iti veśaḥ, sarati kālāntara iti sāraḥ, prāsyate 'sāviti prāsaḥ, dīryate ebhiriti dārāḥ, dāsantyasmā iti dāsāḥ, upetyādhīyate 'smādityupādhyāyaḥ, prasīdantyasminnayanamanāṃsīti prasādaḥ' ityaṣ‍ṭau ca |
pratyayotpattikālā bhūto, vartamāno, bhaviṣyan| avyakto bhūtaviśeṣo, vartamānaviśeṣo, bhaviṣyad‌viśeṣo, vyaktaviśeṣa iti| yathā pāko 'bhūt, pāko bhavati, pako bhaviṣyati, pāko bhavet, pāko babhūva, pāko na bhavati, pāko bhavitā, pākastatra bhūyāditi |
athaiteṣāṃ mithaḥ samavāyopādānāpekṣitaprathamānurāgādyānantaryastiryagādisādhāraṇaḥ sāmānyenaiva pālanasaṃkṣepādyarthaviṣayaḥ sambhogaśabdartho vivakṣyate| tathā caturṇāmapi bhujyarthānāṃ caturṇāmapi samupasargārthānāṃ caturṣvapi prathamānurāgānantarādiṣu sambhogeṣu, catasṛṣvapi sambhogāvasthāsu, sarvairapi pratyayārthairaviśeṣeṇa sārvakālikaḥ sambandho bhavati| yathā punarapekṣitaprathamānurāgādyānantaryaṃ prakṛṣ‍ṭanāgarakādināyakaviṣayo yathāvasthamavasthāpita— saṃkṣepādikramaḥ krameṇa pālanakauṭilyābhyavahārānubhavaśabdavācyaḥ sambhogaśabdārtho vivakṣyate tathā yathākramaṃ caturṇāmapi bhujyarthānāṃ caturṇāmapi samupasargārthānāṃ, catasṛṣvapi prathamānurāgānantarādiṣu catasṛṣvapi sambandhābhivyaktyanubandhaprakarṣasajñakasambhogāvasthāsu caturṣvapi tadānantaryeṣu yathāyathamupasṛṣ‍ṭaprakṛtyarthaviśiṣ‍ṭaḥ pratyayārtho 'bhiniviśata iti |
tatra prathamapakṣe sāmānye na sambhogārthavivakṣāyāmanavekṣitaprathamānurāgādyānantarya— stiryagādisādhāraṇaḥ pālanakauṭilyābhyavahārānubhavalakṣaṇo bhujyarthaḥ| sopasarga— pratyayārtho 'bhyantarīkṛtabhūtādipratyayotpattikāla upasargārthānupraviṣ‍ṭasambandhādicaturavastha udāhriyate| tadyathā—(kusaṃ. 3.36—39)
madhu dvirephaḥ kusumaikapātre papau priyāṃ tāmanuvartamānaḥ |
śrṛṅgeṇa saṃsparśanimīlitākṣīṃ mṛgīmakaṇḍūyata kṛṣṇasāraḥ || 1 ||
1. viśata iti rāghavo 'pi
dadau saraḥpaṅkajareṇugandhi gajāya gaṇḍūṣajalaṃ kareṇuḥ |
athopabhuktena bisena jāyāṃ sambhāvayāmāsa rathāṅganāmā || 2 ||
gītāntareṣu śramavārileśairīṣatsamucch‌vāsitapatraśobham |
puṣpāsavāghūrṇitanetraśobhi priyāmukhaṃ kimpuruṣaś‍cucumba || 3 ||
samprāp‍tapuṣpastabakastanībhyaḥ sphuratpravāloṣ‍ṭhamanoharābhyaḥ |
latāvadhūbhyastaravo 'pyavāpurvinamraśākhābhujabandhanāni || 4 ||
atra ca priyānuvartanaviṣāṇakaṇḍūyanapānopacchandanasvād‌vāhāradānacumbanacāṭu— pariṣvaṅgaprītidāyī sarīsṛpamṛgapaśupakṣipumābhāsataruvad viśeṣāṇāmaviśeṣeṇa sarvasādhāraṇapremapālanārtho gamyate| ayameva ca prayojyarañjanāya buddhipūrvakaṃ prayujyamānaḥ kauṭilyārtho 'pi prathate| svābhiprāyanivṛ(rvṛ)ttyarthamupakalpyamāno 'bhyavahārārthaḥ sampadyate| premapāravaśyāttu svayamupajāyamāno 'nubhavaśabdavācyo bhavati |
upasargo 'pīha pālanārthamupakalpyamāne saṃkṣepārthamālambate| saṃkṣepeṇa hyetāvāneva premapālanārtho bhavati| prayojyarañjanāya buddhipūrvakaṃ prayujyamāne saṅkarārthaḥ spṛśati| ayaṃ ceha buddhisaṅkaro yat prayojyāḥ kathamanurajyeranniti buddhayaḥ saṅkīryante| svābhiprāyanivṛ(rvṛ)ttyarthaṃ pravartamāne sampūrṇatvamavagāhate| ayaṃ ceha sampūrṇatārtho yadubhayeṣāmapīndriyāṇāmānukūlyeṣu (na) sveṣu sveṣu viṣayeṣu gardhātiśayāt pravṛttiḥ premapāravaśyāt svayamupajāyamāne samyaktvārthamābhiniviśate| idaṃ ca tatpremavṛtteḥ samyaktvaṃ nāma yeyamāliṅganādiṣvanupadeśapūrvikā svābhāvikī strīpuṃsayoranyonya— manukūlābhyupapattiriti |
1. prathamādiślokeṣu ca pālanādiniyamaḥ 'madhu dvirepha' ityādi| idaṃ hi sā premapālanopaniṣat, yad anyonyānupapattyā ekatra pānabhojanamānukūlyataśca paricaryoti| tacca prathamaśloke sahacarīcittānuvṛttyā puṣpaikacaṣake madhu pibanmadhuvrataḥ pratyāyayati| śrṛṅgakoṭikaṇḍūyanajanitasukhanimīlitalocanāṃ ca vāmalocanāmavagamya paricaryāyāma— paryāp‍tatṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇasāro bodhayati |
2. atha dvitīyaśloke kauṭilyaṃ, tadyathā 'dadau saraḥpaṅkaje' tyādi| idaṃ ca tadrateḥ svabhāvakuṭilatvamabhivyaktyavasthāyāmunmiṣati, yadevaṃ nāma premaparīkṣā pravartate yadyahaṃ te
priyā tanmaducchiṣṭaṃ bhuṅkṣva, yadyahaṃ te dayitaḥ tad bhuktaśeṣamupabhuṅkṣveti | tayorekamāraṇyakasyāraṇyānāmaśeṣabhāgeṣu viśeṣasadma padmasaro 'vagāhya viharato hṛdayavallabhasya yūthādhipateranekapasya sarojareṇusamparkīpiñjaraṃ kaṣāyasurabhiśītalaṃ purāṇamaireyānukāri vā gaṇḍūṣamarpayantī vāśitā śikṣayati | dvitīyamapi dramiḍīdantadāritārdrakramukaphalapālikomalaṃ kaṣāyasvāduviśadamindukalākhaṇḍapāṇḍu— ramṛṇālakabalāvaśeṣamātmanaḥ priyatamāyai prayacchan premavakraścakravāko 'dhyāpayati |
3. tṛtīyaśloke abhyavahārārtho yathā—'gītāntareṣu' ityādi | so 'yaṃ raterabhyavahāro nāma yeyamindriyāṇāṃ viṣayeṣu gardhātiśayāt pravṛttiḥ, sā ceha gītadhvanimanohare harṣagadgadālāpe ca śramajalatuṣāraśītalakomalaparipāṇḍugaṇḍamaṇḍalābhoge ca madavaśa— vighūrṇitanayanendīvare samullasatpatravallīviśeṣāharaṇe ca sudhāyamānoṣṭhapallavāsvāde svāditamadhuviśeṣadhurakaṭukaṣāye ca svedapratyārdrīkṛtavicitrapatravarṇakod‌granthau puṣpāsava— surabhivadanagandhavade ca sahacarīmukhendau kimpuruṣeṇābhyanujñāyamānā sarvendriyāhvādamājñāpayantī yathoktamarthaṃ jñāpayati |
4. caturthaśloke 'nubhavārtho yathā — 'samprāp‍tapuṣpe'tyādi | iyameva sā rateranubhavaprakarṣasīmā yadāsāditaprakṛṣṭayauvanā yathoktaguṇavatī yuvatirunmiṣatsāttvika— bhāvā svayaṅgraheṇa dayitamānandayati | tatra ca 'samprāptapuṣpastabakastanībhya' iti padena upāruḍhayauvanatvaṃ lakṣayati | 'sphuratpravāloṣṭhamanoharābhya' ityanena ca sāttvikāvirbhāvamabhidhatte | 'latāvadhūbhya' ityādikaṃ tu yathāvarṇitārthānukūlameveti |
athaiteṣvevopasargārthasaṃkṣepādayaḥ pratipādyante | teṣu —
1. pālanasaṃkṣepo yathā— 'madhu dvirepha' ityādi | idameva ca saṃkṣepeṇa pratipālanam, yadicchānuvṛttyā sahapānamānukūlyena paricaryeti, tacceha pūrvottarārdhayorupalabhyata iti |
pālanasaṅkaro yathā—'dadau saraḥ paṅkaje'tyādi | sa cāyaṃ premapālane kāmavāmatāsaṅkaro, yadanyathā loke prasiddhamanyathā prasādhyate | tadihobhayārdhayoḥ priyatamābhyāmucchiṣṭadānena pratīyata iti |1
pālane samyaktvaṃ yathā—'samprāp‍tapuṣpe' tyādi | idaṃ ca tatpremapālane samyaktvaṃ yo 'yaṃ tyaktalajjāyā iva yoṣitaḥ svayaṃgrāheṇa pāṇigrahopagūhanaprakāreṣvabhiniveśaḥ | sa
1. ataḥ paraṃ 'pālane sampūrṇatvaṃ' nāsti |
ceha latāvadhūnāṃ latoveṣṭitakavṛkṣādhirụ̄dhādyāliṅganaprakāravidhānenānumīyate | tatra ca lateva sālaṃ veṣṭayantī cumbanārthinī yanmukhamavanamayenmandasītkṛtā tamāśritā vā kiñcid rāmaṇīyakaṃ paś‍yet tat latāveṣṭitakam | caraṇena caraṇamākramya dvitīyenorudeśamākrāmayantī veṣṭayantī vā pṛṣṭhasaktaikabāhurdvitīyenāṃsamavanamayantī īṣatpratāśvasitakūjitā cumbanārthamevā— dhirọdhumicchediti vṛkṣādhirūḍham (kāmasū. 2.2)| stanābhyāmuraḥ praviś‍ya tatraiva hāramāveśayediti stanopagūḍham| jaghanena jaghanamavapīḍya prakīryaṃmāṇakusumakeśahastā cumbananakhadaśana— padaprayojanāyopari laṅghayet | tajjaghanopagūhanamiti | cumbanārthitvaṃ ceha sphuratpravāloṣṭhatayānumīyate, stanabhārāropaṇaṃ sujātapuṣpastabakāvanamratvena | prakīryamāṇa— kusumakeśapāśādikaṃ tu latāvadhūnāṃ svarūpameveti |
2. kauṭilye saṃkṣepo yathā—'madhu dvirepha' ityādi | atra cāyaṃ premakuṭilatāsaṃkṣepo lakṣyate | yatra yatra cañcarīkasahacarī madhu pipāsuḥ kusume paribhramati tatra tatrāyamapanudannivaināmanupravartamānaḥ parihāseneva carati | sāraṅgo 'pi manmathārtipravartitā— bhimarśasparśasukhanimīlitākṣīṃ viṣāṇāgreṇa nakhamukheneva vallabhāmullikhan vikatthamānaḥ kāmavāmatāṃ prakaṭayati |
kauṭilye saṅkaro yathā—'dadau saraḥpaṅkaje'tyādi | asyaivārthaḥ pālanasaṅkareṇaiva vyākhyātaḥ | tatra hi pālanaṃ kauṭilyena saṅkīrṇam, iha tu kauṭilyaṃ pālaneneti | etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ | pālayan śuci svādu viśadamaninditaṃ cedabhyavahariṣyāmīti manyamānaḥ priyajanāya prayacchati | kevalaṃ kāmavāmatayā taduccheṣayati | kuṭilastu mā bhūdaśucyasvādupicchilā vanyairapyanurāgaprabhraṃśa iti tadupaskāre viśeṣataḥ prayatamānaḥ tathaivopapādayati |
kauṭilye sampūrṇatvaṃ yathā—'gītāntare'ṣvityādi | atra cāyaṃ kauṭilyasya sampūrṇabhāvaḥ | yadā yadāsau gīteṣu prayogaviśeṣaṃ kartumabhilapati, tadā tadaiṣa tanmukhaṃ cumban amuṣyāḥ premanigh‍no vigh‍namivācarati | sāpyāyāsādiva svinnakapolabhittiḥ, puṣpāsavopayogaghūrṇite krudheva netre ghūrṇayantī viśeṣato 'syāḥ antaḥ pramodamuddīpayati |
kauṭilye samyaktvaṃ yathā—'samprāp‍tapuṣpe'tyādi atra cedaṃ tat kauṭilyasya samyaktvaṃ svayamavagatabhāvasyāpi niṣkāraṇadhairyāvalambinaḥ subhagamānino janasya
priyatamāyāṃ yoṣityupekṣā nāma | sā tviha latāvadhūṣu priyatamasvayaṅgrāhe pallavādharasphuraṇaśākhābhujavinamanonnītabhāvāsvapi tarūṇāṃ matistanvyā tayānumīyate | tadupajñaṃ caiṣa laukikaḥ pravādaḥ, yaduta (gāsa. 4.4)
(jaha jaha vāei pio taha taha ṇaccāmi caṃcale pimme) vallī valei aṃgaṃ ,hāvathaddhe vi rukkhammi |
(yathā yathā vādayati priyastathā tathā nṛtyāmi cañcale premṇi) vallī valayatyaṅgaṃ svabhāvastabdhe 'pi vṛkṣe || 5 ||
3. abhyavahārasaṃkṣepo yathā—'madhu dvirepha' ityādi | kaḥ punarihendriyābhyavahārasya saṃkṣepārthaḥ yeyaṃ sannipatya viṣayagrāhitvena phalāvāp‍tikāriṇo jihvātvagindriya— yorabhīṣṭaviṣayāvāp‍tiḥ | dṛṣṭo ghrātaḥ śruto 'pi vā padārthastāvanna svadate, yāvannāsvāditaḥ spṛṣṭo vā bhavati | svādane 'pyayaṃ viśeṣaḥ | yadidamanaṅgadīpanasya madhunaḥ pānaṃ, tasya cāyaṃ sāro yadabhīṣṭatamayā sahaikapātre bhavati | evaṃ sparśane 'pi etadeva tattvam | yaduta priyāṅgena kenacit saṃspaṃrśaḥ, tasya cāyaṃ viśeṣo yaduttamāṅgena bhavati | tasya caiṣā cūlikā, yadeṣa kaṇḍūyanavyājānnamannivaitāṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ parāmṛśati |
abhyavahārasaṅkaro yathā—'dadau saraḥpaṅkaje'tyādi | atredamevābhyavahārasya saṅkīrṇatvam, yadanyopabhuktamanyenopabhujyate, tacceha pūrvārdhe strīprayuktaṃ vyaktameva pratīyata iti |
abhyavahāre sampūrṇatvaṃ yathā—'gītāntareṣvi'tyādi | atho punariyaṃ sampūrṇatārthaḥ, mukhe hi cumbanamupakalpyamānamoṣṭhayoḥ kapolayornetrayośca sampūrṇaṃ bhavati | tacca yathāyathoktaguṇayuktena mattakinnarīmukhe 'nyāvayaveṣu niravakāśatvāt tatkāminaḥ kimpuruṣasya sampūrṇatvaṃ vigāhate naivamanyatrānyasय़ prāyeṇa, yadāha—(māghaḥ 4.38)
bimboṣṭhaṃ bahu manute turaṅgavaktraś‍cumbantaṃ mukhamiha kinnaraṃ priyāyāḥ |
śliṣyantaṃ muhuritaro 'pi tannijastrīmuttuṅgastanabharabhaṅgabhīrumadhyām || 6 || iti |
abhyavahāre samyaktvaṃ yathā—'samprāp‍tapuṣpe'tyādi | idamihendriyābhyavahārasya samyaktvaṃ nāma yadayācitopanatamiṣṭavastu svecchayopabhujyata iti | tacceha taruṇatarulatāvadhūpariṣvaṅgābhiyogavyatikareṇa sakalamavikalamevopalakṣyata iti |
4. anubhave saṃkṣepo yathā —'madhu dvirepha' ityādi | ayaṃ ca saṃprāpyakāristana— sparśanopakalpito 'nubhavasaṃkṣepe viśeṣaḥ yadanunāthyātmano nāma vallabhaḥ priyatama iva pātre
kausumaṃ madhu pibati, vallabhāpi prārthanācāṭukāreṇa preyasābhyarthyamāneva tatra tatra spṛś‍yamānā sparśasukhāni vedayate, tacceha pūrvottarārdhayoḥ 1parārdhyarūpatayā nirūpyata iti |
anubhave saṅkīrṇatvaṃ yathā—'dadau saraḥpaṅkaje'tyādi | ihābhyavahārasyaiva manasānusandhānamanubhavaḥ tasya cet saṅkīrṇatvaṃ yeyamanyā priyavadhūprayuktopacārānubhavarūpatā priyaprasādīkṛtasyopabhuktahāryasambhāvanānubhavarūpatā ca pūrvottarārdhayorabhivyajyata iti |
anubhave sampūrṇatvaṃ yathā—'gītāntare'ṣvityādi | atra ceyamanubhavasya sampūrṇatā, yadakālapuṣpākarāvatāre puṣpitalatāgṛhopagatayā puṣpāsavopayogamattayā puṣpaśarapāravaś‍yapratītayā svalaṅgakṛtayā ca svādhīnapatikayā kinnarakāminyā evaṃ nāma priyānurāgātiśayo bhūyata iti |
anubhavasya samyaktvaṃ yathā—'saṃprāp‍tapuṣpe'tyādi | atredamanubhavasya samyaktvaṃ, yaduta dayitā nāyakasya ratābhyāsāt pariśramamupalabhya rāgasya cānupaśamamanumatānena sāhāyyaṃ dadyāt, tatra ca prakīryamāṇakeśakusumāśvāsavicchinnahāsinī vaktrasaṃsargārthaṃ stanābhyāmuraḥ praviś‍ya pīḍayantī punaḥ punarnayantī yāśceṣṭāḥ pūrvamasau darśitavāṃstā eva pratikurvīta, pātitā pratipātayāmīti hasantī tarjayantī pratighnantī ca brūyāt, punaśca vrīḍāṃ darśayet, śramaṃ, virāmābhīpsāṃ ceti |' (kā. sū. 2.8) tacceha pūrvamadho bhūtvānantaraparivartinībhiḥ keśāyamānaparimalākṛṣṭāli—paṭalābhiḥ sphuratpravāloṣṭha- darśitoccha‍vasatkusumahāsābhiḥ stabakapayodharabharapraveśapīḍitanamitakāntaśākhā— bhujāntarābhiḥ malayamārutāndolitacālitakomalaviṭapābhistraṃsamānakusumapālita— cālitapatramarmarābhiḥ vātastaimityaniścalāniścalavasantavanalatāvadhūbhiḥ prayujyamānamakāṇḍa eva taruṇaprakāṇḍairamṛtarasavarṣāyamāṇamanubhūyata iti | saiṣā pālanakauṭilyābhya— vahārānubhūtibhiḥ 'darśitā kālidāsena premaprasthānapaddhatiḥ |'
atha dvitīyapakṣe viśeṣeṇa sambhogārthavivakṣāyāmapekṣitaprathamānurāgādyānantaryaḥ prakṛṣṭanāgarikādināyakaviṣayaḥ pālanakauṭilyābhyavahārānubhavalakṣaṇopabhujyarthaḥ sopasargapratyayārtho 'bhyantarīkṛtabhūtādipratyayotpattikālaḥ kālaviśeṣo 'nupraviṣṭacaturavastha udāhniyate |
1. parārthyeti jo. rā.
tatra ca caturdhodāhṛtipravibhāgo bhavati—
1. prakṛtyarthaḥ, prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇaṃ ca,
2. pratyayārthaḥ, pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇaṃ ca,
3. prakṛtipratyayārthaḥ prakṛtipratyayārthaviśeṣaṇaṃ ca,
4. ānantaryārthaḥ, ānantaryārthaviśeṣaṇaṃ ceti | tatra—
prakṛtyarthavibhāge prathamānurāgānantare bhujiḥ pālanārthaḥ | prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇaṃ samupasargaḥ saṃkṣepārthaḥ| tatra hi nāyakābhyāṃ parasparālambanavibhāvebhyaḥ samutpannā ratiḥ saṃkṣip‍taireva śayanopakramādibhirupacāraiḥ vyalīkavipriyādiparihāraiśca pālyate, na tatrāliṅganādīn samuccayena prayuñjīta | na ca prasahya kaścidācaret | 'kusumasadharmāṇo hi yoṣitaḥ sukumāropakramāḥ | tāstvanadhigataviśvāsaiḥ prasabhamupakramyamāṇāḥ satyaḥ samprayogavidveṣiṇyo bhavanti |' (māmā. 7. pṛ.174) taduktam—(kāmasū. 3.2)
sahasā cāpyupakrāntā bālā cittamajānatā |
puruṣadveṣiṇī vā svād viraktā vā tato 'nyagā || 7 ||
na caitāmupekṣeta—(kāmasū. 3.2)
atilajjānvitetyevaṃ yastuṃ kanyāmupekṣate |
so 'nabhiprāyavedīti paśuvat paribhūyate || 8 ||
sarvā eva hi kanyāḥ puruṣeṇa prayujyamānamabhiyogaṃ viṣahante, kintu lajjayā parilaghumiśrāmapi vācaṃ na miśrayanti | kiñca—(śā. 3.19 rū)
apyautsukye mahati dayitaprārthanābhiḥ prayātāḥ kāṅkṣantyo 'pi vyatikarasukhaṃ kātarāḥ svāṅgadāne |
ābadhyante na khalu madanenaiva labdhāspadatvā— dābādhante manasijamapi kṣip‍takālāḥ kumāryaḥ || 9 ||
tatra ca—
harati ruciraṃ gạ̄dhāśleṣe yadaṅgakamākulā sthagayati tathā yat pāṇibhyāṃ mukhaṃ paricumbitam |
yadapi bahuśaḥ pṛṣṭā kiñcid bravītyaparisphuṭaṃ ramayati ratāntenaivāsau mano 'bhinavā vadhūḥ || 10 ||
mānāntare bhujiḥ kauṭilyārthaḥ tadviśeṣakaḥ samupasargaḥ saṅkarārthaḥ | tatra hi praṇipātopasāntvanādihṛdayākarṣaṇaprakārakauśalod‌grathite balavadutkaṇṭhāveśavaśavisūtrite vā mānagranthāvamanthamunmiṣantī tattad‌vāsanāviśeṣaśeṣānuvṛttyupajanitairvyalīkavipriyādi— smaraṇaiḥ sapat‍nīnāmagrahaṇagotraskhalanādibhiśca pratihatā ratiḥ punaḥpunaḥ kuṭilatāmāpadyate | yadāha, 'śvasitakampitapayodharā sakaṣāyaireva vākyairnāyikā nāyakaṃ nistudantī śayanīyaṃ gacchet | tatra cāliṅganādīnāmupālambhādibhiḥ saṅkīrṇaḥ prayogo bhavati |' yathā—
muhuraviśadā vistrambhārdrāḥ muhurmuhurasthirāḥ muhurasaralāḥ premaprahvā muhuḥ smṛtamanyavaḥ |
vitathaśapathopālambhāṅkā muhuḥ kṛtasandhayaḥ parivavṛdhire niṣparyantā mitho mithunoktayaḥ || 11 ||
