yadāpi kāryagauravād vyalīkamapyupalabhya nopālabhate tadāpi suprakāśa— māśayakāluṣyoda‍bhūtanūtanākṛtibhājā savyājākāragūhanopagūhanādayaḥ saṅkīryante | ratiścāntaratiśayena kuṭalībhavati |
kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prakalpitamaśrutam |
asahanasakhīśrotraprāp‍tipramodasasambhramaṃ vivalitadṛśā śūnye gehe samucch‌vasitaṃ tataḥ || 12 || (amaru. 75)
pravāsānantare bhujirabhyavahārārtha upasargaḥ sampūrṇārthaḥ | tatra hi cirakālamanubhogādatyantamupacite premarāśau ca cakṣurādīnāṃ sveṣu sveṣu viṣayeṣu gardhātiśayāt sampūrṇa evābhyavahāro bhavati, samuc‍cayena cāliṅganādayaḥ prayujyante |
vasiṣṭhadhenoranuyāyinaṃ tamāvartamānaṃ vanitā vanāntāt |
papau nimeṣālasapakṣmapaṅktirupoṣitābhyāmiva locanābhyām || 13 || (raghu. 2.19 )
yathā ca—(megha. 109 )
śāpānto me bhujagaśayanādutthite śārṅgapāṇau़ māsānanyān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā |
paścādāvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tamātmābhilāṣaṃ nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇataśarac‍candrikāsu kṣapāsu || 14 ||
karuṇānantaro dhāturanubhavārthaḥ upasargaśca samyaktvārthaḥ | tatra hi taistairvyatīta— saṃvidhānakaviśeṣaissamutpannaparamavistrambhatvānniṣprakampā ratiḥ paraṃ prakarṣamārohantī samyaganubhūyate, yathā—
mṛteti pretya saṅgaṃ tu yathā me maraṇaṃ matam |
saiṣāvantī mayā labdhā kathamatraiva janmani || 15 || (kāvyāda. 2.280)
yathā ca—(nāgā. 2.12)
kaṇṭhe hāralatāyogye yena pāśastavārpitaḥ |
gṛhītaḥ sāparādho 'yaṃ mucyate sa kathaṃ karaḥ || 16 ||
nanu cā 'vasthāvaśādekaikasyāpi prathamānurāgānantarādeḥ sambhogasyāyamarthoṃ bhavati | prathamānantaro hi prathamaṃ ratirutpadyate | utpannā ca nāyakābhyāṃ priyācaraṇavipriyākaraṇābhyāṃ pālyate | tatra ca saṃkṣip‍tānāmevāliṅganādīnāṃ vikalpataḥ prayogo bhavati | tataḥ premagateḥ svabhākuṭilatvād dvitīyavasthāyāṃ ratiḥ kuṭilatāmālambate | saṅkīrṇāścānubhāvā bhavanti | tatrodbhūtāyāṃ kāmavāmatāyāṃ sulabhāmavamanyate durlabhāmākāṅgakṣatīti prāyovādāt paraṃ prakarṣamārohantī ratistṛtīyāvasthāyāmabhyavahriyate samuc‍cayena cāliṅganādayaḥ prayujyante, evaṃ ca sā sampūrṇatvamāsādayati | caturthāvasthāyāṃ tu vistrambhotpatteḥ paraṃ prakarṣamāpannānubhūyata eva | na tatropacāraḥ kaścidapyādriyate | evamasyāḥ samyaktvaṃ bhavati |
evaṃ mānānantarādiṣvapi saṃkṣip‍tā pālyate | saṅkīrṇā kuṭilībhavati | sampūrṇābhyavahriyate; samyagbhūtānubhūyata iti | tataḥ kathamucyate, saṃkṣepapālanānupa— sargadhātuprathamānurāgānantare, saṅkarakauṭilyārthau mānānantare, samyaktvānubhavārthau karuṇānantare iti ?
ucyate | yadyapi saṃkṣepataḥ pālanamanyatrāpi bhavati, tathāpi yayā prathamānurāgānantare mugdhāvadhūvistrambhaṇādau etadupayujyate naivamanyeṣu | yadyapi ca vāritavāmatvāt kāmasya kaiṭilyamanyatrāpi jāyate, tathāpi yathā vyalīkapriyādismaraṇairmānānantare naivamanyeṣu, abhyavahāro 'pi yathāsvamindriyāṇāmubhayeṣāmapi viṣayeṣu gardhātiśayāt pravṛttiḥ, sa yathā parasparamutkaṇṭhitayoḥ pravāsānantare sampūrṇo bhavati naivamanyeṣu | abhyavahārasyaiva tu manasānusandhānamanubhavaḥ, yathā— 'samutpannaparamavistrambhayoḥ karuṇānantare samyagbhavati |' naivamanyeṣvityabhiprāyeṇoktam — yathākramaṃ caturṇāmapi dhātvarthānāṃ caturṇāmapi copasargārthānāṃ caturṣvapi prathamānurāgānantarādiṣu sambhogeṣu sarvairapi pratyayārthaiḥ
sārvakālikaḥ sambandho bhavatīti | kiñca,
bahūnāṃ sambhave 'rthānāṃ sarva evopakāriṇaḥ |
saṃsarge kaścideṣāṃ tu prādhānyena pratīyate || 17 ||
tena prathamānurāgānantarādiṣu dhātupasargārthasamplavastad‌vyavasthāyā na virudhyata iti |
nanu ca bhuja pālanābhyavahārayoḥ, bhuji kauṭilya iti triṣvevārtheṣu bhujiḥ smaryate | sa kathamanubhavārtho 'pi bhavatīti jñāyeta ?
ācāryapravṛttirjñāpayati, yadayaṃ 'bhujo 'navana' (aṣṭā. 1.3.66) ityanavanārthe vṛtterasyātmanepadaṃ nivartyānavanārthavṛtteryathāprāp‍tamubhayapadamevābhyanujānāti | tena manyāmahe, sarveṣvayamavatyartheṣu vartata iti |
ke punaravatyarthāḥ?
yeṣvataṃ gaṇa(dhātu?)kārāḥ paṭhanti, 'ava rakṣaṇagatikāntiprītitṛp‍tyavagamanapraveśa— śravaṇasvāmyarthayācanakriyecchādīp‍tyavāp‍tyāliṅganahiṃsādānabhāgavṛddhiṣu' (1.3.66 asū.) iti, sa evamapi bhujeranubhavārtha iti |
kuta etaducyate ?
ya eva te ṣoḍaśātyartharakṣaṇādayaḥ teṣāṃ catvāraḥ pālanaṃ, catvāraḥ kauṭilyaṃ, catvāro 'bhyavahāraṃ, catvāronubhavamabhiniviśanti | tatra—
rakṣaṇaṃ kriyecchāsvāmyarthaḥ prārthanamiti pālane,
hiṃsādīp‍tinahanaṃ bhāvavṛddha iti kauṭilye,
śravaṇamāliṅganaṃ prītistṛp‍tiriti abhyavahāre,
avagamaḥ praveśo gatiravāp‍ta ityanubhave 'ntaḥ ṣoḍaśāpyavatyarthāścaturṣvapi bhujyartheṣu pālanādiṣu samāviśanti | tathāhi—
labdhaparirakṣaṇaṃ, rakṣitavivardhanaṃ, vivṛddhopayogaḥ, alabdhapratīkṣā ceti pālanāni |
yathā— pṛthivīṃ pālayati, prajāḥ paripālayati, rājyamanupālayati, phalaṃ pratipālayatīti | tāni ca 'rakṣaṇaṃ kriyecchā svāmyarthaḥ prārthanamityeva bhavanti | tathā hi—'labdhā 'vināśārthī rakṣati, rakṣitopacayārthī kartumabhilaṣati, yathāvadupayogārthī svīkaroti, alabdhalābhārthī yācata' iti |
vaiparītyaṃ, vaiyātyaṃ, vaidagdhyaṃ, vaicitryaṃ ceti kauṭilyāni |
yathā— 'kuṭilaṃ daivaṃ, kuṭilā dāsī, kuṭila ālāpaḥ, kuṭilaṃ patramiti | etāni ca hiṃsā, dīp‍tiḥ, nahanaṃ, bhāvavṛddhirityeva bhavanti | tathāhi— 'vaiparītyena hinasti, vaiyānyena dīpyate, vaidagdhyena dahati, vaicitryeṇa bhāvaṃ vardhayatīti |
śraddhānvitayornitāntamāsaktiraparyāp‍tatā kṛtārthatvamityabhyavahārārthāḥ |
yathā— satṛṇamabhyavaharati, prasthamapaharati, sainyānyapaharati | ete ca śravaṇamāliṅganaṃ prītistṛp‍tirityeva bhavanti | tathā hi— 'śraddhālu śrṛṇoti, āsaktimānāliṅgati, aparyāp‍taḥ prīyate, kṛtārthastṛpyatīti |
samyagjñānaṃ, kriyādhyavasāyaḥ, kāryānuṣṭhānaṃ; phalādhigamaścetyanubhāvāḥ |
yathā— priyamanubhavati, priyārthamanubhavati, premānubhavati, premārthamanubhavatīti | ete cāvagamapraveśagatyavyāp‍taya eva bhavanti | tathā hi— 'samyagjijñāsuravagacchati, adhyavasāyārthī praviśati, anutiṣṭhāsuḥ kramate, phalādhigamārthī tamavāp‍notīti |
caturṣu vā rakṣaṇādiṣu avatyartheṣu krameṇa vartamānāḥ pālanādayo vartante |
nanu rakṣaṇaṃ tāvatpālanameva 'rakṣa pālana' iti vacanāt | kriyecchā kauṭilyaṃ kuṭilaṃ hi kṛtamidaṃ . . . te yathā— kṛtī kṛtahastaḥ kṛtāstraḥ kṛtānnamiti | svāmyartho 'bhyavahāraḥ yato yaddadāti tadevāsya svamiṣyate | yācitamanubhavaḥ yācitaṃ hyanu paścādbhavatīti prathamā āvṛttiḥ |
evaṃ hiṃsā pālanaṃ, dīp‍tiḥ, kauṭilyaṃ, dahanamabhyavahāraḥ, bhāvavṛddhiranubhava iti |
kathaṃ hiṃsā pālanam ?
vāmatvātkāmasya, kalaharūpaṃ suratamācakṣate |
kathaṃ dīp‍tiḥ kauṭilyam ? kuṭilo loke dīp‍ta ityucyate, ṛtuḥ praśānta iti | kathaṃ dahanamabhyavahāraḥ ?
dahan loke 'bhyavaharatītyucyate, yathā 'jagajjighatsantamivāntavahni'—miti (māgha.) |
kathaṃ vā vṛddhiranubhavaḥ? sākṣādanubhūyamānatvāditi dvitīyā āvṛttiḥ |
eva śravaṇaṃ pālanamāliṅganaṃ ke . . prītirabhyavahārastṛp‍tiranubhava iti | pālayitā hi śuśrūṣate, kuṭila āsaṅgaṃ karoti | abhyavajihīrṣuḥ prīyate, anububhūṣustṛpyatīti tṛtīyā āvṛttiḥ |
evamavagamaḥ pālanaṃ, praveśaḥ, kauṭilyaṃ, gatirabhyavahāra iti | yato 'vagacchet pālayati, praveśakāmo kubjībhavati, antarākrāmannabhyavaharatīti, avāp‍nuvannanubhavatīti caturthyāvṛttiḥ | yathā— caitadrakṣaṇādayaḥ pālanādīnāṃ viśeṣāstathā rakṣaṇādīnāmapi nirodhādayaḥ sambhavanti | yathāg‍nermāṇavakaṃ rakṣatīti saṃkṣepasaṅkarādayaścopasargārthāḥ sarveṣvapi pratyekamavagantavyā iti | evaṃ ca pālanādivadanubhavārtho 'pi bhujeḥ siddho bhavati |
bahvarthā api ca dhātavo bhavanti | tadyathā—
dhṛ anavasthāne dṛṣṭaḥ, avasthāne 'pi dṛṣṭa . . . . . . . . 1 'dhriyate yāvadeko 'pi ripustāvatkutaḥ sukhami'ti (māghe. 2.35)|
'yu' miśraṇe dṛṣṭaḥ, amiśraṇe 'pi dṛś‍yate | ayutasiddhānāmādhāryādhārabhūtānāṃ yaḥ sambandha iha pratyayahetuḥ sa samavāya iti |
jṝṣ vayohānau dṛṣṭaḥ, stutāvapi dṛś‍yate, 'mūlājaritre rudrastavāna' iti |
vapiḥ karaṇe dṛṣṭaḥ, chedane 'pi dṛś‍yate | 'anyante 'sminnivapantu senā' iti |
īḍa stutau dṛṣṭaḥ, preraṇe 'pi dṛś‍yate | 'vāyurvā iti varṣamīḍa' iti |
karotibhūtaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭaḥ | tato 'nyatrāpi dṛś‍yate | 'ghaṭe kuru kaṭe kuru aś‍mānamitaḥ
kuru pādau kuru pṛṣṭhaṃ kuru mā kuru udaraṃ s‍neho hīyata' iti | evaṃ bhujiranubhavārtho 'pi bhaviṣyati |
ko vā na dhāturanubhavārthaḥ, yato vrajati pacatyāste śeta ityapyukta— vrajyādayo 'nubhūyanta iti pratīyante |
kathaṃ bhujiravatyartha ityeva noktam, yathoktaḥ parasmaipadātmanepadaviprabhāgo yathā syāt, avanātiriktāścārthā yathā pratīyeran |
ke punaste ? pālanaṃ yataḥ pāterṇici lugāgame ca pālanamiti bhavati | avanamityavateḥ aṇyantasya |
kathaṃ tarhi 'traiḍ pālane' 'rakṣa pālane' iti ?
k‍vacidayaṃ vivakṣitaṇyartho 'niyacchati, niyamayatī'tivat kartṛvyāpāramātraṃ bhūte | tatra hetuvyāpāravivakṣāyāṃ bhujiḥ pālanārtho bhavati | rakṣaṇādyavasthāviśeṣeṇa kartṛvyāpāravivakṣāyāmapi pālanārtha eva | yadā tu rakṣaṇakriyecchā svāmyarthaḥ prārthaneṣu rakṣaṇādiviśeṣeṇa vartate, tadā kartṛvyāpāramātravivakṣāyāmavanārtho bhavati |
evaṃ mūrtimatāṃ diṅ‌nimittakaḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ kauṭilyaṃ, tadupacārādamūrteṣvapi vyavahriyate | tatra yathobhayarūpe bhujirvartate tadā kauṭilyārthaḥ | yadāpi hiṃsādiṣvapi viśeṣeṇa tadāpi kauṭilyārtha eva | yadā tu hiṃsādīp‍tidahanabhāvavṛddhiṣu tad‌viśeṣeṣu pātyapaharaṇātiprarocanādiṣu viśeṣeṇa vartate, tadā avanārtho bhavati | mukhena khādyādeḥ koṣṭhāntaḥpraveśanamabhyavahāraḥ | sa upacārāc‍cakṣurādīnāṃ rūpādigrahaṇe 'pi vartate | tatra yatra bhujeraśitakhāditeṣu vṛttistadāyamaṃbhyavahārārtho bhavati | indriyārthasannikarṣotpannasya jñānasukhaduḥkhādeḥ saṃvittiranubhavaḥ | sa upacārādarthajñānādapi vyapadiś‍yate | tatra yadobhayarūpe 'pi bhujervṛttistadāyamanubhavārtho bhavati | yadāpyavagamādiṣvaviśeṣeṇa vartate tadāpyanubhavārtha eva | yadā tvavagamapraveśagatyavāp‍tiṣu tad‌viśeṣeṣu vāpi parāmarśādiṣu viśeṣeṇāsya pravṛttistadāvanārtho bhavati |
kathaṃ tarhi bhujiḥ pālanakauṭilyābhyavahārānubhaveṣviti paṭhyate ?
bhujyarthasya tantrāvāpaḥ patravibhāgo na syāt | dvividhaṃ hi sambhogaśāstraṃ tantramāvāpaśca | tantryante janyante ratiprītiviśeṣā yena tat tantramabhyavahāraḥ | āsamantādavāpyante labhyante ratiprītiprakarṣahetava āliṅganādayo yena sa āvāpaḥ | pālanamanubhavakauṭilye | (te) tvaniṣpāditatvādetayorevānupraviśataḥ | abhyavaharato hyavaś‍yamanubhavo bhavati | pālyamānasya tu kauṭilyaṃ yadā anubhavo 'pyabhyavahāra eva | yadāhārābhyavahārasyaiva manasānusandhānamanubhavaḥ |
kathaṃ tarhyasau phalabhūto ratiprītiviśeṣāṇāmutpattiheturbhavati ?
labdhāsvādasya prītihetāvanenaiva pravartyamānatvāt | pāramparyeṇāpi ca kāraṇaṃ kāraṇameva | uktaṃ ca—(vāyupurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe 31.94)
na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānāmupabhogena śāmyati |
haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva bhūya evābhivardhate || 18 ||
evaṃ kauṭilyamapi pālanameva |
kathaṃ punaḥ kauṭilyaṃ pālanaṃ bhavati ?
yato vaiparītyaṃ, vaipātyaṃ, vaidagdhyaṃ, vaicitryaṃ ceti kauṭilyāni | tatra—
vāmaśīlatvāt kāmasya vaiparītyenaiva vardhate | tathā hi—'sulabhāmavamanyate durlabhāmākāṅkṣati' (kāmasū. 5.1) iti prāyovādaḥ | kalaharūpaṃ ca suratamācakṣate |
vaiyātyamapi vardhayatyeva | yadāha—(māgha. 2.44)
anyadā bhūṣaṇaṃ puṃsāṃ śamo lajjeva yoṣitām |
parākramaḥ paribhave vaiyātyaṃ surateṣviva || 19 ||
vaidagdhyāttu rāgavṛddherhetureva, yadāha—'vaicakṣaṇyayuktaśca gaṇikāstatkāminaśca parasparasya prārthanīyā bhavanti | tena vaicitryamapi vyākhyātam | āha ca—bhavati hi rāge 'pi vaicitryāpekṣā, vaicitryeṇa ca parasparasya rāgo janayitavyaḥ | . . . anyeṣvapi dhanurvedādiṣu vaicitryamapekṣate, kiṃ punarihe'ti (kāmasū.) | tadevaṃ 'bhuja pālanābhyavahārayoḥ ॰ ॰ ॰ anenaiva siddhe bhujeḥ kauṭilya ityapi vikaraṇānubandhopagrahādiprayojanārthameveti pratipattavyam |
kiṃ punaramīṣu sarveṣvapyartheṣu bhujeḥ prayogo dṛś‍yate ? bāḍham, tatra— hetuvyāpārapālane bhujiryathā—
śatruṣaḍvargamutsṛjya jāmadagnyo jitendriyaḥ |
ambarīṣaśca nābhāgo bubhujāte ciraṃ mahīm || 20 ||
rakṣaṇādyaviśeṣeṇe kartṛvyāpāro yathā—(raghu. 18.4)
pautraḥ kuśasyāpi kuśeśayākṣaḥ sasāgarāṃ sāgaradhīracittaḥ |
ekātapatrāṃ bhuvamekavīraḥ purārgalādīrghabhujo bubhoja || 21 ||
avanaviśeṣeṣu rakṣaṇaṃ yathā—(śāku. 2.16)
naitac‍citraṃ yadayamudadhiś‍yāmasīmāṃ dharitrī— mekaḥ kṛts‍nāṃ nagaraparighaprāṃśubāhurbhunakti |
āśaṃsante surayuvatayaḥ saktavairā hi daityai— rasyādhijye dhanuṣi vijayaṃ pauruhūte ca vajre || 22 ||
kriyecchāyāṃ yathā—(śāku. 5.19)
idamupanatamevaṃ rūpamakliṣṭakānti prathamaparigṛhītaṃ syānnavetyavyavasyan |
bhramara iva vibhāte kundamantastuṣāraṃ— na ca khalu paribhoktuṃ naiva śak‍nomi hātum || 23 ||
svāmyarthe yathā—
vipulamatibhiḥ kairapyetajjagajjanitaṃ purā vidhṛtamaparairdattaṃ cānyairvijitya tṛṇaṃ yathā |
iha hi bhuvanānyanye dhīrāścaturdaśa bhuñjate katipayapurasvāmye puṃsāṃ ka eṣa madajvaraḥ || 24 ||
yācane yathā—(raghu. 19.3)
labdhapālanavidhau na tatsutaḥ khedamāpa guruṇā hi medinī |
bhoktumeva bhujanirjitaśriyā na prasādhayitumasya kalpitā || 25 ||
kauṭilye yathā—(saka. 1.75)
asminnīṣad‌valitaviṣamastokavicchinnabhug‍naḥ kiñcillīnopacitavinataḥ puñjitaścotthitaśca |
dhūmodgārastaruṇamahiṣaskandhanīlo davāg‍neḥ svairaṃ sarpan sṛjati gagane gatvarān patrabhaṅgān || 26 ||
hiṃsādyaviśeṣe yathā—
śliṣṭacandanaviśeṣakabhaktirbhraṣṭabhūṣaṇakadarthitamālyaḥ |
sāparādha iva muṇḍanamāsīdātmanaiva sṛdṛśāmupabhogaḥ || 27 ||
avanārtheṣu hiṃsāyāṃ yathā—(raghu. 19.21)
prātaretya paribhogaśobhinā darśanena kṛtakhaṇḍanavyathaḥ |
prāñjaliḥ praṇayinīṃ prasādayan so 'dhunod grahaṇamantharaḥ punaḥ || 28 ||
dīp‍tau yathā—(raghu. 19.30)
prekṣya darpaṇatalasthamātmano rājaveṣamatiśakraśobhinam |
vipriyeṇa/pipriye na sa tathā yathā yuvā vyaktalakṣma paribhogamaṇḍanam || 29 ||
dahane yathā—
ābaddhavraṇamindubimbaviśade rādhākapolodare daṃśaḥ kṛṣṇamahābhujaṅgajanito dīrghāṃ mudaṃ vaḥ kriyāt |
yaṃ dṛṣṭa‍vaiva visūtrasandhibhirabhiglanaiḥ kṣaṇādaṅgakai— rāmuhyan viṣavaiśasīva dadṛśe sarvo 'pi gopījanaḥ || 30 ||
bhāvavṛddhau yathā—
mugdhe 'smin pariṇāhini stanayuge muktākalāpo vaśāṃ/avaśo diṣṭyā na smarati sma janmavasatiṃ kumbhasthalī—lālanaḥ |
itthaṃ kelibhujaṅganarmavacasā sācismitajyots‍nayā savrīḍaṃ mukhamāvṛṇoti sutanuścīnāṃśukasvacchayā || 31 ||
abhyavahāre yathā—
kiṃ maurkhyamaśreyasi kāryabuddhirjñānasya kiṃ lakṣaṇamapramādaḥ |
ko 'tyantabandhuḥ puruṣasya bandhuḥ kiṃ svādu bhuṅkte saha yat suhṛdbhiḥ || 32 ||
śravaṇādyaviśeṣe yathā—(śāku. 2.11)
anaghrātaṃ puṣpaṃ kisalayamalūnaṃ kararuhai— ranāviddhaṃ rat‍naṃ madhu navamanāsvāditarasam |
akhaṇḍaṃ puṇyānāṃ phalamiva ca tadrūpamanaghaṃ na jāne bhoktāraṃ kamiha samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ || 33 ||
avanārtheṣu śravaṇo yathā—
vīṇayā na ninadena ca veṇoḥ kekayā ca kalakaṇṭhagirā ca |
sītkutaiśca bhaṇitaiśca vadhūnāṃ bhuñjate śrutisukhāni yuvānaḥ || 34 ||
āliṅgane yathā—
tattasya reje 'rigadāsahiṣṇu vakṣaḥ priyāratyupabhogasākṣi |
śilātalaṃ śrīmadiva dvipendradattābhighātollikhitaṃ mahāndreḥ || 35 ||
prītau yathā—
digdantinaḥ śailataṭāyateṣu yeṣāṃ priyāliṅganalāliteṣu |
yuddhāpadeśena bhavanti vakṣasvavāp‍tavaprapraṇayopabhogāḥ || 36 ||
tṛp‍tau yathā—
jayati yadupateranekakāntāstanaparibhogarasajñakaṇṭhamālam |
muranarakagadābhighātabandhu pravisṛtakaustubharaśmiśobhi vakṣaḥ || 37 ||
anubhave yathā—
guṇeṣu rāgo vyasaneṣvanādaro, ratiḥ sunīteṣu ca yasya bhūpateḥ |
ciraṃ sa bhuṅkte calacāmarāṃśukāṃ sitātapatrābharaṇāṃ nṛpaśriyam || 38 ||
avagamādyaviśeṣe yathā—
anyāṃ yuvatimagatvā subhaga! na vijñāyate viśeṣo 'syāḥ |
yena na bhuktaṃ nimbaṃ drākṣāguṇavit kathaṃ sa syāt || 39 ||
avanārtheṣvavagame yathā—(raghu. 6.34)
asau mahākālaniketanasya vasannadūre kila candramauleḥ |
divāpi jālāntaracandrikāṇāṃ nārīsakhaḥ sparśasukhāni bhuṅkte1 || 40 ||
praveśe yathā—(raghu. 18.18)
tamātmasampannamaninditātmā kṛtvā yuvānaṃ yuvarājameva |
sukhāni so 'bhuṅkta sukhoparodhi vārtaṃ hi rājñāmavaruddhavṛttam || 41 ||
gatau yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.5)
aṅkād yayāvaṅkamudīritāśīssā maṇḍanānmaṇḍanamanvabhuṅkta |
sambandhabhinno 'pi gireḥ kulasya s‍nehastadekāyatanaṃ jagāma || 42 ||
aprāp‍tau yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.43)
candraṃ gatā padmaguṇānna bhuṅkte padmāśritā cāndramasīmabhikhyām |
umāmukhaṃ tu pratipadya lolā dvisaṃśrayā prītimavāpa lakṣmīḥ || 43 ||
evaṃ pālanādiviśeṣeṣvapi | tatra—
hetupālanaviśeṣopekṣaṇaṃ yathā—(raghu. 12.18)
sa visṛṣṭastathetyuktvā bhrātā(trā) naivāviśat puram |
nandigrāmagatastasya rājyaṃ nyāsamivābhunak || 44 ||
rakṣaṇādyaviśeṣaviśeṣe karagrahaṇaṃ yathā—(raghu. 4.7)
manuprabhṛtibhirmānyaiktārbhuktā yadyapi rājabhiḥ |
tathāpyananyapūrveva tasminnāsīd vasundharā || 45 ||
rakṣaṇaviśeṣe nirodho yathā—
akālasandhyāparibhogapāṇḍuraḥ kṣapākṣayakṣāmakapolacandramāḥ |
ratotsavāyāsaviśeṣaśobhino vadhūmukhasyānucakāra vibhramam || 46 ||
kriyecchāviśeṣe 'dhyāsanaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.20)
asūta sā nāgavadhūpabhogyaṃ mainākamambhonidhibaddhasarakhyam |
kruddhe 'pi pakṣacchidi gotraśatrāvavedanājñaṃ kuliśakṣatānām || 47 ||
1. prasiddhastu pāṭhaḥ 'tamisrapakṣe 'pi saha priyābhirjyots‍nāvato nirviśati pradoṣān' iti | uparyuktastu pāṭhaḥ kālidāsagranthāvalī (1986) pādaṭippaṇe | 'sakhaḥ—khāni' = 'sukhasparśanakhāni' —jo.rā.
svāmyarthaviśeṣe dāsyaṃ yathā—(raghu. 6.53)
athāṅgadāśliṣṭabhujaṃ bhujiṣyā hemāṅgadaṃ nāma kaliṅganātham |
āseduṣīṃ sā jitaśatrupakṣaṃ bālāmabālendumukhī babhāṣe || 48 ||
yācanaviśeṣe 'bhilakṣaṇaṃ yathā—(raghu. 18.19)
taṃ rāgabandheṣvavitṛṣṇameva bhogeṣu saubhāgyaviśeṣabhogyam |
vilāsinīnāmaratikṣamāpi jarā vṛthāmatsariṇī jahāra || 49 ||
prakaṭakauṭilyaviśeṣe valanaṃ yathā—(vikra. 4.31)
asyāntikamupayāntī śiśunā stanapāyinā mṛgī ruddhā |
tāmayamananyadṛṣṭirbhug‍nagrīvo vilokayati || 50 ||1
gauṇakauṭilyaviśeṣe viśvasanaṃ yathā—(saka. 5.499)
pad‌bhyāmūruyugaṃ vibhajya bhujayormadhyaṃ nipīḍyorasā pārśvavabhyadhikaṃ vidārya nakharairdantairvilūyādharam |
sup‍tānapyavabodhya yuṣmadahitā bhūyo 'pi bhuṅkte vane kiṃ kāntā surataiṣiṇī, na hi na hi vyāghrī karālānanā || 51 ||
hiṃsāviśeṣe vaiparītyaṃ yathā—
daśanapadamatisphuṭaṃ vibhāti sphurati tanuḥ śramavārisiktamāsyam |
avitathamabhidhatsva kāmini! tvāṃ kuṭilagatirnanu daṣṭavān bhujaṅgaḥ || 52 ||
dīp‍tiviśeṣe vaiyātyaṃ yathā—
mahābhujaṅgaścaivaiṣa śeṣādibhyo viśiṣyate |
paś‍yatyanyān daśatyanyānanyān jīvād vimuñcati || 53 ||
dahanaviśeṣe vaidagdhyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.12)
nīlakaṇṭhaparibhuktayauvanāṃ tāṃ vilokya jananī samāśvasīt |
bhartṛvallabhatayā hi mānasīṃ māturasyati śucaṃ vadhūjanaḥ || 54 ||
bhāvavṛttiviśeṣe vaicitryaṃ yathā—(māgha. 11.5)
vipulataranitambābhogaruddhe ramaṇyāḥ śayitumanadhigacchan jīviteśo 'vakāśam |
ratiparicayanaś‍yannaidratantra/ndraḥ kathacid gamayati śayanīye śarvarī kiṃ karotu || 55 ||
1. atra rāghavaḥ 'ākaro mṛgyaḥ' iti |
abhyavahāraviśeṣe phalavaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ yathā—(māgha. 2.59)
vijayastvayi senāyāḥ sākṣībhūte ca diś‍yatām |
phalabhāji samakṣokte/samīkṣyok‍te buddherbhoga ivātmani || 56 ||
gauṇo 'bhyavahāraviśeṣe nidhuvanaṃ yathā—(raghu. 19.16)
tasya sāvaraṇadṛṣṭasandhayaḥ kāmyavastuṣu naveṣu saṅginaḥ |
vallabhābhirupasṛtya cakrire sāmimuktaviṣayāḥ samāgamāḥ || 57 ||
śravaṇaviṣaye ghrāṇadarśanaṃ yathā—(māgha. 11.27)
muditayuvamanaskāstulyameva pradoṣe mudamadadhuraharyaḥ/ dhurubhayyaḥ kalpitā bhūṣitāśca |
parimalarucirābhirnyakkṛtāstu prabhāte yuvatibhirupabhogānnīrucaḥ puṣpamālāḥ || 58 ||
āliṅganaviśeṣe cumbanaṃ yathā—
tāmbūlabahalaraktaḥ priyabhukto dhūsaraḥ saparyantaḥ |
bālādharo 'dhirohati kusumarucaṃ kāñcanārasya || 59 ||
prītiviśeṣe prakārābhilaṣaṇaṃ yathā—
jananayanamadhuvratopabhogyā bhavatu vilāsini! te mukhāmbulakṣmīḥ (jaśrīḥ) |
idamiha dayitadvijadvayāhaṃ daśanarucādharapallavaṃ pidhehi || 60 ||
prītiviśeṣe sarvendriyāpyāyanaṃ yathā—
kāntājanaṃ suratakhedanimīlitākṣaṃ saṃvāhituṃ samupayāniva mandamandam |
harmyeṣu mālyamadirāparibhogagandhānāviścakāra rajanīparivṛttivāyuḥ || 61 ||
anubhavaviśeṣe dṛṣṭiviṣayajñānaṃ yathā—(raghu. 6.27)
jagāda caināmayamaṅganāthaḥ surāṅganāprārthitayauvanaśrīḥ |
vinītanāgaḥ kila sūtrakārairaindraṃ padaṃ bhūmigato niyuṅkte || 62 ||
gauṇānubhavaviśeṣe pramāṇāntaragrahaṇaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.11)
darpaṇe ca paribhogadarśinī pṛṣṭhataḥ praṇayino nipeduṣaḥ |
vīkṣya bimbamanubimbamātmanaḥ kāni kāni na cakāra lajjayā || 63 ||
avagamaviśeṣe 'pi parāmarśo yathā—(jāha. 16.42)
madhukusumavilepanādibhāgagrahaṇanidarśitasauhṛdasya vṛttyā |
ayamapi sakhi kiṃ svayaṃ vṛtaste priyaparibhogasukhasya saṃvibhāgaḥ || 64 ||
praveśaviśeṣe dharṣaṇaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 8.57)
saṅkrāntacandanarasāhitavarṇabhedaṃ vicchinnabhūṣaṇamaṇiprakarāṃśucitram |
baddhormi nākavanitāparibhuktamuktaṃ sindhorbabhāra salilaṃ śayanīyalakṣmīm || 65 ||
gativiśeṣe niṣevaṇaṃ yathā—(megha. 19)
sthitvā tasmin vanacaravadhūbhuktakuñje muhurtaṃ toyotsargād drutataragatistatparaṃ vartma tīrṇaḥ |
revāṃ drakṣyasyupalaviṣame vindhyapāde viśīrṇāṃ bhakticchedairiva viracitāṃ bhūtimaṅge gajasya || 66 ||
avāp‍tiviśeṣe phalādhigamo yathā—(kirātā. 7.27)
sāmodāḥ kusumataruśriyo viviktā sampattiḥ kisalayaśālinī—latānām |
sāphalyaṃ yayuramarāṅgnopabhuktāḥ sā lakṣmīrupakurute yayā pareṣām || 67 ||
(upasargārthaviśiṣṭaḥ prakṛtyarthaḥ)
athehopasargārthāḥ saṃkṣepādaya udāhriyante | teṣu—
1. pālanasaṃkṣepo yathā—
anirdayopabhogyasya rūpasya mṛdunaḥ katham |
dāruṇaṃ sakhi! te cetaḥ śirīṣasyeva bandhanam || 68 ||
pālanasaṅkaro yathā—(raghu. 15.1)
kṛtasītāparityāgaḥ sa rat‍nākaramekhalām |
bubhuje pṛthivīpālaḥ pṛthivīmeva kevalām || 69 ||
pālane sampūrṇatvaṃ yathā—(urāca. 2.1)
yathecchābhogyaṃ vo vanamidamayaṃ me sudivasaḥ satāṃ sadbhiḥ saṅgaḥ kathamapi hi puṇyena bhavati |
tarucchāyā toyaṃ yadapi tapasāṃ yogyamaśanaṃ phalaṃ vā mūlaṃ vā tadapi na parādhīnamiha vaḥ || 70 ||
pālane samyaktvaṃ yathā—(raghu. 14.24)
sa paurakāryāṇi vicintya kāle reme videhādhipaterduhitrā |
upasthitaḥ cāru vapustadīyaṃ kṛtopabhogotsukayeva lakṣmyā || 71 ||
2. kauṭilyasaṃkṣepo yathā—(sūmu. 240)
lolāṃ dṛṣṭimitastato 'pi bhajate sabhrūlatāvibhramā— mābhug‍nena viceṣṭate valimatā madhyena kampastanī |
hastāgraṃ vidhunoti pallavanibhaṃ kiṅkārabhinnādharā jāteyaṃ bhramarābhilaṅghanabhayād vādyaṃ vinā nartakī || 72 ||
kauṭilyasaṅkīrṇatvaṃ yathā—
ātaṅkaśramasādhvasavyatikarotkampaḥ kathaṃ sahyatā— maṅgairmugdhamadhūkapuṣparucibhirlāvaṇyasārairayam |
unnaddhastanakumbhakuḍ‍malagurugrāsāvabhug‍nasya te madhyasya trivalītaraṅgakajuṣo bhaṅgaḥ priye mā ca bhūt || 73 ||
kauṭilye sampūrṇatvaṃ yathā—(māgha. 10.57)
kāmināmasakalāni vibhug‍naiḥ svedavārimṛdubhiḥ karajāgraiḥ |
akriyanta kaṭhineṣu kathañcit kāminīkucataṭeṣu padāni || 74 ||
kauṭilye samyakatvaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.49)
nirvibhujya daśanacchadaṃ tato vāci bharturavadhīratāparā |
śailarājatanayā samīpagāmālalāpa vijayāmahetukam || 75 ||
3. abhyavahāre saṃkṣepo yathā—(kirātā. 10.22)
vyathitamapi bhṛśaṃ mano harantī pariṇatajamburasopabhogahṛṣṭā |
parabhṛtayuvatiḥ svanaṃ vicakre navanavayojitakaṇṭharāgaramyam || 76 ||
abhyavahāre saṅkaro yathā—(māgha. 5.28)
sas‍nuḥ payaḥ papuranenijurambarāṇi jakṣurbisaṃ dhṛtavikāsivisaprasūnāḥ |
sainyā śriyāmanupabhoganirarthakatvadoṣapravādamamṛjan vananim‍nagānām || 77 ||
abhyavahāre sampūrṇatvaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.64)
paś‍ya pārvati! navenduraś‍mibhiḥ sāmibhinnatimiraṃ nabhassthalam |
lakṣyate dviradabhogadūṣitaṃ samprasannamiva mānasaṃ saraḥ || 78 ||
abhyavahāre samyaktvaṃ yathā—
śirasi dviṣatāṃ niveś‍ya pādaṃ yadanāyāsitakārmukaṃ narendraḥ |
idamekapadena bhujyate śrīratidāridrayamidaṃ tadāśritānām || 79 ||
4. anubhave saṃkṣepo yathā—(māgha. 2.85)
mṛdu vyavahitaṃ tejo bhoktumarthān prakalpate |
pradīpaḥ s‍nehamādatte daśayābhyantarasthayā || 80 ||
anubhave saṅkīrṇatvaṃ yathā—(māgha. 5.39)
saṃsarpibhiḥ payasi gairikareṇujālairambhojareṇu rajasāṅganiṣaṅgiṇā ca |
kāmopabhogamanubhūya sarinmahebhāvanyonyavastuparivartamiva vyadhatta || 81 ||
anubhave sampūrṇatvaṃ yathā—(raghu. 19.28)
darpaṇeṣu paribhogadarśinīṃ narmapūrvamanupṛṣṭhasaṃśrayaḥ |
chāyayā smitamanojñayā vadhūṃ hrinimīlitamukhīṃ cakāra saḥ || 82 ||
anubhave samyaktvaṃ yathā—(raghu. 19.39)
kārtike/kīṣu savitānaharmyabhāg yāminīṣu lalitāṅganāsakhaḥ |
anvabhuṅkta surataśramāpahā meghamuktaviśadāśca candrikāḥ || 83 ||
sākṣādupasargayoge saṃkṣepārtho yathā—
śirasyaho jāmbavatīkaragrahaḥ prakārasambhogasukhāmṛtadrave |
mayā visṛṣṭānubhavatvavāritā vidhūnanādurlalitotsavaṅgamāḥ || 84 ||
saṅkarārtho yathā—(kirātā. 7.26)
saṃkṣobhakṣamagahanāmathopagaṅgaṃ vibhrāṇāṃ jvalitamaṇīni saikatāni |
adhyūṣuś‍cyutakusumācitāṃ sahāyāḥ vṛtrāreraviralaśāda‍valāṃ dharitrīm || 85 ||
sampūrṇatārtho yathā—(megha. 95)
vāmaścāsyāḥ kararuhapadairmucyamāno madīyaiḥ krīḍāyogaściraparicitaṃ tyājito daivagatyā |
sambhogānte mama samucito hastasaṃvāhanānāṃ yāsyatyūruḥ sarasakadalīstambhagauraścalatvam || 86 ||
samyaktvārtho yathā—(kirātā. 9.78)
gatavati nakharekhālakṣyamātaṅgarāge samadadayitapītātāmrabimbādharoṣṭhyāḥ |
virahavidhuramiṣṭā satsakhīvāṅganāyā hṛdayamavalalambe rātrisambhogalakṣmīḥ || 87 ||
adhikārārthayogo sambandhārtho yathā—
akāryoccāraṇe mūkāḥ paiśunyaparipanthini |
vinivṛttānṛtapremāṃ satyasambhogalālitām || 88 ||
saṅgatārtho yathā—
kimavyāp‍taṃ lakṣmyā kimaśuci kimāścaryarahitaṃ kimasvacchaṃ vābdheḥ kimatha na hitaṃ vāsya jagataḥ |
aho naṣ‍ṭaupamyā guṇakusumasambhogasubhagā bhramatyanyā siddhā divi bhuvi ca kīrtirjalanidheḥ || 89 ||
maryodārtho yathā—
revatīstanasambhogalālite yasya vakṣasi |
muk‍tāmālāpadeśena devyā sthānamathāśritā || 90 ||
abhividhyartho yathā—
bhujamudyamya dṛp‍tārivadhavidyāsu paṇḍitam |
kāntākacagrahāmandaprītisambhogalālitam || 91 || iti|
evaṃ rakṣaṇanirodhādiṣu pālanāni copasargārtho yathālakṣaṇamudāhartavya iti| so 'yamupasargārthaviśiṣ‍ṭaḥ prakṛtyartha uktaḥ |
(upasargārthaviśiṣ‍ṭaḥ pratyayārthaḥ)
athopasargārthaviśiṣ‍ṭa eva pratyayārtha ucyate |
(nāyakabhedāḥ —16)
tatra saṃkṣepādyarthabhedataḥ kaniṣ‍ṭhādayo nāyakabhedā bhavanti| tatra—
saṃkṣepataḥ kaniṣ‍ṭhastāmasaḥ śaṭho dhīrapraśānta iti| teṣu—
1. arthaguṇasampadyogāt kaniṣ‍ṭhaḥ, sa yathā—(gāsa. 3.38)
vikkiṇaï māhamāsammi pāmaro pāraṅi vaïlleṇa |
ṇid‌dhūmamummure sāmalīā thaṇae ṇiacchaṃto || 92 ||
(vikrīṇīte māghamāse pāmaraḥ prāvarakaṃ balīvardena |
nirdhūmamumurmure śyāmalyāḥ stanake paśyan ||)
2. mohādipradhānastāmasaḥ, sa yathā—(gāsa. 950ve.)
pupphavaïamhi bālaa mā dhivasu adīharāuso hosi |
ajjaṃ cea marijjaü miacchi kiṃ kālaharaṇeṇa || 93 ||
(puṣpavatyarima bālaka mā spṛśādīrghatarāyuṣyo bhavasi |
adyaiva mriyatāṃ mṛgākṣi kiṃ kālaharaṇena ||)
3. pratikūlavṛttiḥ śaṭhaḥ, sa yathā—
gharasāmiasma vaṃccia—piāṇaṇā paḍaï sahimuhe diṭṭhī |
līlaṃ bahuppaāraṃ sā hu viārei kāmassa || 14 ||
(gṛhasvāmino vañcitapriyānanā patati sakhīmukhe dṛṣ‍ṭiḥ |
līlāṃ bahuprakārāṃ ko vicārayati kāmasya ||)
4. sattvodrekādupaśamādipradhāno dhīrapraśantaḥ, yathā—
atithibhirgatameva divāgatairapathikāgamanā ca niśīthinī |
tadadhunā pratijāgṛhi putrakānpraviśa veśma kuṭumbini śemahe || 95 ||
eteṣāṃ ca prayojanāni vaidagdhyāsahiṣṇutvādanārjavānatirāgācca saṃkṣip‍ta eva ratyupacāro bhavati |
saṅkarāna madhyamaḥ sādhāraṇo dhṛṣ‍ṭo dhīrodātta iti| teṣu—
5. pādonaguṇasampadyogānmadhyamaḥ, yathā—
vrīhiḥ stambakaraḥ prabhūtapayasaḥ pratyāgatā dhenavaḥ pratyujjīvitamikṣuṇā bhṛśamiti dhyāyannayet tānadhīḥ/apetānyadhīḥ |
sāndro śīrakuṭumbinīstanabharavyālup‍tagharmaklamo deve nīramudāramujjhati sukhaṃ śete niśi grāmaṇīḥ || 96 ||
6. anekajātisādhāraṇaṃ yathā—(māgha. 3.16)
yāṃ yāṃ priyaḥ praikṣata kātarākṣīṃ sā sā hriyā namramukhī babhūva |
niśśaṅkamanyāssamamāhiterṣyāstatrāntare jaghnuramuṃ kaṭākṣaiḥ || 97 ||
7. prakāśavipriyo 'pyavilakṣo dhṛṣ‍ṭaḥ, yathā—(saka. 4.180, 5.372)
śataṃ vārānuktaḥ priyasakhi! vacobhissuparuṣaiḥ sahasasraṃ nirdhūtaḥ padanipatitaḥ pārṣṇihatibhiḥ|
kiyatkṛtvo baddhāḥ punariha na vedmi bhrukuṭayaḥ tathāpi kliśnanmāṃ kṣaṇamapi na dhṛṣ‍ṭo viramati || 98 ||
8. ahaṅkārapradhāno dhīroddhato yathā—(raghu. 7.67)
itiḥ parānarbhakahāryaśastrān vaidehi paśyānumatā mayāsi |
evaṃvidhenāhavaceṣ‍ṭitena tvaṃ prārthyase hastagatā mamaibhiḥ || 99 ||
teṣāṃ ca prāyaḥ prayojanāntaravyāsaṅgādanyatrāpi cāsak‍tervyalīkāpahravasadahaṅkāritvācca saṅkīrṇa eva ratyupacāro bhavati |
sampūrṇatvād asādhāraṇaḥ dhīralalita iti| teṣu—
9. ananyajānirasādhāraṇaḥ, yathā—(urāca. 1.37)
āvivāhasamayād gṛhe vane śaiśave tadanu yauvane punaḥ |
svāpaheturanupāsito 'nyathā rāmabāhurupadhānameṣa te || 100 ||
10. rajaḥpradhāno rājasaḥ yathā—(vikra. 3.19)
sāmantamaulimaṇirañjitaśāsanāṅkamekātapatramavanerna tathā prabhutvam |
asyāssakhe! caraṇayoradhigamya samyagājñākaratvamahamadya yathā kṛtārthaḥ || 101 ||
11. anyamanā api gauravāderanapahārī dakṣiṇo yathā—(saka. 5.449)
pratyagrojjhitagokulasya śayanādutsvapnamūḍhasya mā mā gotraskhalanādupaitu yadi vā rādheti bhīroriti |
rātrāvasvapato dine ca vijane lakṣmīti cābhyasyato rādhāṃ saṃsmarataḥ kathaṃ ramayataḥ khedo hareḥ pātu vaḥ || 102 ||
12. vilāsapradhāno dhīralalito yathā—
madhu ca vikasitotpalāvataṃsaṃ śaśikarapallavitaṃ ca harmyapṛṣ‍ṭham |
madanajanitavibhramā ca kāntā sukhamidamarthavatāṃ vibhūtayo 'nyāḥ || 103 ||
eteṣāṃ ca prāyo 'nanyacitatvena rāgabhūyiṣ‍ṭhatayā sthityanatikrameṇa vilāsitayā ca sampūrṇa eva ratyupacāro bhavati |
samyaktvād uttamaḥ—'sa sāttviko 'nukūlo dhīrodātta' iti| teṣu
13. sarvaguṇasampadyogāduttamo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.84)
ito gamiṣyāmyathaveti vādinī cacāla sā ca stanabhinnavalkalā |
svarūpamāsthāya ca tāṃ kṛtasmitaḥ samālalambe vṛṣarājaketanaḥ || 104 ||
14. satvapradhānaḥ sāttviko yathā—(raghu. 13. 28)
pūrvānubhūtaṃ smaratā ca rātrau kampottaraṃ bhīru! tavopagūḍham |
guhāvisārīṇyativāhitāni mayā kathañcid ghanagarjitāni || 104 ||
15. vaśaṃvado 'nukūlo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.51)
muñca kopamanimittakopane! sandhyayā praṇamito 'hamanyathā |
kiṃ na vetsi sahadharmacāriṇaś‍cakravākasamavṛttimātmanaḥ || 106 ||
16. udāracarito dhīrodātto yathā—(hanūmannāṭake 1.19)
kapole jānakyāḥ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi smarasmeraṃ gaṇḍoḍḍamarupulakaṃ vaktrakamalam |
muhaḥ paśyañchṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭagranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ || 107 ||
eteṣāṃ ca prāyaḥ samastaguṇasampadyogena mahāsattvatayā vaśaṃvadatvena atyudāratayā ca samyageva ratyupacāro bhavati| te 'mī saṅkṣepasaṅkarasampūrṇatvasamyaktvaiḥ pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe ṣoḍaśanāyakaviśeṣā bhavanti |
(upasargārthabhedeṣu nāyikābhedāḥ —32)
tathaivameva saṅkṣepādiṣūpasargārthabhedeṣu nāyikābhedāḥ kaniṣ‍ṭhādayo gīyante| tatra— saṅkṣepe kaniṣ‍ṭhā, mugdhā(apralagbhā), adhīrā, śāntā, anụ̄dhā, parakīyā, abhisārikā, kalahāntariteti| tāsu —
1. arthaguṇasampadyoginī kaniṣ‍ṭhā yathā—(saka. 5.377)
taṃ kira khaṇā virajjasi taṃ kira uvahasāsi saalamahilāo |
ehehi vāravālii aṃsū—maïlaṃ to samuppusimo || 105 ||
(tvaṃ kila kṣaṇād virajyase tvaṃ kilopahasāsi sakalamahilāḥ |
ehyehi vārapālike! aśru malinaṃ tat samutproñcchāmaḥ ||)
2. apragalbhā(mugdhā) yathā—(raghu. 19.27)
cumbane 'pi parivartitādharaṃ hastarodhi raśanāvighaṭṭane |
vighnitecchamapi tasya sarvato manmathendhanamabhūd vadhūratam || 109 ||
3. kālaharaṇāsahiṣṇuradhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 5.65)
pāapaḍaṇāṇaṃ mud‌dhe! rahasabalāmoḍicuṃbiavvāṇaṃ |
daṃsaṇamettapasijjiri cukkāsi bahuāṇaṃ sokkhāṇaṃ || 110 ||
(pādapatanānāṃ mugdhe! rabhasabalātkāracumbitavyānām |
darśanamātraprasādaśīle! cyutāsi bahukānāṃ sukhānām ||)
4. niraṅkārā śāntā yathā—(vikra. 3.12)
sitāṃśukā maṅgalamātrabhūṣaṇā viviktadūrvāṅkuralāñchitālakā |
vratopavāsojjhitagarvavṛttinā mama prasannā vapuṣaiva lakṣyate || 111 ||
5. kumāryanụ̄dhā yathā—(raghu. 6.80)
tataḥ sunandāvacanāvasāne lajjāṃ mṛdūkṛtya narendrakanyā |
dṛṣ‍ṭyā prasādāmalayā kumāraṃ paryaṃgrahīt saṃvaraṇasrajeva || 112 ||
6. anyaparigrahaḥ parakīyā yathā—(gāsa. 4.33)
muhavijjhaviapaīvaṃ ṇiruddhasāsaṃ sasaṅkiollāvaṃ |
savaha—saa—rakkhioṭhṭhaṃ coriaramiaṃ suhāvei || 113 ||
(mukhāvighmāpitapradīpaṃ niruddhaśvāsaṃ saśaṅkitollāpam |
śapathaśatarakṣitoṣ‍ṭhaṃ coritaramitaṃ sukhayati ||)
7. svayamupagatābhisārikā yathā—(gāsa. 1.20)
alia—pasuttaa viṇimīliaccha de suhaa majjha oāsaṃ |
gaṃḍapariuṃbaṇapulaïaṃga ṇa puṇo cirāissaṃ || 114 ||
(alīkaprasup‍tavinimīlitākṣa dadasva subhaga mamāvakāśam |
gaṇḍaparicumbanapulakitāṅga! na punaḥ cirayiṣyāmi ||)
8. paśvāttāpavatī kalahāntaritā yathā—(kirātā. 9.45)
savyalīkamavadhīrītakhinnaprasthitaṃ sapadi kopapa|?|na |
yoṣitaḥ suhṛdiva sma ruṇaddhi prāṇanāthamabhi bāṣpanipātaḥ || 115 ||
etāsu hi prāyeṇāpratiṣ‍ṭhitatvādaprāgalbhyādadhairyādupaśamāllajjāto bhayādautsu— kyādatiśayarāgavṛddheśva sakṣip‍tāsaṃkṣip‍tāṃ vikalpena cāliṅganādaya upacārā bhavanti |
saṅkare madhyamā, madhyā, uddhatā, punarbhūḥ, veśyā, sāmānyā, khaṇḍitā, vipralabdheti| tāsu —
9. yā dānaguṇasampadyuktā sā madhyamā yathā—(saka. 5.238)
huṃhuṃ de bhaṇasu puṇo ṇa suaṃ ti karei kālavikkhevaṃ |
ghariṇī hiaasuhāiṃ païṇo kaṇṇe bhaṇaṃtassa || 116 ||
(huṃhuṃ tāvad bhaṇa punarna śrutamiti karoti kālavikṣepam |
gṛhiṇī hṛdayasukhāni patyuḥ karṇe bhaṇataḥ ||)
10. kiñcidupārūḍhayauvanā madhyā yathā—(māgha. 10.41)
saṅgamecchurabhidhātumarīśā sammukhī na ca babhūva didṛkṣuḥ |
sparśane ca dayitasya natabhrūraṅgasaṅgacapalāpi cakampe || 117 ||
11. ahaṅkāravatyuddhatā yathā—(gāsa. 1.71)
hallapphala—ṇhāṇa—pasāhiāṇaṃ chaṇavāsare savattīṇaṃ |
ajjāeṁ majjaṇāṇāareṇa kahiaṃ va sohaggaṃ || 118 ||
(śīghrasnānaprasādhitānāṃ kṣaṇavāsare sapat‍nīnām |
āryayā majjanānādareṇa kathitamiva saubhāgyam ||)
12. puruṣāt puruṣāntaraṃ prāp‍tā punarbhūryathā—(māgha. 16.81)
yāmūḍhavānūḍhavarāhamūrtiḥ muhurttamādau puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ |
tenohyate sāmpratamakṣataiva kṣatāriṇā samyagasau punarbhūḥ || 119 ||
13. paṇyāṅganā veśyā yathā—(gāsa. 891ve.)
sāmaṇṇasuṃdarīṇaṃ vibbhamamāvahaï aviṇao ccea |
dhūmo ccia pajjaliāhiṃ bahumao surahidārūṇaṃ || 120 ||
(sāmānyasundarīṇāṃ vibhramamāvahatyavinaya eva |
dhūma eva prajvalitānāṃ bahumataḥ surabhidārūṇām ||)
14. anekapatikā sāmānyā yathā—(gāsa. 872ve.)
païpurao ccia rahaseṇa cuṃbio dearo aḍaaṇāe |
maha vaaṇaṃ madirāgaṃdhiaṃ ti bhāā tuhaṁ bhaṇaï || 121 ||
(patipurata eva rabhasena cumbito devaro 'satyā |
me vadanaṃ madirāgandhitamiti bhrātā tava bhaṇati ||)
15. khaṇḍitaprathamapremā khaṇḍitā yathā—(gāsa. 7.53)
paccūsāgaa! navarāaratta! kaa—loaṇāṇaṃda |
aṇṇattakhaviasavvaria ṇahahūsaṇa diṇavaï ṇamo de || 122 ||
(pratyūṣāgata navarāgarak‍ta! kṛtalocanānanda |
anyatrakṣapitaśarvarīka! nabho/khobhūṣaṇa! dinapate! namaste ||)
16. saṅketabhraṣ‍ṭā vipralabdhā yathā—(raghu. 19.17)
aṅgulīkisalayāgratarjanaṃ bhrūvibhaṅgakuṭilaṃ ca vīkṣitam |
mekhalābhirasakṛcca bandhanaṃ vañcayan praṇayinīravāpa saḥ || 123 ||
etāsu hi prāyeṇa nātyutkarṣānnātipragalbhānnātyādarānnātivisrambhādatikauṭilyā— danatyāsaṅgādatyavajñāto 'tiroṣācca saṅkīrṇā eva vikalpasamuccayābhyāmāliṅganādaya upacārā bhavanti |
sampūrṇatve jyeṣ‍ṭhā, pragalbhā, adhīrā, dhīralalitā, svairiṇī, gaṇikā, vāsakasajjā, virahotkaṇṭhiteti | tāsu—
17. prathamọdhā jyeṣ‍ṭhā yathā—(rat‍nā. 3.14)
ātāmratāmapanayāmi vilakṣa eva lākṣākṛtāṃ caraṇayostava devi! mūrdhnā |
kopoparāgajanitāṃ tu mukhendubimbe hartuṃ kṣamā yadiparaṃ karuṇā mayi syāt || 124 ||
18. ratyupacāracaturā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.99)
khiṇṇassa ire/ure païṇo viila/ṭhavei giṃhāvaraṇhe ramiassa |
ollaṃ galaṃtakusumaṃ ṇhāṇasuandhaṃ ciurabhāraṃ || 125 ||
(khinnasya urasi patyuḥ sthāpayati grīṣmāparāh‍ṇaratasya |
ārdraṃ galatkusumaṃ snānasugandhaṃ cikurabhāram ||)
19. kālāsahiṣṇuradhīrā yathā—
cuṃbasu sahassahuttaṃ muha hāriaṃ mae jūe |
māṇo uṇa muccaï sāmalaṃga kaha māṇaïttīe || 126 ||
(cumba sahasrakṛtvaḥ mukhamidaṃ hāritaṃ mayā dyūte |
mānaḥ punarmucyate śyāmalāṅga! kathaṃ mānavatyāḥ ||)
20. nāticiramanyurlalitā yathā—(gāsa. 4.68)
mharimo se saaṇa—paraṃmuhīe vialaṃta—māṇapasarāe |
kaïava—suttu—vattaṇa—thaṇa—kalasappellaṇa—suhelliṃ || 127 ||
(smarāmo 'syāḥ śayanaparāṅramukhyā vigalanmānaprasarāyāḥ |
kaitavasup‍todvartanastanakalaśapreraṇasukhakelim ||)
21. ātmacchandā svairiṇī yathā—(saka. 5.395)
taha sā jāṇaï pāvā līe pacchaṇṇamaviṇaaṃ kāuṃ |
jaha paḍhamaṃ cia sa ccia likkhaï majjhe cārittaïttīṇaṃ || 128 ||
{tathā sā jānāti jārāloe pracchannamavinayaṃ kartum |
yathā prathamameva saiva lekhyate madhye cāritravatīnām ||}
22. kalācatuṣṣaṣ‍ṭirgaṇikā yathā—(gāsa. 890ve.)
sacchaṃda—ramaṇa—daṃsaṇa—saṃvaḍ̣dhia—garua—vammaha—vilāsaṃ |
suviaḍḍha—vesa—vaniāramiaṃ ko vaṇṇiu taraï || 129 ||
(svacchanda—ramaṇadarśanasaṃvardhitagurukamanmathavilāsam |
suvidagdhaveśavanitārataṃ ko varṇayituṃ śaknoti ||)
23. gṛha eva praguṇitopakaraṇā vāsakasajjā yathā—(kirātā. 9.34)
sadmanāṃ viracanāhitaśobhairāgatapriyakathairapi dautyam |
sannikṛṣ‍ṭaratibhiḥ suradarairbhūṣitairapi vibhūṣaṇamīṣe || 130 ||
24. viyogādautsukyavatī virahotkaṇṭhitā yathā—(sūmu. 10)
keyūrīkṛtakaṅkaṇāvalirasau karṇāvataṃsīkṛta— vyālolālakapaddhatiḥ patipuro baddhā़ñjaliḥ pṛcchati |
yāvat kiścidudantamātmakamitustāvat sa evetyatha vrīḍāvakritakaṇṭhanālamabalā kaiḥ kairna bhitrā rasaiḥ || 131 ||
etāsu hi prāyaḥ praṇayavṛddheḥ suratacāturyāt kālayāpanād rāgabāhulyādabhi— prāyasiddheḥ kalākauśalād upakaraṇasatridherabhīṣ‍ṭasaṅgamāvāp‍teśca sampūrṇāḥ samuccayena cāliṅganādaya upacārā bhavanti |
samyaktve uttamā, udāttā, ụ̄dhā, svakīyā, kaniṣ‍ṭhā, rūpājīvā, svādhīnapatikā, proṣitabhartṛketi | tāsu—
25. sarvaguṇasampadyoginī uttamā yathā—(saka. 5.375)
hasiāiṃ samālasakomalāi vīsaṃbhakomalaṃ bhaṇiaṃ |
sabbhāvakomalaṃ pulaïaṃ va/ca ṇamimo sumahilāṇaṃ || 132 ||
(hasitāni samālasakomalāni visrambhakomalaṃ bhamitam |
sadbhāvakomalaṃ pusakitaṃ ca namāmaḥ sumahilānām ||)
26. udāraceṣ‍ṭā udāttā yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.1)
atha viśvātmane gaurī sandideśa mithaḥ sakhīm |
pitā me bhūbhṛtāṃ nāthaḥ pramāṇīkriyatāmiti || 133 ||
27. pāṇigṛhītī ụ̄dhā—(kusaṃ. 7.85)
dhruveṇa bhartrā dhruvadarśanāya prayujyamānā priyadarśanena |
sā dṛṣ‍ṭa ityānanamunnamayya hrīsannakaṇṭhaṃ kathamapyuvāca || 134 ||
28. ananyaparigrahā svakīyā yathā—(gāsa. 772ve.)
kiṃ tassa pāraeṇaṃ kimaggiṇā kiṃ va gabbhaharaeṇa |
jassa urammi ṇisajjaï umhāaṃtatthaṇī jāā || 135 ||
(kiṃ tasya prāvaraṇena kimag‍ninā kiṃ vā garbhagṛheṇa |
yasyorasi niṣīdati ūṣmāyamāṇastanī jāyā ||)
29. paścādụ̄dhā kaniṣ‍ṭhā yathā—(saka. 5.387)
paṇaaṃ paḍhamapiāe rakkhiukāmo vi mahuramahurehiṃ |
cheavaro ṇiṇadijjaï ahiṇavavahuāvilāsehiṃ || 136 ||
(praṇayaṃ prathamapriyāyāḥ rakṣitukāmo 'pi madhuramadhuraiḥ |
upadhavaḥ sukhāyate abhinavavadhūvilāsaiḥ ||)
30. rūpātiśāyinī rūpājīvā yathā—(kuṭṭanīma. 44)
ayameva dahyamānasmaranirgatadhūmavartikākāraḥ |
cikurabharastava sundari! kāmijanaṃ kiṅkarīkurute || 137 ||
31. āyattabhartṛkā svādhīnapatikā yathā—(gāsa. 2.30)
sāloe ccia sūre ghariṇī gharasāmiassa ghettūṇa |
ṇecchantassa vi vāe dhuaï hasaṃtī hasaṃtassa || 138 ||
(sāloke 'pi sūrye gṛhiṇī gṛhasvāmino gṛhītvā |
anicchato 'pi pādau dhāvati hasatīṃ hasataḥ ||)
32. priyaviyogavatī proṣitabhartṛkā yathā—
vilulitamatidūrairbāṣpamānandaśokaprabhavamavasṛjantī pakṣmalottānadīrghā |
snapayati hṛdayeśaṃ snehaniṣyandinī te madhuradhavalamugdhā dugdhakulyeva dṛṣ‍ṭiḥ || 139 ||
etāsu hi prāyo guṇotkarṣādaudāryādupayamādātmīyabuddhervayoviśeṣād rūpātiśayād vaśyatvādutkaṇṭhitatvācca samyageva vikalpasamuccayābhyāmāliṅganādaya upacārā bhavanti | te 'mī saṃkṣepasaṅkarasampūrṇatvasamyaktvaiḥ pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe dvātriṃśatrāyikāviśeṣā bhavanti |
yadā tūpasargaḥ prakṛtipratyayārthau viśeṣayati tadā prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūta iti nyāyādeteṣāmapi nāyakaḥ, pratināyakaḥ, upanāyaka iti, nāyikā, pratināyikā, upanāyikā, anunāyiketi ca pratyekaṃ viśeṣāḥ sambhavanti |
upasargasya cānye 'pi sambandhādayo 'dhikārthā vidyante | tadyogādamīṣāṃ sambandhaḥ, saṃsiddhaḥ, sannibhaḥ, saṃkṣip‍ta(/saṃklṛp‍tāḥ) iti pratyekaṃ viśeṣā jāyante | tatra—
(sambandhārthe—8)
itihāsapurāṇādisambandhinaḥ sambandhāḥ | teṣu—
kathāśarīravyāpī nāyako yathā—(raghu. 6.68)
tasyāṃ raghoḥ sūnurupasthitāyāṃ vṛṇīta vā neti samākulo 'bhūt |
vāmetaraḥ saṃśayamasya bāhuḥ keyūrabandhocch‌vasitairnunoda || 140 ||
tatpratiyogī pratināyako yathā—(raghu. 6.67)
sañcāriṇī dīpaśikheva rātrau yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā |
narendramārgāṭṭa iva prapede vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ || 141 ||
nāyakāt kiñcidūnaḥ samo vā gauravāyatanamupanāyako yathā—(kirātā. 2.1)
vihitāṃ priyayā manaḥpriyāmatha niścitya giraṃ garīyasīm |
upapattimadūrjitāśrayaṃ nṛpamūce vacanaṃ vṛkodaraḥ || 142 ||
evaṃvidha eva tannideśavartī upanāyako yathā—(māmā. 8.11)
kathayati tvayi sasmitamālatīvalitalolakaṭākṣaparāhatam |
nayanapaṅkajamullasitatrapāvidhuradṛṣ‍ṭi sakhī namayiṣyati || 143 ||
evaṃ kathāśarīravyāpikā nāyikā yathā—
tāsāṃ mādhavapat‍nīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ baddhavarcasām |
śabdavidyeva vidyānāṃ madhye jajvāla rukmiṇī || 144 ||
tatpratiyoginī pratināyikā yathā—(harivi. atraiva 7.12, 95)
kuviā a sac‍cabhāmā . . . maṃtū || 145 || (pṛ. 1330)
nāyikāyāḥ kiñcidūnā samā vā gauravāyatanamupanāyikā yathā—(saka. 5.353)
devīsvīkṛtamānasasya niyataṃ svap‍nāyamānasya me tadgotragrahaṇādiyaṃ suvadanā yāyāt kathaṃ na vyathām |
itthaṃ yantraṇayā kathaṃ kathamapi kṣīṇāṃ niśāṃ jāgrato dākṣiṇyopahatena sā priyatamā svap‍ne 'pi nāsāditā ||146 ||
nāyikāyāḥ kanīyasyanunāyikā yathā—(sumu. 43)
helodastamahīdharasya tanutāmālokya doṣṇo hareḥ s‍nehādaṃsataṭe 'valambya caraṇāvāropya tatpādayoḥ |
śailoddhārasahāyatāṃ jigamiṣoraprāp‍tagovardhanā rādhāyāḥ suciraṃ jayanti gagane vandhyāḥ karabhrāntayaḥ || 147 ||
(saṃsiddhārthe —8)
loke pratītavṛddhayaḥ saṃsiddhāḥ | tatra —
sārvavarṇikaḥ kaniṣ‍ṭhādirnāyakaḥ, sa yathā—(gāsa. 5.98)
jaṃ vahaï pīa/vīaṃ khaṃ/kaṃḍaṃ majjha suo ekapaharaviṇivāī |
taṃ kuladūsaṇisuṇhāthaṇāṇa tuha maṭṭhae paḍaü || 148 ||
(yad vahati dvitīyaṃ kā/khaṇḍaṃ mama suta ekaprahāravinipātī |
tat kuladūṣaṇīs‍nuṣāstanayoḥ tava mastake patatu ||)
nāyakopagāmiphalaviśeṣo 'rthipratināyako yathā—(gāsa. 3.49)
jaha jaha vaḍ‍ḍhaṃti thaṇā taha taha jhijjaṃti paṃca vāhie |
majjhaṃ pio kudaṃḍo pallijuāṇo savattīo || 149 ||
(yathā yathā vardhete stanau tathā tathā kṣīyante pañca vyādhayaḥ |
madhyaḥ priyaḥ kodaṇḍaḥ palliyuvānaḥ sapat‍nyaśca ||)
upapatirupanāyako yathā—(gāsa. 3.49)
ajjā mae gaṃtavvaṃ ghaṇaṃdhaāre vi tassa suhaassa |
ajjā ṇimīliacchī paaparivāḍiṃ ghare āi || 150 ||
(adya mayā gantavyaṃ ghanāndhakāre 'pi tasya subhagasya |
āryā nimīlatākṣī padaparipāṭīṃ gṛhe karoti ||)
patyuḥ kanīyānanunāyako yathā—(gāsa. 876ve.)
ṭhāṇe ṭhāṇe valiā valaṇe valaṇe valaṇe su/saveasakuḍuṅgā |
ṇa gaosi aṃha gāmaṃ diara ṇa diṭṭhā tue muralā || 151 ||
(sthāne sthāne valitāḥ valane valane sa/savetasanikuñjāḥ |
na gato 'si asmākaṃ grāmaṃ devara! na dṛṣ‍ṭā tvayā muralā ||)
evaṃ sārvalaukikyuttamādināyikā yathā—(gāsa. 1.13)
ghariṇīe mahāṇasa-kamma-lagga-masi-maïlieṇa hattheṇa |
chittaṃ muhaṃ hasijjaï caṃdāvatthaṃ gaaṃ païṇā || 152 ||
(gṛhiṇyā mahānasa—karmalag‍na—masī—malinitena hastena |
spṛṣ‍ṭaṃ mukhaṃ hasyate candrāvasthāṃ gataṃ patyā ||)
nāyikāpratipakṣaḥ pratināyikā yathā—(gāsa. 2.73)
sihipiṃchakaṇṇaūrā vahuā vāhassa vāhassa gavvirī bhamaï |
gaa—mottia—raïa—pasāhaṇāṇaṃ majjhe savattīṇaṃ || 153 ||
(śikhipiñchakarṇapūrā vadhūrvyādhasya garvitā bhramati |
gajamauktikaracitaprasādhanānāṃ madhye sapat‍nīnām ||)
nāyikāyāssamīpamupanāyikā yathā—(gāsa. 957ve.)
ṇia—daïa—daṃsaṇu—kkhitta pahia aṇṇeṇa vac‍casu paheṇa |
gaha—vaï—dhuā dullaṃghavāurā ia haagāme || 154 ||
(nijadayitādarśanakṣip‍ta pathika! anyena vraja yathā |
gṛhapatiduhitā durlaṅghavāgurā iha hatagrāme ||)
nāyikāyāḥ kanīyasyanunāyikā yathā—(pṛ. 1691)
gharasāmiassa vaṃc‍ci—piāṇaṇā paḍaï sahimuhe diṭṭhī |
līlaṃ bahuppaāraṃ sā hu ko viārei kāmassa || 155 ||
(gṛhasvāminaḥ vañcitapriyānanā patati sakhīmukhe dṛṣ‍ṭiḥ |
līlāṃ bahuprakārāṃ sā khalu vicārayati kāmasya ||)
(sannibhārthe —8)
eta evopacaritavṛttayaḥ sannibhāḥ | teṣu —
nāyako yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.63)
aṅgulībhiriva keśasañcayaṃ sannigṛhya timiraṃ marīcibhiḥ |
kuḍ‍malīkṛtasarojalocanaṃ cumbatīva rajanīmukhaṃ śaśī || 156 ||
pratināyako yathā—(seba. 11.26)
kaha virahappaḍiūlā hohii samuhaṭhṭhiā païmmi upagae |
ṇecchaï iarāvi sasiṃ kiṃ uṇa diṭṭhammi diṇaarammi kamaliṇī || 157 ||
(kathaṃ virahapratikūlā bhaviṣyati sammukhasthitā patyau upagate |
necchati itarathāpi śaśinaṃ kiṃ punaḥ dṛṣ‍ṭe dinakare kamalinī ||)
upanāyako yathā—(seba. 10.41)
vahalammi vi tamaṇivahe ṇivvāleuṇa sac‍caviarūvāo |
aṇubaṃdhaṃti sasi—arā ghettuṃ ṇa caaṃti pāavacchāāo || 158 ||
(bahule 'pi tamonivahe pṛthakkṛtvā satyāpitarūpāḥ |
anubadh‍nanti śaśikarāḥ grahītuṃ na śak‍nuvanti pādapacchāyāḥ ||)
anunāyako yathā—
viasaṃteṇa muṇijjaï sisiroagga-ṇavaüttha-ṇiaacchāāo |
kamalamuheṇa surabhiṇā āsādia-mahamāsa-saṃgamaṃti kamaliṇīṇa || 159 ||
(vikasatā jñāyate śiśirodagra—navotthanijakacchāyam |
kamalamukhena surabhiṇā āsāditamadhumāsasaṃgamitaṃ kamalinīnām ||)
nāyikā yathā—(saka. 5.357)
avaūhiapuvvadise samaaṃ joṇhāe seviapaosamukhe |
māi ṇa jhijjhaï raaṇī avara-disā-hutta-patthiammi miaṃke || 160 ||
avagūhitapūrvadiśe samkaṃ jyots‍nayā sevitapradoṣamukhe |
mātaḥ na kṣīyate rajanī aparadiśābhuktaprasthite mṛgāṅke ||)
pratināyikā yathā—(saka. 4.86)
dūrapaḍibaddharāe āliṃgaṃtammi diṇaare avaradisaṃ |
asahaṃti vva kilammaï piaamapac‍cakkhadūsaṇaṃ diṇalacchī || 161 ||
(dūrapratibaddharāge āliṅgati dinakare aparadiśām |
asahamāneva klāmyati priyatamaṃpratyakṣadūṣaṇaṃ dinalakṣmīḥ ||)
upanāyikā yathā—(saka. 5.358)
orattapaṃkaamuhiṃ vammaha—ṇaḍiaṃ va salilasaaṇaṇisaṇṇaṃ |
alliaï tīra-ṇaliṇīṃ vāāe gamei sahaariṃ cakkāo || 162 ||
(uparak‍tapaṅkajamukhīṃ manmatha-naṭitāmiva salilaśayananiṣaṇṇām |
ālīyate tīranalinīṃ vācā gamayati sahacarīṃ cakravākaḥ ||)
anunāyikā yathā—(māgha. 11.22)
navakumudavanaśrīhāsakeliprasaṅgādadhikaruciraśeṣāmapyuṣāṃ jāgaritvā |
ayamaparadiśo 'ṅeka muñcati srastahastaḥ śiśayiṣuriva pāṇḍuglānamātmānaminduḥ || 163 ||
(saṅklṛp‍tārthe—8)
śabdasya sāmarthyopajātatā guṇasaṅkrāntayaḥ saṅklṛp‍tāḥ | teṣu—
nāyako yathā—(gāsa. 3.11)
iaro jaṇo ṇa pāvaï tuha jahaṇāruhaṇasaṃgamasuhellim |
aṇuhavaü kaṇaaḍoro huavahavaruṇāṇa māhappaṃ || 164 ||
(itaro jano na prāp‍notu tava jaghanārohaṇasaṃgamasukhakelim |
anubhavatu kanakadoraḥ hutavahavaruṇayormāhātmyam ||)
atināyako yathā—(māgha. 9.63)
mama rūpakīrtimaharad bhuvi yastadanuprasak‍tahṛdayeyamiti |
tvayi matsarādiva nirastadayaḥ sutarāṃ kṣiṇoti khalu tāṃ madanaḥ || 165 ||
upanāyako yathā—(gāsa. 2.44)
jo kaha vi sahīhiṃ maha chiddaṃ lahiūṇa pesio hiae |
so māṇo coriakāmua vva diṭhṭhe pie ṇaṭṭho || 166 ||
(yaḥ kathamapi sakhībhiḥ mama cchidraṃ labdhvā preṣito hṛdaye |
sa mānaḥ corakāmuka iva dṛṣ‍ṭe priye naṣ‍ṭaḥ ||)
anunāyako yathā—(saka. 4.155)
kaha mā jhijjhaü majjho imīe kaṃdoṭhṭhadalasaricchehiṃ |
achīhi jo ṇa dīsaï ghaṇathaṇahararuddhapasarehiṃ || 167 ||
(kathaṃ mā kṣīyatāṃ madhyo 'syā utpaladalasadṛkṣābhyām |
akṣibhyāṃ yo na dṛśyate ghanastanabhararuddhaprasarābhyām ||)
nāyikāyā yathā—(kirātā. 3.40)
yaśo 'dhigantuṃ sukhalipsayā vā manuṣyasaṅkhyāmativartituṃ vā |
anutsukānāmabhiyogabhājāṃ samutsukevāṅkamupaiti lakṣmīḥ || 168 ||
pratināyikāyā yathā—
dine dine gāḍhamupoḍharāgā yathā yathā śrīrupagāhate tvām |
mahīpate! nūnamupāhiterṣyā tathā tathā dūramupaiti kīrtiḥ || 169 ||
upanāyikāyā yathā—
(dināntakālāvadhi bhuktabhuktā niśāmukhe pāśya)1va baddhabhāvā |
calasvabhāvā dayiteva yunaḥ santāpamindrasya karoti lakṣmīḥ || 170 ||
anunāyikā yathā—(raghu. 15.1)
kṛtasītāparityāgaḥ sa rat‍nākaramekhalām |
bubhuje pṛthivīpālaḥ pṛthivīmeva kevalām || 171 ||
॰ ॰ ॰ viśeṣo vivakṣāvaśād bhāvahetukartrādirūpapratyayārthatāṃ pratipadyate | tatra—
nāyikāyā bhāvarūpatā yathā—(śāku. 3.17)
parigrahabahutve 'pi dve pratiṣ‍ṭhe kulasya me |
samudraraśanā corvī sakhī ca yuvayoriyam || 172 ||
tāsāmeva hetutvaṃ yathā—
śiñjānamañjumañjīrakāñcīsañcāracāravaḥ |
ramayanti manaḥ kāntā nitāntaṃ yogināmapi || 173 ||
atha yantāramādiśya dhuryān viśrāmayeti saḥ |
tāmavārohayat pat‍nīṃ rathādavatatāra ca || 174 || (raghu. 1.54)
1. koṣ‍ṭhakagatoṃ 'śo 'smatparikalpitā khaṇḍitāṃśapūrttiḥ | pāśini varuṇe |
kartṛtvaṃ yathā—(vikra. 3.11)
ayaṃ tasyā rathakṣobhādaṃsādaṃso nipīḍitaḥ |
ekaḥ kṛtī śarīre 'smiñ śeṣamaṅgaṃ bhuvo bharaḥ || 175 ||
kalatravantamātmānamavarodhe mahatyapi |
tayā mene manasvinyā lakṣmyā ca vasudhādhipaḥ || 176 || (raghu. 1.32)
sampradātṛtvaṃ yathā—(raghu. 1.47)
tattad bhūmipatiḥ pat‍nyai darśayan priyadarśanaḥ |
api laṅghitamadhvānaṃ bubudhe na budhopamaḥ || 177 ||
apādānatvaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.9)
prasīda viśrāmyatu vīra! vajraṃ śarairmadīyaiḥ katamaḥ surāriḥ |
bibhetu moghīkṛtabāhuvīryaḥ strībhyo 'pi kopasphuritādharābhyaḥ || 178 ||
tasmin vidhānātiśaye vidhātuḥ kanyāmaye netraśataikalakṣye |
nipeturantaḥkaraṇairnarendrāḥ dehaiḥ sthitāḥ kevalamāsaneṣu || 179 || (raghu.611)
ete ca nāyakasyāpi jñātavyāḥ | tatrāsya . . . (kusaṃ. 7.95)
navapariṇayalajjābhūṣaṇāṃ tatra gaurīṃ vadanamapaharantīṃ tatkṛtākṣepamīśaḥ |
api śayanasakhībhyo dattavācaṃ kathañcit pramathamukhavikārairhāsayāmāsa gūḍham || 180 ||
kartṛtvaṃ yathā—(māgha. 9.82)
iti gantumicchumabhidhāya puraḥ kṣaṇadṛṣ‍ṭipātavikasad‌vadanām |
svakarāvalambanavimuk‍tagalat‌kalakāñci kāñcidaruṇat taruṇaḥ || 181 ||
ubhayoḥ kartṛtvaṃ yathā—kusaṃ. 7.79, raghu. 7.24)
pradakṣiṇaprakramaṇāt kṛśānorudarciṣastanmithunaṃ cakāśe |
merorupānteṣviva vartamānamanyonyasaṃsak‍tamahasriyāmam || 182 ||
ubhayoḥ karmatvaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.86), (raghu 7.22)
tau kṣaṇaṃ śithilitopagūhanau dampatī racitamānasormayaḥ |
