ollaṃ galaṃtapupphaṃ ṇhāṇasuaṃdhaṃ cihurahāraṃ || 39 ||(gāsa. 3.99)
(khinnasya sthāpayati urasi patyuḥ grīṣmāparāh‍ṇaramitasya |
ārdraṃ galatpuṣpaṃ snānasugandhaṃ cikurabhāram ||)
sāloe ccia sūre ghariṇī gharasāmiassa ghettūṇa |
ṇecchaṃtassa vi pāe dhuaï hasaṃtī hasaṃtassa || 40 ||(gāsa. 2.30)
(sāloka eva sūrye gṛhiṇī gṛhasvāmino gṛhītvā |
anicchato 'pi pādau dhāvati hasantī hasataḥ ||)
(16) saviturastācalopagamanam astaḥ yathā—
gavāṃ gacchantīnāṃ prativasatipūtena rajasā diśaḥ śyāmāyante tanutimirapītātapatṛṣaḥ |
nirastaṃ tejobhirjaraṭhakamaṭhakroḍakapilaṃ girerastasyāṅke patati saviturbimbavalayam || 41 ||
idaṃ bhāsāṃ bharturdrutakanakagolapratikṛti kramānmandajyotirgalati nabhaso bimbavalayam |
athainaṃ prācīnaḥ sarati muralīgaṇḍamalina— starucchāyācakraisstabakita iva dhvāntanicayaḥ || 42 ||
(17) aharvibhāvaryoḥ sandhi, sandhyā, yathā—(vikra. 3.2)
utkīrṇā iva vāsayaṣṭiṣu niśānidrālasā barhiṇo dhūmairjālavinissṛtairvalabhayassandigdhapārāvatāḥ |
ācāraprayataḥ sapuṣpabaliṣu sthāneṣu cārciṣmatīḥ sandhyāmaṅgalavartikā vibhajate śuddhāntavṛddho janaḥ || 43 ||
sandhyākāntikaṣāyitena nabhasā pratyakṣasandarśanai— rlīlāveśmani dīparaśmijaṭilaṃ nīlaṃ tamo jṛmbhate |
vellad‍bāhulatāvilolavalayaṃ svānairitaḥ sūcita— vyāpārāḥ pratiyojayanti vividhān vārāṅganā varṇakān || 44 ||
(18) niśāgamāndhakārastamo yathā—(seba. 10.25)
tāva a tamālakasaṇo kaṃcaṇakaḍaaṃ va bahalasaṃjhārāaṃ |
paḍipelliūṇa a tamo hiakaddamasuragaïṃdaṇihaso vva ṭhio || 45 ||
(tāvacca tamālakṛṣṇaḥ kāñcanakaṭakamiva bahalasandhyārāgam |
pratiprerya eva tamaḥ hṛtakardamasuragajendranikaṣa iva sthitaḥ ||)
āsaṇṇammi paviralaṃ bahalaṃ thoaṃtarammi dūrammi ghaṇaṃ |
obhaggadiṭṭhipasaraṃ savvattha samaṭṭhiaṃ pi dīsaï timiraṃ || 46 ||
(āsanne praviralaṃ bahalaṃ stokāntare dūre ghanam |
avabhug‍nadṛṣṭiprasaraṃ sarvatra samasthitamapi dṛśyate timiram ||) (seba. 10.26)
ghaüigāaṇaṃmi mahīmahivaggammi vaṇisammalaṇahāholo |
ghaḍiaṇahamelaïṇiāleacchāaggahalaṃbaāraṃmi jaaṃ || 47 ||
kuvalaa—dalaüttaṃsihiṃ ṇīsahisaaṃsaṇihiṃ maragaagejjākaṃtihiṃ lasidasaaṇīhiṃ |
timiruggamabhare migamaa—maṃḍaṇa—dhāriahiṃ paṃgaṇe tāva gaāgama kia abhisāriāhiṃ || 48 ||
(kuvalayadala—avataṃsābhirasitanivasanābhiḥ marakata—graiveyaka—kāntibhirlasitanivasanābhiḥ |
timirodgamabhare mṛgamadamaṃṇḍanadhāriṇībhiḥ prāṅgaṇe tāvad gatāgatāni kṛtāni abhisārikābhiḥ ||)
(19) indorudgamaḥ candraḥ yathā—
tāvaa suvela-dharāhara-kaḍaa-taḍaṃtaria-sasi-ara-parigahiā |
dīsaï thoatthitā aṃsamāruhaṃti vva ṇahaalaṃ puvvadisā || 49 ||
(tāvacca suveladharādharakaṭakataṭāntaritaśaśikaraparigṛhītā |
dṛśyate stokasthitā aṃsamārohantīva nabhastalaṃ pūrvadiśā ||)
vid‍duma-valaaddha-ṇihārāhiroggaā avarā ṇu dạ̄dhā suhaā |
sohaï asoa-ṇimmia-vammaha-cāva-taṇuī miaṃkassa kalā || 50 ||
(vidrumavalayārdha-nīhāra-hīrodgatāparā daṃṣṭrā-subhagā |
śobhate aśokanirmitamanmathacāpatanvī mṛgāṅkasya kalā ||)
joṇhārasa-cuṇṇaïaṃ kara-vicchūḍha-timirāa-parikkhevaṃ |
raïa-maa-pattalehaṃ muhaṃ va raaāṇīe dāviaṃ sasibiṃbaṃ || 51 ||
(jyotsnārasacūrṇāyitaṃ karavikṣip‍ta—timirāyitaparikṣepam |
racita-mada-patralekhaṃ mukhamiva rajanyā darśitaṃ śaśibimbam ||)
paḍhamaṃ vid‍dumaappo pacchā hohi savisesadhavalacchāo |
maa-pallavia-vilāsiṇi-muha-paḍimā-mukkadappaṇo vva miaṃko || 52 ||
(prathamaṃ vidrumakalpaḥ paścād bhavati saviśeṣadhavalacchāyaḥ |
madapallavitavilāsinīmukhapratimāmuktadarpaṇa iva mṛgāṅkaḥ ||)
(20) candrātapo jyotsnā yathā—
caṃdāavaṃmi jāaï māruavihuaviḍappaṃtarasāmovaïe |
kumuuppalavāpīṇaṃ prarūḍha dhavalakasaṇaṃ dumacchāāṇaṃ || 53 ||
(candrātape jāte mārutavidhutavisarpamāṇarasāmodayute |
kumudotpalavāpīnāṃ prarūḍhaṃ dhavalakṛṣṇaṃ drumacchāyāṇām ||)
bhiṇṇatama-duddiṇāiṃ viḍavaṃtara-virala-paḍia-caṃdakarāiṃ |
thoa-suhāloāiṃ paaḍaṃti va muddhapallavāiṃ vaṇāiṃ || 54 ||
(seba. 10.44)
(bhinnatamodurdināni viṭapāntaraviralapatitacandrakarāṇi |
dhautasukhālokāni pragalantīva mugdhapallavāni vanāni ||)
dīpāavapiṃjariā kāmiṇihasiavvaā pariggahasuā |
hoṃti gavakkhovagaā kālāaru-daddha-dhūsarā sasikiraṇā || 55 ||
(dīpātapapiñjaritā kāminīhasitavyāḥ parigrahasukhāḥ |
bhavanti gavākṣopagatāḥ kālāgarudagdhadhūsarāḥ śaśikiraṇāḥ ||)
goraṃgaü taruṇīaṇo joṇhāiṃ ahisaraï sia-ṇevaccha-paḍiccheo vallaha-baddha-raï |
tacchāahiṃ puṇu caliaü sāmalagattiahiṃ ṇīlaü vesu vahaṃtihiṃ maaṇummatiahiṃ || 56 ||
(gaurāṅgastaruṇījano jyotsnāyāmabhisarati sitanepathyaparicchado vallabhabaddharatiḥ |
tacchāyāsu punaś‍calitaṃ śyāmalagātrābhiḥ nīlaṃ veśaṃ vahantībhirmadanonmattābhiḥ ||) (saka. 3.131)
(21) niśāprathamayāmakarma prādoṣikaṃ yathā—
sajjijjaï uvaāro aho raïaṃpi puṇo raïjjaï saaṇaṃ |
saṃbharia vāṇi-atthā appāhia-patthiā vi rubbhaï dūī || 57 ||
(sajjīkriyate upacāraḥ aho racitamapi punā racyate śayanam |
saṃsmṛtya vāṇyarthān, sandiṣṭaprasthitāpi rudhyate dūtī ||)
pijjaï pīaṃ pi mahu dīsaï diṭṭho vi dappaṇe appāṇo |
aṇuāṇa rāgapasarā pucchijjaï pucchiā puṇo vi piakahā || 58 ||
(pīyate pītamapi mudhu dṛśyaṃte dṛṣṭo 'pi darpaṇe ātmā |
anujānāṃ rāgaprasarā pṛcchyate pṛṣṭā punarapi priyakathā ||)
ajjei loaṇāiṃ baṃdhaï rasaṇaṃ raei tilaālekkhaṃ |
jāo hoṃta-samāgama-suhekka-rasio vi vāulo juaïjaṇo || 59 ||
(anak‍ti locane vadhnāti raśanāṃ racayati tilakālekhyam |
jāto bhaviṣyatsamāgama—sukhaika—rasiko 'pi vyākulo yuvatijanaḥ ||)
ettahe uttahe jaṃtahi toraṇavaṃtiahiṃ dūittaṇu vesaṃtihi paṃthuṇiaṃti ahiṃ |
vesavisesu layaṃta muaṃtihiṃ vāliahiṃ pariaṇu kiu vihaḍapphaḍamuttāliahiṃ || 60 ||
(atra tatra yāntībhistoraṇavatībhi— rdautyaṃ preṣayantībhiḥ panthānamīkṣamāṇābhiḥ |
veṣaviśeṣaṃ gṛh‌nmuñcantībhirbālābhiḥ parijanaḥ kṛto vyākulaḥ sphuṭamu‌ttālābhiḥ ||)
(22) ardharātraṃ niśīthaḥ yathā—
kva prasthitāsi karabhoru! ghane niśīthe prāṇeśvaro vasati yatra janaḥ priyo me |
ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle! nanvasti puṅkhitaśaro madanaḥ sahāyaḥ || 61 || (amaru. 71)
sakhi! sa vijito vīṇādyute kayāpi parastriyā paṇitamabhavat tābhyāṃ tasminniśālalitaṃ dhruvam |
kathamitarathā śophālīṣu skhalatkusumāsvapi sthitavati nabhomadhye 'pīndau priyeṇa vilambyate || 62 || (daśarū. 2.25)
(23) apararātraṃ rātriparāvṛttiryathā—(kirātā. 9.74, 76)
anyonyaraktamanasāmatha bibhratīnāṃ cetobhuvaḥ surasakhāpsarasāṃ nideśam |
vaibodhikadhvanivibhāvitapaścimārdhā sā saṃhṛteva parivṛttimiyāya rātriḥ || 63 ||
kāntājanaṃ suratakhedanimīlitākṣaṃ saṃvāhituṃ samupayāniva madamandam |
harmyeṣu mālyamadirāparibhogagandhānāviścakāra rajanīparivṛttivāyuḥ || 64 ||
prātaḥ priyeṣu surataśramagāḍhanidrāsīdud‍bhujocchvasitapīnapayodharāṇi | āliṅganāni ghaṭayanti vilāsinīnāṃ pratyagrabodhabahulāḥ kṛkavākuvācaḥ ||64||
nādhanyaiḥ kṣaṇadāvirāmamadhurāḥ kiñcid‍vinidrālasa— śrotraiḥ savraṇamugdhacāraṇavadhūdantacchadāyāsinaḥ |
śrūyante mṛdupītabhuktamarutaḥ paurāṇarītikrama— vyālolāṅguliruddhamuktasuṣiraśreṇīravā veṇavaḥ || 66 ||
(24) pratyuṣakālakarma prābhātikaṃ, yathā—
tāva a raaṇivahūe pariattaṃtīe malia-tārākusumo |
jāo parimalapisuṇo ua ṇaccaṃto vva pāaḍo paccūso || 67 ||
(tāvacca rajanīvadhvāṃ parivartamānāyāṃ mṛditatārākusumaḥ |
jātaḥ parimalapiśunaḥ paśya nṛtyanniva prakaṭaḥ pratyūṣaḥ ||)
bhūmi—ṇimiekkacalaṇaṃ piaamahutta—pariattiāṇaṇa—kamalaṃ |
sohaï pemmaṇialiaṃ ṇaaṇaddhaṃta darapecchiaṃ || 68 ||
(bhūminibhṛtāṅkacaraṇaṃ priyā 'prāp‍taparivartitānanakamalam |
śobhate prema nigalitaṃ śayanārdhāntadaraprekṣitaṃ yuvatīnām ||)
gatavati nakhalekhālakṣyatāmaṅgarāge samadadayitapītātāmrabimbādharoṣṭhayāḥ |
virahavidhuramiṣṭā satsakhīvāṅganāyā hṛdayamavalalambe rātrisambhogalakṣmīḥ || 69 ||
(kirātā. 9.78)
etāś‍cūrṇitacūrṇakuntalabhṛtaḥ kṣuṇṇastragāmodinī— rbibhrāṇāḥ kabarīḥ kuraṅgakadṛśo vistraṃsibandhākulāḥ |
kelipraụdhivilup‍tavarṇakatayā bimbaikaśeṣaiḥ puro patrālītilakairdiśanti vijayaṃ saubhāgyavaidagdhyayoḥ || 70 ||
(25) krīḍārthaṃ kānanavihārāgamanaṃ yathā— (māgha. 7.1,3,4,15,44,45,50,46)
anugiramṛtubhirvitāyamānāmatha sa vilokayituṃ vanāntalakṣmīm |
niragamadabhiroddhumādṛtānāṃ bhavati mahatsu na niṣphalaḥ prayāsaḥ || 71 ||
avasaramadhigamya taṃ harantyo hṛdayamayat‍nakṛtojjvalasvarūpāḥ |
avaniṣu padamaṅganāstadānīṃ vyadadhata vibhramasampado 'ṅganāsu || 72 ||
nakharuciraciteṣu cāpalīnaṃ lalitagateṣu gatāgataṃ dadhānā |
mukharitavalayaṃ pṛthau nitambe bhujalatikā muhuraskhalattaruṇyāḥ || 73 ||
aviralapulassaha vrajantyāḥ pratipadamekataraḥ stanastaruṇyāḥ |
ghaṭitavighaṭitaḥ priyasya vakṣastaṭabhuvi kandukavibhramaṃ babhāra || 74 ||
(26) vane viviktālokajanaḥ kāmināṃ ceṣṭāviśeṣo vanavihāraḥ (yathā)—
vratativitatibhistirohitāyāṃ pratiyuvatau vadanaṃ priyaḥ priyāyāḥ |
yadadhayadadharāvalopanṛtyatkaravalayasvanitena tad vivavre || 75 ||
mukhakamalakamunnamayya yūnā yadabhinavoḍhavadhūrbalādacumbi |
tadapi na kila bālapallavāgragrahaparayā vivide vidagdhasakhyā || 76 ||
idamidamiti bhūruhāṃ prasūnairmuhurabhilobhayatā puraḥ prakoṣṭhyā |
anurahasamanāyi vallabhena tvarayati rantumaho janaṃ manobhūḥ || 77 ||
vilasitamanukurvatī purastād dharaṇiruhādhiruho vadhūrlatāyāḥ |
ramaṇamṛjutayā purassakhīnāmakalitacāpaladoṣamāliliṅga || 78 ||
(27) kāmināmanyonyānurāgahetuḥ kusumapallavādigrahaṇavibhramaḥ puṣpāpacayaḥ, yathā— (kirātā—8.15, 18, 19, 16)
priye 'parā yacchati vācamunmukhī nibaddhadṛṣṭiḥ śithilākuloc‍cayā |
samādadhe nāṃśukamāhitaṃ vṛthā viveda puṣpeṣu na pāṇipallavam || 79 ||
vilambamānākulakeśaśapāśayā kayācidāviṣkṛtabāhumūlayā |
taruprasūnānyapadiśya sādaraṃ mano 'dhināthasya manaḥ samādade || 80 ||
vyapohituṃ locanato mukhānilairapārayantaṃ kila puṣpajaṃ rajaḥ |
payodhareṇorasi kācidunmanāḥ priyaṃ jaghānonnatapībarastanī || 81 ||
salīlamāmuktalatāntabhūṣaṇaṃ samāsajantyā kusumāvataṃsakam |
stanopapīḍaṃ nunude nitambinā ghanena kaścijjaghanena kāntayā || 82 ||
(28) vanavihārāyāsasūcako 'vasthāviśeṣaḥ śramānubhavaḥ, yathā— (māgha. 7.3971—73)
prathamamalaghumauktikābhamāsīcchramajalamujjvalagaṇḍamaṇḍalekham |
kaṭhinakucataṭāgrapāti paścādatha śataśarkaratāṃ jagāma tāsām || 83 ||
aviratakusumāpacāyakhedānnihitabhujālatayaikayopakaṇṭham |
vipulataranirantarāvalag‍nastananihitapriyavakṣasālalambe || 84 ||
abhimatamabhitaḥ kṛtāṅgabhaṅgā kucayugamunnativittamunnamayya |
tanurabhilaṣituṃ klacchalena vyavṛṇuta vellitavāhuvallarīkāḥ || 85 ||
himalavasadṛśaśramodabindūnapanayatā kila nūtanoḍhavadhvāḥ |
kucakalaśakiśorake kathaṃcittaralatayā taruṇena paspṛśāte || 86 ||
(29) śramātapādivigamaheturlatāgṛhātapatrādyāśrayaḥ pracchāyādikasevā, yathā—(māgha.8.3—5)
nīrandhradrumaśiśirāṃ bhuvaṃ vahantī sāśaṅkaṃ muhuriva kautukāt karaistāḥ |
pasparśa kṣaṇamanilākulīkṛtānāṃ śākhānāmatuhinaraśmirantarālaiḥ || 87 ||
ekasyāstapanakaraiḥ karālitāyā bibhrāṇāḥ sapadi sitoṣṇavāraṇatvam |
sevāyai vadanasarojanirjitaśrīrāgasya priyamiva candramāścakāra || 88 ||
svaṃ rāgāviparivitanvatottarīyaṃ kāntena pratipathavāritātapāyāḥ |
sacchatrādaparavilāsinīsamūhācchāyāsīdadhikatarā tadāparasyāḥ || 89 ||
saṃkṣobhakṣamagahanāmathāpagaṅgaṃ bibhrāṇaṃ jvalitamaṇīni saikatāni |
adhyūṣuś‍cyutakusumācitāṃ sahāyā vṛtrāreraviralaśādvalāṃ dharitrīm || 90 ||
(30) nadyādau majjanavilāso jalakrīḍā yathā—(kirātā. 8.42,49,43,44)
śubhānanāḥ sāmburuheṣu bhīravo vilolahārāścalaphenapaṅ‌ktiṣu |
nitāntagauryo hṛtakuṅkumeṣvalaṃ na lebhire tāḥ parabhāgamūrmiṣu || 91 ||
priyaissalīlaṃ karavārivāritaḥ pravṛddhaniḥśvāsavikampitastanaḥ |
savibhramādhūtakarāgrapallavo yathārthatāmāpa vilāsinījanaḥ || 92 ||
hradāmbhasi nyastavadhūkarāhate ravaṃ mṛdaṅgadhvanidhīramujjhati |
muhuḥ stanaistālasamaṃ samādade manoramaṃ nṛttamiva pravepitam || 93 ||
śriyā hasadbhiḥ kamalāni sasmitairalaṅkṛtāmbupratimāgatairmukhaiḥ |
kṛtānukūlā surarājayoṣitāṃ prasādasāphalyamavāpa jāhnavī || 94 ||
(31) s‍nānādyanantaraṃ vastrābharaṇamālyānulepanādigrahaṇaṃ naipathyaprayogo yathā—
kiṃ bhūṣaṇaistava vibhūṣitamātmanaiva digdhaṃ rucaiva malinairalamaṅgarāgaiḥ |
svacchāmbaraṃ vapurupāhitarūpagarvaṃ strānārdrameva subhage! mudamādadhāti || 95 ||
ālikhya patramasitā 'guruṇābhirāmaṃ rāmāmukhe kṣaṇavibhāsitacandrabimbe |
jātaścirād vikasanā '1 vasaro 'yamasyetyuktvā sakhī kuvalayaṃ śravaṇe cakāra || 96 ||
dolāyamānapaṭukāntilataṃ lalāṭapaṭṭaṃ lalāmalalitaśriyamud‍vahantyā |
ekībhavatsuraśarāsanaśītaraśmikhaṇḍāhatāmanucakāra divaṃ nabhaḥśrīḥ || 97 ||
ślāghyātmanā daśanakoṭikṛtacchadena samprāpya cumbanasukhānubhavaṃ tadānīm |
rāgāt kuśeśayadṛśāmadhareṣu nāgavallīdalena yadakāri kimadbha‍utaṃ tat || 98 ||
(32) sambhogaviśeṣārthamākrīḍaśailasevā krīḍāparvatavihāraḥ, yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.22–25)
merumetya marudāśuvāhanaḥ pārvatīstanapuraskṛtaḥ kṛtī |
hemapallavavibhaṅgasaṃstarānanvabhūt suratamardanakṣamān || 99 ||
padmanābhavalayāṅkitāśmasu prāp‍tavatsvamṛtavipruṣoṃ navāḥ |
mandarasya kaṭakeṣu cāvasat sa priyāvadanapadmaṣaṭpadaḥ || 100 ||
vāraṇadhvanitabhītayā tayā kaṇṭhasaktamṛdubāhubandhanaḥ |
ekapiṅgalagirau jagad‍gururnirviveśa viśadāḥ śaśiprabhāḥ || 101 ||
tasya jātamalayasthalīrate dhūtacandanalataḥ priyāklamam |
ācacāma salavaṅgakesaraścāṭukāra iva dakṣiṇānilaḥ || 102 ||
1. 'kasanā 'vasaro 'yama'='kasanādvasaro(?)yama' rāghavaḥ |
(33) samārūḍhaprauḍhavistrambhānurāgoddīpanāya deśyā mahim‍nideśyāśca māhimānyaśca vividhakrīḍāḥ pravartayet | tāsvekameva kusumanirbharaṃ śālmalīvṛkṣamāśritya sunimīlitakādibhiḥ khelanaṃ krīḍā ekaśālmalī (kāmasū. jayamaṃ. 1.4) yathā—
ko esotti palottuṃ sāmalījāṇiaṃ piyaṃ parikkhasaï |
haliasuaṃ muddhavahū seajalolleṇa hattheṇa || 103 ||
(ka eṣa iti pratyāvartituṃ śālmalijñātaṃ priyaṃ paripātayati |
hālikasutaṃ mugdhavadhūḥ svedajalārdreṇa hastena ||) (saka. 5.303)
jo vi ṇa pucchaï tassa vi kahei bhaṃgāiṃ teṇa valaāi |
aïujjuā haāsā ahava pio se varāīe || 104 ||
(yo 'pi na pṛcchati tasyāpi kathayati bhag‍nāni tena valayāni |
atiṛjukā hatā atha vā priyaḥ tasyāḥ varākyāḥ ||)
(gāsa. 5.38)
(34) yatra kaste priya iti pṛcchadbhiḥ palāśādinavalatābhiḥ priyajano hanyate sā navalatikā, yathā—
vāḍei vidiaṃ gammijjaṃ mividiṇa ॰ ॰ e valaïaṃ |
saalāvaabāi samuc‍calaṃtisetammi āvasio || 105 ||
ṇavalaappaharamaṅge jahiṃ jahiṃ mahaï dearo dāuṃ |
romaṃcadaṃḍarāī tahiṃ tahiṃ dīsaï bahue || 106 ||
(navalatāprahāramaṅge yatra yatrecchati devaro dātum |
romāñcadaṇḍarājistatra tatra dṛśyate vadhvāḥ ||) (gāsa. 1.28)
teṇa ira ṇavalaāe diṇṇo paharo imīa thaṇavaṭṭhe |
gāmataruṇīhiṃ ajja vi diahaṃ pariāliā bhamaï || 107 ||
(tena kila navalatayā dattaḥ prahāra etasyāḥ stanapṛṣṭhe |
grāmataruṇībhiradyāpi divase pratipālitā bhramati ||) (saka. 5.229)
ṇavalaapaharuttatthāe taṃ kaaṃ kiṃ vi suṇhāe |
jaṃ ajjavi juaïjaṇo ghare ghare sikkhiuṃ mahaï || 108 ||
(navalatāprahārottrastayā tatkṛtaṃ kimapi s‍nuṣayā |
yadadyāpi yuvatijano gṛhe gṛhe śikṣituṃ bhramati ||) (gāsa. 862ve.)
(35) pāñcālamunipravartitā bhinnabhāṣāveṣaceṣṭitaiḥ prahāsakrīḍā pāñcālānuyātam, yasyā bhūtamātre prasiddhiḥ, yathā—(karpūramañjarī 4.13,14,15,17)
hatthe mahāmaṃsavalīdharāo huṃkkāra—phekkāraravā raüddā |
ṇisāarīṇaṃ paḍisīsaehiṃ aṇṇā masāṇābhiṇaaṃ kuṇanti || 109 ||
(haste mahāmāṃsabalidhāriṇyo huṅkāraphetkāraravā raudrāḥ |
niśācarīṇāṃ pratiśīrṣakairanyā mahāśmaśānābhinayaṃ kurvanti ||)
imā masī kajjalakālakāā tikkaṇḍacāvāo vilāsiṇīo |
puliṃdarūveṇa jaṇassa hāsaṃ sa—morapiṃchābharaṇā kuṇaṃti || 110 ||
(imā maṣīkajjalakālakāyāḥ trikāṇḍacāpāḥ vilāsinyaḥ |
pulindarūpeṇa janasya hāsaṃ samayūrapiñchābharaṇāḥ kurvanti ||)
kouhallavasa—jaṃgamavesā veṇuvādaṇaparā avarāo |
kālavesavasahāsialoā osaraṃti paṇavaṃti hasaṃti || 111 ||
(kautūhalajananāṅganiveśāḥ veṇuvādanaparāḥ aparāḥ |
kālaveśavaśahāsitalokā apasaranti praṇamanti hasanti ||)
kāvi vāiakarālahuhukkā mạdh‌ḍhamaddalalaeṇa maacchī |
bhūladāhiṃ parivāḍicalāhiṃ callikammakaraṇaṃmi paaṭhṭhā || 112 ||
(kāpi vāditakarālahuhukkā mattamardalalayena mṛgākṣī |
bhrūlatābhyā paripāṭīcalābhyāṃ cedikarmakaraṇe pravṛttā ||)
(36) prathamavarṣaṇaprarūḍhanavatṛṇāṅkurāsu sthalīṣu śād‍valamabhyarcya bhuktapītānāṃ kṛtrimavivāhā— dikrīḍā navapatrikā | tatra ca varaṇavidhānādau teṣāmevaṃvidhāḥ parihāsā bhavanti, yathā—
āsaṇṇakuḍuṃge juṇṇadeule bahu—juāṇa—saṃkiṇṇe |
thero tti paï mā ruasu putti! diṇṇāsi suggāme || 113 ||
(āsannanikuñje jīrṇadevakule bahuyuvasaṅkīrṇe |
sthavira iti patiḥ mā rudihi putri dattāsi sugrāme ||)
tā kuṇaha kālaharaṇaṃ tuvaraṃtammi vi vare vivāhassa |
jā paṃḍu—ṇahapaāiṃ hoṃti kumārīe aṃgāiṃ || 114 ||
(tāvat kuruta kālaharaṇaṃ tvaramāṇe 'pi vare vivāhasya |
yāvat punaḥ (a)nakhapadāni bhavanti kumāryā aṅgāni ||) (saka. 5.312)
kaïā jāā kaïā ṇu sikkhiā māuā haïkumārī |
taṃ taṃ jāṇaï savvaṃ jaṃ jaṃ mahilājo jāṇaṃti || 115 ||
(kadā jātā kadā nu śikṣitā mātarhatakumārī |
tattajjānāti sarvaṃ yadyanmahilā jānanti ||) (gāsa.825ve.)
tattha vi hoṃti sahīo puttii mā ruasu jattha diṇṇāsi |
vaṃjulaṇiuṃjalīlā tattha vi girivāhiṇī golā || 116 ||
(tatrāpi bhavanti sakhyaḥ putrike! mā rodīḥ yatra dattāsi |
vañjulanikuñjalīlā tatrāpi girivāhinī godā ||) (gāsa.885ve.)
(37) varṣāsu kadambanīpaharidrumādikusumaiḥ praharaṇabhūtairdvidhā balaṃ vibhajya kāmināṃ krīḍāḥ kadambayuddhāni yathā—
sahiāhiṃ pia-visajjia-kalaṃba-raa-bharia-ṇibbharū-s‍‌sio/rucchasio |
dīsaï kadaṃbadhavao vva thaṇaharo haliasuh‍ṇāe || 117 ||
(sakhībhiḥ priyavisarjitakadambarajobharitanirbharocch‌vasitaḥ |
dṛśyate kadambastabaka iva stanabharo hālikas‍nuṣāyāḥ ||)(saka. 5.311)
thaṇavaṭṭhu ‍c‍cia kalaṃvareṇuṇibbharaṇimīliacchīe |
bhahammaï seso vi jaṇo kalaṃbakusumomehiṃ suh‍ṇāe || 118 ||
(stanapṛṣṭhameva kadambareṇunirbharanimīlitākṣyāḥ |
hanyate śeṣo 'pi janaḥ kadambakusumaiḥ s‍nuṣāyāḥ ||)
hammaï piāe daïokalaṃbaguccheṇa mucchaï diaro |
hammaï daïeṇa piā pīḍā uṇa se savattīṇaṃ || 119 ||
(hanyate priyayā dayitaḥ kadambagucchena mūrcchati devaraḥ |
hanyate dayitena priyā pīḍā punastasyāḥ sapat‍nīnām ||)
dhaṇṇo si re haviduaṃ/haliddaa haliasuāpapīṇatthaṇaharucchaṃge |
pecchaṃtassa vi païṇo jaṃ tuha kusumāi ṇipaḍaṃti || 120 ||
(dhanyo 'si re haridraka halikasutāpīnastanabharotsaṅge |
prekṣamāṇasyāpi patyuḥ yat tava kusumāni nipatanti ||)(gāsa. 863ve.)
(38) abhinavavisāṅkurodbhedasamaye sarassamāśritya kāmimithunānāṃ krīḍā visakhādikā, yathā—
geṇhaṃti piaamā piaamāṇa vaaṇāhi visalaaddhāiṃ |
hiaāiṃ va kusumāuha—bāṇa—kaāṇea—raṃdhāiṃ || 121 ||
(gṛh‍ṇanti priyatamāḥ priyatamānāṃ vadanād visalatārdhāni |
hṛdayānīva kumumāyudhavāṇakṛtānekarandhrāṇi ||) (saka. 5.313)
diaro vahuṇṇiāe puṇo puṇo muha—muṇāla—saṃkāe |
daṃtappahaṃ viatthaï vihasijjaṃto piaamāe || 122 ||
(devaro bhrātṛjāyāyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ mukhamṛṇālaśaṅkayā |
dantaprabhāṃ savikarṣati vihasyamānaḥ priyatamayā ||)
etenābhyūṣakhādikekṣubhakṣikā ca vyākhyātā | yathā—(saka. 5.317)
maaṇaggiṇā karo me daḍ‌̣dho tti puṇo puṇo c‍cia kahei |
haliasuā maliabbhūsadohalī pāmarajuāṇe || 123 ||
(matha/madanāg‍ninā karo me dagdha iti punaḥ punareva kathayati |
halikasutā mṛditābhyūṣadohadinī pāmarayūni ||)
diarassa sarasa—maüaṃ aṃsūmaïleṇa dei hattheṇa |
paḍhamaṃ hiaaṃ vahuā pacchā gaṃḍaṃ sadaṃtavaṇaṃ || 124 ||
(devarasya sarasamṛdukamaśrumalinena dadāti hastena |
prathamaṃ hṛdayaṃ vadhukā paś‍cād gaṃḍaṃ sadantavraṇam ||) (saka. 5.318)
(39) śakramaha indrotsavaḥ, yathā—(saka. 5.314)
sac‍caṃ cia kaṭṭhamao suraṇāho jeṇa haliadhūāe |
hatthehiṃ kamaladalakomalehiṃ cikko ṇa pallavio || 125 ||
(satyameva kāṣṭhamayassa suranātho yena hālikaduhitrā |
hastaiḥ kamaladalakomalaiḥ spṛṣṭo na pallavitaḥ ||)
iṃdamahaṃ daṭṭhumaṇo saṃkoia—daḍ‌ḍha—ṇāma—racchāe |
mottūṇa taṃ ṇisaṃko ajja jaṇo kahaṃ ṇu bolīṇo || 126 ||
(indramahaṃ draṣṭumanāḥ saṅkocitadagdhanāmarathyayā |
muktvā taṃ niśśaṅkaḥ adya janaḥ kathaṃ nvatikrāntaḥ ||)
(40) āśvinapaurṇamāsīvilāsaḥ kaumudīpracāraḥ, yathā—(saka. 5.315)
aha tueṁ sahatthadiṇṇo kaha kaha vi khalaṃta-matta-jaṇamajjhe |
tissā thaṇesu jāo vilevaṇaṃ komuī-vāso || 127 ||
(atha tvayā svahastadattaṃ kathaṃkathamiva skhalanmattajanamadhye |
tasyāḥ staneṣu jātaṃ vilepanaṃ kaumudīvāsaḥ ||)
ghettūṇa cuṇṇamuṭ‌ṭhṭhiṃ harisūsasiāiṁ vepamāṇīe |
bhisuṇemi tti piaamahatthe gaṃdoaaṃ jāaṃ || 128 ||
(gṛhītvā cūrṇamuṣṭiṃ aśrumalinena vepamānāyāḥ |
avakirāmīti priyatamahaste gandhodakaṃ jātam ||) (gāsa. 4.12)
diareṇa piāthaṇae komuivāseṇa kaddamijjaṃte |
hasaï pariosasuṇṇaṃ uvvattamuhaṃ haliavutto || 129 ||
(devareṇa priyāstane kaumudīvāsena kardamīkṛte |
hasati paritoṣaśūnyamud‍vṛttamukhaṃ halikaputraḥ ||)
(41) dīpotsavo yakṣarātriryathā—(saka. 5.316)
aṇṇe vi hu hoṃti chaṇā ṇa uṇo dīvāliāsaricchā te |
jattha jahicchaṃ gammaï piavasaī dīvaa—miseṇa || 130 ||
(anye 'pi khalu bhavanti kṣaṇā na punardīpālikāyāḥ sadṛkṣāḥ |
yatra yathecchaṃ gamyate priyavasatirdīpakamiṣeṇa ||)
suṇhāe hiaaguṇiaṃ sīsaï diarassa chaṇa—paīveṇa |
sajjhasa—paaṃpia—tthaṇa—ṇīsāsaṃdolia—siheṇa || 131 ||
(s‍nuṣāyāḥ hṛdayaguṇitaṃ śiṣyate devarasya kṣaṇapradīpena |
sādhvasa—prakampita—stana—niḥśvāsāndolita—śikhena ||)
(42) spṛhayantīvratamaṣṭamīcandrakaḥ, sa hi caitracaturthīto 'ṣṭamacaturthyāmudīyamānaḥ kāminībhirāpyate, yathā—
avasa-haa-pavva-caraṇeṇa putti mā kheaasu suaṇuṃ |
uggamihamāṇasasī tuha vaaṇasirīeṁ hi juasoho || 132 ||
(avaśa—hata—parvacaraṇena putri! mā khedayasva svatanum |
udgamiṣyamāṇaśaśī tava vadanaśriyā yutaśobhaḥ ||)
avasahiajaṇo païṇā salāhamāṇeṇa ec‍ciraṃ hasio |
caṃda tti tujjha muha-saṃmuha-diṇṇa-kusumaṃjali-vilakkho || 133 ||
{avaśaha(hṛ)tajanaḥ patyā ślāghyamāneneyac‍ciraṃ hasitaḥ |
candra iti tava mukha-sammukha-datta-kusumāñjali-vilakṣaḥ ||} (saka. 5.211)
(43) yasyāṃ yavastrastareṣvabalā lolaṃti sā kundacaturthī, yathā—
jahiṃ tumaṃ sac‍civiā viṇiaṃsaṇa—lolirī juāṇehiṃ |
te tattha cchia chette maaülaübbhesaā jāā || 134 ||
(yatra tvaṃ dṛṣṭā vinivasanalolanaśīlā yuvabhiḥ |
te tatraiva kṣetre mṛgakulodbheṣakā jātāḥ ||)
luliā gahavaïdhūā diṇṇaṃ va phalaṃ javehiṃ savisesaṃ |
eṇhiṃ aṇivāriaṃ va gohaṇaṃ caraü chettaṃmi || 135 ||
(lulitā gṛhapatiduhitā dattamiva phalaṃ yavaiḥ saviśeṣam |
idānīmanivāritameva godhanaṃ caratu kṣetre ||) (saka. 5.300)
(44) vasantāvatāradivasaḥ suvasantakaḥ, yathā—(gāsa. 4.69)
phaṃgucchavaṇiddosaṃ keṇa vi kaddamapasāhaṇaṃ diṇṇaṃ |
thaṇaalasamuhapaloḍ‍ḍhaṃtaseadhoaṃ kiṇo dhuasi || 136 ||
(phālgunotsavanirdoṣaṃ kenāpi kardamaprasādhanaṃ dattam |
stanakalaśamukhapraluṭhatsvedadhautaṃ kimiti dhāvayasi ||)
chaṇapiṭṭhadhūsaratthaṇi mahumaataṃbacchi kuvalaāharaṇe |
kaṇṇagaacūamaṃjari putti! tae maṃḍio gāmo || 137 ||
(kṣaṇapiṣṭadhūsarastani madhumadatāmrākṣi kuvalayābharaṇe |
karṇagatacūtamañjari! putri! tvayā maṇḍito grāmaḥ ||) (gāsa. 826ve.)
(45) sahakārakusumapallavādibhañjanaṃ sahakārabhañjikā, yathā— (śāku. 6.3)
tuṃ si mae cūaṃkura! diṇṇo kāmassa gahiadhaṇuhassa |
kāmiaṇa—hiaa—dalaṇe paṃcabbhahio saro hohi || 138 ||
(tvamasi mayā cūtāṅkura dattaḥ kāmasya gṛhītadhanuṣaḥ |
kāmijanahṛdayadalane pañcābhyadhikaśśaro bhava ||)
raïaṃ pi tā ṇa sohaï raïjoggaṃ kāmiṇīṇa chaṇaṇevacchaṃ |
kaṇṇe jāi ṇa raïjjaï kaolagholaṃtapallavaṃ sahaāraṃ || 139 ||
(racitamapi tāvanna śobhate ratiyogyaṃ kāminīnāṃ kṣaṇanepathyam |
karṇe yāvanna racyate kapolaghūrṇamānapallavaṃ sahakāram ||) (saka. 5.307)
(46) āndolanakrīḍā dolāvilāsaḥ, yathā—(saka. 5.302)
aṃdolaṇalaṃghiataṭṭiāeṁ diṭṭhe tumammi muddhāe |
āsaṃghijjaï kāuṃ kara—pellaṇa—ṇic‍calā dolā || 140 ||
(āndolanalaṅghitataṭṭikapā dṛṣṭe tvayi mugdhayā |
āśāsyate kartuṃ karapreraṇaniś‍calā dolā ||)
uc‍cavasahittaṇaṃ te avarajjhaï caṃda maṃdasuhassa |
pāehiṃ jaṃ ṇa chivvasi bahūe aṃdolamāṇīe || 141 ||
(uc‍cavasatitvaṃ tavāparādhyati candra! mandasukhasya |
pādābhyāṃ yanna spṛśyase vadhvā dolamānayā ||)
(47) udakapūrṇā kṣvelā vaṃśanāḍī yasyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ sā udakakṣvelikā, yathā(rat‍nā. 1.12)
asmin prakīrṇapaṭavāsakṛte 'ndhakāre dṛṣṭo manāṅ‍maṇivibhūṣaṇaraśmijālaiḥ |
pātālamudyataphaṇākṛtiśrṛṅgako 'yaṃ māmadya saṃsmarayatīva bhujaṅgalokaḥ || 142 ||
śrṛṅgāṇi drutakanakojjvalāni gandhāḥ kausumbhaṃ pṛthukucakumbhasaṅgi vāsaḥ |
mādhvīkapriyatamasannidhānamāsāṃ nārīṇāmiti jalakelisādhanāni || 143 ||
(māgha. 8.30)
(48) madanatrayodaśyāṃ kāmadevādipūjā madanotsavaḥ, yathā—(rat‍nā. 1.19)
kusumasukumāramūrtirdadhatī niyamena tanutaraṃ madhyam |
ābhāti makaraketoḥ pārśvasthā cāpayaṣṭiriva || 144 ||
pratyagramajjanaviśeṣaviviktamūrtiḥ kausumbharāgarucirasphuradaṃśukāntā |
vibhrājase makaraketanamarcayantī bālapravālaviṭapaprabhavā lateva || 145 || (rat‍nā. 1.20)
(49) krīḍānte gṛhāgamanaṃ gṛhapratyāgamaḥ, yathā—
kaṃṭhāvalaṃbiapio piaamakaṃṭhābalaṃbio gehaṃ |
aṇusaraï khea—pasịdhila—guruāvaavo piāsattho || 146 ||
(kaṇṭhāvalambitāpriyaḥ priyatamakaṇṭhābalambito geham |
anusarati khedapraśithilagurukāvayavaḥ priyāsārthaḥ ||)
haṃho kaṇṇullīṇā bhaṇāmi re suhaa kiṃ pi mā tūra |
ṇijjaṇa—pāṇaddhīsu kahi pi puṇṇehiṃ laddhosi || 147 ||
(haṃho karṇollīnā bhaṇāmi re subhaga! kimapi mā tvarasva |
nirjanarathyāsu kathamapi puṇyaiḥ labdho 'si ||)
bālaa! dūre gāmo pattalabahulā imā a vaṇarāī |
mā vacca tumaṃ maṃ ujjhiūṇa sahi—sattha—vicchuḍiaṃ || 148 ||
(bālaka dūre grāmaḥ patrabahulā iyaṃ ca vanarājī |
mā vraja tvaṃ māmujjhitvā sakhīsārthaviyuktām ||) (saka. 5. 225)
sā tui sahatthadiṇṇaṃ kaṇṇe kāūṇa borasaṃghāḍhaṃ |
lajjāluiṇī vahuā gharaṃ gaā gāmaracchāe || 149 || (gāsa. 5.19)
(mā tvayā svahastadattaṃ karṇe kṛtvā badaśrṛṅgāṇam |
lajjāvatī vadhūḥ gṛhaṃ gatā grāmarathyayā ||)
(50) sakhyādīnāṃ karmāṇi sahāyavyāpāraḥ, yathā—(gāsa. 7. 2)
e ehi kiṃ piṃ tissā kaeṇa ṇikkiva bhaṇāmi, alamahavā |
aviāriakajjāraṃbhaāriṇī maraü ṇa bhaṇissaṃ || 150 ||
(e ehi kimapi tasyāḥ kṛtena niṣkṛpa! bhaṇāmyalamathavā |
avicāritakāryārambhakāriṇī mriyatāṃ na bhaṇiṣyāmi ||)
saccaṃ jāṇaï daṭṭhuṃ sarisammi jaṇammi jujjae rāo |
maraü, ṇa tumaṃ bhaṇissaṃ, maraṇaṃ pi sahāhaṇijjaṃ se || 151 ||
(satyaṃ jānāti draṣṭuṃ sadṛśe jane yujyate rāgaḥ |
mriyatāṃ na tvāṃ bhaṇiṣyāmi maraṇamapi ślāghanīyaṃ tasyāḥ ||) (gāsa. 1. 12)
tā kiṃ kareu jaï taṃ si tīe vaï-veḍha-pellia-thaṇīe |
pāaṃguṭṭhad‌dhakkhitta—ṇīsahaṃgīeṁ vi ṇa diṭṭho || 152 ||
(tatkiṃ karotu yadi tvamasi tayā vṛtiveṣṭanapīḍita—stanayā |
pādāṅguṣṭhārdhotkṣip‍tanissahāṅgayāpi na dṛṣṭaḥ ||) (gāsa. 3. 21)
appāhiāi tuha teṇa jāitāe mae ṇa muṇiāiṃ |
accuṇha—sāsa—parikkhalaṃta—visamakkhara—paāiṃ || 153 ||
(vyāhṛtāni tava tayā yāni mayā na jñātāni |
atyucch‌vāsapariskhaladviṣamākṣarapadāni ||) (gāsa. 859 ve.)
(51) sambhogārthaṃ śarīrapratikarma prasādhanam yathā—
diṇṇa—taṇu—aṃjaṇāiṃ juaï—aṇassa dara—ratta—taṃboṭhṭhāiṃ |
āsaṇṇa—raha—suhāiṃ ahivāsijjaṃti vammaheṇa muhāiṃ || 154 ||
(dattatanukāñjanāni yuvatijanasya dara raktatāmroṣṭhāni |
āsannaratisukhāni adhivāsyante manmathena mukhāni ||)
pariuṃbaṇeṇa aharo agghaï hiaahariseṇa ṇaaṇacchāā |
sohaṃ kuṇaï pio ccia viraei muhā pasāhaṇaṃ juaïaṇo || 155 ||
(paricumbanenādharo 'rdhati hṛdayaharṣeṇa nayanacchāyā |
śobhāṃ karoti priya eva viracayati mudhā prasādhanaṃ yuvatijanaḥ ||)
daramattapattaleho mahagghavia—piaamo—vaūaṇa—suhio |
paṭṭhimuhaṭṭhiahiao jāaï pajjaṃtamaṃḍaṇo juaïjaṇo || 156 ||
(dararacitapatralekhaḥ mahārghapriyatamopagūhanasukhitaḥ |
pṛṣṭhamukhasthitahṛdayo jāyate paryāp‍tamaṇḍano yuvatijanaḥ ||)
ṇimmaviamaṃḍaṇāṇa vi sohā vāsaavimāṇiāṇa vimaliā |
mohaṃ ṇevacchamiṇaṃ piaoso ccia pasāhaṇaṃ juaīṇaṃ || 157 ||
(nirmitamaṇḍanānāmapi śobhā vāsakavimānitānāṃ vigalitā |
moghaṃ nepathyametat priyatoṣa eva prasādhanaṃ yuvatīnām ||)
(52) samānalīlāvidyāvittavayasānurūpālāpairāsanabandho goṣṭhī| tasyāṃ viharaṇaṃ goṣṭhīvihāraḥ| tatra ca—
puṣpopahārāja—vijṛmbhita—piṇḍa—dhūpe dīpāṃśubhiḥ kapiśite dhṛtadāmni harmye |
kāntāsakhaḥ sahacarānugataśca kāmī ś‍yāmāmukhe smitamukho vidadhīta goṣṭhīm || 158 ||
saṅgītamatra kalayenmṛdukākalībhiḥ gāthāḥ paṭhecca masṛṇamadanāgradūtīḥ |
dvayarthaiḥ padaiḥ piśunayecca rahasyavastu hṛdyaṃ hasecca daśanāṃśubhirullasadbhiḥ || 159 ||
tatra gāthā yathā—(saka. 5. 224, 3.57)
poḍhamahilāṇaṃ jaṃ jaṃ suṭhṭhu sikkhiaṃ taṃ rae suhāvei |
jaṃ jaṃ asikkhiaṃ ṇavavahūṇa taṃ raïṃ dei || 160 ||
(prauḍhamahilānāṃ yadyat suṣṭhu śikṣitaṃ tattad rate sukhayati |
yadyadaśikṣitaṃ navavadhūnāṃ tattad dhṛtiṃ dadāti ||)
dvayarthapadaprayogo yathā—(vala. 538)
caṃdaṇavaliaṃ diḍhakaṃcibaṃdhaṇaṃ dīharaṃ supariṇāhaṃ |
hoi ghare sāhīṇaṃ musalaṃ dhaṇṇāṇa mahilāṇa || 161 ||
(candanavalitaṃ dṛḍhakāñcībandhanaṃ dīrghaṃ supariṇāham |
bhavati gṛhe svādhīnaṃ musalaṃ dhanyānāṃ mahilānām ||)
(53) ratyāvāsapraveśo vāsagṛhopagamanam, yathā—(seba. 10.59)
vevaï sasii kilammaï saaṇe āmuaï ṇīsaho aṃgāiṃ |
ṇa viṇajjaï kiṃ bhīo o maaparavvaso vilāsiṇīsattho || 162 ||
(vepate śvasiti klāmyati śayane āmuñcati nissaho 'ṅgāni |
na vijñāyate kiṃ bhīta uta madaparavaśo vilāsinīsārthaḥ ||)
ṇevaccha—diṇṇa—hiao osāria—sahīaṇo—aṃtaṭṭhioṃ ṇihuaṃ |
pecchaï āittapahaṃ pia—paḍivatti—rasio vilāsiṇīsattho || 163 ||
(nepathyadattahṛdayo 'pasāritasakhījano 'ntaḥsthito nibhṛtam |
prekṣate ādīp‍tapathaṃ priyapratipattirasiko vilāsinīsārthaḥ ||)
ālihadi piaamā āsaṇṇavioaṃ vammahaāura—hiaaṃ |
pulaüggameṇa pisuṇiakeavamāṇavimuhaṃ vilāsiṇisatthaṃ || 164 ||
(ālikhati priyatamā āsannaviyogaṃ manmathāturahṛdayam |
pulakodgamena piśunitakaitavamānavimukha vilāsinīsārtham ||)
appei a juvaïjaṇo tāviadaïāe sammuhādaṃsa—diṇṇaṃ |
hiaappahuttamahiaṃ maaṇa—vahuppaṃta—loaṇo pariosaṃ || 165 ||
(arpayati ca yuvatijanaḥ tāpitadayitāyāḥ sammukhādarśadattam |
hṛdayaprabhūtamahitaṃ madanaprabhavallocanaḥ paritoṣam ||)
(54) madanārtāgāmikāmīnīpratipālanamabhisārikāpratīkṣaṇaṃ, yathā—(seba. 10.65)
ahisāraṇaṃ ṇa geṇhaï ṇa saṃṭhavei alaaṃ ṇa pucchaï āīṃ dūiṃ |
caṃdāloapaḍihao vevaï mūḍhahiao vilāsiṇisattho || 166 ||
(abhisāraṇaṃ na gṛhṇāti na saṃsthāpayati alakaṃ na pṛcchati ālīm |
candrālokapratihato vepate mūḍhahṛdayo vilāsinīsārthaḥ ||)
ahisāraṇaṭṭhapatthe cira—gamaṇuvvāa—ṇīsahāṇaṃ samaaṇaṃ |
vīsamaṃuṃ paḍhamagaaṃ ṇa dei jubarīṇa suraaturiaṃ hiaaṃ || 167 ||
(abhisāraṇārthaprasthite ciragamanakhinnanissahānāṃ samadanam |
viśramituṃ prathamagataṃ na dadāti yuvatīnāṃ suratatvaritaṃ hṛdayam ||)
asamattamaṃḍaṇa ccia vacca gharaṃ se sakouhallassa |
volāvia—halahalaassa putti citte ṇa laggihisi || 168 ||
(asamāp‍tamaṇḍanaiva vraja gṛhaṃ taya sakautūhalasya |
vyatikrāntautsukyasya putri citte na lagiṣyasi ||) (gāsa. 1. 21)
aliapasuttaa viṇimīliaccha de suhaa majjha oāsaṃ |
gaṃḍa—pariuṃbaṇā—pulaïaṃga ṇa uṇo cirāihassaṃ || 169 ||
(alīkaprasup‍taka vinimilītākṣa dadasva subhaga mamāvakāśam |
gaṇḍa—paricumbanā—pulikitāṅga! na punaścirayiṣyāmi || ) (gāsa. 1.20)
(55) priyajanāhvānāya sakhyādisampreṣaṇaṃ dūtīvisarjanaṃ, yathā—(gāsa. 2.81)
dūi tumaṃ via ṇiuṇā kakkhaḍa—maüāi jāṇase bolluṃ |
kaṃḍūiapuṃḍuraṃ jaha ṇa hoi taha taṃ kuṇijjāsu || 170 ||
(dūti tvameva nipuṇā karkaśamṛdukāni jānīṣe vaktum |
kaṇḍūyitapāṇḍuraṃ yathā na bhavati tathā tat kariṣyasi ||)
ṇivasasi dukkhasahāā maha hiae so pio tahiṃ cea |
sahi suṇaha do vi tumhe paramatthaṃ va saṃdisimo || 171 ||
(nivasasi duḥkhasahāyā mama hṛdaye sa priyastatraiva |
sakhi! śrṛṇuta dvāvapi yuvāṃ paramārthameva sandiśāmaḥ ||)
suraa—suha—lālasāhiṃ piaama—ratthaṃtaresu puṇaruttaṃ |
pesijjaṃti sarahasaṃ samaaṃ dūrhahi diṭṭhīo || 172 ||
(suratasukhalālasābhiḥ priyatamapathāntareṣu punaruktam |
preṣyante sarabhasaṃ samakaṃ dūtībhirduṣṭayaḥ ||)
ahiaṃ samāgamāhiṃ vi piaamasaṃdesiāhiṃ dūīhiṃ |
sokkhaṃ dhūṇaṃdaarā sīsaṃtā detti saṃdesā || 173 ||
(adhikaṃ samāgamairapi priyatamasandiṣṭābhiḥ ālībhiḥ |
saukhyaṃ dhūyamānakarāḥ śiṣyamāṇāḥ dadati sandeśāḥ ||)
(56) nimittaviśeṣāt priyāṇāṃ gamane svayaṃ tā tatra gacchediti svayaṃ vā gamanaṃ yathā—
vicchiṃdijjaï dhīraṃ dāragaā paḍivahaṃ ṇa ṇijjaï diṭṭhī |
gammaï hiaammi gae piāṇaṃ gaadūimaggaü ccia vasahiṃ || 174 ||
(vicchidyate dhairyaṃ dvāragatā pratipathaṃ na nīyate dṛṣṭiḥ |
gamyate hṛdaye gate priyāṇāṃ gatadūtīmārgata eva vasatima ||)
paḍhamapahāe puhikkio paosa—kāla—paḍisiddhavīrābhe |
pecchaï gamaṇeddhavahe caṃdakarāappie pie juaïjaṇo || 175 ||
(prathamaprabhayā pṛthakkṛtaḥ pradoṣakālapratiṣiddhavīrābhe |
prekṣate gamanārdhapathe candrakarārpitān priyān yuvatijanaḥ ||)
seulliasavvaṃgī gottaggahaṇeṇa tassa suhaassa |
dūiṃ appāeṃtī tassea gharaṃgaṇaṃ pattā || 176 ||
(svedārdritasarvāṅgī nāmagrahaṇena tasya subhagasya |
dūtīṃ pratyāyayantī tasyaiva gṛhāṅgaṇaṃ prāp‍tā ||) (gāsa. 5.40)
suhaücchaaṃ jaṇaṃ dullahaṃ pi dūrāhi amha āṇeṃta |
uavaāraa jara jīaṃ pi ṇeṃta ṇa kaāvarāho si || 177 ||
(sukhapṛcchakaṃ janaṃ durlabhamapi vidūrādasmākamānayan |
upakāraka jvaraka jīvamapi nayanna kṛtāparādho 'si ||) (gāsa. 1.50)
(57) prāp‍tasyābhyutthānādipratipattirāgatopacāraḥ, yathā—
jaṇiaharisāṇa takkhaṇahiaāpaḍiaṃ pi piaamabbhuṭṭhāṇaṃ |
aṃgehi kāmiṇīṇaṃ saṃbhāveuṃ maālasehiṃ ṇa caaï || 178 ||
(janitaharṣāṇāṃ tatkṣaṇahṛdayāpatitamapi priyatamābhyutthānam |
aṅgeḥ kāminīnāṃ sambhāvayituṃ madālasaiḥ na śakyate ||)
kāmiṇījaṇassa sahasā piadaṃsaṇavittharaṃtaharisavimuhiā |
divasaguṇiā vi hiaeṇa hoṃti paḍivattibharasahā ullāvā || 179 ||
(kāminījanasya sahasā priyadarśanavistṛṇvad‍dharṣavimugdhāḥ |
divasaguṇitā api hṛdaye na bhavanti pratipattibharasahā ullāpāḥ ||)
tāmarasakomalāo piakaṃṭhāliṃgaṇe samukkhittāo |
pariaṃmāvelamao juaīṇaṃ dharei vammaho bāhāo || 180 ||
(tāmarasakomalān priyakaṇṭhāliṅgane samutkṣip‍tān |
parimbhāpīḍamayān yuvatīnāṃ dhārayati manmatho bāhān ||)
parimantharābhiralaghūrubharādadhiveś‍ma patyurupacāravidhau |
skalitābhirapyanupadaṃ pramadāḥ praṇayātibhūmimagaman gatibhiḥ || 181 ||
(māgha. 9.78)
(58)āgatānāmanurāgavṛddhaye prasādhanasaṃvāhanādividhiḥ paricaraṇam, yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.27)
tāṃ pulomatanayālakocitaiḥ pārijātakusumaiḥ prasādhayan |
nandane ciramayugmalocanassaspṛhaṃ suravadhūbhirīḍitaḥ || 182 ||
āvivāhasamayād gṛhe vane śaiśave tadanu yauvane punaḥ |
svāpaheturanupāśrito 'nyayā rāmabāhurupadhānameṣa te || 183 || (urāca. 1.37)
lolāṃśukasya pavanākulitāṃśukāntaṃ tvaddṛṣṭibahāri mama locanabāndhavasya |
adhyāsituṃ tava ciraṃ jaghanasthalasya paryāp‍tameva karabhoru! mamoruyugmam || 184 ||(vesaṃ. 2.23)
kiṃ śītalaiḥ klamavinodibhirārdravātān sañcārayāmi nalinīdalatālavṛntaiḥ |
aṅke nidhāya karabhoru! yathāsukhaṃ te saṃvāhayāmi caraṇāvuta padmatāmrau || 185 || (śāku. 3.18)
(59) riraṃsātiśayān sakhyādīnāmanavekṣaṇādibhirutthāpanaṃ visarjanam, yathā—(kirātā. 9.66)
bhartṛṣūpasakhi nikṣipatīnāmātmanaḥ sphuṭamadodyamitānām |
vrīḍayā viphalayā vanitānāṃ na sthitaṃ na vigataṃ hṛdayebhyaḥ || 186 ||
mithyāmīladarālapakṣmaṇi valatyantaḥ kuraṅgīdṛśo dīrghāpāṅgasarittaraṅgasarale talponmukhe cakṣuṣi |
patyuḥ kelimataḥ kathā viramayannanyonyakaṇḍūyanaiḥ ko māṃ vyāharatītyudīrya niragāt savyājamālījanaḥ || 187 ||
madhumadaparipāṭalaprakopadviguṇatarāruṇitekṣaṇaṃ mṛgākṣyā |
ratirasamanayā ghanāparādhaṃ priyāmiva serṣyadṛśā vyaloki dīpaḥ || 188 ||
atha ratirabhasādalīkanidrāmadhuravighūrṇitalocanotpalābhiḥ |
śayanatalamaśiśrayan vadhūbhiḥ sahamadamanmathamantharā yuvānaḥ || 189 ||
(60) kūrpāsakavibhūṣaṇādityāgaḥ kañcukādimokṣaḥ, yathā—
savvaṃgattā (savvaṃgāo) hiakaṃcuammi maṇivalaaṇibiḍaparic‍cate |
de raï—lālasa—līlā—visūriaṃ sahaü mihuṇassa || 190 ||
(sarvāṅgād hṛtakañcuke maṇimalayanibiḍaparityak‍te |
tāvat ratilālasalīlākhinnaṃ rājatu mithunasya ||)
khippaï hāro thaṇamaṃḍalāhi taruṇīhiṃ ramaṇapariraṃbhe |
agghiaguṇā vi guṇino lahanti lahuattaṇaṃ kāle || 191 ||
(kṣipyate hāraḥ stanamaṇḍalāt taruṇībhī ramaṇaparirambhe |
arcitaguṇā api guṇino labhante laghutvaṃ kāle ||) (gāsa. 5.29)
vīsaṃtassa vilāsiṇihie kusumāuhassa rasaṇāe |
puṇṇāhamaṃgalaṃ via gijjaü muc‍caṃtabaṃdhāe || 192 ||
(viśrāmyato vilāsinīhṛdaye kusumāyudhasya raśanayā |
puṇyāhamaṅgalamiva gīyate mucyamānabandhayā ||)
uttāria—ṇeura—hāra—tilaa—tāḍaṃka—valaa—rasaṇaṃmi |
avihaapasaro maaṇo dhāvaï aṃgammi taruṇīṇaṃ || 193 ||
(uttārita—nūpura—hāra—tilaka—tāṭaṅka—valaya—raśane |
avihataprasaro madano dhāvatyaṅge taruṇīnām ||)
(61) (surato) pakramo ratārambhaḥ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.79, 80.4)
tatkṣaṇaṃ viparivartitāhriyorniṣya/ cchatoḥ śayanamiddharāgayoḥ |
sā babhūva vaśavartinī dvayoḥ śūlinaḥ suvadanā madasya ca1 || 194 ||
ghūrṇamānanayanaṃ skhalatkathaṃ/caṃ svedabindumada—kāraṇasmitam |
ānanena na tu tāvadīśvaraścakṣuṣā ciramumāmukhaṃ papau || 195 ||
nābhideśanihitaḥ sakampayā śaṅkarasya rurudhe tayā karaḥ |
taddukūlamatha cābhavat svayaṃ dūramucch‌vasitanīvibandhanam || 196 ||
gholaï tahiṃ tahiṃ cia ṇa taraï taruṇīe laṃghaüṃ majjha |
ṇābhimahāvattabhamāḍio vva hattho piaamassa || 197 ||
(ghūrṇati tatra tatraiva na śak‍noti taruṇyā laṅghituṃ madhyam |
nābhimahāvartabhrānta iva hastaḥ priyatamasya ||)
1. madasya ca = madanasyeti rāghavaḥ, madanasya ceti jośeraḥ |
(62) āliṅganādiprayogo ratam, yathā—(māgha. 10.42)
uttarīyavinayāt trapamāṇā rundhatī kila tadīkṣaṇamārgam |
āvariṣṭa vikaṭena vivọdhurvakṣasaiva kucamaṇḍalamanyā || 198 ||
loladṛṣṭivadanaṃ dayitāyāś‍cumbati priyatame rabhasena |
vrīḍayā saha vinīvi nitambādaṃśukaṃ śithilatāmupapede || 199 ||
(kirātā. 9. 47)
sītkṛtāni maṇitaṃ karuṇoktiḥ s‍nigdhamuktamalamarthavacāṃsi |
hāsabhūṣaṇaravāśca ramaṇyāḥ kāmasūtrapadatāmupajagmuḥ || 200 ||
(māgha. 10.75)
nāndīpadāni ratināṭakavigh‍naśāntāvājñākṣarāṇi paramāṇyathavā smarasya |
daṣṭe 'dhare praṇayinā vidhutāgrapāṇessītkāraśuṣkaruditāni jayanti nāryāḥ || 201 ||
(63) samprayogavirāmo ratāvasānaṃ yathā— (māgha. 10.80,88,82,84)
prāpya manmathamadādatibhūmiṃ durvahastanabharāḥ suratasya |
śaśramuḥ śramajalārdralalāṭaśliṣṭakeśamasitāyatakeś‍yaḥ || 202 ||
viśramārthamupagūḍhamajasraṃ yat priyaiḥ prathamaratyavasāne |
yoṣitāmuditamanmathamādau tad dvitīyasuratasya babhūva || 203 ||
prekṣaṇīyakamivekṣaṇamāsāṃ hrīvibhaṅguravilocanapātāḥ |
sambhramadrutagṛhītadukūlacchādyamānavapuṣaḥ suratāntāḥ || 204 ||
śliṣṭacandanaviśeṣakabhaktibhraṣṭabhūṣaṇakadarthitamālyaḥ |
sāparādha iva maṇḍanamāsīdātmanaiva sṛdṛśāmupabhogaḥ || 205 ||
(64) ratāvasāne sukhasvāpo nidrānubhavaḥ, yathā—(saka. 5.470)
āśleṣiṇaḥ pṛthutaraklamaśītapītamāyāminīrghanamudo rajanīryuvānaḥ |
ūrvormuhurvalayabandhanasandhilolapādāntasaṃvalitatūlapaṭāḥ svapanti || 206 ||
laghuni tṛṇakuṭīre kṣetrakoṇe yavānāṃ navakalama-1 palālasrastare sopadhāne |
pariharati suṣup‍taṃ hālikadvandvamārāt kucakalaśamahoṣmābaddharekhastuṣāऱḥ || 207 ||
1. kalama = kamala rāghavaḥ |
vrīhiḥ stambakariḥ, prabhūtapayasaḥ pratyāgatā dhenavaḥ, pratyujjīvitabhikṣuṇā bhṛśamiti dhyāyannapetānyadhīḥ |
sāndrośīrakuṭumbinīstanabharavyālup‍tagharmaklamo deve nīramudāramujjhati sukhaṃ śete niśi grāmaṇīḥ || 208 ||

(māgha. 11. 13)

visrambhaṇādisambhogabhedāvacchedahetavaḥ || 210 ||
catuṣṣaṣṭirato 'traiva kecid visrambhaṇādayaḥ |

sambhoga uktaḥ prathamānurāgādanantarasso 'yamanekabhedaḥ |

1. 'yacchandago' iti rāghavaḥ, yacchabdayogo jo.
naivaṃ, yato 'nanyathāsiddhābhyāmevānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śabdārthayoḥ sambandhā— vadhāraṇam, ananyathāsiddhau cemau | tathā hi yatra bṛṃhitaṃ hīyate, heṣitamupajāyate reṇucakramanvayi tatra hastino hīyante pipīlikānvayinyaḥ; na caitāvatā reṇucakrasya pipilikā anvayinyo bhavanti, yatra vā kṣīraṃ hīyate dadhyupajāyate pātramanvayi tatra mādhuryaṃ hīyate amlatopajāyate tṛp‍tiranvayinī | na caitāvatā pātrasya tṛp‍tiḥ kāryā bhavati | avadhṛtaṃ hi sāmarthyamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pravibhajyate | yathā loke 'vadhi (badhiro ')pi cakṣuṣmānālokayati, satyapi śrotre upahatacakṣurnālokayati rūpamityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cakṣuḥ—śrotrasannidhāne rūpālokanaṃ cakṣuṣa eva vyavasthāpyate na śrotrasya | yasya ca kevalasya yo 'rtho 'vadhṛtaḥ padāntarasannidhāne 'pi sa eva | na hi rasanamasannidhau darśanasya, madhurādivyañjakaṃ darśanasannidhau nīlādivyaktisāmarthyaṃ pratilabhate | prathamānurāgaśabdasya ca kevalasyotkaṇṭhādiṣu mānaśabdasyerṣyāyitādiṣu anantaraśabdasya punaravadhimatsveva sāmarthyamavadhṛtam | teṣāṃ tāvānevārtho bhavati, yaḥ punaḥ padayoritaretaropaśleṣāt vistrambhaṇādirmānaśaithilyādirvā avadhimad‌viśeṣo 'bhyadhikaḥ pratīyate vākyārthaḥ sa bhavatīti |

(1) deśakālotkaṇṭhādibhirmānāpacayo mānaśaithilyam, yathā—(gāsa. 1.74)
pudṛḍhamaṇṇudūmiāeṁ vi gahio dayiammi pecchaha imāe |
osaraï vāluāmuṭṭhiu vva māṇo surasuraṃto || 2 ||
(prauḍha/ dṛḍhamanyudūnayāpi gāḍhaṃ gṛhite ' nayā paś‍yata dayite |
apasarati vālukāmuṣṭiriva mānaḥ surusurāyamāṇaḥ ||)
a/uvvahaï daïagaï/hiāharojja/ṭṭhajjhijjaṃtarosapaḍirāaṃ/ yaṃ |
pāṇosaraṃtamaïraṃ va paliha/ phaliacasaaṃ mahuṃ bālā || 3 ||
(udvahati dayitagṛhītādharoṣṭhakṣīyamāṇaroṣapratirāgam |
pānāpasaranmadiramiva sphaṭikacaṣakaṃ mukhaṃ bālā ||) (gauḍa. 690)
(2) gacchato mānasya cihnāni mānāpagamanaliṅgāni, yathā—(gāsa. 2.88)
ṇeurakoḍivilaggaṃ cihuraṃ daïassa paāpaḍiassa |
hiaaṃ paütthamāṇaṃ ummoaṃti ccia kahei || 4 ||
(nūpurakoṭivilag‍‍naṃ cikuraṃ dayitasya pādapatitasya |
hṛdayaṃ mānapravṛttamunmo‌cayantyeva kathayati ||)
ālokya priyatamaṃśuke vinīvau yattasthe namitamukhendu mānavatyā |
tannūnaṃ padamavalokayāmbabhūva mānasya drūtamapayānamāsthitasya || 5 ||
(māgha. 9.84)
(3) mānagopanaṃ mānāpahnavo yathā—
dattā vācaḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ pūrvavat prītiramyā nyastā dṛṣṭirvadanaśaśino darśitaśca prasādaḥ |
mugdhe mugdhasmitamavikṛtaṃ sarvametad vṛthā te nanvākhyāto rahasi vinayenaiva kopānubandhaḥ || 6 ||
bhrūkuṭirāracitā gatamagrato hṛtamathānanamuktamasādhu vā |
iyamatiprabhutā kriyate balādakupito 'pi hi yatkupito janaḥ || 7 || (saka. 4.156)
(4) mānasyāpasaraṇaṃ mānāpagamaḥ, yathāmdash;
dṛṣṭe locanavartmanā mukulitaṃ pārśvasthite cakrava— nnyagbhūtaṃ bahirāsitaṃ pulakavat sparśaṃ samātanvati |
nīvībandhavadāgataṃ śithilatāṃ sambhāṣamāṇe priye mānenāpasṛtaṃ hniyeva sudṛśaḥ pādaspṛśi preyasi || 8 ||
vihāyaitanmānavyasanamanayoruccakucayo— rnidheyaḥ preyāṃste yadi vayamanullaṅgaghyavacasaḥ |
sakhībhyaḥ snigdhābhyo giramiti niśamyaiṇanayanā nivāpāmbho datte nayanasalilairmānasuhṛde || 9 || (saka. 5.286)
(5) bāṣpamokṣaḥ prarodanaṃ, yathā—(kirātā. 9.45)
savyalīkamavadhīrikhinnaṃ prasthitaṃ sapadi kopapadena |
yoṣitaḥ suhṛdiva sma ruṇaddhi prāṇanāthamabhibāṣpanipātaḥ || 10 ||
na spṛṣṭo 'pi tridaśasarito dūramīrṣyānubandhāṃ nāpyutsṛṣṭo bhujagapatinā tarjanābhirjayāyāḥ |
mānasyānte nayanasalilaiḥ kṣālitaḥ śailapuñyā patyurmaulau natijuṣi jayatyātmanaḥ pādapāṃsuḥ || 11 || (saka. 5.285)
(6) priyeṇa mānavaimalasthādipṛcchā priyābhyupapattiḥ, yathā—
kīsa maliāvaaṃsaṃ vaaṇṇa—ṇīsāsa—paṃḍurāhararāaṃ |
vaaṇaṃ vahasi kisoari! kara—saṃkāmia—kaola—pattālekkhaṃ || 12 ||
(kasmād malināvataṃsaṃ prapannaniḥśvāsapraguṇitādhararāgam |
vadanaṃ vahasi kṛśodari karasaṅgakrāmitakapolapatrālekhyam ||)
kīsa a imesu bahuso visama—ppata—taliṇaṃjaṇacchavi—kalusā |
dīhāvaṃgesu tujjha parigholaṃti ṇaaṇesu bāhuppīḍā || 13 ||
(kasmācca anayoḥ bahuśaḥ viṣamaprāntatalināñjanacchavikaluṣāḥ |
dīrghāpāṅgayostava parigalanti nayanayoḥ bāṣpotpīḍāḥ ||)
(7) mṛṣāniṣedho mudhāpratiṣedhaḥ, yathā—
unnamayya sakacagrahamāsyaṃ cumbati priyatame haṭhavṛttyā |
huṃhu muñca mama ceti ca mandaṃ jalpitaṃ jayati mānavatīnām || 14 ||
ruddhaṃ bāṣpajalena locanayugaṃ tvaddarśanānicchayā gātraṃ tvatparirambhamantarayituṃ romodramenāvṛtam |
vaktuṃ tvāṃ paruṣā giraḥ sphurati me dantacchadaḥ kiṃ mudhā māmāśrliṣyasi nistrapo 'si śaṭha! he naiva prasannāsmi te || 15 ||
(8) sāmavākyāni parisāntvanāni, yathā—(saka. 5.368)
ādhātuṃ vinayaṃ nirāgasi jane kupyantu nāmeśvarā— stena svāśayaśuddhireva sukarā prāyaḥ prabhūṇāṃ puraḥ |
mithyāmānini! manyase yadi tathā nityaṃ manovartinī vācyā tāmarasākṣyavīkṣi subhage!1 kā vā tvadanyā mayā || 16 ||
avahāreūṇa ciraṃ bhaṇasu tumaṃ cia amukkarosā vi phuḍaṃ |
kiṃ agaṇeūṇa imaṃ hojjā tumaṃmi majjha ppamāa-kkhalaṇaṃ || 17 ||
(avadhārya ciraṃ bhaṇa tvamevāmuk‍taroṣāpi sphuṭam |
kiṃ cintayitvedaṃ bhavet tvayi mama pramādadaskhalanam ||)
(9) nānāvidhavarṇanāvākyāni (citracāṭūktayaḥ/) cāṭuktayaḥ, yathā—(amaru. 81)
kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo 'dhararasaḥ |
muhurlag‍na: kaṇṭhe taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭīṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe! na tu vayam || 18 ||
kṛtaprāyā rātriḥ kṛśatanu śanairyena vinaman pradīpo 'yaṃ nidrāvaśamupagato ghūrṇata iva |
praṇāmānto mānastyajasi na tathāpi krudhamaho kucapratyāsattyā hṛdayamapi te caṇḍi! kaṭhinam || 19 ||

(10) vipriyeṣu kāऱṇāntaropanyāsaḥ skhalitagopanāni, yathā—

akkhaṃḍie vi paṇae akaaṃmi vi vippae akajje vi majjha |

(11) pādapatanaṃ praṇipātaḥ, yathā—(harivi.)
to ia suraaru-kāraṇa-maülia-hiaāe sāvasesa-lahuo |

(12) priyapraṇāmavigamanahetavaḥ priyotthāpanāni, yathā—(harivi.)
to se rubbhaṃta ccia hiaaviaṃbhaṃtaharisaveucchaliā |

(13) bāṣpāpanayanam aśrupramārjanaṃ, yathā—(gāsa. 706 ve.)
avasara rottuṃ cia ṇimmiāiṁ mā pusasu me haacchīiṃ |
daṃsaṇamettummaïehiṃ jehiṃ sīlaṃ tuha ṇa ṇāaṃ || 26 ||
(apasara! roditumeva nirmite motpuṃsaya me hatākṣiṇī |

(14) uddhṛtamānaleśo mānaśeṣaḥ, yathā—(māgha. 10.36)

patyuḥ pādanatasya komalakareṇākarṣataḥ saspṛhaṃ māninyā karuṇaspṛhe 'pyanunaye nākuñcito nārpitaḥ || 29 ||
(15) vyalīkānucintanam aparādhasmaraṇaṃ, yathā—(dra. 30.75 api pṛ. 1333)

(16) mānavimanaskatā (premavaimanasyaṃ /) mānavaimanasyāni yathā—
dūsahakaāvarāhaṃ avarāhe vi garue pasāhāhimuhaṃ |
appacchaṃdapaattaṃ piaṃ ca pemmaṃ ca doṇṇi vi hu uccaṃti || 32 ||
(dussahakṛtāparādhaṃ aparādhe 'pi guruke prasādābhimukham |
ātmacchandaḥpravṛttaṃ priyaṃ ca prema ca dvayorapi jugupsante ||)
duragaammi ṇiattaï duraṇivuttaṃ puṇo paattaï pemmaṃ |
kaha hoi pariṇāmo māṇassa ṇamo mahaṃti vimuhijjaṃti || 33 ||
{dūragate nivartate dūranivṛttaṃ punaḥ pravartayati mām |
kathaṃ bhavati pariṇāmo mānasya ṇamo mameti vimuhyanti ||}
(17) kacuprakampanaṃ stanākampaḥ, yathā—
kṛśāsi tvaṃ kasmāt prakṛtiriyamaṅgasya nanu me kimaṅge sūtratvaṃ gurujanakṛto pāva/ sakatayā |
na me doṣaḥ kaścinnahi nahi nahītyevamuditā stanotkampaṃ bālā priyahṛdi nipatya praruditā || 34 ||
parāvṛttyā śete kalayati ca kampasstanataṭīṃ na sandhatte vācaḥ sphurati ca varaṃ vaktumadharaḥ |
viruddhānyaṅgāni ślathakaraṇamāste 'tha ca vapuḥ sakopastanvaṅgagyā manasijavilāso vijayate || 35 ||
(18) mānahānau niḥśvasitāni mānaniḥśvasitāni, yathā—
tīe vialaṃtadhīraṃ abbhuṭṭhaṃtīe khaṇa-paholira-vāhaṃ |
dūrosaraṃta-saraṇaṃ dūraara-valagga-veaṇaṃ ṇīsasiaṃ || 36 ||
(tayā vigaladdhairyamabhyuttiṣṭhantyā kṣaṇapraghūrṇanaśīlabāṣpam |
dūrāpasaratssmaraṇaṃ dūratarāvalag‍navedanaṃ niḥśvasitam ||)
maṇaṃsiṇīe ahiṇavamaïrāmoa—paḍivaddhavammahapasaraṃ |
daïa-jaṇa-diṇṇa-ṇaaṇaṃ vialia-dhīralahuaṃ ciraṃ ṇīsasiaṃ || 37 ||
(manasvinyā abhinavamadirāmodapratibaddhamanmathaprasaram |
dayitajanadattanayanaṃ vigalitadhairyalaghukaṃ ciraṃ niḥśvasitam ||)
(19) mānāpagamādanurāgavṛddhau (svedaromāñcau/) sāttvikāvirbhāvaḥ, yathā—
ṇavaviraa-karāvalaṃbaṇa-suha-paṭhivajjaṃta-ssea-pulaüggamo |
saccā/ bhāmā tā ccia akiaübbariaṃ pi piaamaṃ allīṇā || 38 ||

satyā/ bhāmā tāvadeva ca alīkodbhūtamapi priyatamamālīnā ||)
granthimud‌grathayituṃ hṛdayeśe vāsasaḥ spṛśati mānadhanāyāḥ |
bhrūyugena sapadi pratipede romabhiśca samameva vibhedaḥ || 39 ||

(20) tadvadeva kapoloṣṭhasphuraṇāni kapoloṣṭhaspandanāni, yathā—(gāsa. 6.18)
bāhollaphuria—gaṃḍāharāeṁ bhaṇiaṃ vilakkhahasirīe |
ajja vi kiṃ rūsijjaï savahāvatthaṃ gae pemme || 40 ||
(bāṣpārdrasphuritagaṇḍādharayā bhaṇitaṃ vilakṣahasanaśīlayā |
adyāpi kiṃ ruṣyate śapathāvasthāṃ gate premṇi ||)
āaṃbaṃtakavolaṃ khaliakkharajaṃpiriṃ phurotaṭṭhiṃ |
mā chivasu tti sarosaṃ samosaraṃtiṃ piaṃ bharimo || 41 ||
(ātāmrāntaḥ kapolāṃ skhalitākṣarajalpanaśīlāṃ sphuradoṣṭhīm |

(gāsa. 2.92)
(21) mukhasya mānakāluṣyāpagamo mukhaprasādaḥ, yathā—
āloia ccia pie ṭhavio tīe maaṇeṇa mohaṇasuhao |
kusumadhaṇummi vi bāṇo valaïa-vibbhamaguṇe muhammi pahariso || 42 ||
{ālokita eva priye sthāpitaḥ tasyā madanena mohanasubhagaḥ |
kusumadhanuṣyapi bāṇo (va)layitavibhramaguṇe mukhe praharṣaḥ ||}
thoosaraṃtarosaṃ thoatthoaparivaḍḍhamāṇa-paharisaṃ |
hoi a dūrapasāaṃ uhaa-rasāattavibbhamaṃ tīeṁ muhaṃ || 43 ||
(stokāpasaradroṣaṃ stokamukhastokaparivardhamānapraharṣam |
bhavati ca dūraprasādaṃ ubhayasāyattavibhramaṃ tasyā mukham ||) (harivi.)
(22) tatpratyāyanāni vyājaśapathāḥ, yathā—(rat‍‍nā. 4.1)
savyājairvacanaiḥ priyeṇa vacasā cittānuvṛttyādhikaṃ vailakṣyeṇa pareṇa pādapatanairvākyaiḥ sakhīnāṃ muhuḥ |
pratyāpattimupāgatā mayi tayā devī rudatyā yadā prakṣālyaiva tayaiva bāṣpasalilai kopa 'panītaḥ svayam || 44 ||
muhuraviśadāḥ premaprahvā muhurmuhurasthirāḥ muhurasaralā vistrambhārdrā muhuḥ smṛtamanyavaḥ |
vitathaśapathopālambhāṅkā muhuḥ kṛtasandhayaḥ parivavṛdhire niṣparyantā mitho mithunoktayaḥ || 45 ||
(23) premārdrakopavajñālokā vakravīkṣitāni, yathā—(amaru. 49)
dūrādutsukamāgate vivalitaṃ sambhāṣiṇi sphāritaṃ saṃśliṣyatyaruṇaṃ gṛhītavasane kopāñcitabhrūlatam |
māninyāśrcaraṇānativyatikare bāṣpāmbupūrṇekṣaṇā— ccakṣurjātamaho prapañcamadhuraṃ jātāgasi preyasi || 46 ||
māne mānamupeyuṣi svabhavanaṃ dvārāvasaktāṅgayā kiñcitkampitamantharoruyugayā vrīḍāvanamrabhruvā |
bāṣpāmbhaḥ kaṇapūrapūritadṛśā gacchatpurorathyayā māninyā kṛtavipriyaḥ priyatamastiryakchanairīkṣitaḥ || 47 ||
(24) vyalīkod‌ghaṭṭanamupālambhaḥ, yathā—(harivi.)
sā kusumehiṃ garuiā maha vi kao suhaa daṃsaṇeṇa pasāo |
kahaaṇa pasāasaddo lagaü piāhiaassa imassa tuhaṃ || 48 ||
{sā kusumaiḥ gurūkṛtā mamāpi kṛtaḥ subhaga darśanena prasādaḥ |
kathaṃcana prasādaśabdaḥ lagatu priyāhṛdayasya cāsya tava ||}
sahiaṃ māṇakkhalaṇaṃ ṇāo paḍipakkha—vihāassavvaṇaraso |
sahio tuha (tuha) vioo mā lajjasu suhaa lajjiavvammi mae || 49 ||
(soḍhaṃ mānaskhalanaṃ jñātaḥ pratipakṣavibhātassavraṇarasaḥ |
soḍhastava viyogo mā lajjasva subhaga! lajjitavyaṃ hi mayā ||)
(25) vacanasya prativacanāni pratyuttarāṇi, yathā—
kānte! nātha! vimuñca mānini! ruṣaṃ roṣānmayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ, khedo 'smāsu, na me 'parādhyati bhavān sarve 'parādhā mayi |
tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā, kasyāgrato rudyate, nanvetanmama, kā tavāsmi, dayitā, nāsmītyato rudyate || 50 ||
kiṃ gauri māṃ prati ruṣā, nanu gaurahaṃ kiṃ, kupyāmi kāṃ prati mametyanumānato 'ham |
jānāmyatastvamanumānata eva satya itthaṃ giro giribhuvaḥ kuṭilā jayanti || 51 || (rudraṭakā. 2.15)
(26) mānaśalyoddharaṇamavajñābhraṃśaḥ, yathā—
harisa—viasaṃta—vaaṇaṃ kavola—ala—saṃgalaṃta—pulaübbheaṃ |
appasāhiaṃ pi jāaṃ pasāhiabbhahia—maṇaharaṃ tīe muhaṃ || 52 ||
(harṣavikasad‌vadanaṃ kapolatalasaṅkalatpulakodbhedam |
aprasādhitamapi jātaṃ prasādhitābhyadhikamanoharaṃ tasyā mukham ||) (harivi.)
ṇimmaviasaṃdhiammā tāva a dūrapadibaddha—vammahappasarā |
garuaṃ suraücchāaṃ dāūṇa sahi vva jjāmiṇīṃ tīeṁ gaā || 53 ||
(nirmāpitasandhikarmā tāvac‍ca dūrapratibaddhamanmathaprasarā |
gurukaṃ suratotsāhaṃ datvā sakhīva yāminī tasyā gatā ||) (harivi.)
(27) gạ̄dhānurāgaprakāśaḥ1 premāvirbhāvaḥ, yathā—
sotkaṇṭhaṃ sarasāgati priyatame pādānatiṃ vāñchati smṛtvā manyuvinirgatāśrucaraṇe kliṣṭe tadabhyud‌gamāt |
taṃ cādhūnati marmaṇā vidadhate dṛṣṭa‍vā punaḥ kāntayā premacchedabhiyā kṛtaḥ praṇataye pādārpaṇānugrahaḥ || 54 ||
apayāti saroṣayā niraste kṛtakaṃ kāmini cukṣubhe mṛgākṣyā |
kalayannapi savyatho 'vatasthe 'śakunena skhalitaḥ kiletaro 'pi || 55 ||
(māgha. 9.83)
1. 'prakāśaḥ = praṇāśa' iti rā.
(28) priyānugamanacihnāni premāliṅganāni, yathā—(gāsa. 1.87)
avalaṃbia—māṇa—paraṃmuhīe eṃttassa māṇiṇi piassa |
puṭṭhipuulaüggamo se/tuha kahei saṃmuhaṭhṭhiaṃ hiaaṃ || 56 ||
(avalambitamānaparāṅmukhyā prāp‍tasya māninī priyasya |
vardhitapulakodgamā he kathayati sammukhasthitaṃ hṛdayam ||)
vividhavilasadbhāvākūtā tanusmaraghūrṇitā nibiḍapulakā gạ̄dhāśleṣaṃ balādabhivāñchati |
nayanaviṣayaṃ yāte tasmin vicāravidhikriyāṃ tyajati hṛdayaṃ kopastasmin jane sakhi! kīdṛśaḥ || 57 ||
(29. priyoparodhaḥ)
prāṇośaścaraṇānato dayitayā nopekṣito nekṣitaḥ |
( ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰) || 58 ||
tīe vialaṃtadhīraṃ abbhuṭ‌ṭhaṃtīe khaṇapaholibāhaṃ |
dūrosaraṃtasaraṇaṃ dūraaravalaggaveaṇaṃ ṇīsasiaṃ || 59 ||(dra.pṛ. 1207)
(tayā vigaladdhairyamabhyuttiṣṭhantyā kṣaṇapraghūrṇanaśīlabāṣpam |
dūrāpasaratsmaraṇaṃ dūrataravalag‍navedanaṃ niḥśvasitam ||)
(30) rateratiprakarṣaḥ śrṛṅgāravṛddhiḥ, yathā—(harivi.)
gheppaṃti appaṇa c‍cia kaāvarāhāhiṃ kāmiṇīhiṃ piaamā |
kiṃ ia sikkhāveṃto avarijjhaï piaṃ karoi mahumao || 60 ||
(gṛhyanta ātmanaiva kṛtāparādhābhiḥ kāminībhiḥ priyatamāḥ |
kimiti śikṣayan aparādhyati? priyaṃ karoti madhumadaḥ ||)
āyātaḥ kṛtavipriyaḥ priyasakhīdattāpajāpaścirāt smṛtvā cāṭu sasādhvasaṃ nipatitaḥ prāp‍tāntaraḥ pādayoḥ |
na śliṣṭaḥ sa ruṣā na cāpi virahakliṣṭātmanā bhartsito māninyā nayanāmbhaseva patatā kiṃ nāma noktaḥ priyaḥ || 61 ||
(31) balāt keśagrahaṇaṃ haṭhakacagrahaḥ, yathā—
uggāhiaṃ ṇa bhaṇiaṃ hiae ciraciṃtiaṃ pi rāapariṇāmaṃ |
māṇaṃsiṇīe piaama—sarahasa—kaa—ggahiaṃmi māṇaggahaṇe || 62 ||
(ud‍grāhitaṃ na bhaṇitaṃ hṛdaye ciracintitamapi rāgapariṇāmam |
manasvinyā priyatamarabhasakacagṛhīte māna—grahaṇe ||)
sakaaggaharahasuttāṇiāṇaṇā piaï piamuha—viiṇṇaṃ |
thoaṃ thoaṃ rososahaṃ va māṇaṃsiṇī maïraṃ || 63 ||
(sakacagraharabhasottānitānanā pibati priyatamavitīrṇām |
>stokaṃ stokaṃ mānauṣadhamiva manasvinī madirām ||) (gāsa. 6. 50)
(32) balādāliṅganaṃ prasahyāśleṣaḥ, yathā—
laṃbha/rosapusiāvarāho rahasāliṃgaṇa-viiṇṇa-vammaï-ppasaro |
hoi ramiavvajoggo daïa-balāmoḍi-cuṃbio juaïjaṇo || 64 ||
(lambhaproñchitāparādho rabhasāliṅganavitīrṇamanmathaprasaraḥ |
bhavati ramitavyayogyo dayitabalātkāracumbito yuvatijanaḥ ||)
agghaï valaṃtadhīraṃ daïahaṭhāliṃgaāṇa ṇaaṇacuṃbiaṃ |
visamapariaṭṭiamuhaṃ samuhavalaṃtahiaaṃ vilāsavaīṇaṃ || 65 ||
(a/rghati valamānadhairyaṃ dayitahaṭhāliṅgitānāṃ nayanacumbitam |
viṣamaparivardhitamukhaṃ saṃmukhavaladdha‍ṛdayaṃ vilāsavatīnām ||)
(33) hastenābhighātaḥ pāṇitāḍanam, yathā—(līlāvatī)
mudhe vapaveviraṃguli-ṇaha-muha-sippaṃta-seya-salileṇa |
hatthullaeṇa hatthaaleṇaṃ māṇiṇi mā haṇasu piaṃ tulijjihisi || 66 ||
(mugdhe! pravepanaśīlāṅgulinakhamukhasicyamānasvedasalilena |
hastārdreṇa hastatalena mānini! mā jahi priyaṃ tulayiṣyasi ||)
ekkaṃ paharugavviṇṇaṃaṃ hatthaṃ muhamārueṇa vīaṃto |
so vi hasaṃtīe mae gahio vīeṇa kaṃṭhammi || 67 || (gāsa. 1.86)
(ekaṃ prahārodvig‍naṃ hastaṃ mukhamārutena vījayan |
so 'pi hasantyā mayā gṛhītaḥ dvitīyena kaṇṭhe ||)
(34) caraṇāhatiḥ pādābhighātaḥ, yathā—
caraṇāhaassa païṇo pulaïa matthālaaṃ puloaṃtī |
savaï sakajjala-bāha-cchaleṇa māṇaṃsiṇī māṇaṃ || 68 ||
(caraṇāhatasya patyuḥ pulakitamastālakaṃ pralokayantī |
sravati sakajjalavāṣpacchalena manasvinī mānam ||)
manasijasarasīvikāsipadmaḥ priyatamaulivilolanaikadakṣaḥ |
praṇayaja-kalaheṣu vāmapādo jayati raṇanmaṇinūpuraḥ priyāyāḥ || 69 ||
(35) priyakadarthanaṃ dayitayātanā, yathā—(raghu. 19.17)
aṅgulīkisalayāgratarjanaṃ bhrūvibhaṅgakuṭilaṃ ca vīkṣitam |
mekhalābhirasakṛc‍ca bandhanaṃ vañcayan praṇayinīravāpa saḥ || 70 ||
kopāt komalalolabāhulatikāpāśena baddhvā dṛḍhaṃ nītvā vāsaniketanaṃ dayitayā sāyaṃ sakhīnāṃ puraḥ |
bhūyo naivamiti skhalatkalagirā saṃsūcya duśceṣṭitaṃ dhanyo hanyata eva nihnutiparaḥ preyān rudatyā hasan || 71 || (amaru. 9)
(36) anunayāvadhīritakāntopacchandanaṃ (pratyanunayaḥ/)pratyāyanam, yathā—
preyān so 'yamapākṛtassaśapathaṃ pādānataḥ kāntayā dvitrāṇyeva padāni vāsabhavanād yāvanna yātyunmanāḥ |
tāvat pāṇisarojasampuṭalasannīvīnibaddhaṃ dhṛto dhāvitvaiva kṛtapraṇāmakamaho premṇo vicitrā gatiḥ || 72 ||
kopavatyanunayānagṛhītvā prāgatho madhumadāhitamohā |
kopitaṃ virahakheditaceto kāntameva kalayatyanuninye || 73 || (māgha. 10.29)
(37) s‍nehavāmatā premavaikṛkatāni, yathā—(gāsa. 7.75)
atthak‍karūsaṇaṃ khaṇa-pasijjaṇaṃ alia-vaaṇa-ṇibbaṃdho |
ummaccharasaṃtāvo puttaa! paaī siṇehassa || 74 ||
(ākasmikaroṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇaprasādanamalīkavacananirbandhaḥ |
unmatsarasaṃtāpaḥ putraka! padavī s‍nehasya ||)
kathamapi sakhi! krīḍāyogād vrajeti mayoditaḥ kaṭhinahṛdayaḥ śayyāṃ tyaktvā balād gata eva saḥ |
iti sarabhasagrastapremṇi vyapetadaye spṛhāṃ punarapi hatavrīḍaṃ cetaḥ karoti karomi kim || 75 || (amaru. 15)
(38) mānāpagamād vrīḍāyogo lajjāgamaḥ, yathā—(saka. 5.322)
thoārūḍhamahumaā khaṇapamhaṭṭhāvarāha—diṇṇullāvā |
hasiūṇa saṃṭhavijjaï pieṇa saṃbharialajjiā kā vi piā || 76 ||
(stokārūḍhamadhumadā kṣaṇaprasmṛtāparādhadattollāpā |
hasitvā saṃsthāpyate priyeṇa saṃsmṛtalajjitā kāpi priyā ||)
karajadaśanacihnaṃ naiśamaṅge 'nyanārījanitamiti saroṣādīrṣyayā śaṅkamānām |
smarasi na khalu dattaṃ mattayaitat tvayaivetyanunayati navọdhāṃ lajjamānāṃ vilāsī || 77 ||
(māgha. 11.37)
(39) mānavati śobhā mānarāmaṇīyakāni, yathā—
bhavatu ruṣi kaṭhorā kintu ramyā mṛgākṣī nirupadhimadhurāṇāṃ svādavo 'mī vikārāḥ |
śrayati kaṭhinabhāgaśśuktipātreṣvapo yāḥ ka iva na bahumānastāsu muktāḥ phalāntāḥ || 78 ||
sodyogasya skhalitavacaso yat‍nasaṃstambhitā śrīḥ sāvegasya śramajalabhṛto nirṇimittasmitasya |
bhūyo bhūyaḥ kṛtakaghaṭitabhrūlatābhaṅgaketo— rmānasyāsyā rahasi kathitāpahnutasyāsti nārghaḥ || 79 ||
(40) sakhīrahovṛttāntavarṇanaṃ vistrambhasambhāṣā, yathā—(amaru. 155)
sakhyāstāni vacāṃsi yāni bahuśo 'dhītāni yuṣmanmukhād vakṣye 'haṃ bahuśikṣitā kṣaṇamiti dhyātvāsmi mānaṃ gatā |
dhūrtenetyatha maṇḍalīkṛtakucaṃ gāḍhaṃ samāliṅgya māṃ pītānyeva sahādhareṇa hasatā cakṣuḥ/vaktra—sthitānyeva me || 80 ||
kopānirvahaṇāt tathaiva śayane paryasya maunavratai— rna sthātuṃ kṣamayā balād vivalanapratyutsuke cetasi |
mithyāmīlitalocanaṃ sarabhasavyāvṛttamuktā ( 'lakaṃ nirni)dro 'calanā1 kila priyatamo rātrau mayāliṅgitaḥ || 81 ||
1. ॰ ॰ drāvalayeti rā. jo. | mūlamasmadukalpitam |
(41) mānadhāraṇasāmarthyaṃ (mānāsak‍tiḥ/) mānaśaktiḥ, yathā—(gāsa. 2.95)
kelie vi rūseuṁ ṇa tīraeṁ tasmi cuk‍kaviṇaammi |
māe jāiaehiṃ va imehiṃ avasehiṃ aṃgehiṃ || 82 ||
(kelyāpi ruṣitaṃ na śakyate tasmin cyutavinaye |
mātaḥ! yācitakairivaibhiravaśairaṅgaiḥ ||)
acchīiṁ tā thaïssaṃ dohi vi hatthehi tasmi diṭṭhammi |
aṃgaṃ kalaṃba/ kusumaṃ va pulaïaṃ kahaṃ ṇu ḍhak‍kissaṃ || 83 ||
(akṣiṇī tāvat sthagayiṣyāmi dvābhyāmapi hastābhyāṃ tasmin dṛṣṭe |
aṅgaṃ kadamba/kusumamiva pulakitaṃ kathaṃ nu cchādayiṣyāmi ||)
(gāsa. 4.14)
(42) mānāpagame 'pi mānaliṅgāviṣkaraṇaṃ mānapratipādanam, yathā—
sphuṭo vācyo roṣaḥ sphurati paritoṣo nayanayo— rvibhug‍ne bhrūlekhe vikasati kapolasthalamidam |
mukhaṃ tiryakprītiṃ gamayati ca romāñcanicayaḥ priye dussampādā kṛtakakupitasya sthitiriyam || 84 ||
sā yāvanti padānyalīkapiśunairālījanaiḥ pāṭhitā tāvantyeva kṛtāgaso drutataraṃ saṃlapya patyuḥ puraḥ |
prārabdhā parito yathā manasijasyecchā tathā vartituṃ premṇo maugdhyavibhūṣaṇasya sahajaḥ ko 'pyeṣa kāntaḥ kramaḥ || 85 ||
(43) mānahānau vayasyā narma sakhīparihāsaḥ, yathā—
॰ ॰ ॰ cetasi vartate stanacakraṃ ॰ ॰ ॰ |
viśālākṣa ॰ ॰ ॰ te (s) sakhi padāṅkitam || 86 ||
idamamlānamālāyā lag‍naṃ stanataṭe tava |
chādyatāmuttarīyeṇa navaṃ nakhapadaṃ sakhi || 87 || (kāvyāda. 2.289)
(44) mānapaścāttāpo mānānuśayaḥ, yathā—
agahiadaïāṇuṇao pacchaāṇuṇei aṇusaavīsaṃvalio |
kaïavaṇirūviamaaṇalahuio juaïjaṇo || 88 ||
(agṛhītadayitānunayaḥ paś‍cādanunanayati anuśayavisaṃvalitaḥ |
kaitavanirūpitamadanalaghūkṛto yuvatijanaḥ ||)
pāapaḍio ṇa gaṇio piaṃ bhaṇaṃto vi appiaṃ bhaṇio |
gacchaṃto vi ṇa ṇiruddho bhaṇa kassa kae kao māṇo || 89 || (gāsa. 5.32)
(pādapatito na gaṇitaḥ priyaṃ bhaṇannapyapriyaṃ bhaṇitaḥ |
gacchannapi na niruddho bhaṇa kasya kṛte kṛto mānaḥ ||)
(45) mānajugupsā mānanindā, yathā—
utkṣepo hṛdaye, skhalanti vacanānyāvegalolaṃ mano gātraṃ sīdati cakṣuraśrukaluṣaṃ kaṇṭho 'varuddhasvaraḥ |
yasyaiṣā sakhi! pūrvaraṅgaracanā mānaḥ sa mukto mayā vandyāstā api yoṣitaḥ kṣititale yāsāmasau sammataḥ || 90 ||
ṇaïpūrasacchahe jovvaṇammi diahesu ṇiccapahiesu |
aṇiattāsu a rāīsu putti kiṃ daḍḍhamāṇeṇa || 91 ||
(nadīpūrasadṛkṣe yauvane divaseṣu niyatiprahiteṣu |
anirvṛtāsu ca rātriṣu putri! kiṃ dagdhamānena || ) (gāsa. 1.45)
(46) mānasyānusmaraṇaṃ mānānucintanaṃ, yathā—(gāsa. 2.8)
calaṇoāsa—ṇisaṇṇassa tassa bharimo aṇālavaṃtassa |
pāaṃguṭṭhāvẹdhiakesadịdhāaḍ‍ḍhaṇasuhelliṃ || 92 ||
(caraṇāvakāśaniṣaṇṇasya tasya smarāmo 'nālapataḥ |
pādāṅguṣṭhāveṣṭitakeśadṛ̣dhākarṣaṇasukhakelim ||)
bharimo se saaṇa-parammuhīe vialaṃta-māṇa-pasarāe |
kaïava-suttuvvaṇa-thaṇa-kalasa-ppelliṇa-suhelliṃ || 93 || (gāsa. 4.68)
(smarāmastasyāḥ śayanaparāṅgamukhyā vigalanmānaprasarāyāḥ |
kaitavasup‍todvṛttastanabharotpreraṇasukhakelim ||)
(47) mānabhaṅgo mānapradhvaṃsaḥ, yathā—(amaru. 23)
ekasmiñchayane parāṅamukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyato— ranyonyaṃ hṛdayepsite 'pyanunaye saṃrakṣatorgauravam |
paścādākulayorapāṅgavalanānmiśrībhavaccakṣuṣo— rbhag‍nā mānakaliḥ sahāsa—rabhasa—vyāsakta—kaṇṭhagrahaiḥ || 94 ||
aṇṇoṇṇa-cchala-pesia-tulagga-melīṇa-diṭhṭhi-pasarāiṃ |
doṃ vi vaṇe taha kaabhaṃḍaṇāi samaaṃ pahasiāiṃ || 95 ||
(anyonyacchalapreṣita—tulāgramilitadṛṣṭiprasarau |
dvāvapi vane tathā kṛtakalahau samakaṃ prahasitau ||) (gāsa. 7.99)
(48) pradhvastamānasya punaradud‍gamo mānapunarbhāvaḥ, yathā—
mānanirodhādhāra tvaṃ gaccha śivāste bhavantu panthānaḥ |
amunā baddhāñjalinā hṛdayamaśeṣaṃ nipītaṃ me || 96 ||
cūe caḍeviṇu kkāilaïṃ paüṃ pi ugguṭaaṃ |
(taṃ tahā patiaṃ) taruṇīaṇe jaṃ jaṃme vi pammuttā || 97 ||
(cūte āruhya kokilayā evamapi udaghuṣṭam |
tat tathā patitaṃ taruṇījane yad janmanyapi pramuk‍tā ||)
mānānantara ityeṣa sambhogasya ca varṇitaḥ |
pravāsānantarasyāsya svarūpamupavarṇyate || 98 ||
(2)
tatra ratiprakarṣanimittābhilaṣaṇīyāliṅganādyavāp‍tihetavaḥ priyāgamanavārtāpriya— sakhīvākyādayaḥ sambhogaśabdavācyā bhavanti |
kaḥ punaratra samāsaḥ ? ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣa eva |
kā vṛttiḥ ? na tāvadanutsṛṣṭasvārthā |
tarhiṃ bhavatu yuktaṃ punaryadutsṛṣṭasvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt ?
bāḍhaṃ, yuktam | evaṃ hi dṛś‍yate loke puruṣo 'yaṃ parakarmaṇi pravartamānaḥ svakarmotsṛjati, tadyathā—'takṣā rājakarmaṇi pravartamānastatkarmotsṛjati' |
nanvevaṃ sati rājapuruṣamānayetyukte puruṣamātrasya ānayanaṃ prāp‍noti |
naiva doṣaḥ| utsujannapyasau svārthaṃ nātyantāyotsṛjati | yaḥ parārthavirodhī svārthastamevotsṛjati | tadayathā—takṣā rājakarmaṇi pravartamānastakṣakarmotsṛjati, na hīkṣitahasitakaṇḍūyitāni | na cāyamarthaḥ paramārthavirodhī | viśeṣaṇaṃ nāma (tat) tasmānnotsṛjati | astu vā svārthasyātyantamutsargaḥ samarthadhikāro vṛttau kriyate tatra rājña ityukte sarvasvaṃ prasaktaṃ, puruṣa ityukte sarvasvāmī prasaktaḥ |
ihedānīṃ rājapuruṣamānayetyukte rājā puruṣaṃ nivartayatyanyebhyaḥ svāmibhyaḥ puruṣo 'pi rājānamanyebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ |
evametasminnubhayato vyavacchinne yadi rājārtho nivartate kāmaṃ nivartatāṃ na jātucit puruṣamātrasyānayanaṃ bhaviṣyati, prākpravṛterakṛtārthasya nivṛttau vṛttireva na syāt, vṛttinimittā ca nivṛttistasmāddoṣa iti |
kiṃ punaridaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāma ? bhedaḥ, saṃsarga ubhayaṃ vā | tatra rājñaḥ puruṣa ityatra yadā tāvadetadavadhṛtaṃ parāyattavṛttirayaṃ puruṣo na svatantrastadā svāmisaṃsargasyāvagatatvāt svāmiviśeṣajñānāyopādīyamāno rājaśabdaḥ svāmyantarebhyaḥ puruṣaṃ svāvartayati, so 'yaṃ svāmyantaravyavacchedo bheda ityucyate | yadā punaranavagataparāyattabhāvasya puruṣasya svāmisambandhadyotanāya rājaśabdaḥ prayujyate tadā viśeṣasaṃsargasya śabdopādānatvādana— vakāśo viśeṣāntare sampāta ityaśabdāsvāmyantaranivṛttirarthādavasīyate, yadā tvarthāntarānivṛttiḥ svārthāsaṃsargaṃ cākṣisandhāya upasarjanapadaprayujya . . . . . . śabdārthasāmarthyayoḥ pratipattinibandhanayorabhedāpekṣāyāṃ bhedasaṃsargasamudāyaḥ sāmarthyaṃ bhavati |
tatreha bheda eva sāmarthyaṃ yato 'nantara ityukte avadhṛtamidaṃ kasyāpyavadheranantaraṃ, na svatantra iti samasto vidhiprasaktaḥ pravāsasyetyukte sarvaḥ sambandhaprayukta ihedānīṃ pravāsānantaraṃ ityukte pravāso 'nantaraṃ nivartayatyanyebhyo 'pyavadhibhyaḥ anantaraṃ pravāsayannivartatyanyebhyaḥ sambandhibhyaḥ, tatra yo 'sau bheda: tatsāmarthyaṃ, tannivṛttā ca vṛttiḥ | bhedānimittāyāṃ ca vṛttau satyāṃ pratyabhimukhasya bhedamupajanayannupasarjanasyārtho nivartate, yasyāpi pradhānasyāntarāvadhimato nivartate so 'pi avadhimavacchinanti | evamubhayato 'pyavacchedena nirjñāte 'nantaraviśeṣe samudāyārthe vānyasmin prādurbhūte yadi pravāsārtho nivartate, kāmaṃ nivartatāṃ, na jātu (tadavacchinna) avadhimātrasya sampratyayo bhaviṣyati |
ke punaḥ priyāgamanavārtādayaḥ?
(1) priyāgamanavārtā, (2) priyasathīvākyāni, (3) diṣṭyā vṛddhayaḥ, (4) prītyādayaḥ, (5) sambhramaḥ, (6) abhyutthānaṃ, (7) priyābhyāgamaḥ, (8) sandarśanaṃ( / śaḥ), (9) priyābhyupapattiḥ, (10 ) parijanapramodaḥ, (11) maṅgalasaṃvidhānaṃ, (12) manaḥpraharṣaḥ, (13) utsavaḥ, (14) bhavanapratisaṃskāraḥ, (15) kārśyādyupalambhaḥ (/ labdhiḥ), ( 16) praharṣopacayaḥ, (17) premapuṣṭiḥ, (18) prasādhanagrahaṇaṃ, (19) vṛttānusmaraṇam, (20 ) avasthānivedanaṃ, (21) duḥkhādiparipraśrna , (22) deśasampadupavarṇanaṃ, (23. svaduḥkhasaṅkīrtanam), (24) śrṛṅgāravṛddhiriti | teṣu—
(1) priyāgamod‌ghoṣaṇaṃ priyāgamanavārtā, yathā—(harivi.)
aha āgao tti ṇavaria accāsaṇṇo vi saccabhāmāeṁ harī |
pariaṇamuha ccia suo bāhajalaṃtarialoaṇāeṁ ṇa diṭṭho || 99 ||
(atha āgata iti navaramatyāsanno 'pi satyabhāmayā hariḥ |
parijanamukhādeva śruto bāṣpajalāntaritalocanayā na dṛṣṭiḥ ||)
kuḍḍammi ohi-vāsara-rehā-saṃgaṇaṇa-metta-vāvāro |
vimaṇamuhīe ṇiacchasu ko aṇuvaddhiassa jaṇo muccaï || 100 ||
(kuḍ‌ye 'vadhivāsararekhāsaṅgaṇanamātravyāpāraḥ |
vimanaskamukhi! paś‍ya ko 'nupasthitasya mucyate ||)
(2) iṣṭavayasyānāṃ mithovyavahāraḥ priyasathīvākyāni, yathā—
accā/ ttāsamugghosia-daïāgamaṇe ṇavabahūeṁ imīe |
paharisa—ṇiruddhakaṃṭhatthaṇieṇaṃ gāḍhamuvagụ̄dhā || 101 ||
sahasā mā sāhijjaü piāgamo tīeṁ virahakisiāe |
accaṃtapahariseṇa vi jā maā sā maa ccea || 102 || (pṛ. 447)
(sahasā mā kathyatāṃ priyāgamastasyāḥ virahakṛśāyāḥ |
atyantapraharṣeṇāpi yā mṛtā sā mṛtaiva ||) (saka. 5.54)
(3) priyāgamaparitoṣikamaṅgalāni diṣṭayā vṛddhayaḥ, yathā—
gharakajjeṇa vi jo calaï jattha dhāvaï tahiṃ tahiṃ cea |
gharaṇīe ohidiahe paddhāvaï saṃkiaṃ hiaaṃ || 103 || (pṛ. 1457)
(gṛhakāryeṇāpi yaḥ calati yatra dhāvati tatra tatraiva |
vadhvā avadhidivase pradhāvati śaṅkitaṃ hṛdayam ||
ajja maha imaṃ sahi dāhiṇearaṃ piaamāgamaṇa-dūaṃ |
avaṇiakheaṃ baddhāviāsi papphaṃdara acchī || 104 ||(pṛ. 1462)
(adya mamedaṃ sakhi dakṣiṇetaraṃ priyatamāgamanadūtam |
apanītakhedaṃ vardhāpitāsi praspandate akṣi ||)
(4) pūrṇapātrādiharaṇaṃ prītyādayaḥ, yathā—
kaïātammiaïte saha sac‍ciapullavalhārilasaṃ |
ghāsaamiliāoaṇahoraṇi ahya kahiṃti || 105 ||
ko maṃ baddhāvehii jassa tumaṃ harisa—viasia—kaolā |
tassa tamaṃ kiṃ dāhisi bhaṇiūṇa pieṇa avaụ̄dhā || 106 ||
(ko māṃ vardhāpayiṣyati yasya tvaṃ harṣa—vikasitakapolā |
tasya tvaṃ kiṃ dāsyasi bhaṇitvā priyeṇopagụ̄dhā ||)
(5) samādarātiśayassambhramaḥ, yathā—
ānandod‌gamabāṣpapūrapihitaṃ cakṣuḥ kṣamaṃ nekṣituṃ bāhū sīdata eva kampavidhurau śaktau na kaṇṭhagrahe |
vāṇī sādhvasagadgadākṣarapadā saṃkṣobhalolaṃ mano yatsatyaṃ priyasaṅgamo 'pi sucirādādau viyogāyate || 107 ||
sahasā pattammi pie samuggaāṇaṃda-vāha-pihiacchī |
ajjhā sajjhasabahulā paaṃ pi dāuṃ ṇa pārei || 108 ||
(sahasā prāp‍te priye samut‍thitānandabāṣpapihitākṣī |
āryā sādhvasabahulā padamapi dātuṃ na pārayati ||)
(6) pratyudgamo 'bhyutthānam, yathā—
pratyudgamya tanūruhodgativaśāt khedaskhalac‍ceṣṭayā datvā svedalavaiḥ svahastapatitaiḥ prakṣālanaṃ pādayoḥ |
kiñcitsmeramukhaprakīrṇadaśanasvacchāṃśupuṣpojjvalai— rānandāśrubhirarghito dayitayā pānthaścirādāgataḥ || 109 ||
bāhajalollialoaṇa thaṇaya ṇa uppusia |
ṇa vi dahi-akkhaalaïa ṇa vaṃdaṇamāla kia || 110 ||
harisāraṃbhaviamiapulaükkaṃpabhara |
pekkhevi kaṃtu pahuttaü laggī kaṃṭhe para || 111 ||
(bāṣpajalārdritatalocane stanau na parimārjitau |
nāpi dadhyakṣatāḥ gṛhītāḥ na vandanamālā kṛtā ||
harṣārambhavijṛmbhitapulakotkampabharā
prekṣya kāntaṃ prāp‍taṃ lag‍nā kaṇṭhe punaḥ ||)
(7) kamiturāgamanaṃ priyābhyāgamaḥ, yathā—(harivi.)
ua jāva sā kilammaï appa-kkaa-viraha-vittharaṃtānuṇusaā |
tā patto jaha icchā taha ṇivvattiamaṇoraho mahumahaṇo || 112 ||
(paś‍ya yāvat sā klāmyati ātmakṛtavirahavistīryamāṇānuśayā |
tāvat prāp‍to yathecchā tathā nirvartitamanoratho madhumathanaḥ ||)
na khalu dūragato 'pyativartate mahamasāviti bandhutayoditaiḥ |
praṇayino niśamayya vadhūrbahiḥ svaramṛtairamṛtairiva nirvavau || 113 ||
(māgha. 6.19)
(8) priyāvalokanaṃ sandarśaḥ (saṃdarśanam), yathā—
āṇiapulaübbheo saatti—paṇaa—paḍidhūsaraṃmi vi garue |
piadaṃsaṇe pavaḍ‍ḍhaï maṇṇuṭṭhāṇe vi ruppiṇīeṁ pahariso || 114 ||
(ānītapulakodbhedaḥ sapat‍nīpraṇayapratipūrite 'pi guruke |
priyadarśane pravardhate manyusthāne 'pi rukmiṇyāḥ praharṣaḥ ||) (harivi.)
assia-sohāisao sac‍cāe vi bhoi-devadaṃsaṇa-jaṇio |
jaha hiaassa pahariso taha harisavisaṃṭhulāṇa acchīṇasuhaṃ || 115 ||
(āśritaśobhātiśayaḥ satyāyā api bhogidevadarśanajanitaḥ |
yathā hṛdayasya praharṣaḥ tathā harṣavisaṃṣṭhulayorakṣṇoḥ sukham ||)
(9) tatkālaceṣṭā priyābhyupapattiḥ, yathā—(amaru. 77)
āyāte dayite marusthalabhuvāmālokya durlaṅghyatāṃ gehinyā paritobāṣpataralāmasajya dṛṣṭiṃ mukhe |
datvā pīluśamīkarīraśabalāṃ svenāñcalenādarā— dunmṛṣṭaṃ kalabhasya kesarasaṭābhārāgralag‍naṃ rajaḥ || 116 ||
taha sohaï piaāgame pulaüvvelliaü siavalaaü ju mahīale daliaviralliaü |
uṇamuhaṃ de dohaheeṇa(?) sanamappiaü c‍cadu(?) ji virahivaïriu kalakalakaṃṭhiaü || 117 ||
(tathā śobhate priyāgame pulakotsāritaḥ sitavalayaḥ yo mahītale dalitaviprakīrṇaḥ |
unmukhaṃ tasya dohadadānena samarpito mama priyasya upajāpairnirvāriṇyaḥ kalakalakaṇṭhyo 'pi ||)
(10) sakhyādisampadaḥ parijanapramādaḥ, yathā—(harivi.)
dāraṭṭhaviasuradumaṃ dataṃ cia saṃgama/ saggakusumopaāragghaviaṃ |
aṇṇaṃ vi sac‍cavijjaï pariosaparittagghaṇaṃ tīe gharaṃ || 118 ||
(dvārasthāpitasuradrumaṃ tadeva svargakusumopahārārghitam |
anyac‍ca dṛś‍yate paritoṣaparītajanaṃ tasyā gṛham ||)
vāsaṭhṭhiammi sohā—pariosa—pasāhiāṇaṇāe maṇaharo |
appuṭṭhasoa—vimale sahisattho dīe dappaṇammi vi diṭṭho || 119 ||
(vāsasthite sobhāparitoṣaprasādhitānanayā manoharaḥ |
apsṛṣṭaśokavimalaḥ sakhīsārthastayā darpaṇe 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ ||) (harivi.)
(11) dadhidūrvāṅkurādiprayojanaṃ maṅgalasaṃvidhānam, yathā— (apabhraṃśa— pṛ॰34 ku.)
(ku.) ....valaü....siddhatthaü hāsuggamu dahi u pulaaü duvvākaṃdalu ā...sahiu |
pāseu ṇisevia(?) roaṇu takkhaṇeṇa kalia(?) vaaṇu ji maṃgalabhāaṇu pekkhevi eṃtu piu ||
loṇa—chaleṇa bhamāḍivi ghalliu raṇaraṇaü puṇujalamisiṇa vaaṃsihiṃ vāhuk‍karu ghaṇaü |
virahāṇalu ṇiṭ‌ṭhāviu ārittia—ṇiheṇa muddhae maṃgalu(?) paaḍiu daïāgama—suheṇa ||
(rā॰) pulaïsiddhathaü hāsuggamu dahiu bhūlaaduvvākaṃdalu ṇaā ..............................sahiu |
vāse ṇisevia roaṇu takkhaṇeṇa lakiuvaaṇu ji maṃgalabhāaṇa pekkhevi eṃtu pihyaü || 120 ||
(pulakitasiddhārthaḥ hāsodgamaḥ dadhi pulakaḥ durvākandalā navāḥ sakhyaḥ |
prasvedaḥ niṣevitarocanaṃ tatkṣaṇena kalitaṃ vadanameva maṅgalabhājanaṃ prekṣya āyāntaṃ priyam ||)
(rā.) loṇachaleṇa bhamāḍivi ghalliu raṇaraṇaü puṇu jaṇamisiṇa vaaṃsihiṃ vāhukkaru ghaṇaü |
virahāṇalu ṇiṭṭhāviu ārattia—ṇiheṇa muddhae maṃ galu(?) paaḍita daïāgamasuheṇa || 121 ||
(lavaṇacchalena bhrāmayitvā kṣip‍tā virahokaṇṭhā punarjalamiṣeṇa vayasyānāṃ bāṣpotkaraḥ prabhūtaḥ |
virahānalaḥ niṣṭhāpita ārātrikanibhena mugdhayā maṃgalu(?) tadānīṃ pratigṛhītaṃ dayitāgamasukhena ||)
(12) cittasantoṣo manaḥpraharṣaḥ, yathā—
dūraviaṃbhiapasaro kaa—kajja—ṇiatta—daïa—daṃsaṇajaṇio |
hiae ṇa māi lakkhia—reiasoa—viaḍe vi se parioso || 122 ||
(dūravijṛmbhitaprasaraḥ kṛtakāryanijadayitadarśanajanitaḥ |
hṛdaye na māti lakṣitā 'śokaviṭape 'pi tasyāḥ paritoṣaḥ ||)
paṇaaparipūraṇeṇa viaabhūsia—pia—āgameṇa a garuo |
pasaraï laddhatthāmo aṇṇuṇṇarasaṃtarehiṃ tīe pahariso || 123 ||
(praṇayaparipūraṇena virahotsukapriyatamāgamena ca gurukaḥ |
prasarati labdhasthāmā anyūnarasāntaraistasyāḥ praharṣaḥ ||)
(13) ābhyupayikamutsavaḥ, yathā—
paryutsukaṃ puramidaṃ sakalaṃ nirīkṣya dūrojjhitadhvajasahastrahatārkatāpam |
anyotsavena mahatākulitāntarātmā rāmābhiṣekadivasasya punaḥ smarāmi || 124 ||
eṣa prāsādamālaṃ dhavalayati sitairaṃśukai rājalokaḥ, sammardaṃ vetrahastaisti/rayati bharato lakṣmaṇenānuyātaḥ |
sānandā s‍nānabhūmau taralitanayanā harṣabāṣpeṇa cāmbā sītā s‍nehāvakṛṣṭā likhati vikasitaṃ padmamātarpaṇena || 125 ||
(14) punargṛhamaṇḍanaṃ bhavanapratisaṃskāraḥ, yathā—
tuha suṃdari gharakuḍ‌ḍaṃ dūroggaabāhuaṃ dumaṃtīe |
majjha ṇiraavaliaṃ valei paḍavakkha—hiaāiṃ || 126 ||
(tava sundari! gṛhakuḍ‌yaṃ dūrodgatavāṭakaṃ dhavalayantyāḥ |
madhyaṃ prakaṭavaliṃ valate pratipakṣahṛdayāni ||)
tuha kkhā/cchāmoari dūmiadūracchitteṇa hoi hattheṇa |
ālihia—muddha—kaṃkelli—pallavaṃ vi kuḍḍamiṇaṃ || 127 ||
(tava kṣāmodari dhavalitadūrakṣip‍tena bhavati hastena |
ālikhitamugdhakaṅkelipallavamiva kuḍ‌yamidam ||)
(15) virahakṛtadaurbalyādidarśanaṃ kārś‍yādyupalabdhiḥ(/dyupalambhaḥ), yathā—(śāku. 7.21)
vasane paridhūsare vāsanā niyamakṣāmatanuḥ kṣataikaveṇiḥ |
atiniṣkaruṇasya śuddhaśīlā mama dīrghāṃ virahavyathāṃ bibharti || 128 ||
keyūrīkṛtakaṅkaṇāvalirasau karṇāvataṃsīkṛta— vyālolālakapaddhatiḥ patipuro baddhāñjaliḥ pṛcchati |
yāvat kiñcidudantamātmakamitustāvat sa evetyatha vrīḍāvakritakaṇṭhanālamabalā kaiskairna bhinnā rasaiḥ || 129 ||(sūmu.193)
(16) ānandāt kārś‍yamokṣaḥ praharṣopacayaḥ, yathā—
vāasu—uḍ‌ḍāvaṃtiae piu pattaü sahasatti |
addhā uddhā valaa gaa addhā phuṭ‌ṭa taḍatti || 130 ||
(vāyasamuḍḍāpayantyāḥ priyaḥ prāp‍taḥ sahasā |
ardhā ūrdhvāḥ valayāḥ gatā ardhāḥ sphuṭitāstraḍiti ||)
pie sahasatti pahuttae vihaḍia tahe valaaṃ |
pulaüttaṃbhiagattahe sohahiṃ mahihiṃ gaaṃ || 131 ||
takkhaṇamukkaho soaho ṇaṃ baṃdhaṇaṃkaḍaa |
ṇāi paṇaṭ‌ṭhaho virahaho taralaturaṃgaapaa || 132 ||
(priye sahasā prāp‍te vaghaṭitāni tasyāḥ valayāni |
pulakottambhitagātr‌yāḥ śobhante mahyāṃ gatāni ||
tatkṣaṇamuk‍tasya śokasya nanu bandhanakaṭakāni |
nanu praṇaṣṭasya virahasya taralaturaṅgapadāni ||)
(17) sa hārekaḥ premapuṣṭiḥ, yathā—(harivi.)
ṇimmahia-kusuma-parimala-hiahiaāe vi mahuarāvali-caḍulā |
paḍhamaṃ piammi ̣dhṭhṭhī pacchā tīe vi surapāavammi ṇisaṇṇā || 133 ||
(nirmathitakusumaparimalahṛtahṛdayāyā api madhukarāvalicaṭulā |
prathamaṃ priye dṛṣṭiḥ paś‍cāttasyā api surapādape niṣaṇṇā ||)
tā/ to se piammi rasiā tā / to dumaraaṇammi viasiaüppalasuhaā |
pariosa-rasuvvela-aṇurāa-aṃdoliā ṇisammaï diṭṭhī || 134 ||
(tattasyāḥ priye rasitā tato drumarat‍ne vikasitotpalasubhagā |
paritoṣarasod‌velitānurāgāndolitā niṣīdati dṛṣṭiḥ ||) (harivi.)
(18) bhūṣaṇadiyogaḥ prasādhanagrahaṇam, yathā—(māgha. 9.43)
iti niścitapriyatamāgatayaḥ sitadīdhitāvuditavatyabalāḥ |
pratikarma kartumupacakramire samaye hi sarvamupakāri kṛtam || 135 ||
pulaübbeupasāhaï darakummāṇa thaṇa |
paharisu bāhu vihusaï ṇikkajjala ṇaaṇa || 136 ||
aṃsujalohu vi sohaï khāmakavolamuhe |
muddhahe kāiṃ ṇa maṃḍaṇu daïāgamaṇasuhe || 137 ||
(pulakodbhedaḥ prasādhayati īṣanmlānau stanau |
praharṣaḥ bāhū vibhūṣayati niṣkajjale nayane ||
aśrujalaugho 'pi śobhate kṣāmakapolamukhe |
mugdhāyā kiṃ na maṇḍanaṃ dayitāgamanasukhe || )
(19) vyatītaceṣṭānucintanaṃ vṛttānusmaraṇaṃ, yathā—(śāku. 7.25)
mohānmayā sutanu pūrmupekṣitaste yo baddha (bāṣpa) binduradharaṃ paribādhamānaḥ |
taṃ tāvadākuṭilapakṣmavilag‍namadya bāṣpaṃ pramṛjya vigatānuśayo bhavāmi || 138 ||
atrānugodaṃ mṛgayānivṛttastaraṅgavātena vinītakhedaḥ |
ahaṃ tvadutsaṅganiṣaṇṇamūrdhā smarāmi vānīragṛheṣu suptim || 139 ||
(raghu. 13.35)
(20) svākalyakādipratipādanamavasthānivedanam yathā—(vikra. 4.41)
