ṛtadhvajaśca suciraṃ tayā reme sumadhyayā |
nitambeṣu ca śailānāṃ nim‍nagāpulineṣu ca || 193 ||
kāminīsahacarasya kāminastasya veśmasu mṛdaṅganādiṣu |
ṛddhimantamadhikarddhiruttamaḥ pūrvamutsavamapohadutsavaḥ || 194 ||
(raghu. 19.5)
(23) premābhimānavṛddhiḥ śrṛṅgārapuṣ‍ṭiḥ, yathā—(kādakasā. 8.19)
iti vitatavilāsaḥ puṇḍarīkeṇa sārdhaṃ divi bhuvi ca vicitrodyānalīlāvihāraḥ |
abhinavaphalasampad‌vardhamānā 'bhinanda— śriyamabhajata candrāpīḍamūrtirmṛgāṅkaḥ || 195 ||
tīrthe toyavyatikarabhave jahrukanyāsarayvoḥ dehatyāgādamaragaṇanālokhyamāsādya sadyaḥ| pūrvākārādhikatararucā saṅgataḥ kāntayāsau līlāgāreṣvaramata punarnandanābhyantareṣu||196|| (raghu. 8.95)
(24) kalyāṇāntarāvataṃsā kalyāṇasampat saukhyaparamparā, yathā— (nāgā. 5.37, 39)
haṃsairāhatahemapaṅkajarajassamparkapaṅkojjhitai— rutpatrairmama mānasādavirataistoyairmahāpāvanaiḥ| svecchānirmitarat‍nakumbhanihitairaiṣābhiṣicya svayaṃ tvāṃ vidyādharacakravartinamahaṃ prītā karomi kṣaṇāt||197||
niṣkrāntaśśaṅkhacūḍaḥ patagapatimukhād vainateyo vinīta— stena prāgbhakṣitā ye viṣadharapatayo jīvitāste 'pi sarve| matprāṇāp‍tyā vimuktā na gurubhirasavaścakravartitvamāp‍taṃ sākṣāttvaṃ devi dṛṣ‍ṭā priyamaparamataḥ kiṃ mayā prārthanīyam||198|| (nāgā. 5.39)
karuṇānantarasyeyamudāharaṇapaddhatiḥ| pratarśitānayaivāsāṃ samānanyāyamūhyatām||199||
anantarāṇāṃ sarveṣāmayamekaḥ prakṛṣyate| ratirvisrambhacāsmin hi niṣkampatvaṃ prapadyate||200||
iti gaditamaśeṣa vipralambhasvarūpopahitanijasamutthe ślāghyaśrṛṅgāranāmnaḥ| ratisamudayarūpaṃ jīvitaṃ puṣpaketornivasatu sukavīnāṃ sarvadā mānaseṣu||201||
iti śrīmahārājādhirajaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe mānānantarādiprakāśo nāma ||pañcatriṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ||35||
abhinavamidamuktaṃ bhojarājena śāstraṃ bhajati hṛdayakoṣo vismayaṃ yena gāḍham| abhinava iti śabdaḥ sārthakatvena yukto 'nubhavapathamupetaḥ kevale bhojarāje|| ﻿
atha‍
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe ṣaṭ‌triṃśa: prakāśaḥ
sambhogāvasthāprakāśaḥ
athānantaryārthatad‌viśeṣaṇaviśeṣabhūtā eva kriyākālarūpaviśeṣāntaḥpātinyaḥ sattābhivyaktyanubandhaprakarṣasāṃjñikāḥ caturṇāmapi sambhogānāṃ avasthāḥ catasra upavarṇyante | tatra
1. nāyakayoḥ prāgasaṅgatayoḥ saṅgataviyuktayorvā mithassamāgame prāgutpanna‌: tadānīntano ratyākhyaḥ sthāyī bhāva iti rateḥ sattāsaṃjñā prathamāvasthā,
2. abhilaṣaṇīyāliṅganādīnāmavāp‍tau satyāṃ samupajāyamānaiḥ harṣadhṛtismṛti— bhirvyabhicāribhāvaiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ, ṛtūdyānopagamanajalakrīḍāparvatopaveśaprasādhana— grahaṇamadhupānendūdayādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ, savibhramabhrūkaṭākṣavikṣepālāpa— sambhramasmitādibhiranubhāvairabhivyajyamānaḥ iti abhivyaktisaṃjñākā dvitīyāvasthā |
3. īpsitamāsādayan jihāsitaṃ jihāsānaḥ iti anubandhasaṃjñākā rateḥ tṛtīyāvasthā |
4. prāp‍taprāpyaprakarṣāvasthaḥ sambhogaḥ śrṛṅgārākhyāṃ labhata iti prakarṣasaṃjñākā rateḥ turīyāvasthā |
tāsu ca yathākramaṃ saṃkṣepādayaḥ samupasargārthāḥ bhogaśabdārthena saṃbadhyante |
1. saṃkṣip‍to bhogaḥ sattāvasthāyāṃ,
2. saṅkīrṇo bhogaḥ abhivyaktāvasthāyāṃ,
3. sampūrṇo bhogaḥ anubandhāvasthāyāṃ,
4. samyagbhogaḥ prakarṣāvasthāyāmiti |
sa sarvo 'pi dvidhā— sāmānyarūpo viśeṣarūpaśca |
1. sāmānyarūpaḥ paśumṛgādīnām |
2. viśeṣarūpo nāgarakanāyakādīnām | ﻿
(1. sāmānyarūpaḥ paśumṛgādīnām)
tayorādyā yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.36—39)
madhu dvirephaḥ kusumaikapātre papau priyāṃ svāmanuvartamānaḥ |
śrṛṅgeṇa saṃsparśanimīlitākṣīṃ mṛgīmakaṇḍūyata kṛṣṇasāraḥ || 1 ||
dadau saraḥpaṅkajareṇugandhi gajāya gaṇḍūṣajalaṃ kareṇuḥ |
ardhopabhuktena bisena jāyāṃ sambhāvayāmāsa rathāṅganāmā || 2 ||
gītāntareṣu śramavārileśairīṣatsamucch‌vāsitapatraśobham |
puṣpā‍savāghūrṇitanetraśobhi priyāmukhaṃ kimpuruṣaś‍cucumba || 3 ||
samprāp‍tapuṣpastabakastanībhyaḥ sphuratpravāloṣ‍ṭhamanoharābhyaḥ |
latāvadhūbhyastaravo 'pyavāpur vinamraśākhābhujabandhanāni || 4 ||
atra ca sarīsṛpamṛgapaśupakṣipuruṣābhāsatasthivad‌viśeṣāṇāṃ nisargasiddhayaiva ratotsavo dīyate, yathocyate—
vṛthopadeśassiddho hi kāmo 'nākhyātaśikṣitaḥ |
svakāntāramaṇopāye ko gururmṛgapakṣiṇām || 5 ||
kamalinīnalinī dayitaṃ vinā na sahate saha tena niṣevitām |
tamadhunā madhunā nihitaṃ hṛdi smarati sā ratisāramaharniśam || 6 ||
(rudraṭasya kāvyālaṅkāre 3.57)
dantacchadāruṇimarañjitakāntadanta— munnamya cumbati hasad‌vadanaḥ priyāyāḥ |
kāmpilyakaprasavapāṭalagaṇḍapāli— pākāruṇasphuritadāḍimakānti vaktram || 7 || (māmā. 9.31)
pādāhataḥ pramadayā vikasatyaśokaḥ śokaṃ jahāti bakulo mukhasīdhusiktaḥ |
garvāyate kurabako 'bhihataḥ kucābhyā— mālokitastilaka utkaliko vibhāti || 8 ||
sā ca rateḥ sattā abhilaṣaṇīyāliṅganādisatyāṃ samupajāyamānairharṣadhṛtismṛti vyabhicāribhāvaiḥ saṃsṛjyate | tadiha 'samprāp‍tapuṣpastabakastanībhya' (kusaṃ. 3 gatena) ityādinā pratipādayanti, tatra hi vayassandhau harṣādayo jāyante | yadāha—(māmā. 9.29vat) ﻿
tadā kiñcitkiñcit kṛtapadamahobhiḥ katipayai— rathāgre vistāristanamukulamāsīnmṛgadṛśaḥ |
vayass‍nehākūtavyatikaraghano yatra madanaḥ pragalbhavyāpāraścalati hṛdi mugdhaśca vapuṣi || 9 ||
jātāśca te 'dharasphuraṇādibhirjñāyante, tathā hi—(māmā. 2.5)
nīvībandhocch‌vasanamadharaspandanaṃ dorviṣādaḥ svedaścakṣurmasṛṇamadhurākekarass‍nigdhamugdham |
gātrastambhaḥ stanamukulayorutprabandhaḥ prakampo gaṇḍābhoge pulakapaṭalaṃ mūrcchanā cetanā ca || 10 ||
ratiprakarṣādīnyāliṅganāni | tadiha 'sphuratpravāloṣ‍ṭhamanoharābhya' (kusaṃ. 3. gatena) ityanena darśayati | abhijñātā ṛtūdyānopagamanajalakrīḍākrīḍāparvatapraveśamadhupānendū— dayādibhiruddīpyate |
tatreha ṛtuḥ prakaraṇād gamyate tadyathā— (kusaṃ. 3.24,26,29,32,33)
tasmin vane saṃyamināṃ munīnāṃ tapassamādhipratikūlavartī |
saṅkalpayonerabhimānabhūtamātmānamādhāya madhurjajṛmbhe || 11 ||
asūta sadyaḥ kusumānyaśokaḥ skandhāt prabhṛtyeva sapallavāni |
pādena nāpaikṣata sundarīṇāṃ samparkamāśiñjitanūpureṇa || 12 ||
bālenduvakrāṇyavikāsabhāvād babhuḥ palāśānyatilohitāni |
sadyo vasantena samāgatānāṃ nakhakṣatānīva vanasthalīnām || 13 ||
cūtāṅkurāsvādakaṣāyakaṇṭhaḥ puṃskokilo yanmadhuraṃ cukūja |
manasvinīmānavighātadakṣaṃ tadeva jātaṃ vacanaṃ smarasya || 14 ||
himavyapāyād viśadādharāṇāmāpāṇḍarībhūtamukhacchavīnām |
svedod‍gamaḥ kimpuruṣāṅganānāṃ cakre padaṃ patraviśeṣakeṣu || 15 ||
udyānopagamanaṃ madhupānādayaḥ pratipādayanti, jalakrīḍāṃ kari ॰ ॰ krauñcacakravākamithunaṃ cābhidhatte | kroḍāparvatapraveśaṃ prasādhanagrahaṇaṃ, madhupānaṃ kinnaradvirephavṛttāntaḥ sūtrayati, indūdayo divāsambhoge na vidyate, ādigrahāṇāttu— (kusaṃ. 1.9, 15, 10, 14; 3.35) ﻿
kapolakaṇḍūḥ karibhirvinetuṃ vidyaṭṭitānāṃ saraladrumāṇām |
yatra srutakṣīratayā prasūtaḥ sānūni gandhaḥ surabhīkaroti || 16 ||
bhāgīrathīnirjharaśīkarāṇāṃ vọdhā muhuḥ kampitadevadāruḥ |
yad‌vāyuranviṣ‍ṭamṛgaiḥ kirātairāsevyate bhinnaśikhaṇḍibarhaḥ || 17 ||
vanecarāṇāṃ vanitāsakhānāṃ darīgṛhotsaṅganiṣiktabhāsaḥ |
bhavanti yatrauṣadhayo rajanyāmatailapūrāḥ suratapradīpāḥ || 18 ||
yatrāṃśukākṣepavilajjitānāṃ yatrecchayā kimpuruṣāṅganānām |
darīgṛhadvāri vilambibimbāstiraskariṇyo jaladā bhavanti || 19 ||
tasmin samāropitapuṣpacāpe ratidvitīye madane praviṣ‍ṭe |
kāṣ‍ṭhāgatas‍neharasānuviddhaṃ dvandvāni bhāvaṃ kriyayā vivavruḥ || 20 || iti |
deśaviśeṣasyoddīpanavibhāvatāṃ pratipādayati | uddīpitāśca te savibhramabhrūkaṭākṣa— vikṣepālāpasambhṛtasmitāni vibhāvānubhāvairabhivyajyante | te 'pi kinnarīmukhe yathoktaguṇayukte yuktito bhavantyeveti | ratyupacāraśceha sarvo 'pi sarvopakaraṇapraguṇayaiva viśiṣ‍ṭadeśakālopakalpitaḥ pratīyate | tathāhi—
ramyā navadyutirapaiti na śād‌valebhyaḥ śyāmībhavantyanudinaṃ nalinīvanāni |
asmin vicitrakusumastabakācitānāṃ śākhābhṛtāṃ pariṇamanti na pallavāni || 21 || (kirātā. 5.37)
tvaksārarandhraparipūraṇaraktagīti— rasmin muhurmṛditapakṣmalarallakāṅgaḥ |
kastūrikāmṛgavimardasugandhireti rāgīva saktimadhikāṃ viṣayeṣu vāyuḥ || 22 || (māgha. 4.61)
sammūrcchatāṃ rajatabhittimayūkhajālai— rālolapādapalatāntaranirgatānām |
gharmadyuteriha muhuḥ paṭalāni dhām‍nā— mādarśamaṇḍalanibhāni samullasanti || 23 || (kirātā. 5.41) ﻿
śrīmallatā bhavanamoṣadhayaḥ pradīpāḥ śayyā navāni haricandanapallavāni |
asmin ratiśramajitaśca sarojavātāḥ smartuṃ diśanti na divaḥ surasundarībhyaḥ || 24 || (kirātā. 5.28)
seyaṃ raterabhivyaktyavasthā |
ata uttaraṃ priyācaraṇavipriyākaraṇābhyāṃ pravardhamānā ratiḥ prāguktaireva vibhāvānubhāva— vyabhicāribhiranubadhyate| tacca tadopapadyate yadepsitamāsādyate anīpsitaṃ ca na sya॰॰॰ parādhīnavṛttīnāṃ munivananivāsanirbhayānāṃ bhayāhāramaithunamātravedināmupanatamano 'bhilaṣitāṃ puṣpaśaṣpasallakīmṛṇālatarutoyavarṣanirvṛtānāmalimṛgamātaṅgarathāṅgakinnarorvīruhamithunānāma— mithyaiva bhavanti | saiṣā rateranubandhasaṃjñākā tṛtīyāvasthā |
caturthyapi prakarṣasaṃjñikā vidyate (sā) tu yadyapi mukhyavṛttyeha nopadiṣṭā, tathāpi cātra viśeṣopadarśanairupadiṣṭeva bhavati | tadyathā—'madhu dvirepha' ityādi | tatra vidagdha kāmināmanyoktiṣu bhramara eva prakṛṣyate, tatra śaṭhadhṛṣṭadakṣiṇānukūlanāyakadharmāḥ kavibhirāropyamāṇā upalabhyante | teṣu —
śaṭhadharmo yathā—
pibanmadhu yathākāmaṃ bhramaraḥ phullapaṅkaje |
apyasannaddhasaurabhyaṃ paśya cumbati kuṭmalam || 25 || (kāvyāda. 2.206)
dhṛṣṭadharmo yathā—(kirātā. 10.34)
śvasanacalitapallavādharoṣṭhī navanihiterṣyamivāvadhūnayantī |
madhusurabhiṇi ṣaṭpadena puṣpe mukha iva sālalatāvadhūś‍cucumbe || 26 ||
dakṣiṇadharmo yathā—
bhramarāḥ kundalatāyāṃ cirarūḍhapraṇayabhaṅgabhīrutayā |
dayitatamāmapi vipine cūtalatāṃ nibhṛtamabhilaṣanti || 27 ||
anukūladharmo yathā—
mugdhāmajātarajasaṃ kalikāmakāle bālāṃ kadarthayasi kiṃ navamālikāyāḥ |
anyāsu tāvadupabhogasahāsu bhṛṅga! lolaṃ vinodaya manaḥ sumanolatāsu || 28 ||
﻿
tasya ca paravati tatsaṅgamasubhagaṃmāninaḥ svayoṣiti ratistathā na svadate yathā mithoviprayuktamṛgayūnoriti taduttarārdhena pratipādayati, prakṛṣṭaśca mṛgas‍‍neha iti sārvalaukikī gāthā— (gāsa. 3.87)
raṇṇammi taṇaṃ raṇṇammi pāṇiaṃ savvado saaṃgāhaṃ |
taha vi miāṇa maīṇaṃ a āmaraṇaṃtāiṃ pemmāiṃ || 29 ||
(araṇyaṃ tṛṇamaraṇye pānīyaṃ sarvataḥ svayaṃgrāhyam |
tathāpi mṛgāṇāṃ mṛgīṇāṃ cāmaraṇāntāni premāṇi ||)
mṛgas‍nehād gajas‍neha iti prakṛṣṭamanyadapi vilokitam | yathocyate—
revāpayaḥ kisalayāni ca sallakīnāṃ vindhyopakaṇṭhavipinaṃ vipulaṃ vihāya |
kiṃ śocase gaja! gato 'si vaśaṃ kariṇyāḥ s‍neho hi kāraṇamanarthaparamparāyāḥ || 30 ||
gajas‍nehāccakras‍neho viśiṣyata ityapi vilokitam | sa hi priyatamayā viyujyamānaḥ kilaivamāha, yathā—(sūmu. 250)
āpṛṣṭā 'si vyathayasi mano durbalā vāsaraśrī— rehyāliṅga kṣapaya rajanīmekikā cakravāki!| nānyāsakto na khalu kupito nānurāgacyuto vā daivādhīnastadiha bhavatīmasvatantrastyajāmi || 31 ||
tadubhayamapi dvitīyaślokenācaṣṭe, cakravākas‍nehādapi kinnaramithunas‍nehaḥ prakṛṣyate, taddhi mitho viyuktaṃ kṣaṇamapi na jīvati, tat tṛtīyaślokenābhidhatte | tato 'pi vṛkṣavallīprema prakṛṣṭam, te tathā mitho vyatiṣajyete yathā yāvajjīvaṃ tathaivārdhanārīśvaravadavatiṣṭhete, taccaturthaślokenāha | so 'yaṃ caturavastho 'pi sambhogaśrṛṅgāraḥ sāmānyarūpa uktaḥ|
(2. viśeṣarūpo nāgarakanāyakādīnām)
athaiva viśiṣṭanāyakaviṣayo viśeṣarūpa ucyate | sa ca sāttvikādināyakabhedāt sthirāsthiratvāditāratamyāt prabandhenopapadyamāno dvādaśaprakāra utpadyate | ﻿
1. prathamasandarśanakṣaṇa eva saṃkṣepeṇotpanna saṃkṣip‍ta ityucyate |
2. athaiṣa dvitīyāvasthāyāṃ vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogairabhivyajyamānaḥ svabhāva— kuṭilatvād vyañjanasambandha ॰ ॰ ॰ sso 'pi dvādaśaprakāra eva viprathate | saṅkīryamāṇatvācca saṅkīrṇa ityucyate |
3. athāyameva īpsitamāsādayañ jihāsitaṃ jihānaḥ paraprakarṣonmukhastṛtīyāvasthāyāṃ dharmārthakāmānanubadh‍nāti | tad‍vaśācca dvādaśaprakāro jāyate | sampūrṇarūpatvāt sampūrṇa ityucyate |
4. atha caturthāvasthāyāmayameva prāp‍taprāpyaprakarṣitabhūtakaraṇasāmagryato dvādaśaprakāraḥ | yathā pākācca samyamāsvādyatvamupagataḥ samyagityucyate | tatra —
(1. saṃkṣepapakṣe —12)
saṃkṣepapakṣe rāgopādhiḥ premāpi dvādaśaprakāraṃ bhavati | tatra
1—4 haridrārāgaṃ, rocanarāgaṃ, kāmpilyarāgaṃ, rītirāgamiti sāttvikasya, 5—8 kusumbharāgaṃ, lākṣārāgam, akṣībarāgaṃ, mañjiṣṭhārāgamiti rājasasya, 9—12 kardamarāgaṃ, kaṣāyarāgaṃ, sakalarāgaṃ, nīlīrāgamiti tāmasasya |
tatprāyeṇa puruṣāṇāṃ viśeṣa upajāyate | tatra—
(sāttvikasya)
1. alpakāraṇāpaneyaḥ haridrārāgaḥ, tadatisattvodrekasya, sa hi tathā na kāmena bādhyate | yathā sattvodrekāt karuṇādibhistenāsau nātitarāmaticiraṃ vā rajyate | ato haridrārāga iti, nāgānande jīmūtavāhanaḥ — (4.22)
na tathā sukhayati manye malayavatī malayacandanarasārdrā |
abhivāñchitārthasid‍dhyai vadhyaśileyaṃ yathā ' 'śliṣṭā || 32 ||
2. analpakāraṇāpaneyo rocanārāgaḥ, tanmahāsattvasya, sa hi kāmenābādhyamānaḥ dharmādipravṛttireva svakāraṇasāmagryato jāyate | tenāsya nātidurapaneyā nātiraktā vā rocanāyā iva rāgalekhā bhavati | yathā śākuntale durvāsasaḥ śāpenāpanīta smṛterduṣyantasya— (7.24) ﻿
sutanu! hṛdayāt pratyādeśavyalīkamapaitu te kimapi manasaḥ sammoho me tadā balavānabhūt |
prabalatamasāmevaṃprāyāḥ śubheṣu hi vṛttayaḥ s‍trajamapi śirasyandhaḥ kṣip‍tāṃ dhunotyahiśaṅkayā || 33 ||
3. analpakāraṇopanipāte 'pi prayat‍nāpaneyaṃ kāmpilyarāgaṃ tadatisāttvikasya, yathā hariścandracarite viśvāmitramocanāya dāravikrayiṇo hariścandrasya—
he dhanyāḥ śrṛṇutāvadhatta dhaninaḥ! seyaṃ mayā preyasī matpāṇigrahadūṣaṇāditi daśāṃ yātā jagatpāvanī |
durvṛttena durantapātakaśatadhvaste hitaḥ pauruṣe svāmitvaikasabhājitāpi sudatī vikrīyate krīyatām || 34 ||
4. kāraṇopanipāte yanmahatāpi svayat‍nenāpanetuṃ śakyate, tad rītirāgam | tadatimahāsattvasya, yathā janāpavādabhīrutayā nirvāsitāyāmapi sītāyāṃ rāmāyaṇe rāmasya—
tataḥ kairapyukte pariṇayavidhau kāṣṭhamunibhiḥ purāṇairātaṅkaglapitahṛdayena kṣitibhṛtā |
vinā vācaṃ naitat kṣamamiti nidhāyānanamadhaḥ- patad‍bāṣpāmbhobhirlikhitamiva dattaṃ prativacaḥ || 35 ||
eteṣu ca sattvacchāyādhikyānna tathāvidhā rāgacchāyānuvṛttirityāpīta eva rāgavarṇo bhavati | sa hi tathā na dharmārthayoranuṣajyate yathā kāme tenātitarāṃ rajyate, guṇeṣu ca yathottarecchatvāt kāmināmanurāge 'pi śīghrameva virajyate | yathā harivaṃśe (ucyatāṃ) vāsudevaḥ—
pāntha! dvāravatīṃ prayāsi yadi he taddevakīnandano vaktavyaḥ, smaramantramohavivaśā gopyo na nāmojjhitāḥ |
etāḥ ketakapuṣpadhūlipaṭalairālokya ramyā diśaḥ kālindītaṭabhūmayo 'pi tava re nāyānti cintāspadam || 36 ||
﻿
(rājasasya)
6. 1analpakāraṇenāpaneyaṃ lākṣārāgam, tadapi rajobahulasyaiva jāyate, yathā vikramorvaśyām ūrvaśīvilokanāpahṛtamahādevīpremasampadaḥ purūravasaḥ—(vikra. 3.17)
devyā datta iti yadi vyāpāraṃ vrajasi me śarīre 'smin |
prathamaṃ kasyānumate cori ! hṛtaṃ me tvayā hṛdayam || 37 ||
7. kāraṇopanipāte mahāprayat‍nāpaneyamakṣībarāgam, yathā yaugandharāyaṇadiprayat‍nato rājyalābhāya tāpasavatsarāje vāsavadattāyāṃ vatsarājasya—
cakṣuryasya tavānanādupagataṃ nābhūt k‍vacinnirvṛtaṃ yenaiṣā satataṃ tvadekaśayanaṃ vakṣassthalī kalpitā |
yenoktāsi vinā tvayā mama jagacchūnyaṃ kṣaṇājjāyate so 'yaṃ dambhadhṛtavrataḥ priyatame ! kartuṃ kimapyudyataḥ || 38 || (tāpa.413)
8. mahāprayat‍nenāpanetumaśakyaṃ mañjiṣṭhārāgam, yathā madālasopākhyāne madālasāyāmeva kuvalayāśvasya—
śreṇībhūtāmivāśāsu nikhātāmiva cetasi |
protāmiva vikalpeṣu rājasūnuramaṃsta tām || 39 ||
idaṃ cāha—
yadi sā mama tanvaṅgī na syād bhāryā madālasā |
asmiñjanmani satyasya sāvitrī sahacāriṇī || 40 ||
eteṣu ca rajobhūyiṣṭhatvād rāgabhūyiṣṭheṣu rāgāntaropanipātāt sktatāyameṣa varṇotkarṣo bhavati |
(tāmasasya)
9. athālpakāraṇāpaneyameva tāmasasya kardamarāgaṃ yathā mālavikāg‍nimitre | mālavikāvilokanāpahṛtacetaso mahādevyāṃ dhāriṇyāmirāvatyāṃ ca praṇayavatyāmag‍nimitrasya— (mālavikā.3.23)
manye priyāhitamanāstasyāḥ praṇipātalaṅghanaṃ sevām |
evaṃ hi praṇayavatī sā śakyamupekṣituṃ kupitā || 41 ||
1. rājasasya kusumbharāgamiti nopalabhyate bhedaḥ | ﻿
10. kāraṇāpaneyaṃ tāmasasyaiva kaṣāyarāgaṃ, yathā vikrāntaśūdrake śivagaṇasya—
sā vakṣaḥparivartanaikalalitā viśvāsabhūmiḥ priyā bālā niṣkaruṇena mugdhatapasā dagdhā varākī mayā |
bhartturbhaktirapekṣitā nanu punaḥ strīdāhadoṣo mahāñ jātaṃ sac‍caritaiṣiṇo mama punarmlecchasya yannocitam || 42 ||
11. kāraṇopanipāte mahāprayat‍nato 'pi sarvathā durapaneyaṃ sakalarāgam, tadapi tāmasasyaiva yathā raghuvaṃśe ajasya indumatyāṃ pramādamṛtāyāmapi varṣakatipayajīvino 'jasya | (raghu. 8.92)
tenāṣṭau parigamitāḥ samāḥ kathaṃcid bālatvādavitathasūnṛtena sūnoḥ |
sādṛśyapratikṛtidarśanaiḥ priyāyāḥ svap‍neṣu kṣaṇikasamāgamotsavaiśca || 43 ||
12. sarvathaivāpanetumaśakyaṃ nīlīrāgam, tadatitāmasasya, yathā kādambarīkathāyāṃ mahāśvetāviṣaye vaiśampāyanasya— (kādambarīkathāmukhe)
dūraṃ muktālatayā visasitayā vipralobhyamāno me |
haṃsa iva darśitāśo mānasajanmā tvayā nītaḥ || 4 ||
eṣāṃ ca tāmasānāṃ tamo 'tirekād rāgayossvakīyavarṇatiraskāre varṇāntaramutpadyate so 'yamupasargārthaḥ |
(2. saṅkarārthapakṣe —12)
atha saṅkarārthapakṣe prema dvādaśaprakāraṃ bhavati —
āvṛttavyājam, anuvṛttavyājaṃ, pariṇatavyājam, adhyāhṛtavyājaṃ, kṛtrimavyājam, apekṣitavyājam, antarvyājam, bahirvyājaṃ, ekavyājam, bahuvyājaṃ, sarvavyājaṃ, nirvyājamiti | sarvavyājamiha strīṇāṃ viśeṣata iva jāyate | tatra—
1. āvṛttavyājaṃ yathā—
caturacaṭubhirgạ̄dhāśleṣairhaṭhāt paricumbanai— ralakalalite vāraṃ vāraṃ gato 'pyatimandatām |
aparavanitāsaṅgāllag‍na . . . . . . . . . . . . . rnavatāṃ gataḥ || 45 ||
﻿
2. anuvṛttavyājaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 9.68)
yeṣiduddhatamanobhavabhāvā mānavatyapi yayau dayitāṅkam |
kārayatyanibhṛtā huṇadoṣe vāruṇī khalu rahasyavibhedam || 46 ||
3. pariṇatavyājaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 4.6)
avvo aṇuṇaasuhakaṃkhirīa akaaṃ kaaṃ kuṇaṃtīe |
saralasahāve vi pio aviṇaamaggaṃ balā ṇīṇo || 47 ||
(kaṣṭamanunanayasukhakāṅkṣaṇaśīlayā 'kṛtakṛtaṃ kurvatyā |
saralasvabhāvo 'pi priyo 'vinayamārgaṃ balānnītaḥ ||)
4. adhyāhṛtavyājaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 1.48)
aṇṇamahilāpasaṃgaṃ de devva karesu amha daïassa |
purisā ek‍kaṃtarasā ṇa hu dosaguṇe viāṇaṃti || 48 ||
(anyadayitāprasaṅgaṃ he deva kuru me dayitasya |
puruṣā ekāntarasā na khalu doṣaguṇo vijānanti ||)
5. kṛtrimavyājaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.243)
mānayogyāṃ karomīti priyasthāne sthitāṃ sakhīm |
bālā bhrūbhaṅgajihmākṣī paśyati sphuritādharā || 49 ||
6. apekṣitavyājaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.45)
bhrūbhaṅgibhiḥ sakampoṣṭhairlalitāṅgulitarjanaiḥ |
yatra kopaiḥ kṛtāḥ strīṇāmaprasādārthinaḥ priyāḥ || 50 ||
7. antarvyājaṃ yathā—(māgha. 10.28)
anyayānyavanitāgatacittaṃ cittanāthamabhiśaṅkitavatyā |
pītabhūrisurayāpi na bhede nirvṛtirhi manaso madahetuḥ || 51 ||
8. bahirvyājaṃ yathā—(māgha. 10.36)
ānanairvicakase hṛṣitābhirvallabhānabhitanūbhirabhāvi |
ārdratāṃ hṛdayamāpa ca roṣo lolati sma vacaneṣu vadhūnām || 52 ||
9. ekavyājaṃ yathā—(māgha. 10.35)
śaṅkayānyayuvatau vanitābhiḥ pratyabhedi dayitaḥ sphuṭameva |
na kṣamaṃ bhavati tattvavicāre matsareṇa hatasaṃvṛti cetaḥ || 53 ||
﻿
10. bahuvyājaṃ yathā—(amaru. 75)
kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prakalpitamaśrutam |
asahanasakhīśrotraprāp‍tipramādasa/masambhramaṃ vicalitadṛśā śūnye gehe samucch‌vasitaṃ puraḥ || 54 ||
11. sarvavyājaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 9.60)
mā gamanmadavimūḍhadhiyo naḥ projjhya rantumiti śaṅkitanāthāḥ |
yoṣito na madirāṃ bhṛśamīṣuḥ prema paśyati bhayānyapade 'pi || 55 ||
12. nirvyājaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 9.43)
dvāri cakṣuradhipāṇi kapola(lau) jīvitaṃ tvayi kutaḥ kalaho 'syāḥ |
yoṣitāmiti vacaḥ punaruktaṃ prītaye navanavatvamiyāya || 56 ||
so 'yamupasargasya saṅkarārtham |
(3. sampūrṇatāpakṣe)
atha sampūrṇatāpakṣe anubandhopāye prema dvādaśaprakāraṃbhavati— dharmānubandham , arthānubandhaṃ, dharmārthānubandham, adharmā 'rthānubandham ityādi |
. . assapata . . saṃ aṃlassa viraso raso hoi |
āda . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . || 57 ||
1(yad vācyaṃ yad‍vācyamapyubhayamapyetena sarvaṃsahā tvaṃ sakhyāḥ pramukhe pragalbhavacasā) proktā vaṭucchadmanā |
tatsarvaṃ praṇatasya me 'dya dayite dākṣāyaṇi kṣamyatā— mityuktvā 2(svakapardadivyasarito dhaute pade nāriṇā) || 58 ||
śāpādasi pratihatā smṛtirodharūkṣe bhartaryapetatamasi prabhutā tavaiva |
chāyā na mūrcchati malopahataprasāde śuddhe tu darpaṇatale sulabhāvakāśā || 59 || (śāku. 7.32)
ādyantayorasvādu picumandapākaṃ yathā— (gāsa. 844ve.)
jaï devva tuṃ pasaṇṇo mā kārihi majjha māṇusaṃ jammaṃ |
tā pemmaṃ aha pemmaṃ tāmā jaṇe dullahe || 60 ||
1–2. idaṃ dvayamasmābhirapūri | ﻿
(yadi deva tvaṃ prasanno mā kārṣīḥ mama mānuṣaṃ janma |
tat prema, atha prema tajjane durlabhe ||)
anavaratapākaṃ kapitthapākaṃ, yathā—(gāsa. 910ve.)
sottuṃ suhaṃ ṇa laṃbhaï aṃbo pemmeṇa pemmasya vaṃkavisamassa |
dugghaḍia—maṃcaassa va khaṇe khaṇe pāapaḍaṇeṇa || 61 ||
(svap‍tuṃ sukhaṃ na labhyate aho premṇā vakraviṣamasya |
durghaṭitamañcakasyeva kṣaṇe kṣaṇe pādapatanena ||)
yathottarasvādu kramukapākaṃ, yathā—
vodalaṃti hiaaṃ ciraāla—parūḍha—garua—vīsaṃbhā |
tamasosaraṃta sabbhāvadāruṇā pemmapariṇāmā || 62 ||
(vidalanti hṛdayaṃ cirakālaprarūḍhagurukavisrambhāḥ |
॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ svabhāvadāruṇāḥ premapariṇāmāḥ ||)
yathottarasvādu kharjūrapākaṃ yathā—(urāca. 1.39)
advaitaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoranugataṃ sarvāsvavasthāsu yad visrambho hṛdayasya yanna rajasā yasminnahāryo rasaḥ |
kālenāvaraṇātyayāt pariṇate yat s‍nehasārotthitaṃ bhadraṃ tasya sumānuṣasya kathamapyekaṃ hi tat prāpyate || 63 ||
tadetat kāmasarvasvaṃ tadetat kāvyajīvitam |
ya eṣa dviprakāro 'pi rasaḥ śrṛṅgārasaṃjñakaḥ || 64 ||
(yathā vipadmā sarasī yathā rātrira)1-tārakā |
avidagdhā yathā goṣṭhī niśśrṛṅgārā tathāṅganā || 65 ||
yathāṃśumālī pī/vītāṃśuryathānarcirhutāśanaḥ |
yathā 'pratāpo nṛpatiraśrṛṅgārastathā pumān || 66 ||
yathendunā niśā bhāti niśābhiśca yathā śaśī |
aṅganābhiśca śrṛṅgāraḥ śrṛṅgāreṇa tathāṅganā || 67 ||
yathā taḍidanambhodā payodastaḍitaṃ vinā |
ahaṃkṛtiraśrṛṅgārā śrṛṅgārāccā/raścānahaṅkṛtiḥ || 68 ||
1. idamasmābhirapūri | ﻿
rasaḥ śraṅgāra evaiko bhāvā ratyādayo matāḥ |
prakarṣagāmino 'pīha premaglāniśramādivat || 69 ||
iti nigadita—bhaṅgyā 'naṅga—sarvasvametad dvividhamapi manobhirbhāvayanto 'sya bhedam |
tadanubhava—samutthānanda—saṃmīlitākṣāḥ pariṣadi paritoṣaṃ hanta santaḥ prayāntu || 70 ||
yāvanmūrdh‍ni himāṃśukandalabhṛti svarvahinī dhūrjaṭe— ryāvad vakṣasi kaustubhastabakite padmā muradveṣiṇaḥ |
yāvac‍cittabhuvastrilokavijayaprauḍhaṃ dhanuḥ kausumaṃ bhūyāt tāvadiyaṃ kṛtiḥ kṛtadhiyāṃ karṇāvataṃsotpalam || 71 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakaśe sambhogāvasthāprakāśonāma
|| ṣaṭ‌triṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 36 ||
iti sanātanakaviśrīrevāprasādadvivedisampāditaḥ śrṛṅgāraprakāśo nāma sāhityaprakāśaḥ pūrṇaḥ |
